description: A fast-paced hardcore platformer featuring hand-crafted levels and lightning-fast respawns. Help Square survive his journey to the depths of Flatland, a minimalist neon-style 2D world. Run, jump, die, learn, repeat.

name: Ichor
description: Fluid dynamics shoot-em-up

name: 70 Seconds! Adventure
description: 70 Seconds! Adventure - a game where you have to wander around the locations in search of a way out of here. You will have to overcome the intricate locations filled with aggressive monsters and various bosses. Choose your weapon and arm yourself with it and go to a dangerous world

name: Connor's Desert Adventure
description: Connor's Desert Adventure is a side-scroller with a unique play-style where you will need to avoid rolling tumbleweed by jumping or sliding.

name: DeltaBlade 2700
description: Fight as a Rogue Cyberpunk Ninja-Robot in DeltaBlade 2700: an Action-Packed, High-Energy, Competitive Local Multiplayer Brawler with Explosive, Fast-Paced Sword Combat... and Jetpacks. Think on your feet, react quickly, fight cleverly: take advantage of every moment to turn the tide.

name: Thanks For Listening
description: "Thanks for Listening" is a short story-driven game that gives the player the chance to help four radio hosts with their lives.

name: GrapplingHook
description: Grab your hook and start your adventure! Grappling Hook is an adventure game with unique movement. Try to reach the end of the parallel worlds and get out of the lab. Grab tight and try not to fall when you move through different portals!

name: Super Monkey
description: Super Monkey is the Mario game style with very funny gameplay.Simple gameplay, nice graphic, funny monsters and sound, very funny and very interesting, Players can collect gold in exchange for clothing, skin, and new weapons as they go through the gates. Game for everybody!

name: Anthophobia
description: Anthophobia is a side-scrolling action survival horror. In the wake of a global plant-based pandemic, the protagonist has kept hidden in her apartment for three months. Now that her water supplies have run dry, it is time to brave the floral armageddon and seek new shelter.

name: Fun with Ragdolls: The Game
description: Become a ragdoll and create your own environments in Sandbox Mode, explore worlds created by others, or just flop around your destructible sets! Fun with Ragdolls: The Game lets you enjoy everything you love about ragdolls!

name: Cucumber Defense VR
description: Because of the abuse of fertilizer hormones, many mutant pests appeared on the planet, sweeping the whole planet of fruits and vegetables. And your vegetable garden will be their next goal. You now have the fate of the whole planet in your hands. grab up your weapons and protect the final fruits.

name: Protein for Muscle
description: Longing for muscles is one of the fundamental aspirations of humanity. Protein, which exists for muscles, is the only item we can trust. Steal protein without being found in machomen. It ’s easy.

name: Resort
description: A comet is on course to destroy Laburnum Creek. Writer Laura Tanner visits the former health resort to interview several inhabitants who are refusing to leave. But there’s something rotten at the heart of this picturesque town. A story exploration game between dreams and reality.

name: Capto: Capture Your Gameplay
description: Capto is a powerful screen capture, and recording app suite that’s perfect for capturing gaming actions live and creating informative gaming tutorials.

name: Player Power
description: A chaotic football arcade game!

name: 逃離地獄邊緣 - Escape from the cursed convent
description: Escape from the Cursed Convent is an adventure game, filled with rich storytelling which includes several game play styles such as qte,puzzle solving and more.It is a story driven by saint,freedom and faith which is located in a 16th century Catholic church...

name: BAFF 3
description: Minimalist, hardcore and challenging game in the genre of avoid-em up that will test your reflexes, timing and planning! This game is hard as hell!

name: Racing angle
description: Racing angle - is an arcade racing game where each level has a unique structure and camera angle.

name: Half-Past Impossible
description: Half-Past Impossible is an Incredibly hard Plat-former Inspired by the legendary ''I wanna be the guy''

name: Toasterball
description: A ball, two goals, and... toasters : Welcome to Toasterball. Play against your friends in this unconventional tournament, where toasters are athletes and the laws of physics are merely a suggestion.

name: Exactamundo: World Trivia Tour
description: Travel the world and learn about the incredible world we live in. Welcome to Earth!

name: 9-nine-:Episode 3
description: 9-nine-: Episode 3 is the latest chapter in this series of supernatural mystery visual novels with the focus now shifted towards a new heroine, Haruka Kosaka.

name: Darkness Rollercoaster - Ultimate Shooter Edition
description: The ultimate rail shooter in this corner of the Galaxy !

name: 机甲雄心：巡天者
description: 在遥远的未来，冲出地球的人类向广袤无垠的宇宙扩张，无数资源丰富的星球被开采. 然而并不是每颗星球都是平静安宁的，残忍的星际海盗，流浪的叛军，失控的机器人，恐怖的怪兽.... 于是人类联盟开启了“巡天者”这个职位，招募勇敢的年轻人，用来维护各个星域的安宁。 而你，也成为了其中一员，驾驶着太空船，在每个关键时刻登陆星球，然后用你潮水般的机甲军团将那些麻烦者抹去。

name: Hentai Fight Club
description: Sexy hentai girls want to fight you.Will you take the challenge?For the win get enough points in match-3 puzzle.Girls take defeat so seriously, that even lose their clothes.-Worldwide Reviews

name: Heart in the Dark
description: In the course of the 3D action adventure Leonidon will fight many battles, in which he has a combat system of 4 elements fire, water, air and earth, each element has 28 attacks, besides he has his alchemy skills to support himself

name: Sex & Gun PC
description: "Grab your weapon and experience a fast paced gun fight game with interactive sex, driven by a crazy story : "The Rise of RoboCock".

name: YARBAY
description: Yarbay is a psychological dramatic FPS game that tells the story of a warplane pilot. His plane shot down in the middle of the desert, in Middle East by terrorists and he has to take care of himself. Yarbay means "lieutenant colonel" in Turkish. And this "yarbay" Cihangir, must return to Turkey in one piece.

name: Elite Escape
description: You've been accepted to Alpha-X, an elite special forces unit comprised of only the brightest analytical minds in the world. Pass the entry test and show that your selection was not a mistake. Test your problem-solving skills in this futuristic puzzle/escape room game!

name: Challenging Dogfights
description: Take control of the US aircrafts at the World War II, fight against deadly enemies! Play through several challenging missions and free-play mode with the desired map, aircraft and difficulty.

name: Emperium
description: An epic adventure filled with loot, and monsters. Enter the world of Emperium!

name: Deadhaus Sonata
description: From the Creator of Legacy of Kain and Eternal Darkness. Deadhaus Sonata is a Narrative Driven Action RPG where you play the Undead fighting the living. An unstoppable force from Deadhaus, you are a monster among men, dealing death and destruction on a massive scale.

name: Paladin Slayer
description: Paladin Slayer is a hack and slash / beat'em all game, in the third person. In a universe of medieval fantasy with intrigues and multiple environments. A story of adventures against a background of conspiracy

name: Playing Both Sides
description: Playing Both Sides is a JRPG with a unique battle system and 10+ hours of play.

name: WWE 2K BATTLEGROUNDS
description: The world of WWE is your battleground with all-new, over the top, in-your-face arcade action as your favorite WWE Superstars and Legends battle it out in outlandish interactive environments.

name: They Can't Stop All Of Us
description: D.A.B. Your foes in co-op & PvP battles. (D)efend bases with weapons and skill. (A)ttack with clever AI armies. (B)uild amazingly creative defenses.

name: SE VR World Demo
description: This game is a playable technology showcase that introduces game mechanics which will be in a new game.

name: Nightmare Cave
description: Nightmare Cave is an indie action adventure RPG where you play as a teddy bear in a Dream Realm fighting off the Nigthmare. Equiped with a sword, a shield, a bow and infinite arrow, you must defeat and clear the Nightmare!

name: The Secrets of Jesus
description: The Secrets of Jesus is a classic point & click adventure game, which tells an old tale in a completely new manner.

name: ODA
description: ODA is a retrowave-style puzzle platformer. It's smart and unusual. Can it change your perception of space, time and your own life? Hopefully not. But it can enrich your perception of space, it can challenge you with quite unusual swap-mechanics.

name: Catgirl & Doggirl Cafe
description: Reborn in a fantasy world you're chosen to open a Japanese-style family restaurant. Instead of buying ingredients, you spend your money rescuing 2 animal-eared girls from a dastardly slaver! Enjoy a heartwarming *tail* about the blossoming romance in the Catgirl & Doggirl Cafe.

name: Color +
description: Your goal is to score more points over a long distance. Good luck

name: Haunted Legends: The Scars of Lamia Collector's Edition
description: A murder investigation uncovers ancient secrets and dark magic!

name: Hope; or How We Survived
description: A tower guard protects the town’s survivors but how does he pass the time when not shooting zombies? Hope; or How We Survived is a short, narrative focused game with pick up and play shooting and dialogue mechanics.

name: Little Helper
description: Welcome to the North Pole, where Pumpking is now the ruler! Help Santa defeat Pumpking and his minions once and for all by collecting all the stolen presents and saving all the Santas to save Christmas!

name: Hope for City
description: Hope For City is an Old-School RPG game. We designed this game for mini rpg & survival fans. Farming, crafting, combat, fishing, mini games and more, just explore it! Monsters, wild animals, orcs... Who do you think will win?

name: Kamile: The Fall
description: KAMILE is an interactive VR experience set in 2084. You are Kamile. Your husband is a genius scientist responsible for a huge breakthrough in AI development. When work-related incident turns into family drama you’ll be forced to fight and flight to protect your son and his secrets.

name: One Fantasy Shooter
description: One fantasy shooter is a first person shooter with big enemies and change gravity system for your hero. Explore the mysterious fantasy world, find secrets, open alternative versions of each level.

name: PlayClaw 7 - Game Overlays, Recording and Streaming
description: Use our cool in-game overlays to achieve the best gaming experience! Harnessing the power of your GPU, hardware accelerated H.264 codecs and the various overlays, you will have an advantage over your opponents and you can share your victories.

name: The Dark Wish
description: The Dark Wish is adventure horror game. Are you brave enough to discover true?

name: CUCKOLD SIMULATOR: Life as a Beta Male Cuck
description: CUCKOLD SIMULATOR, the exciting new game where you play as Cuckold (that is his name) in his day-to-day life. Work hard, give all your money to the bull, and be verbally abused by your fat wife.

name: Sky Cannoneer
description: An arcade classic reimagined -- build up your fortifications, place your cannons, and fire at the enemy forces! Improve your Battle Haven with powerful upgrades, including new types of Forts, Technologies, Superpowers, and Summons.

name: Every Day's Different
description: "Every Day's Different" is an English voiced visual novel that focuses on slice of life with a more realistic depth. It ranges from romance to heavy topics such as self-worth and divorce.

name: Slaveblade
description: DISCLAIMER: Made by one dev. Slaveblade is the story of Idraxymus the Enslaver. Already dead and tormented, Idraxymus makes a deal for resurrection. Everything in his path must be slain and his final destination is a mystery. Slaveblade is an exploration about what it means to live and die.

name: Crowd Simulator
description: It's really crowded!!! Crowd Simulator is a unique, fun experience that places you in different crowd scenarios. The main objective is to move with and against crowds.

name: 夢限ノ夜
description: ◇２時間程度のホラーノベルアドベンチャー◇　悪夢からは逃げられない。日向ヨウは夢を見た。中学生のころのなつかしい思い出だ。しかし、ヨウにはそのころの記憶がなかった。なぜ記憶がないのか。なぜ、今になって思い出したのか。 ヨウはかつての面影をもとめてなつかしの校舎へ向かう。

name: Raiders of Chanyu
description: Choose your fate and embark on an odyssey as a garrison commander in ancient China. Maintain order, crush insurrection and protect the lands under your jurisdiction from the nomadic Chanyu clans of the Xiongnu.

name: Desert monsters
description: This is a third person action adventure game,The player is located in a deserted desert full of monsters,Players are free to explore their surroundings.Players must avoid monster attacks or kill monsters to survive,Small monster attacks are lower, large monster attacks and higher health,Players need to survive as long as possible.

name: Cures & Curios
description: Cures & Curios is a virtual reality game for the HTC Vive. In the game, the player works in a medicine show cart in the Weird Old West, full of ingredients and tools. Players will concoct potions and elixirs, barter and trade with customers, and perform acts of magic.

name: 缸中之脑：谎言（Brain in a vat lies）
description: In this world, nothing is real, In pursuit of your own goals, the adventure is unfolding, There will be monster obstructions and intriguing events along the way. When you reach your final destination, you are...

name: Rage Melee
description: Jump in to this unique take on the 2 player fighter in Rage melee. Play the game to build up your rank in its 5 different difficulty's. Can you beat the competition and Skyzzim in this action packed arcade fighter?

name: Escape the Lab
description: “Escape the Lab” – Virtual Reality experience of an Escape Room that focuses on realistic chemical experiments.

name: Radial
description: Radial is a 2D speedrun oriented platformer in which you will be able to use teleportation portals. Be ready to acrobatic moves, fights againts creatures, hidden challenges and race against the clock! Will you master the portals powers and take up the challenge?

name: Trial Of Destiny
description: Trial Of Destiny is a unique mix of Action RPG + Deck building roguelike + Bullet hells where you play as Glen, the hero from the different world, summoned to save Gaia from the destructions of The Destiny.

name: The Longest Love
description: Amy wakes up in a strange room. She seems to have lost all her memory. She only knows that there is a blue monster under the same roof. She needs to avoid weird monster and escape from unknown houses. As time passed and groped, the weird monster tried to give her Inject a drug.

name: Crazy Critters - Combat Cats
description: Run, jump, scratch and fight to be the purrrfect combat cat! Choose from a variety of different characters each with its own unique ability and skills. Be careful though, there are no nine lives here! Shoot laser weapons and throw hamster grenades at all those that dare to stand in your way!

name: FLAT FORM FIGHTER
description: chaotic slapdown in a dark universe /// fight as your favorite characters, including: Goblin, and POOPY /// drive your enemies before you

name: Mondly: Learn Languages in VR
description: Experience the ultimate way to learn languages, without leaving home! Enjoy talking to our virtual characters and gain confidence for real life situations. Get instant feedback on your pronunciation, enrich your vocabulary and discover the fun in learning languages! Fluency in 30 languages awaits!

name: Adventure Escape Mysteries
description: Experience the unique puzzles and critically-acclaimed stories enjoyed by tens of millions of players. Investigate cryptic clues, unravel a mystery, and solve puzzles in beautifully illustrated adventures!

name: Last Message
description: Last message is a short atmospheric thriller / narrative / adventure game that brings you into a world overrun by infected.

name: Nour: Play with Your Food
description: An interactive exploration into the aesthetics of food.

name: Spirit of Midnight
description: Play as a house cat who gains the ability to leave home and embark on a supernatural adventure after encountering a strange spirit. Befriend a badger and meet other adorable creatures along the way, all in an effort to restore balance to the forest and uncover the truth behind its mysteries.

name: UFO : Brawlers from Beyond
description: "UFO : Brawlers from Beyond"! A fast action multiplayer shooter set during an intergalactic televised tournament where EARTH has been chosen as the BATTLEFIELD!

name: Scarlet Hood and the Wicked Wood
description: Scarlet Hood must lead a hapless Munchkin troupe through the Wicked Wood. Too bad the Black Witch, LeFaba, doesn't take too kindly to strangers gallivanting in her domain. Our fledgling witch soon realizes she's reliving the same day. Can she overcome the disaster that awaits at every turn?

name: The Defender: Farm and Castle 2
description: You are a magician who will protect the castle from the invasion of monsters. Manage your resources, Upgrade skills and build the castle, Increase your population and prepare to deal with more powerful enemies.

name: Fractalis
description: Fractalis is a procedurally generated roguelike that has turnbased/gridbased combat with a realtime feel.

name: Risnuch
description: Slash the enemies, improve yourself, join to arena, kill monsters, skeletons, golems.Join the infinity adventure of the Risnuch!

name: Cocktail for Beauty
description: Cocktail for Beauty - This is a classic 3 in a row game. Mix cocktails and treat girls, score points and look at new beauties! Drink them all!

name: Planet Automata
description: The galaxy is being threatened by an army of robots, but a brave hamster will step up as the hero!

name: Who Stole My Beard?
description: Your beard has been stolen! You and your loyal dog Leo must investigate the people and places of Beardsville to solve the crime. Uncover conspiracies, find new beards, and remember to pick up the groceries in this charming town of bearded intrigue.

name: Super Space Slayer 2
description: Save the galaxy from the demon king Luciferus by blasting demonic cultists and more! Based on the legendary Google Play title, Super Space Slayer 2 features completely re-designed mouse, keyboard and gamepad controls that make it even better than the original.

name: Tactical Nexus
description: Puzzle RPGs(Resource management games) that can be played for 10,000 hours by preparing all DLC. You can play for 2,500 hours by purchasing DLC up to the current Chapter-4. First of all, try playing with Mainpackage for hundreds of hours.

name: Sloth Quest
description: Control the true king of the jungle as you navigate treacherous vines, battle predators, scale trees and travel to the great beyond. Can you master the precise timing honed by all sloths in the jungle?

name: WildIsland
description: 剧情丰富的荒岛求生游戏

name: Dungeon Dreams (Female Protagonist)
description: Roguelike Romance JRPG with a female protagonist. Customize your characters, take open-ended quests and write your own story in the town of Ecallia. A game with town building, dating and life sim elements, but also a randomly generated Dungeon with lots of companions and loot!

name: Ladies Orders
description: One day, the assassins of Mahistî attacked the stronghold with a plot to assassinate Alys. But with the bravery of the knights, Mahistî's plan failed. Despite winning, but the assassin leader has escaped. Therefore, Alys led her knights to the south to find the whereabouts of the assassin leader.

name: The Blitzkrieg: Weapons of War
description: Become commander and defend the motherland from invading enemy forces. Utilise a devastating arsenal of weaponry, and survive the blitzkrieg!

name: Emo Simulator
description: Emo Simulator

name: Dodge Rocket
description: Dodge rocket is a fun survival shooter where you need to control a rocket through space, evading and destroying alien spaceships while your mission is to survive to get the highest score possible

name: Death Live
description: 有的人活着他已经死了，有的人死了他还活着。还有的人……早就麻木，忘了自己到底是死是活——死亡直播间Plus！橘子班灰色短篇视觉小说合集，由《死亡直播间》《假期第三天》等作品组成。

name: CosmicBreak Universal
description: CosmicBreak Universal is an Action MMORPG featuring PvP battles of up to 30 vs. 30 players at one time. Familiar WASD controls and fast-paced Arena action make it easy to jump in. Start playing now to customize, control, and battle with your very own robot!

name: Red Wings: Aces of the Sky
description: Red Wings: Aces of the Sky is an arcade action game that puts you in the middle of WWI aerial battles. Accompany the legendary Red Baron and cheat death on your way to victory!

name: GodOrEvil.Beta
description: This is a test version of a pixel-style card game. I hope you will be able to experience the challenges of simple card games. Obviously, customs clearance game is only a matter of time. It seems that the biggest challenge lies in whether Europe and Africa are successful or not.

name: Boat Violence: Ship Happens
description: Boat Violence is a 4-player local party game where you use your pirate ship to outplay, outwit and murder your opponents. Load your cannons and get ready to hurt your friends. Best played within punching distance of your friends.

name: Pixel Sentry
description: Do you have nothing to do? Don't want to load up a game where it takes a while to get into it? Well here is the perfect solution for you.

name: Chroma: Bloom And Blight
description: Chroma: Bloom and Blight is a truly free-to-play competitive card game set in the story-rich lands of Arholt. Every card and game mode in Chroma is free, including all future expansions. Find your hero, build your deck and tell your story...without worrying about the cost of cards.

name: Chained
description: Help Cole take revenge on the AI program named "Scout" and the company that put him out of a job. Solve puzzles, hack accounts, and stop the field of cybersecurity from being taken over by an evolving AI system.

name: Rainforest Solitaire
description: Enjoy the addictive beautiful matching solitaire in the tropical forest and show your card skills!

name: Kung Fu Jesus
description: Join Kung Fu Jesus on a psychedelic, genre-busting beat 'em up set in a madcap world where organized crime, alternate dimensions, and hardcore martial arts converge. From the seedy underworld to the spiritual plane and beyond – nothing is as it seems in Kung Fu Jesus!

name: Sensible Blood Rugby
description: An hommage to classic arcade games from the 90s , adapted to the olympic sport of rugby sevens !

name: Only One Burn
description: Land the craft without crashing. Oh, and you only get one burn!

name: Morbid: The Seven Acolytes
description: Morbid: The Seven Acolytes is a Horrorpunk Action RPG filled with Lovecraftian horrors and Cronenbergian gore, making it the most gruesome take on the isometric Souls-like genre yet!

name: The Chasm - Mines Of Madness
description: Lovecraft. Procedural generation. Roguelike experience. Digging. Cosmic horror. The Chasm has opened.

name: You are apt
description: You are apt - this is a fascinating shooter in which you need to destroy objects and prevent them from falling down. Test your reaction, prudence and try not to drop objects. How accurate are you?

name: Games
description: A battle to save your friends in the most epic way.

name: Boardwalk Carnival Game
description: Create your own Carnival. Play Fun, Entertaining Mini Games

name: Inside The Park VR
description: Inside The Park VR is an immersive virtual reality baseball simulator developed for the Valve Index. Designed to make you a better player, Inside The Park VR delivers on this promise with immersive visuals, realistic physics, and dynamic data to make you the best baseball player you can be.

name: CATAPULT BATTLE SIMULATOR!
description: Completely sick catapult! Crazy! In multiplayer mode moreover! Shoot everything you can find!

name: MAZEMAN
description: MAZEMAN is an arcade game that will challenge you big time thanks to its frantic pace. Enter the maze and look for the key while avoiding all kinds of dreadful monsters. Lots of unlockables, monsters, levels, power-ups, await you in this beautiful, stream of pixel art mazes filled with arcade vibes!

name: Blade Warrior
description: The beast was present in the land, As night grew strong and set the sun to flight, So its legions made ready... Find the seven fragments held by the seven wizards in the seven towers in this DOS classic and free the world enslaved by Murk.

name: Murder by Numbers
description: Solve Pixel Puzzles to find clues. Use those clues to interrogate witnesses. Work your way to the truth... ...and uncover the mystery of Murder by Numbers!

name: Shuttlecock-H: Covered Rematch
description: Shuttlecock-H: Covered Rematch is a second installment of the challenging Bullet Hell for players of all ages. Completely new levels in a pleasant company of three cute girls.

name: TextureWorks
description: TextureWorks is an incredible one stop powerful tool for Texture Synthesis, Texture Re-scaling, Texture Designing, tiled texture generation, Texture Map Generations; with over 1600 texture files available free with the Base code to help you simplify your game development workflow.

name: Hyperspeed Fragfest
description: Hyperspeed Fragfest is a futuristic first person shooter featuring beautiful endless worlds and a unique ultra-fast player movement.

name: Gericonia 2
description: You are the leader of a new Settlement. Sent from the Capital, your goal is to tame the lands and uncover secrets. In this strategy game, you will build a city and manage different resources. Expand your town, battle outsiders, master the unknown and launch expeditions.

name: Sex City
description: A city that will cheer you up! And in fact, not only the mood. In this game, control takes only one hand!

name: Quantism
description: Quantism is a learning program for everyone who is interested in chemistry. We offer an intuitive interface, clear animations and images, along with a progress system, tests and exams. Learn more about the amazing world of atoms and molecules in the many chapters Quantism has to offer!

name: V1RUZ
description: In V1RUZ, you see yourself stuck in the middle of an ever growing virus epidemic in the USA. Learn how to craft weapons, tools and fight against the living and the dead to survive in this cruel, rotting world.

name: The Fog
description: Explore the land collecting lanterns in a desperate attempt to survive the thick, evil fog in this atmospheric platformer.

name: Crimson Hotel
description: In 1949 two gruesome accidents tainted the Crimson's reputation and led to an innocent mother being charged with murder. Jane Barker hasn't been seen since her release in 1954. You're a group of teenagers on their way home from a party when your car breaks down outside the Crimson Hotel...

name: Fantasy Gladiators
description: Enter the world of Fantasy Gladiators, where creatures span from the normal (Kings) to the unexpected (a tiny, murderous clown). You must carefully craft your dream roster and mercilessly take down your opponent. Every decision could make or break your entire dynasty.

name: Graviton
description: The Traykonians don't believe there's intelligent life on Earth, and it's up to you to prove them wrong. Manipulate gravity to solve their mind-bending puzzles... just try not to accidentally fling yourself into any lasers.

name: Viper
description: The sister title to Tunnel B1 takes the battle to the skies!

name: Lonely Arts
description: Let global players create arts freely. An art simulator to relax people's spirit and relieve pressure. We will gather the creativity of players around the world, and strive to create the most suitable platform for players to create.

name: A Street Cat's Tale
description: A Tale of a street cat left alone

name: DEDstress
description: DEDstress is a bizarre, high-intensity thriller. Assisted by voices in your head - run, hide and bribe your way out of a strange South African mental hospital, where the staff need more help than the patients.

name: Super Realistic Autocross VR
description: Super Realistic Autocross is an arcade-style racing simulator that brings the fun of Solo Autocross to your computer in VR! Learn your car and compete globally against professional drivers to climb the leaderboard.

name: SereNest
description: Sometimes you need time to relax in your own space. Provides five tranquil rooms with relaxing musics.

name: Asylum of the Dead
description: Asylum of the Dead is a first person zombie shooting survival game.

name: Chinatris
description: Chinatris is a Tetris-like game about Chinese characters where different charactersfall to create new ones. To win, you must create the target characters from each stage. You’ll be having fun while learning Chinese!

name: Recyclomania
description: Build your own recycling plants and become a recycling master in this incredible Match 3 game!

name: TILTit
description: A hard as nails frantic arcade falling blocks physics puzzler on a seesaw - where your performance shapes a city over 20 levels.

name: CRUEL WORLD
description: Cruel World - a sandbox and a survival simulator in a harsh post-apocalyptic world. Try on the role of a lone survivor. In a cruel world destroyed by human stupidity. Hide, craft, fight, explore, survive!

name: The Dark Eye : Book of Heroes
description: Experience classical role-playing together with your friends in a co-op multiplayer RPG based on THE DARK EYE license that lets you engage in party-based adventures in the fantasy world of Aventuria.

name: Chapeau
description: 🎩 Party Hats Go Head to Head! 👒 Bounce, float and zoom through the air in this frantic party game, and bring back memories from the good old days of couch co-op or beat the bots in solo challenge mode.

name: Dictators:No Peace Countryballs
description: Dictators : No Peace Countryballs is a war simulation and dictator game. This is a fun,simple and some say a funny countryballs game. If you like simulation games, you will love playing Dictators : No Peace. Play as a dictator of your favourite country and colonize the world.

name: NYX: The Awakening
description: Imprisoned by the ancient goddess Nyx, Vicky has to overcome her fears and fight the creatures that have invaded her town. Go back to the 80's and prepare yourself for a blast of neon nostalgia. Save your world and escape the nightmare!

name: VR垃圾分类_Refuse classification
description: Combining advanced VR technology with hot topics of people's livelihood, through interesting and vivid interactive experience of VR, students'learning enthusiasm is greatly mobilized. In the VR garbage sorting contest, students can grasp the key points of the propaganda activities.

name: Two Weeks in Painland
description: Two Weeks in Painland is a story-driven game about a run-of-the-mill hacker spying on gangsters who are anything but, all while trying to keep his life and limbs in the process. Easier said than done.

name: Travellers Rest
description: You are an innkeeper, on a journey to transform a run-down inn into a bustling social space. Brew your own beer, run a farm, explore the world, and build relationships with your customers to create your own fantasy tavern!

name: Cetetorius
description: This is a first-person action RPG where you are free to do whatever you want. Turn off the road, start the adventure! The world is open to exploration. Explore the lands of the kingdom, look for unique artifacts, create many objects with a simple crafting system and become part of an amazing world!

name: AMazing TD
description: AMazing TD is a unique strategy game that focuses on building mazes in a competitive Tower Defense gameplay. Explore endless possibilities as you play on maps with distinct randomized tiles. Each game you will experience will require different strategies.

name: War Ghost
description: Inspired by the adventure and imagination we love in classic such as " Age of Empires ", WAR GHOST Presents a fictional and peculiar story that reminds us of the great battles that took place in history. of humanity.The main story of the game is set in a chaotic universe of constant conflict.

name: Tractor Cargo Driving Simulator

Engage in deadly shootouts with a diverse arsenal of weaponry in this fast competitive online FPS. The objective: Get the encrypted data back to the source. Find the encrypted key and activate the data SLOT, a pyramidal dock with the power of sending the data back to ATMOS.

RotoBrix

description: NearPrime VR is a built-for-VR Cyberpunk FPS, incorporating elements of old and new FPS experiences with an unprecedented level of immersion to tell a riveting story of love, sacrifice, and what it means to be human. Jack into the eyes of near-future Heroes with superhuman abilities.

name: TrickShot
description: TrickShot is a fun single-player VR game with a challenge like no other!. Your goal is to use a ball to solve puzzles, play at the arcade or enjoy the hype of endless mode. Does this sound too easy for you? well, let's see if you will be our next TrickShot champion.

name: Bootybuns 2
description: Sexy card game - what forfeits can you get the girls to perform !?

name: Hunting Simulator 2
description: With your hunting dog by your side, explore the Texan desert and forests of Colorado and Europe as you track down 33 animal species. Choose your gear from over 160 official weapons, accessories and clothing items (including Browning, Winchester and Bushnell).

name: Men of War: Assault Squad 2 - Cold War
description: The legendary Men of War RTS series has reached the cold war era. Take command of U.S. or Soviet soldiers, controlling vast armies with the military decisions down to you. Claim victory in dynamic singleplayer and co-op campaigns or challenge fellow strategists in online multiplayer!

name: Pictoglyph
description: Pictoglyph is a Nonogram/Picross style puzzle game in which the player learns and remembers a set of shapes represented by symbols, which have to be marked on a grid using clues and logic.

name: VR瓦割り / VR roof tile
description: This game competes how many tiles are broken in VR space. It simulates with controller speed tracking and physics. You can compete with people from all over the world in the ranking system. It can also be a stress relief.

name: Star Girl Proxima
description: Become a magical girl hero and defend the alien world of Proxima Centauri b in Star Girl Proxima! An 8-bit style action-platformer.

name: 不可思议佣兵团
description: This is a small story about a small mercenary group that strives to survive in adversity. Notes: All Charactors in this game are older than 18.

name: Captain fly and sexy students

name: Psy High 2: High Summer

name: Protect Your Fool

name: Martian Law

name: jut
description: A game about beach hunting. Put trash in your belly, wear a stack of hats, and find every item to complete the game!

name: Bombini

name: Dr. Umgebung's School of Life
description: Dr. Umgebung's School of Life is a game about simulating life in small glass terraria. You are attending a school where you earn how to mold life by tweaking the gas pressures and temperature inside a terrarium.

name: King of the Sandcastle
description: King Of The Sandcastle is an asynchronous online multiplayer pokemon-like dungeon crawling king of the hill game with permadeath and turn-based battles.

name: Moeras
description: A short action-adventure game about an archer that's guarding a swamp.

name: dino game

name: driftwood
description: driftwood is a short walking simulator about the North Sea at night

name: Hoco Poco
description: Hoco Poco is a harry potter duel style free-4-all local multiplayer.

name: Tomscape
description: An online role-playing game in which you slap rats, frogs, and other players to become the coolest.

name: kamer
description: Sokpop S02: kamer - a short game about daydreaming. Come home, walk around your room, and let your thoughts flow freely...

name: huts
description: huts is a game about finding & building huts while relaxing in the woods

name: Zoo Packs
description: Sokpop S02: Zoo Packs is a strategy game much like Fire Emblem and Advance Wars, except you can play it online against your friends!

name: Botanik
description: A relaxing game about a geometric-shaped gardener that takes care of various plants.

name: spider ponds
description: A game bout being a spider. Weave a web in the swamps. Catch prey, avoid other pedators, and follow a mysterious creature...

name: Llama Villa
description: The simulation game with Llamas!

name: Hentai Honeys Slider
description: Slider puzzle from 3x3 to 5x5. Contains 4 images. The image changes when you clear it.

name: ALLBLACK Phase 1
description: ALLBLACK Phase 1 is a visual novel adapted from light novel with the same title. Follow the journey of the amnesiac and seemingly abnormal "Theodore Quentin" as he uncovers his identity while escaping from the people who wants him at all cost...

name: Sleep Paralysis : mystery of the mountain village
description: Sleep Paralysis is a game that tells about the incident where you were possessed by supernatural beings when you fell asleep and was followed by a ghost

name: YORG.io 3

name: Follow the White Rabbit VR (화이트래빗)

name: Dark Light

name: 东方梦月谈~Lunatic Dreaming
description: (The following content is from Google Translate, please bear with us.)"Lunatic Draming" is a fan game of TouHou Project. The gameplay is dominated by the Magic Tower, with a small amount of RPG elements.

name: FOREST OF ELF
description: This is a stage clear action RPG game that fights with bows and arrows and powerful magic. Break through the WAVE set for each stage, and defeat the bosses who are waiting.

name: Pear Quest

name: Sushi Wildlands

name: Escape Room Simulator
description: Escape Room Simulator!... bringing your love for the classic genre into glorious 3d*. Navigate puzzles and manipulate objects as you attempt to escape from the simulated rooms.

name: NIMBY Rails

name: Wetpants
description: Wetpants is a short VR archery experience. Get your bow and bombs and guard that fortress to the last man and...tree?

name: Keeper 2119
description: First person videogame that uses teleportation to solve all kinds of skill and puzzle challenges.

name: Frozenheim
description: Frozenheim is a serene Norse city builder with elaborate management gameplay and RTS tactical combat. Lead your Viking clan through hardships of the frozen north, season by season, year after year. Build and survive. Set sail, explore and conquer. Win Odin’s favor and secure your place in Valhalla!

name: Brutal Sports - Football
description: Do you like action but reckon that chainsaw massacres are for grannies' tea parties? If you do then Brutal Sports Football is for you, league, knockout or unfriendly tournaments.

name: Legends
description: Two alien scientist have mischievously traveled back in time. Their sole purpose is to destroy the future of our beloved planet. By dropping modern weapons on ancient civilizations, they have enabled the more dubious humans to rule the world.

name: Daaang!
description: Roll your way around and smash anything you see in this physics-based sandbox platformer. No time limits, no objectives, just relaxing smashing fun. Earn money by playing the game and use that money to upgrade stats and special moves.

Lead your units to victory as the dark story unfolds. First you have to build your units, then you can order them to attack the enemy!

name: Cyberpunk hentai: Memory leak
description: A causal memory training puzzle with a nice reward at the end of each level.

name: O Rei
description: Do you want to reign?

name: GLADOM - 2D PVP Free & Skill Based
description: GLADOM it's a new and free to play multiplayer game PVP oriented with a focus on skill rather than progression.Play game modes of Deathmatch and Capture The Flag, in 1v1, 2v2, 3v3, and 4v4 matches.Easy to play, hard to master sliding physics-based mechanics.

name: Baron: Fur Is Gonna Fly
description: Thrilling aerial battles for up to 8 pilots in this local multiplayer action game. Choose a pilot, and let the battle begin. But wait! Your pilots are animals, and their biplanes are loaded with unusual weapons: flamethrowers, stinky fish, and more!

name: Voidlifted
description: Run and develop your kingdom. Go on missions and help save the world by conquering all lands.

name: Shining City
description: This is a casual game for city sightseeing.

name: Stilt Fella
description: Become the fella. Walk on the stilts.

name: 落华居

name: Boom 3D Mac

name: Witch Halloween

Aunt bequeathed all her fortune and Chelsea's house to niece, but she must to stay there exactly one night completely alone. After that, the whole fortune will go to Chelsea.

name: Bandit the game
description: Bandit the game is an RPG-survival with an open world and elements of tower defense, where you can build own base, gang and vehicle.

name: Armortale
description: Baby demon foxes are on a rampage! Head on an epic journey together with a wise witch to stop their mischief and save the kingdom. A fun action platformer with a unique armor swapping mechanic.

name: P1R4T3S

name: Caravan Chaos

name: Forgotten Hill Disillusion

name: The Castle
description: Evil has taken over a small town. But a group of courageous adventurers has decided to organize an expedition to end the feared vampire. Recruit a group of characters to enter the castle and fulfill your mission. But get ready because the castle hides many surprises.

name: Sons of Ra

name: The Paperman

name: Labyrinths of the World: Fool's Gold Collector's Edition

name: Head Over Heels

name: Devil Slayer
description: R18 Fantasy RPG

name: Ecosystem

name: Escape Zolstar

name: Helicopter Simulator

name: Wall Jump Stuff

name: Grid Wars

name: Last Knight

name: Platforms

name: Metal Heads

name: 巅峰骑士团
description: 让你找回GBA时代的游戏体验

name: Buck Zombies

name: World War 2 Craft (二战演义)
description: World War II RTS

name: RhythmSnake

description: Simple shooting game, using your skills and talent to survive as long as you can.in different types of maps, using different guns to defeat the enemys to collect scores and ammos. With the level getting higher,the number of emenys will increase constantly.As the level gets higher and higher, the game will get harder and harder.

name: Jera
description: Jera is a 2D platformer game, in which the main character will improve its mobility gaining elemental powers affecting the stability of the world.

name: The Pilgrim
description: Explore a strange and mysterious world, searching through the environment for symbols that will open the way forward.

name: Knife road
description: Take you through different time and space, Experience different customs of time and space, Meeting the challenges posed by time and space.

name: ITORAH

name: Phantom 3D

description: Accompany a shrine maiden and three fallen deities on a journey across a dying world, where hope is all man has left.

name: Persephone
description: What if death isn't the end, but the key to solve puzzles? Where, when and how will you choose to die in order to progress? Transport yourself to this magical world enriched with beautiful graphics and captivating music.

name: Coloring Game: Little City
description: A theme-based sequel of the popular Coloring Game (coloring by numbers).

name: Iridion 3D

Upon entering the Earth's gravitational field, it is revealed that the Earth has been invaded by the Iridion Empire.

name: Iridion II
description: The Iridions are back! Planet Earth is too far away to offer help. The only chance? A lone powerful spaceship...Yours!

At the same time, Kasumi's old wound starts to burn with a frightening power, making her wonder if she is to blame...

name: Ribbon

name: Cyber OutRun

name: Unknown Surge
description: First MMO FPS Game from Bangladesh

name: Codebreaker

Identify the missing item in a sequence of characters or symbols. Do you have what it takes to be a Codebreaker?

name: Phucker in the Woods
description: A group of youngsters go to the woods to self-investigate a disappearance...

name: Colonies End
description: Colonies End is a sci-fi, adventure, sandbox game set among the stars. You’ll be mining, constructing, advancing and discovering to survive in these dimension spanning realms.

name: GYATM Dragon Edition
description: You are the first person on Mars. You will need to establish a base, mine resources, and build everything the colonists will need to survive. It's one person against a harsh and unforgiving planet where everything we take for granted is in short supply.

description: Northern Storm is a build strategy game where a blizzard comes along and destroys your builds. After climate change caused a deadly cold storm, survival can only be achieved through strict management of resources. Remember that I am only one developer without a team, so don't expect a large game.

name: PROTEST SIMULATOR
description: PROTEST SIMULATOR

name: The Ai Games
description: Its time to learn the truth about reality, and serve our creator as his champion in the games.

name: Justin Wack and the Big Time Hack

name: PPDD

Since the enemy's attack sign is expressed visualiy,you'll not receive unreasonable damage and can avoid all attacks if you are an expert.

name: Xentripetal Force
description: Play Xentripetal Force while sitting on a couch with your family or friends to experience survival in outer space. You can team up with one of your friends to survive or play against each other. Xentripetal Force supports up to 4 players. Use your character's ability and score in your friends' goal in order to win.

name: PROP AND SEEK®

name: Snowdome

name: Alien Squatter

name: Mustache or Revenge
description: Do not let fiend steal your mustaches! It is challenging platformer taking you to the adventure through dangerous dungeons filled with ingenious traps.

name: Injection π23 'No Name, No Number'

name: Evergreen Blues

name: Henry Mosse and the Wormhole Conspiracy

name: 3rd eye

Take on your care robot and explore the underground, find new blueprints, gather resources and build your defenses and traps to survive through the night against a myriad of zombie-like creatures. Your goal: to defend the defenseless cradle.

name: 云聚：失落的魔法 Magic Ganglia

This game features customized protagonist, multiple routes and endings, exploration of dungeons which are full of challenges and puzzles, in order to restore the pure pleasure of both CRPG and TRPG.

name: Hentai NetPuzzle

name: Hentai ChessKnight
description: Hentai ChessKnight is a puzzle ,you need to play the knight and turn all the color block off.

name: Immortal Wanna
description: Immortal Wanna new game of DUCK INC. Just arcanoid with girls (All girls are 18 y.o.)

name: TheMovingMaze
description: A traditional maze awaits you, and you'll enjoy the old days
Sensei challenge you! This is a hardcore arcade game in which you will need to complete level in less than 5 seconds!

name: Hentai Dgirls
description: Hentai Dgirls is a relaxing puzzle game with beauty girls picture and relaxing music.

name: Silk

name: Samurai of Hyuga Book 4

description: A turn-based rally through Europe with the goal of becoming the richest!

name: NERTS! Online
description: NERTS! Online is a fast-paced competitive solitaire game for you and up to five of your friends, played the same way we play it at the Zachtronics office!

name: Mage Math
description: Mage Math is a fantasy adventure game where kids fight monsters, use magic, and practice math. Your kids will have tons of fun in a full video game that helps kids become confident in math. Grades: 1st to 6th

name: Dominos!
description: Welcome to Dominos! Setup domino chains and navigate your way past obstacles to the final goal! Play multiplayer with up to 5 players competing against each other.

name: Zombie Golf
description: Zombie Golf is fun mini-golf style game set in a zombie filled post apocalyptic city. Get points by taking out zombies or hitting numerous items throughout the city. Test your skills and compare scores.

name: 叫我铸造师
description: 大家好，很荣幸四十不惑还能为你做出这款RPG 在下不撸王者，不懂吃鸡，十几年来只做过50多款RPG ★有人说：这是快餐时代，没有人看剧情 ★有人说：你老了，还做这种东西，没戏 ★我想说：其实我只想做一款心中的RPG，献给怀念老味道的你。 来吧~如果你还记得那个味道…敬情怀，致我们心中的RPG。

name: Tiger Fighter 1931 Tora!Tora!Tora!
description: The game's system is somewhere between air combat and army warfare. It's a lot like the old game I played as a kid, and we control fighters to destroy the enemy's army. We crossed the line of fire and shot down one enemy after another.

name: Fluid Simulation
description: Feel bored or anxious? This app can solve your problem! Experiment and play with those swirling substances. Gorgeous visuals with professional post-effects like bloom and sunrays.

name: Project RIP
description: Welcome to Project R.I.P. , control AI driven Agents in the battle against hordes of demons. Show your skills on the battlefield and on Global Leaderboards in this Singleplayer Horror Survival First Person Horde Shooter.

name: Sable's Grimoire: Man And Elf
description: Elves' secrets run as deep as their grudges, and Sable is caught right in the middle of an old, escalating fued between a family of powerful elves.

name: For a Better Country
description: This game is a text-based simulation for a pure country management experience. Old-school mechanics are combined with up-to-date topics and clean graphics.

name: Parachronism: Order of Chaos
description: Parachronism is an action RPG with life sim elements set in a fantasy world inspired by Ancient China. Sent into the past and mistaken for the fugitive princess of a kingdom at war, embark on an epic journey to save time itself.

name: Above Earth
description: Survive in high orbit on a damaged space station after a global calamity. Craft equipment, perform dangerous EVA maneuvers and repair the station.

name: 明日探险家
description: The core gameplay of our game is to find props - click, organ settings. The game contains three modes: customs clearance reward (art element change), shooting mode (add bonus) and racing mode (extra props, prompt props, overtime props).

name: Hentai Cute
description: Collect a mosaic or puzzle with explicit pictures and enjoy the relaxing music.

name: Wandering Gem Jockeying
description: Run, slip, slide, collect, glide, jump, fly and (don't) die in this chill, ice-themed, platformer.

name: Trial And Terror
description: HARDESET GAME ON STEAM![ Surreal, abstract and dark puzzle featuring simple yet challenging mechanics. The retro maze awaits!

name: My Light In The Dark
description: My Light In The Dark is a short story about a girl who lives with her abusive mother. The girl finds out some dark secrets about her mother, and she has to find a way to escape the house.

name: I Walk Among Zombies Vol. 3
description: Gunfire rings out, shattering the safe haven of the town hall. Violent death. People driven to suicide. A mystery group behind the scenes. An imminent horde of zombies. And the intelligent zombies are finally on the move. What will become of Yuusuke and the others?

name: DoSK
description: DoSK - Defense Of Soul Keepers. 3D Action RPG game. Player defense their castle from enemies with their ability and purchased items. There are 8 heroes Player can choose: TangSan, DuongHao, Mubai, Oscar, HongJun, XiaoWu, RongRong, ZhuZhu.

name: Penguins vs. Bugs
description: When a penguin entomologist's specimens are set loose, a team of penguins works to recover the escaped bugs as quickly as possible. Our penguin hero sets out to immobilize the insects so that the rest of the team can capture them.

name: Aegis Online
description: Aegis Online is the virtual tabletop for all your game night needs. For classic role playing games, traditional wargaming, and more! Aegis Online has the tools to bring your friends to the table even when they can't be in the room.

name: AVABEL ONLINE
description: MMORPG 「AVABEL ONLINE」

name: Bookbound Brigade
description: Bookbound Brigade is about beating the hell out of historical and literary characters you studied in school by leading a dream team of real and fictional heroes through a 2D side-scrolling platform-adventure.

name: Watch Tower
description: Casual arcade with clicker elements! Defend the Kingdom from invasion! Take control of the last surviving tower and a group of archers to stop the army of evil creatures.

name: School of Mythology
description: A summary of the creation of the world and the collection of basic myths in Egyptian mythology. It is an educational project and it is completely text-based. The aim of this work is to understand the basics of Egyptian mythology in an easy way and in a short time.

name: Framing Dawes
description: A story-rich, dark fantasy, single-player, 2d point and click adventure, where a witch's curse means it's Groundhog Day in a forgotten wonderland. Cast spells, build a flying bathtub, talk to inanimate objects, find missing socks and much more!

name: Absolute Territory
description: Futuristic single-player mission-based space dogfighter with the familiar feeling of classic space sims. Fly a variety of search & destroy, assault, patrol, escort, and scan missions. Choose your ship, customize weapon loadout, manage power settings, and use directional thrusters like an elite pilot

name: 黎明霞光
description: 大学生女主父母失踪了好几年了，她要同时照顾自己和赚钱养家，生活十分的穷困潦倒，有天她偶然遇到了一份招聘启事，酬劳十分高，让她无法拒绝，按招聘启事所说的她找到了男主角的独居，并被成功录取为女仆......

name: The Yellow Ladder
description: Fight through enemies with multiple tools and shut down a massive computer in this frantic, action-packed side-scroller!

name: Roman Adventures: Britons. Season 2
description: Fearless General Flavius with his detachment cleared the land of Britons from filth. However, it was not enough. The source of evil itself. To this end, the Romans went on a perilous journey through the portal between the worlds.

name: Astroplatformer
description: This game is about the adventures of a half-mad astronaut. Collect precious metals, overcome the dangers in your path and be rich enough to buy three meals a day.

name: Dungeon of Eyden
description: Dungeon of Eyden is a hack & slash co-op game, with fun mechanics and simple, yet eye-catching graphics and an every time world it re-create itself.

name: Deadswitch 3
description: Deadswitch 3 is a fast-paced 2D multiplayer shooter. Experience action-packed combat with hundreds of weapons and multiple solo and team-based game modes.

name: Orbitblazers
description: Get Ready for a Futuristic Adrenaline Rush!

name: OZARK
description: OZARK explores the story of ÆDEM, a private military contractor who are tasked to infiltrate a secret underground base in the Arkansas Mountains. Discover what nefarious activities are happening deep within the mountains.

name: Symmetry: Early Access
description: A 3D platforming challenge like no other! Play solo or against up to 3 others in Symmetry - a ball roller that is sure to put your nerves to the test!

name: Cyber Hook
description: Speed through a gorgeous retrowave world using parkour skills and a grappling hook to scale and ride walls in this fast-paced, 3D platformer. Blast enemies, manipulate time and abuse physics to avoid falling to your death.

name: Escape from Chernobyl: Jailbreak
description: The plot of the game will tell the story of the mysterious prisoner E-0308, who found himself in prison for a special content of the ER-03 project, near the town of Pripyat

name: 10 Second Shuriken
description: 10 Second Shuriken is a fps platformer. Speedrun your way through levels destroying all the enemies as quickly as you possibly can to get a legendary 3 star rating. JUMP your way through sky islands, enemy projectiles and lasers as you attempt this task in 10 SECONDS.

name: Floaty Fighters
description: It's fight or flight! Battle it out in the sky as four unique combatants in this free movement fighting game. It's anyone's game, think on the fly! Play with up to four players locally or online with Steam Remote Play Together!

name: RPG NPC Simulator VR
description: Join the RPG world as an NPC of a secret shop. Grow your reputation among players by offering better swords, shields, bows and potions to attract higher level players. Expand to blacksmiths, mine and smith unique weapons which could be found nowhere but your secret shop.

name: The Sword and the Slime
description: The Sword and the Slime is a unique take on the 2D puzzle-platformer where you play as a flying sword and find an unlikely ally in a slime. Using only the mouse, protect and guide your companion through a dangerous dungeon full of nasty monsters and cruel traps.

name: Aleesha's Tower
description: A young woman named Aleesha was hunted and killed accused of witchcraft. Years later she comes back to take revenge on all mankind and it's up to you to stop her.

name: Tiger Fighter 1931 Tora!Tora!
description: This is a shoot em up game , In this game the player combats a large number of enemies by shooting at them, the game is set in the Chinese People’s War of Resistance against Japanese Aggression,off the air of the North Eastern Province.

name: Standball
description: Rumor has it that you can get out of this place. The only way to do this is to stand on the ball and entertain them. Maybe you should help?

name: Spark and Sparkle
description: It's time for competitive puzzle and shooting action! Face an opponent in this arcade-style blend of jigsaw building and shooting! Defeat hordes of monsters as they pile on to the screen, and finish your puzzle first to win!

name: CRAZY CAGE
description: Who will be the best fighter in the CRAZY CAGE? Ragdoll physics, melee weapons, huge bullets & explosions, tons of powerups, dope scorestreaks, multiple gamemodes and more. Single player, 4 player splitscreen & 8+ online for endless fun and chaos. Join the craze & JUMP IN THE CAGE!

name: Murgles
description: Monster catching, fantasy RPG with deep, strategic combat. Catch, level up and customize tanks, healers and damage dealers to become a powerful Murgle Summoner.

name: Pocket Wheels
description: Pocket Wheels is a racing game with 3D platformer elements featuring a toy car with various abilities. So fasten your seat belt and take a ride through various themed rooms full of objectives in this unusual crossover.

name: The Shattered Blade
description: This Game is a pure action platformer,in this game you will control a very fast character,slash in endless danger, meet insane enemies and crazy traps.

name: El Culto
description: Disfruta de esta porción del juego RPG Old School, encarna a este detective que investiga una serie de asesinatos perpetrados por una secta satánica, impide que se desate el caos y evita que "el culto" reviva a un antiguo demonio del infierno.

name: The Lewd Knight
description: Help the girl - a superhero in the fight against evil

name: Orc Massage
description: Orc Massage is a 3D adult simulation game. You play as an honest Orc who is trying to make a living with his business, but his monster girl clients have a bad habit of getting turned on by his "handy work". Will he stay professional or be seduced by his clients? That is all on you!

name: edataconsulting VR Office
description: Come at visit us (virtually) at our office in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria. Enjoy a very simple VR sandbox experience for all, VR newbies and enthusiasts. Experience in first person the sensations of a digital twin environment. Learn how to move around and interact with objects in VR.

name: Book Seeker
description: You will play a commissioned detective in the game. Your client wants you to help find the treasures of his grandfather: a very special book, The client’s book was stolen from the window one night. When you delve into this matter, you find that there are some secrets in it. Even related to an unspeakable race...

name: Lodestone -  The crazy cave adventures of mad Stony Tony and his encounter with the exploding rolling stones
description: Lodestone is a single player action spellcaster made exclusively for VR. Hold the power to summon and bend stones at your will, prove yourself against enemies while exploring an underground world and do your best to get to the end! We dare you!

name: Runefall 2
description: The chronicle runes have been stolen and a bandit is on the run! Chase him across the kingdom as you meet new characters, solve quests, and discover the lore of the land of Silverdale.

name: They'll Find You
description: A retro horror game that places you as a small child against a variety of monsters in an isolated mansion.

name: GraFi 3
description: GraFi 3 - casual, colorful,minimalist, physical puzzle with traps and changing gravity.

name: 3x64
description: Connect blocks of the same colors on the constantly changing gravity! Try to survive as long as possible - you can call for help many mighty powerups or even craft your own!

name: Synzzball
description: Navigate the ball through challenging levels by avoiding hazards. Use the editor to create and share your own level.

name: Unreal Drone Racing
description: Unreal Drone Racing is an arcade style racing game with drones... and lasers!

name: Area 51 Defense
description: Area 51 Defense is an action-packed survival shooter, with an in-built level editor and endless waves of enemies.

name: Lost Existence
description: Explore vast, forgotten lands, cryptic abandoned ruins, and mysterious caverns, in this open-world voxel action-RPG. Create your own uniquely crafted class. Build multiplayer dungeon, PvP, or siege experiences. Run, vault, and leap effortlessly across endless wilderness, or delve deep underground.

name: 最后的巫后：众王纷争的年代 The Last Queen in the Wizard Kingdom
description: "The Last Queen in the Wizard Kingdom" is a real-time strategy game, about the fantasy world of the dark ages of isefaya.

name: Eterna: Heroes Fall
description: Eterna: Heroes Fall is a true Old-School Turn-Based Tactical RPG featuring a storyline spanning generations, with multiple protagonists, a world filled with magic, glory, and ancient peril. Establish a bloodline of Heroes chosen by the gods to save the continent of Centura from an ancient peril.

name: Dress-up Traveller
description: "Dress-Up Traveler" is a pixel style side scroll dress-up action game! Defeat enemies and collect materials to create equipment!

name: Endless Fables 4: Shadow Within
description: Famous anthropologist Pamela Cavendish goes back to her hometown to face a tragedy from her childhood. When her friend - Hans - was kidnapped by a nightmarish figure no one believed her. Years later, brave and steadfast, Pamela has a chance to make things right.

name: Forex Demo Accelerator
description: Forex Demo Accelerator. Learn to trade quickly using accelerated time frame and autotrader hints. Practice on the most popular indicators and currency pairs! Fine-tune your strategy, and then take it live!

name: Sticky Paws
description: A 2D platformer game about a cat that can climb anything! Sticky Paws is the story of Sticky the Cat, who is on a little adventure to retrieve a cake that a mouse stole.

name: Magistrangers
description: Short kinetic visual novell about three girls get caught in quite misterious situation.

name: Glitch Puzzle
description: Glitch Puzzle is a classical puzzle in unusual anime style.

name: Minesweep World
description: the classic minesweep gameplay with quality backgrounds and nice look

name: A Million Conquests
description: Experience the thrill of a shmup game like the arcade classics. With just the right amount of story, lots of action, and many, many bullets.

name: BEARS, VODKA, BALALAIKA! 🐻
description: The year is 1941. You play as russian soldier in times of nazis occupation.

name: Luna Sanctus
description: Follow the journey of Azel and his companions as he reclaims his empire and exert vengeance against his parents' murderer. Explore the vast world of Yggdrasil and all its magic during your adventure, and learn all about the world lore while completing the numerous quests!

name: Mystic Mayhem Unleashed
description: Mystic Mayhem Unleashed is the adventures of Max, who crash landed on an island and accidentally releases an evil wizard named Malwarp. Now he must fix what he unleashed. Do You Have What It Takes to Save the Island?

name: NEKO-NIN exHeart 3
description: "We have arrived from the Fuuma Village in order to serve you, sir!"

name: Rezist: Tower Defense
description: Protect your server from the malicious software intrusion. Improve your utility programs in time, rollout patches — and you will stand fearless even against the algorithms of your most devious enemies.

name: Weeping Willow - Detective Visual Novel
description: Weeping Willow is a kinetic visual novel in the genre of detective. Events take place in the small town of Weidendorf during quarantine of the plague.

name: Affinity
description: Affinity is a short, relaxing, minimalist puzzle game.

name: Cross Country Express
description: Cross America in a wild goose chase to collect your flock before the annual farm pageant. Leap across a seemingly never-ending assortment of fences, barrels and trees in a deceptively simple runner game. And whatever you do, dont trip.

name: The Refuge
description: Escape from the heist just like Markus Hunter does in the film!

name: Roots Of The Woods
description: The game tells about an anomalous and strange place, the Forest, located far from cities and nearby tracks. The story begins in the distant past, but the narration is conducted from the moment of meeting the main characters – Trisha and Harland.

name: HENTAI Sliding Puzzle
description: HENTAI Sliding Puzzle is a classic puzzle game. These puzzles will surely prove a tricky test for your brain. The beauty and elegance of the puzzles will surely make you fall in love with them. So just lean back, relax, and refresh your mind with this huge collection of puzzles.

name: DOUBLE INVASION!!
description: Push blocks. Shoot germs. Heal your body.

name: Plunge
description: It's time to take the Plunge! Enter the adventure of Billie, the billionth prisoner who longs to find freedom on the other side. Dodge, dash, and defeat a wide variety of guards, creatures, and otherworldly beings bent on preventing Billie's passage in this exciting turn-based dungeon plunger!

name: Wissen Heroes
description: A turn-based multiplayer strategy game set in a fantasy universe and themed as a classic board game. Recruit Heroes for your team and fight strategically, choose their skills carefully, equip them with the best combination of relics, and be smart to anticipate your opponent's actions.

name: 失落的琴弦-The Lost Strings
description: 这是一款必须要两个人才能玩的合作冒险游戏。叫上小伙伴一起踏上冒险旅程吧！ 史上最丑的女主角Patti，是个傲娇毒舌的盲女孩。 半吊子魔法水平的精灵Bobbi，是个可爱话唠的栗子怪。

name: Use Your Brain!
description: Use Your Brain! is a a mindbending take on the blockbreaker genre of games where you have to control a paddle (textbook) on all four sides of the screen to successfully destroy the blocks with your ball (brain).

name: Hypnolab VR
description: Join the Dr. Kady Psyche as a new intern at the Ivory Peaks Corporation in her experimental hypnolab! Test out strange devices, alter minds, and push the boundaries of science!

name: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour: Europe
description: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour: Europe is an exciting jigsaw puzzle game and tour guide with 500 high-quality photos

name: Solitaire Victorian Picnic
description: All the charms of life in Victorian times! Feel the magic of Victorian England.

name: Light Trail Rush
description: In Light Trail Rush eight players battle each other to secure victory in a futuristic sport. The leader of the pack draws the road while free-roaming through space, while the rest is brawling and using power-ups to collect points and claim the lead. Action. Brawl. Speed. This is Light Trail Rush!

name: live Desktop Beauty
description: Customize your dream girl and let her pose and dance on your screen while you are working, playing, or surfing on the internet. The girl will appear on the top of any of your project, such as games, applications, browsers, and so on.

name: Magic Quest: TCG
description: Magic Quest: TCG is a fantasy themed collectable card game with 11 different classes to choose from, a world to explore with hundreds of Stages, competitive PvP, Dungeons and Raids which you can play solo or with your guildmates.

name: Fringe Planet
description: Fringe Planet is a voxel based survival simulator game inspired by Dwarf Fortress and Rimworld. Set in a fantastic universe of eldritch horror inspired by the works of H. P. Lovecraft.

name: Forever Alone
description: Travel through a handcrafted world by looking into another reality to reveal various paths to get past obstacles!

name: Dirty Beastly Muscles
description: Gay. Furry. Muscles. Adult. The game centers on RPG, character customizations, tactical combat, mini-games, puzzle solving, resource collection and management, and multiple endings. 16 different selectable characters, each with their own kinks, outfits, skills, and story lines.

name: Pixie Farm VR / ピクシーファームVR
description: Pixie Farm VR is a pixie raising simulation VR game where you raise only pixies in a world that seems to have dragons and phoenixes!

name: Z Mutants
description: Something is happening in town. People are going crazy attacking each other. Can you survive to find out what's causing this insanity? Who's behind this zombie outbreak?

name: Mars Base Beta
description: Mars Base Beta is a charming top-down RPG-style farming game following the journey of the first human explorers on Mars.

name: 你姐姐
description: Simple puzzle game, but there are a lot of good-looking girls. If you are bored and want to kill time, play with her is the way to go.

name: Everdine - A Lost Girl's Tale
description: Everdine finds herself lost in a forest of eternal twilight. Help her gather the needed ingredients to perform a magic ritual to escape before the dangers of these woods devour poor Everdine. ~ An atmospheric, fairy tale vibes RPG Maker horror adventure.

name: IRON WORLD
description: IRON WORLD is a brutal top-down shooter about the survival of a space settler in the world of Mad Max.

name: Noyah: Corrupted Memories
description: Noyah: Corrupted Memories is a roguelike deckbuilder, in pixel art, with random battle generation, day and night cycle, climate events, advanced rune system, that allows you to create endless possibilities with a single card.

name: THE ADVENTURES OF LWANDA MAGERE
description: This is an action-adventure game based on the history of a famous Kenyan hero, Lwanda Magere and his encounters with other African heroes at large. Lwanda Magere was invincible to physical attacks, and had the ability to takedown entire armies.

name: P1441vr
description: P1441vr is basic firearms simulator with semi realistic mechanics and a variety of game modes to sling lead in. Move n shoot your way through steel targets or disable enemy threats in Simunitions training. *Read Early Access section*

name: idolYAKI: From Delinquents to Pop Stars
description: Become friends or foes with the three most notorious criminals at your school as you help them transform into pop idols and compete in a nearby contest! A short, quick game with six possible endings!

name: Loop Room
description: The loop room is a horror game from the first person point of view, and the goal is to operate 5 panels in 100 repeated rooms and escape to the emergency exit. Run away from the endless room through various equipment and items.

name: Untangle
description: Untangle is a first-person, single-player, school-violent-themed survival horror game. Though it's not a game based on a true story, it is built on an intention to raise awareness of school violence at the same time when you're playing a game.

name: NeverDeath
description: NeverDeath is a fighting game set in our own solar system centuries in the future. Explore the intricacies of the unique left/right fighting system while battling across the solar system as nine distinct characters.

name: Queen of Honor
description: Queen of Honor - is a classical 2D platformer with surviving elements where you have to do different levels as a brave queen Hola.

name: Terragon: Symbol Of Magic
description: In an epic fantasy world, run and managed by guilds of magicians, you play as a young magician who is eager to join the guild that supports and protects his village. After being accepted to the guild, a great adventure begins, with plenty of quests and great battles.

name: Lucky day
description: "Lucky day" is a remastered classic 2D arcade game. The main goal is to collect all the coins in a maze while running away from monsters.

name: Kolobok: the Return
description: A preachy game based on a Russian fairy tale.

name: 傻瓜式SGB粗陋心得
description: This is an experimental RPG, which is used to test the author's mastery of the development tool smile game build (SGB) and experience steam's launch process. All materials come from the software itself and DLC, except two ending texts and a modified cover.

name: TIERRA - Mystery Point & Click Adventure
description: A mystery puzzle adventure, inspired by hidden object escape room games.

name: Fading Afternoon
description: Seiji Maruyama is a middle-aged yakuza recently released from prison. Known as "Gozuki" (one of the demon generals from Buddhist mythology) he is the power that his oyabun counts on. But there is one thing his aniki is not taking into account: Maruyama is getting old.

name: The Savoury Inspector
description: A silly jaunt into the world of The Savoury Inspector! You the apprentice, the inspector your mentor. Together, embark on a journey to solve the mysterious puzzle of the unsavoury.

name: Toadomination
description: Toadomination is a rogulite, bullethell, looter shooter game that takes you into an ancient confrontation that lasts more than a decade, in a battle between a toad and a viper. Equip yourself with the most powerful weapon, collect capital and meet face to face with the sworn enemy.

name: TeleNovela
description: Embrace your inner Latino and write the greatest love story that will run for about six months on prime time before being replaced by an even greater love story!

name: Lostria
description: - BETA VERSION - Lostria is an online turn-based tactical game in a fantasy universe. Players build teams and compete among themself in tactical battles to become the best strategist in the world.

name: SYNDER
description: Armies of demons have invaded Earth. Experience a survival adventure FPS that takes you through cities streets, subway tunnels, buildings in a futuristic fallen city and more! With focus on a combination of fast paced gameplay and fun mechanics discover the origins of this disaster

name: Leaf Me Alone
description: Leaf me alone is a game where a little cleaning robot tidies fallen leaves, empty cans and even toy ducks. This game can bring satisfaction even whilst you are resting. The exciting journey that you’re about to experience with your cute cleaning robot A-12 is now ready to start.

name: Buoy
description: After the cataclysm that occurred on planet Earth, nature is on the verge of extinction, all people died from a devastating pandemic of fungus around the world. You will have to survive and return the former beauty of your native planet.

name: Fate Chapter 2 : The Beginning
description: Fate chapter 2 is a psychological horror game from the first person perspective and offers a complete story and experience. The game includes many different regions and puzzles. See you right around and solve the mystery and the most important SURVIVE!

name: Tell Some Story: Foz
description: Action-adventure + Third person shooter. The year is 2042, the near future, the gloomy world of cyberpunk will offer you the role of detective Foz. Random circumstances drag the hero into a showdown between gangs and corporations, where he has to make a choice on whose side he is.

name: Starfighter Aces
description: Massive battles rage in the stars! As a new pilot in the Allied Starfighter Corps, help turn the tide against a ruthless enemy. Hundreds of ships struggle to achieve victory in huge, team-based missions. Shoot down fighters, torpedo star cruisers, and duel famed enemy aces!

name: AirFighter
description: Air Fighter is a free 3D game in which you can fly your personal plane from World War II and take part in air battles against other planes.

name: Match3 mania!
description: Match3 mania! - a hardcore challenge for fans of the genre! Timekiller with a constant race against time, which is always short. Break blocks according to the rules of match3 games and collect big combos for extra seconds to help you reach incredible records!

name: Train'em
description: Train’em is a creature-collection adventure, with real time combat and an open world to explore. Explore the world of Regione Lazina alongside your team of companions, fight other trainers, play with friends, achieve emblems and trophies, win tournaments & become the master of this world

name: Yoshimitsu Hatsumi
description: Yoshimitsu Hatsumi is an addictive mix of RPG and classic side-scrolling combat.

name: Goddess detective
description: The house of a kind family is suddenly haunted. According to them, there was a problem with the TV in the living room and the lighting in the bedroom. The strange phenomenon that often happens, let a family have to move out to live.

name: Alone
description: Alone is a puzzle platformer where you control more than just one character. Switch control between a variety of bots, each with their own unique features, to help overcome increasingly more difficult challenges.

name: Discord Bot Workshop
description: Make Discord bots faster, smarter, easier with Discord Bot Workshop.

name: Vaccine A
description: Firewall, vaccine, cleaner... Place various blocks to protect your CPU! Vaccine A is a sandbox defense game, filled with parody of various programs.

name: In Cold Dark
description: An interactive point-and-click space story about rediscovering a life, our friendships, our choices and regrets.

name: Plush Madness
description: A summoning has gone wrong.Now the house and all plushies are possessed. Can you make it through the maze, activate all symbols and defeat the demon? Plush Madness is a Horror Fighting Game optimized for VR and playable for Flatscreen too.

name: SlideNSlip
description: SlideNSlip is a cute, casual, and challenging top-down puzzle game, in which the goal is to maneuver Mac and his penguin friends around so that Mac can get to his jet ski and escape the icy island he's stuck on.

name: Void Explorer
description: Explore the void of space and discover all sorts of planets, build your own bases and gadgets and survive!

name: Fear Protocol: Shadow Paradigm
description: It's another nice dark day in Escondido, California and special agent Jack Banger goes from out of the frying pan and into the fire. The disgusting biomonster creatures are continuing to terrorize the city and there's only so much time before the plague spreads across the nation.

name: Platformer::Execute();
description: This is a puzzle game platform, focused on completing each level using programming.

name: The Witch Eye

name: 408 - The Forbidden Room

name: Before Akhira

name: Time Voyeur
