name: Seblen: Battle!
description: Seblen: Battle is a quick and easy to learn, but difficult to master card game for single players and online 1v1 Versus mode. The launch is releasing with: 40 Seblen Character Cards 10 Specialty Skill Cards 6 Rarity Tiers

name: Unshaded
description: A game from the creator of Within the Blade. Complete 100 hardcore stealth missions. Become a ninja master.

name: The Revenant Protocol
description: The Revenant Protocol is a third person shooter with hack'n slash features where you will combine your deadly blade and vicious firepower to become the apex hunter in a world mutated by an experimental technology.

As a player, you will use custom VR mechanics to catch raining pipes, avoid the rising waters and build unique pipe structures to escape flooding rooms.

Explore, builds, hunts and fights as he tries to survive the mysteries of this island.

name: StickyOrbs
description: Simple and interesting games

name: Catching a Ride
description: Drive at night seeing the road only through the light of other cars, in this tiny adventure about feeling lost, and making friends along the way.

name: 新倾国之怒
description: 《新倾国之怒》是一款根据同名大型古装电视剧改编的史诗级战争武侠风格的ARPG网游巨作，以武神赵子龙的传奇一生为主线，高度还原了赵云的辉煌一生以及他与夏侯轻衣的一段动人的爱情故事。

In this irreverent story, you follow a crew of Space Truckers as they try to survive in a world of aliens, zombies, robots, androids, the Space Cartels, and terrible secrets, in and out of a virtual Internet that holds its own mysteries.

name: Jigsaw Frame: Relax

name: Asdivine Saga
description: Uncover the evil machinations behind a warring kingdom in a fantasy RPG!

name: Resonant

name: Dungless 2

name: Antithesis

name: Cat Attack
description: Cat Attack - 2d Side Scroller - Shooter, a game about a dog trying to fight off an army of cats who are not happy that food was taken from them.

name: Pop This Pop-It

name: Arcaduis

name: Metal Faith
description: A 3D adventure puzzle game

name: It's a wrap!
description: A 2D puzzle platformer that would make Hollywood proud.

name: The Evil Farming Game: Replanted Playtest
VGL: Imperative
description: You will have to visit the patient's apartment, find out about the agent's disappearance and submit a report to VGL Corporation. The task is easy, but after you enter the apartment, the picture will change and only the goal will remain - to survive!

So once she finds out that she's terminally ill and doesn't have much time left to secure growing-up son Mitch's future, she decides to hit the road and spend this one last month together.

Manage your resources, units and use your special abilities to make sure they never come back to this city

name: Glisten to your heart: The courage within you

name: Scary Tales

name: Golden Underfoot
description: An entertaining novel about the search for treasures and survival in the wastelands.

name: SPACE DANCE
description: Space simulator in the genre of fixed shooter from the 90s

name: Hustle Game
description: The player controls a small platform that can be moved horizontally from one wall to the other, placing it under the ball, preventing it from falling down.

name: Piggy Disco
description: Pixel rhythm game.Fun mode:Enjoy the music and try to get a good score!Challenge mode:We won't take any mistake! Keep awake and try to stay alive till the last second!

name: Longphort

This is your opportunity to experience the frosty sensation of competitive skiing without breaking your legs!

name: RETROLD

name: Cyber Defense

name: Cat from the box

name: Haunted Hotel: The X Collector's Edition

name: Xenomare

name: CubePuzzle

But don’t lose the rhythm of your heartbeat or make typos, they may cause you a heart attack… Fully playable without visuals.

name: Kayak VR: Mirage

Maneuver our fully physically accurate kayak around checkpoints and crown yourself the fastest, or take it easy and use the free-ride mode and take in the sights of our varied locales.

Combine items in your inventory to get into locked areas of the house and find other useful tools that can help you uncover the truth while meeting a few familiar faces.

name: Piffsy

name: BlockWorld

name: 藏梦：序曲

In this game, players are supposed to participate in the story about how did Princess Wencheng complete her journey to Tibet that for getting marry with Srongtsen Gampo in Princess Wencheng’s fantasy world.

name: You Can't Finish
description: You need to go all way from start to finish in this 3D platformer. Try to finish

name: Wéko The Mask Gatherer - Prologue

description: A burning skyscraper, a sinking ship, or a meteor shower – use your wits and everything that comes in handy, in order to save yourself from extremely perilous catastrophes. Save yourself!

description: After escaping from the old cabin, and falling down without consciousness, Brian Fisher traveled in time and space. He woke up 30 years ago, when he was a little boy, in a place that he doesn't remember where it is, and how he got there.

name: Creeping Darkness

Gather precious loot, discover hidden secrets, and chat with merchants to get powerful items. Seal the dungeon, save the world!

name: Hungry Bunny
description: Hungry rabbit - A bright platformer about a hungry rabbit who seeks to collect all the carrots scattered across numerous levels to satisfy his hunger.

name: Luminus
description: A 2D puzzle platformer where you use light and shadow to manipulate the world.

name: Mines & Dragons

name: My Otaku Academia

name: Ultimate Sadou- tea or coffee?

name: 时空梦魇Ⅰ代号608

name: RoboCop: Rogue City

name: Castle of Delights
description: A fox has to choose between Nostalgia and Lust. A woman wants to live in the Dreaming. Everything can happen in the Phantasia's Party, in the Castle of Delights. Philosophical romances in a psychedelic world.

name: The Grass
description: An adventure in a grassy field where you must break the curse to get out. A title of action adventure and survival horror Are you ready to overcome this challenge?

name: Big Boy Boxing
description: BIG BOY BOXING is the action, slapstick, boss-rush game where every fight comes with a punchline. Challenge and defeat all the former champions and reignite the glory days of boxing!

name: kana!kana?
description: 一款从假名开始带你入门日语的游戏（软件？）

name: Escape from Nowhere
description: Escape from Nowhere is an indie runner game where you run and have to dodge obstacles, collecting various bonuses.

name: Golf Together
description: Play Golf Together with your friends in this versatile mini golf game. Over the local area network, online or on your own. Choose from different modes and create your own levels with a extensive feature packed level editor.

name: Celestine
description: Celestine, by the makers of Final Battle, features an enthralling story with many twists and turns, and a gameplay to satisfy the itch of RPG players. It is a must-have for fans of the old Final Fantasy, Dragon Quest and Breath of Fire.

name: Sexy Heroine! Part 3
description: Select one in 4 different heroines (with their own strengths and weaknesses) and embark on a quest that will take you into the depths of a dark dungeon inhabited by evil forces.

name: 超逼真的攻城模拟器 Playtest
Go! Go! PogoGirl
description: Jump on your pogo stick and bounce, bounce, bounce! Go! Go! PogoGirl is a dynamic, cute and wholesome platformer about a girl and her pogo stick. Bounce your way through the world, collect gems and then bounce some more!

name: SPACE STORESHIP -スペースストアシップ-
description: ――When I woke up, I found myself in an empty spaceship. 『SPACE STORESHIP』 is a unique puzzle game that blends the Sokoban system with elements of gravity.

name: Murder Diaries 2
description: In this game you abstractly follow the narration of a murderer and a joung detective through their lifes and thoughts. This leads you straight into the middle of an exciting murder case and a murder mystery unlike you have ever seen before unfolds.

name: Exogate Initiative
description: Build and manage mankind's first worlds exploration program. Build your infrastructures underground, recruit international specialists and send them on missions across the universe through the Exogate.

name: Dead-End Detective: The Sixpence Strangler
description: Become a detective in this comedic/thrilling visual novel set in the 1950s as you try to track down a serial strangler that stalks the streets of London.

name: SaberStyle
description: Sabre style VR, a fighting game that makes you nervous and stimulates adrenaline soaring。

name: Amidst The Darkness
description: Dragged, bloodied and bruised into old dilapidated worker halls, Amidst The Darkness follows the story of a sadistic entity - known informally as The Being. Trawl your way through old abandoned halls and sewers in a bid to find an escape.

name: Spades
description: Strategic turn-based card game supporting multiplayer mode.

name: Succubus With Guns
description: It's a simple campaign-style, third-person shooter. Shoot zombies and other monsters to move to other worlds. Defeat all the bosses guarding the portals.

name: Oozing Islands
description: Enjoy freedom of movement in full 3D with no fixed paths in this tower defense and RTS hybrid. Your units are your towers and you can build fences anywhere. Set your units' behavior to create a perfect team of defenders. Two leader boards let you play forever!

name: Sin-Cay
description: A sci-fi adventure with shooter and puzzle elements. The game follows the adventures of Shin-kai, a half-divine creature animated by ancient magic in an uncharted and mysterious world. The story begins in 1959 in the Soviet Union, in a place called "the mountain of the dead".

name: Roar of Revenge
description: A game that puts together Rastan's action with adventure elements inspired by Faxanadu. An old school tribute for every lover of 8-bit classics!

name: 3AM
description: Realistic horror experience like no other out there! Puzzle your way out of an abandoned office building within an hour. No cannibals or zombies, just you and a building filled with paranormal activity... oh, and a Demon that takes many forms!

name: MESOZOIKUM
description: Mesozoikum is an open-world dinosaur survival game and guides you through the atmospheric world of the Jura.

name: SIGURAT
description: Shoot, smash and explode your enemies in this space shooter inspired by the golden age of arcade games.

name: DarkFighter
description: Chaos wakes up from the darkness and erodes Hades of hell. Hades opens the door of hell, and the devil and chaos of hell come to the world. Chaos erodes the earth, and the gods who can fight against chaos are missing. Only the sun goddess and the God of love protect human beings against Hades.

name: Casual Golf
description: An arcade game where you will send a golf ball into the hole, overcoming a unique playing field for each level.

name: Emotion
description: This is the story of an android that regains the deprived emotions Defeat a large number of enemies and strong enemy bosses and proceed while growing Dark 2D action game

name: Boog Adventure
description: Can you defeat King Zecto in this fun and rage inducing adventure.....There is only one way to find out......

name: Spinner Breaker
description: Spinner Breaker is a casual arcade scoring game.

name: The Callisto
description: A sci-fi VR exploratory puzzle game, The Callisto pushes the boundaries of VR with stunning visuals, dynamic puzzles, and a rich storyline that unfolds piece-by-piece through your own exploration.

name: BridgeFix 2=3-1
description: BridgeFix 2=3-1 is a beautiful, relaxing and rewarding puzzle game which adds new twists to the game Hashi-wo-kakero. The game is easy to learn, hard to master and offers you plenty of puzzles to solve.

name: Balls out of Control
description: Avoid the crazy bouncing balls, get all diamonds and destroy the demonic balls before the time ends! Enjoy of a quick, direct and non-complex game as previously.

name: Fire & Maneuver
description: From the team that brought you The Armchair Historian comes a new strategy game set in the Victorian Era. As muskets become rifles and infantry are replaced by Gatling guns, you must adapt to a rapidly changing battlefield. This is a new age, not of courage and chivalry, but of Blood and Iron.

name: 100 hidden cats 2
description: Hidden object game in the city setting. Black and white hand-drawn graphics in a cartoon style. Ultra hard! Really very difficult!

name: CTRL Phreak
description: A hacking roguelike that has you furiously typing the way "hackers" do in movies. Embody the movie-trope hacker by typing lightning-fast gibberish on your keyboard, building a deck of Keywords and Frameworks that supercharge your code, and breaching files until you've gained root access.

name: Labyrinths of the World: The Game of Minds Collector's Edition
description: Desperate Times Call for Desperate Measures...

name: Edibles
description: Escape the kitchen and find yourself in an ever ending world of beauty and woes! Lots of puzzles to solve to avoid ending up either squashed, eaten blended or just thrown away in the trash! Where can a tomato find peace? What is a tomato's purpose in life? You decide!

name: Sphere Arena
description: In Sphere Arena you take control of a ball to roll, jump or slide through non-linear levels in order to visit all checkpoints scattered across the maps in industrial setting. Improve your skill in singleplayer or compete with other players in multiplayer mode.

name: Plushie from the Sky
description: A charming souls-like wacky game. Play as a little fallen angel, explore dreamy landscapes, shoot down corrupted monsters and fight challenging bosses with a plushie.

name: Gravity Flip
description: Gravity Flip is a Single-Player, 2D platforming game. Throughout the game, the player must utilize the ability to switch the pull of gravity to maneuver around obstacles as they explore deeper.

name: Kulebra and the Souls of Limbo - Demo
description: An adventure where you’ll meet the many good and not-so-good folks of Limbo. Use your wits and keen eye to gather clues from the residents and find items that will help uncover the mystery of Limbo and its curse that traps souls into repeating the same day on loop.

name: CHILDHOOD GONE: SHADOWED WAND
description: (Ever heard of this haunted game ...?) This is an adventure-rpg-horror game! Explore freely! Get around by using magic such as: floating, water walking, and quakes! Combat the MONSTER LORDS and save the Kingdom! (That is... if the 'ghosts' want you to.)

name: Pet Knight into cave
description: In this world, you have to play as a pet rider. You will go to the crypt, defeat monsters to get gold coins, and upgrade yourself to explore deeper caves.

name: CarsFuckingDragons
description: Fight and Fornicate in this comedic JRPG.

name: Soccer Cup Solitaire
description: Chain together passing combos as you look to score the winning goal and succeed in this fun Solitaire game. Are you ready to square off against the likes of Brazil, England, Spain and the USA on your quest for the Cup?

name: SALIGIA
description: Moses, who does not know that he has committed the sin of "Anger", one of the Seven Deadly Sins in Christianity, will pay for this sin with his mind.

name: Counter-Terrorism Ops
description: Check if you can free all hostages without incurring losses among the members of the anti-terrorist group. Choose the right equipment for a given action, make tactical decisions for the entire group, and shoot from the perspective of one of them!

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle Summer
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring summer sexy scenes on the beach by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Glorious
description: Forge your Glorious Legacy in blood and bronze, in this roguelike action strategy game. The ancient world has been plunged into chaos and despair as the dark shadow of war looms over the land. Raise your army, summon your heroes, customise and command them to victory!

name: Brave point kill
description: In this world, you have to play as a brave. You will go to the monster camp, defeat the monsters to get gold coins, and improve yourself to defeat more powerful monsters.

name: 弥留之岛 Xanadu Island
description: Xanadu Island is a fast-paced massively multiplayer bullet hell game that brings you to the arcade gameplay. In the nonstop BOSS battle, your death is just the beginning，accumulate experience, acquire equipment, and fight side by side with other players to knockdown all the BOSSes!

name: TV Kid
description: TV Kid is an addicting roguelike clicker game with endless possibilities for item combinations! Click through channel after channel and try to defeat television itself!

name: The Nightmare Journey
description: In a peculiar and macabre universe, little Arthur faces his greatest fears, the nightfall and what scares him most, in this brief period of darkness his syndrome transcends the limits of the psychic, the monsters are always on the lookout, will he this time will escape?

name: Ultimo Soccer UDC
description: Dribble past all the obstacles in this skill-based soccer game.

name: Panda City
description: Happiness is everything! Build your lowpoly city on a small island and make your inhabitants(pandas) happy. They are asking for a lot of things. Will everybody fit on the island an can you build the perfect home for your population?

name: OFFICESCAPE
description: OFFICESCAPE is a first-person puzzle-platformer adventure game. In OFFICESCAPE you play as yourself, you are stuck in a dream and you are trying to wake up.

name: Reef Rumble
description: Take control of your custom jellyfish and battle with your friends in highly dynamic physic-based fights, for fun or to see who is the best. Step into the ring for 2 to 8 players clashes in local or online play. Pierce the weak spot of your opponents using submarine dangers to score points.

name: Little Devourers
description: Little Devourers is a casual and relaxing game in which you control a black hole that does a great cleaning.

name: EXOCIDE
description: EXOCIDE is a retro FPS with an early 00's aesthetic. Manage two powerful sets of weapons systems with extreme aggression to annihilate the swarm! Keep your maniacal robotic backpack excited with gruesome headshots, bug guts and multi-kills. It will offer full kinetic power in return.

name: Not another zombie game
description: Peaceful villagers are attacked by the zombies, save the villagers by eliminating all zombies.

name: PowerSlave Exhumed
description: PowerSlave: Exhumed is a KEX Engine port of the classic console game perfectly blending both the PlayStation & Saturn versions

name: Summer Mission
description: A nostalgic indie game that includes 3D exploration, animation, and 2D novel . Let's talk about a summer miracle that will be my future brush .

name: TurBot
description: TurBot is a fast-paced, hard as nails race to the finish where you'll combine a wide selection of movement options and power ups to reach the goal faster than anyone else!

name: In Space No One Can Hear You Clean
description: Velocity-driven arcade action!

name: CubeCube
description: CubeCube is a third person perspective action game. You can compose and change the attack action with your own style. Face the powerful enemy and discover the truth of CubeCube's awaken.

name: 接线员的使命
description: 在《接线员的使命》中，您将扮演警局接线员。在纷繁复杂的来电里，您能否帮助来电者走出困境、找到最合理的处理方式？

name: Beauty Agent
description: The heroine Ai belongs to a secret agent organization made up of women. Recently, the organization was attacked by evil forces, and a large number of agents were kidnapped. As the core combat member of the organization, Ai went deep into the enemy base alone to rescue his companions.

name: Color Your World
description: Think fast to solve 100 colorful labyrinth puzzles and color your world! Color each maze, earn 3 stars and unlock new challenging levels. Play 100 levels and encounter obstacles such as moving walls, teleporters and treadmills!

name: Gefragt Gejagt - Das Spiel
description: Chaser or chased - who will ultimately emerge victorious from the studio? It's up to you! Experience the show up close.

name: Relentless Frontier
description: Relentless Frontier is a fast paced sci-fi FPS running on the GZDoom Engine, with a strong focus on mobility, strategy, and exploration. Beef up your Omnistruct to replicate new weapons and abilities to help you traverse the terrain and demolish threats, and escape from Ross 128-b in one piece.

name: Mana Go Round
description: A fantastical puzzle game where you match mana and magic circles to cast spells, clear the field, and win!

name: Unmatched: Digital Edition
description: Unmatched: Digital Edition is a turn-based game of epic battles between heroes from story and myth. And in battle, there are no limits!

name: Runic Relay: The Trials
description: Speed Platforming with a magical twist! Play as an apprentice wizard and use multiple spell interactions to complete short levels as fast as possible. Compete on a global leaderboard for the #1 spot.

name: Tactical Vanguard Saga
description: This story-driven, single-player, 2D turn-based strategy RPG in a sci-fi setting tells the story of a child from Earth, Audra, who is inspired by a trendy video game to break special agent Beaufort out of captivity on Mars, against the wishes of their shared enemy; the Space Frontier Colonies.

name: Long Tail
description: Long Tail is a combination of classic snake game with puzzle game based on route planning. Find the best way to collect all coins scattered on the board. Bounce from your own tail, avoid spikes, use portals... No time pressure or failure punishments - anytime you can undo any move!

name: OnlyGame: Athlete Girls
description: Relax class puzzle game to keep you in a good mood with sexy girls.

name: Please, Come Back Before Winter
description: Please, come back before winter is a poetic adventure game. Play as Naëlle the brave little mouse and find your lost siblings, grieving after the passing of your adoptive mother. Mark your way as you explore an inconstant world to get home as fast as possible before winter arrives!

name: Tristan Cole's Pro Driver
description: TCPD is a combo based stunt driving game inspired by classic racing & extreme sports titles. Complete objectives while drifting, grinding, and performing insane aerial stunts in your ride to show off your style & prove you're the best driver on the street.

name: Oatmeal
description: A game about oatmeal

name: Company of Heroes 3
description: Bigger and better than ever, Company of Heroes 3 combines heart-pounding combat with deeper strategic choices in a stunning Mediterranean theatre of war. ​ In Company of Heroes 3, every battle tells a story...what's yours?

name: Astronium
description: Astronium is an Metroidvania with Souls-Like aspects, with a focus on combat and on the grind for weapons. Defeat strong enemies, surpass ambushes, explore diferent biomes and meet interesting individuals on this hostile planet

name: Black Lotus Motel
description: 2 PLAYER ONLINE CO-OP simulator that puts your cooperative skills to the test. Choose your partner and ESCAPE TOGETHER before it's too late.

name: Romeow: to the cracked Mars
description: Romeow has a big mission, to go to Mars. Go through messy paths and help him get there. Collect the spaceship components and place the cat flag on the orange planet. Enjoy this relaxing puzzle with him.

name: Gabriels Worlds The Adventure
description: Help Gabriel find out what happened to his friends, explore levels with a high degree of difficulty, puzzles, collectibles and a beautiful story, in a precision platform game focused on exploration.

name: In Search Of...
description: You are trapped in a room and the only rational thing is to open a safe, in the hope of being able to escape. Surely you were looking for something...

name: Coral Quest
description: An underwater running game, where Polly & friends cleanup plastic and debris to make their home a more habitable place. Matchala Games is donating 25% of all proceeds to help clean up our oceans. Powered by compelling graphics, cute characters, accessories and a unique 9 lane running system

name: Knotfiction
description: The second "married couple" project following HarmonEy is a work that focuses on flirting with your older bride!

name: Domino Sandbox
description: Minimalist style domino sandbox. Build your domino effect with unlimited pieces, customizable colors and reversibility.

name: Vacuum Pilot
description: Vacuum Pilot is a 2D speedrunning game with simple but hard to master controls based on mouse movement. Free Demo available now!

name: Jake's Paralysis
description: Animated Visual Novel in which you follow Jake through his romantic and student life evolution, making decisions that will impact how the story ends. This game has content unsuitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: 东方有顶天梦 ~ The Top of The Dream
description: An TouHou style barrage shooting game, with a unique firepower and boundary mechanism, use of the mechanism and resources, in the difficult Stage and BossBattle to master the rhythm and explore the SpellCard ,to defeat the FinalBoss, uncover the veil of transformation, and see the "dream of the sky"

name: Smoots Summer Games - First Training
description: Smoot Summer Games - First Training is a sports arcade game for 1-4 players where you can play athletics events. First Training is a free introduction version of the game Smoots Summer Games

name: White Eyes
description: The universe implodes and interstellar nomads race to get back home. Galaxies and stars are violently pushed toward their home, threatening to destroy it and any nomads who get caught in their path. Survive rounds of relentless onslaught to secure survival of the nomads.

name: Stone Guardian
description: Stone Guardian is a low-poly style adventure 3D platformer where you play as a guardian that needs to find the disappeared Stone. To find it he needs to enter the magical world and face challenges.

name: Goalgetter
description: The first First-Person Football Manager gives you the chance to make your dream, of becoming a top striker in one of the major European leagues, come true. You are a young and very gifted football player. Now you are getting the chance to play in the first league.

name: 契灵之约
description: 助战契灵相伴，携手浪漫情缘，谱写都市冒险物语！

name: Onde
description: Catch a wave in this smooth sound-surfing platformer: Let ethereal tunes carry you fluidly through serene abstract landscapes, tune into soothing sound spheres and revel in a meditative journey of life.

name: Save The Octo
description: Save the octo is an unusual reaction game for all fans of the genre. Plug the holes in the package with the octopus in time to save it from the leaking water and score as many points as possible.

name: Retro Three Kingdoms
description: ★★ A game of oriental history made by a European ★★War and war and war...Not Pay2Win Your time is precious.

name: MusicLabeLManager 2K21
description: Music Tycoon 2K21, singles, concert tours, streaming services and much more! Create your Music Empire!

name: Asteroid Five
description: A first person space exploration game where you investigate the inner caves of an asteroid passing by your planet. Dive into the deeps of the asteroid aboard your ship, collecting information and samples of many beautiful minerals and lifeforms while searching for more complex and intelligent beings

name: Godless
description: Become the last god of a fantasy world to avenge your kind and eliminate mortals in turn-based matches with auto battler elements.

name: Lightyear Frontier
description: Lightyear Frontier is an open-world farming exploration game with crafting, resource management and base building. Play 1-4 players in online co-op, discover and grow alien plants, domesticate wildlife, endure the elements and build your new home away from home.

name: Cuccchi
description: Cuccchi is a game where you explore beautiful dioramas and go through dangerous and trippy labyrinths, in a journey inside the paintings of Enzo Cucchi.

name: Endless Boss Fight
description: Endless Boss Fight is a weird 3D hack'n'slash game. A dishonorable bedouin gets trapped in the cave and now he has to take a fight and beat the host of the cave 16 times.

name: Pablo Let's Go Bar
description: Robust action packed Co-Op Shooter, offering tight Gunplay and Dope to obliterates wave of enemies. Ravage through the Beautiful levels which tell a story of its own. So get your Friends along and lets Dope some Baddies.!!

name: Calmed by the Dark Leviathan
description: Earth is now ruled by dragons, is up to Europa, Sofia, Claire and Virginia to pilot a robot and defy the gods to save the world!

name: Metasweeper
description: The first and only Minesweeper Zelda-like. Explore a strange rectilinear land full of strange rectilinear life. Find new abilities that complement your minesweeping and unlock new areas. And discover more depth than you ever thought possible from a minesweeper game.

name: A Week in the Office -Under the Table-
description: You are hiding beneath your drowsy co-worker's desk. Your goal is to make her climax a certain amount of times each day. Use your hand, office supplies and different tools to stimulate her without getting caught. Whenever you get caught, you have the opportunity to hide for a few minutes.

name: Cyber Girl 1.0: Booting
description: You will be controlling Tala, a female cyborg full of mysteries and with amazing abilities. It is time to boot up her system and help in her quest of revenge against the person who completely changed her life!

name: Vampire Revenge
description: Vampire Revenge is an adult 2D game developed by Gaweb Studio. Play as a weakened vampire lord and fight your way to the top, either by fighting or seducing. Includes the following themes : blood sucking, hypnotism, fight, animated sex, maze exploration, power-ups and more!

name: 摆地摊
description: 这是一款模拟经营游戏，只需要动动鼠标的懒人玩法。 玩家需要自己进货，再高价卖出去的摆地摊模拟游戏

name: Take town
description: Urban Planning Simulator (puzzle) build and manage your city! You are the mayor of a small town develop it and earn money.

name: Blood Labs
description: This is a Rouge-like Shooter where you fight through procedurally generated rooms of mutants.

name: Tackle Girl
description: Platform game. You aim to clear over 60 stages use Jump , Dive and Tackle!

name: Path of Vidya
description: Path of Vidya is a modern philosophical/sci-fi story-driven, turn-based RPG using the RPG Maker VX Ace program.

name: Hidden Expedition: A King's Line Collector's Edition
description: King Arthur’s Legend Comes Alive!

name: Redux
description: A puzzle game about destroying your past self.

name: BULLET HEAT
description: BULLET HEAT is a virtual reality arena shooter and sandbox game. Interact with different weapons, fight off waves of enemies, and experiment with different physics and building mechanics.

name: 末日航路-The Termination
description: It's a story of deception and redemption. You receive a mysterious invitation to a seven days doomsday journey. An expectant interstellar journey has become a doomsday route to the end. There is only one word difference between "victim" and "perpetrator".

name: Mac's Journal
description: Explore environments full of secrets and meet quirky characters in this short rpg. Collect items, use them in battle and to get access to different places. And most importantly, help Mac in his adventure to save a puppy from some evil oranges!

name: Mavis Beacon Teaches Typing
description: Maximize your productivity with Mavis Beacon Teaches Typing® 2020! The most comprehensive typing instruction system now includes learning tools and an updated user interface to guarantee typing improvements in just 2 weeks!

name: Jewel Match Solitaire Summertime
description: Summer, Sun, and Solitaire! Grab some cards and keep cool in the shade. It’s time for a picnic and a game of Solitaire! Jewel Match turns up the heat with this Solitaire Summer Edition. Travel the lands and explore more than 300 levels, restoring 5 beautiful summer escapes!

name: 江湖行
description: 一个懵懂的少年，带着对江湖的向往，走入了江湖，也因此陷入了一场阴谋当中，成为了被人利用的棋子。 为了从阴谋中挣脱，只能根据各种线索，不断的追踪，找出幕后的元凶，并终结这一切。

name: SINGULARITY WORLD
description: What exactly is our consciousness? Where does it come from?This is a game where you can explore the world of consciousness.　　　　　A boy seeking consciousness searches the ruined tower for answers.

name: Beyond The Evil
description: Beyond the Evil is an action horror game that places the player to a hard experience to find who created the plague that doomed the world.

name: Destroy The Shogun
description: Destroy the Shogun is an old school ninja inspired action platformer with a 16 bit art style, full boss battles and comic book styled cutscenes.

name: Blipz
description: Blipz is a unique and addictive arcade puzzler that serves as a tribute to the main design mechanic of Tetris, creating order from chaos.

name: Holt
description: The people of Xyla flourished for years with no trouble. But, an unknown entity called the Shaxis would wreak havoc on their once peaceful world. Play as Holt and uncover the story of the war and what the future holds.

name: Immense Threat
description: Join the chickens in their war for the stolen dignity, and defeat the wicked Consumers!Immense Threat is a classic-style adventure platformer, set in future. Fight and shoot your way through dangerous enemies, and avoid deadly traps on over 20 levels!

name: WoodHeart
description: Explore a vast world in this 2D top-down Zelda-like adventure. Find treasures as you slash enemies, swing them around, and throw them at the bosses. Talk and laugh with people, animals, and even tree stumps. With no destined fate, will you slay the evil demon Firerom or just jump in puddles?

name: Barbarian Kingdom
description: Among the sands of the desert, a settlement is emerging that has a chance to become an empire. Be the ruler and decide on its shape, build a well-functioning kingdom with enormous strength and prestige, or become a ruthless Barbarian conquering unconquered lands. What strategy will you choose?

name: Car Physics Simulator
description: Car Physics Simulator, Drive Realistic Cars and Test Physics!

name: AE86 EUROBEAT DRIFT
description: Drive the legendary car surrounded by sakura trees, collect eurobeat tapes and become master at the art of drifting.

name: My Downtown
description: Help the Mayor breathe life into a sparkling new city! Play over 100 levels of match 3 bliss and build your own city!

name: Reminiscence
description: You've only precious moments before time collapses onto itself to save your family. Warp, jump and rewind through time and space - and pray that whatever lives between it doesn't notice you.
This is Cat3dokoro’s「3」, of the novel game genre. Also includes minigames outside of the main story.

name: VRAstroSmash
description: VRAstroSmash is a seated, casual scifi arcade style shooting VR only game. Destroy asteroids, space junk, and UFO'S. Up to 4k textures and 150000 polys. Ship auto upgrades through the game progression, such as auto fire, ship repair, increased weapon cooling, and flight controls.

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Flip Match
description: An evolution of Solid Match and next on Hanoi Puzzles series. Assemble towers by fliping pieces to get the right color on top, stack pieces of the same color to assemble a tower on a hexagonal board with a mysterious and relaxing atmosphere.

name: Everblood Arena
description: Everblood Arena is a turn-based roguelite tactics arena battler with a heavy focus on procedural generated items and character builds. Get your team of fantasy warriors and take part in 5v5 tactical turn based battles. Rise your way up the ranks and claim the greatest prize, the Everblood Cup!

name: There May Be Ninety-Nine Of Us, But We Have To Win In Ninety-Nine Turns!
description: A masochist RPG inspired by kaizo games. There is no randomness. Plan perfectly for the enemy at hand, swap out your 99 party members flawlessly, and manage the party's equipment down to the smallest stat - or wipe.

name: Kensei
description: Kensei is a branching narrative RPG where you can influence events as a Samurai, a Ronin, or a Monk. Set in 1612 Japan, the game features a historical fiction based storyline which ends with the most famous duel of all time.

name: Moxie's Lemon
description: Moxie's Lemon is a short cinematic platformer about pettiness and frustration.

name: Advent Crossroad
description: First-person dungeon crawler RPG. Traverse through strange areas and fight vicious monsters to escape a twisted shopping mall.

name: Veronica's Body
description: How will your deepest desires change you again? Veronica's Body is all about erotic transformation and corruption fetish combat that flawlessly blends RPG style combat and kink in order to tackle titillating bosses and solve sultry secrets.

name: 梦回三国
description: 一款穿越到三国的回合制策略卡牌游戏。 玩家只需要鼠标即可操作体验。

name: 诛天记
description: 《诛天记》是一款次世代ARPG游戏，拥有超高品质的画面、细腻的操作手感和丰富的系统玩法。游戏有灵宠、剑道、坐骑等多个特色玩法，还有创新的姻缘系统，让你游戏不孤单！ 游戏采用自由交易系统，玩家可经过游戏内置商城自由买卖手中装备，不肝不靓，轻松换取巨额钻石;商城中准备了多种神器任玩家购买，一键交易轻松玩游。

name: XEL
description: XEL is an epic 3D sci-fi fantasy action-adventure. Explore the mysterious world of XEL and help protagonist Reid to uncover her enigmatic past. Make new friends and foes along the way and collect exciting gadgets to master challenging dungeons and solve time bending puzzles.

name: Cards of the Dead - Prologue
description: Cards of the Dead - Prologue is a free standalone version of the game 'Cards of the Dead'. This is beginning of a story where you start on the outskirts of town.

name: Smoots Golf - First Training
description: Hit the green with your friends at over 40 holes!

name: RGByte
description: RGByte is batch image editing software with a focus on simplicity and productivity.

name: Train Yard Builder
description: Let your childhood dreams come true and become a full-time train models collector! Buy vintage or modern trains and wagons. Paint them, use stickers, or even design them from a scratch! Then plan a landscape and lay tracks. And don't forget to charge the visitors for viewing your unique collection!

name: Sovereign Syndicate
description: A cRPG set in Victorian steampunk London. Explore an open world of back alleys, brothels, and opium dens as one of three characters. Sharpen your skills or let them stagnate, no random stat points here. Try your luck with our tarot card chance system; combat, persuasion, magic? The choice is yours.

name: Marble Parkour 2: Roll and roll
description: Sequel to marble parkour. Roll more and avoid new traps and play different minigames

name: Viking Heroes 2
description: Join a family of heroic Vikings on an epic journey through a magical land as they come to the aid of the helpless and seek to stop a dark and destructive force. Defeat ferocious dinosaurs, explore the dazzling realm of dreams and plan ahead as you amass resources and race to beat the clock!

name: RPG: Squad battle
description: Control 3 members super hero team, finish different missions and destroy evil bosses at different enviroments

name: XSection
description: Put your perception of shape to the test! Can you identify which of the objects presented to you creates the outline on screen? Get ready for an all new brain exercise!

name: Iselin Saga
description: Follow Iselin in an adventure through a magical land to find the truth about her parents and stop witch Aradia.

name: Keeper of the Labyrinth
description: An interactive fiction game about identity and self-discovery. Decide your own path through the labyrinth's strange halls, and confront the terrors and mysteries within.

name: Ablockalypse
description: A classic reignited... Can you place all the pieces together before the time runs out? Put your spatial visualization ability to the test with this quick paced action puzzle game which will continually keep you coming back for more.

name: 战斗俄罗斯方块
description: Fighting Block is a casual online game that eliminates cubes. Attacks opponents by eliminating cubes. Multiplayer online real-time battles, cute, real-time interactive feedback, classic Tetris gameplay, combined with popular chaos Chicken-eating mode, come together to eliminate layer by layer!

name: Brick BiuBiu
description: A simple and casual shooting elimination game. Eliminate the bricks and get a higher score! Similar to the Tetris gameplay.

name: Submarine War
description: Submarine War is a new action-packed submarine combat game that immerses players in the 3D action with unique game controls and 3D environments.

name: ELYON
description: Elyon is an open-world action-combat MMORPG set in the continent of Harth, where the two sovereign realms, Vulpin and Ontari, are at war for the control of a portal that leads to paradise.

name: Only Me
description: After waking up Your brain hurts Outside the window is the vast space Memory seems a bit messy People around you tell you who you are and what your mission is But you know you can’t believe it all... "Only me" is a stand-alone game with a space background of decryption and stealth shooting.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 7
description: Spend a Sensational Summer Vacation helping Rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. It’s Conservation Challenge year and Pinecreek’s better than ever before.

name: Feudal Baron: King's Land
description: The King has granted you the right to rule over a part of his kingdom. Feudal Baron: King's Land is a strategy game in which you build, develop and govern a medieval city, take care of its citizens and defend it against the enemies of the realm.

name: They're Coming
description: They’re Coming is a single-player survival horror game designed to immerse thrill seekers into the Asylum which is haunted by the undead.

name: New Meaning
description: In New Meaning you play as Luke Wilson, or do you? Luke is a struggling teenager trying to shed some light upon a dark lonely world, will you help him or will you aid his departure into depression? This game is not suitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: Egg of Empire
description: A real-time strategy game with campaigns of exploration, expansion and conquest cross different maps. Collect resource to prepare for wars and build archer towers to defend against Kiwi army. Train your egg troops and order them to attack kiwi.

name: Cat Leather Jackets
description: Cat Leather Jackets is a music game/ visual novel hybrid about a teenage punk rock band. Follow Priya and her friends as they write, rehearse and perform songs, all the while dealing with the frustrations and drama of being young and trying to figure out what life is all about.

name: Bright girl
description: "Bright Girl" is a casual game where players can appreciate the unique legendary stories of many beautiful girls.

name: 50 Waves Hero
description: It's a defense game that blocks 50 waves. But Hero has just woken up from the seal and is powerless. So you have to protect your castle while growing up your warrior.

name: BITGUN
description: Be prepared to go to (quite possibly suicidal) missions into randomly generated locations to fight the oppressive regime and help build a rebellion! BITGUN is an action roguelike shooter with attention to the detail which will make you feel in control of every spilled drop of blood or broken wall.

name: Nin Online
description: Join the Ninjaverse today! become a ninja with extraordinary powers in an feudal Japanese fantasy world. With Role-playing encouraged gameplay and fast paced real-time action PvP combat, you'll always be surrounded by friends and enemies. Warning: This is a very hardcore game!

name: The Search For Fran
description: " The Search for Fran " Welcome to the City Park. You are here to search for Fran. While searching, You can also talk with people and go on Quests , Collect Glorbs , Throw a Ball , Drive a Car , Fly a Ship , Fix Traffic Jams, Try a "Challenge" and much more !

name: Subject 95
description: Be a lab rat and escape multiple levels!

name: Red Rust
description: As a tough Soviet KGB agent you travel around the world fighting street gangs and giant mechanical monsters on direct order from Comrade Stalin.

name: Gromopoli
description: "Gromopoli" is an online board game. Buy properties, receive rent and avoid the enemy's properties to survive. Play with up to 7 other players, with team of 2 to 4 players, and on boards of varying sizes!

name: DeHexTD
description: Defend your ever growing platform against an ever rising amount creeps

name: Meteor Genocide
description: Our only goal in this 2D space game is to reach the highest score by avoiding the meteor obstacles on our way.

name: Angle Soccer
description: It's all a matter of angle

name: Shiba Mekuri 柴めくり
description: January 23, 2021. A small family member has joined our family. A two-month-old Shiba Inu puppy. We named her Hina. This is a puzzle game with lots of cute daily videos of Shiba Inu Hina.

name: If The Dream Of Star
description: "If The Dream Of Star" is an Asian-language tour attacking and dodging with music, which is a game centered around "psychology". This is a virtual world, where people are carefree but completely happy. Is it really happy?

name: Kanamono
description: Destroy your enemies and use the scraps that come out to destroy them even more! Side-scrolling space fantasy shooting game, that is "Kanamono".

name: Geisterland
description: Geisterland is a dark adventure game that takes place in a fantastic universe and talks about societal problems in a creative way. It talks about empathy and fairness... and if we might let them go to survive. Will you give up your principles to survive?

name: Swoon!
description: Swoon! is an Adventure 2.5D Platformer for all ages. You are an alien who crashed on planet Earth. Collect all the mechanical parts of your spaceship, face the most daring bosses, travel through time and save your friends.

name: Finding A Prince: The Game
description: Finding A Prince is a rogue like jrpg with some light humor. Like most rogue likes a single run may not take you more than about 20 minutes however it's more about collecting all the game has to offer, playing through the game your way, and building that unstoppable run at the highest difficulty.

name: Animosa
description: Journey alongside the timid knight through this challenging metroidvania full of unique bosses and dynamic enemies. Build trust, unlock abilities, encourage and explore.

name: Mini Kart Racing
description: Mini Kart Racing, Race with cute cars!

name: Fantasy Mahjong connect
description: Fantasy Mahjong connect is a tile-matching puzzle game. Simply connect pairs adjacent to each other and on the outer edge of the board. Now the time is limited!

name: Jaunt
description: Minimalist Rhythm Clicker. Click the shapes within quick succession to regain health and increase score until you reach the end of the song.

name: Barking Puzzle
description: Barking Puzzle will take you on an extraordinary journey with a very dexterous dog. Help her collect goodies on her way to open the passage to the next levels and get to the very end!

name: The Mysteries of Ranko Togawa: Murder on the Marine Express
description: A mystery visual novel taking place aboard the underwater train Marine Express. Follow student Ranko Togawa on her quest to find the culprit on the murder of an accompanying teacher... with lots of surprises along the way!

name: Game of Love
description: Alice thought high school would just be an easy ride. But when she suddenly becomes very popular, the drama begins. Threats first. It always starts with threats... but what comes next?

name: Game For Anna
description: Hello Anna. I made a game for you. We can play together as we used to.

name: Rhythmetallic
description: Indie rhythm game featuring heavy metal music! New music will be added constantly and the metal journey is waiting for you in Rhythmetallic!

name: Eternal Evil
description: A small town is being taken over by ghouls. Solve puzzles, carefully read notes and use various weapons against horrific and evolving enemies to uncover what is behind this gruesome event. Eternal Evil is an old-school survival-horror game.

name: High Dimension
description: High Dimension is a unique randomized challenge game involving science and magic. Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers and surprises. Explore with procedural generation offering a huge adventure designed to please all players.

name: Dice & Dungeons
description: Dice & Dungeons is a unique deck builder. You build a DICE deck (dicebuilding)! Explore dungeons, fight enemies with increasingly difficult and get new dice to your deck. A dungeon and it's challenges are never the same as before.

name: ASKE
description: A first person shooter that sets you far away, near death.

name: HeroOfLandWar:Ren
description: It's a strategy game that focuses on ground war. A variety of UNIT tanks, armored vehicles, self-propelled guns...Strategically operate them to win the battle.

name: Nyctophobia: Devil Unleashed
description: A single-player psychological horror game that will take you to the deepest and darkest secrets of the asylum.

name: Hookah Cafe Simulator
description: Have you ever wanted to know what is it like running your own Hookah Cafe Business? Let's Simulate It. Upgrade your shop with new types of equipment to attract and impress more customers.

name: FrankenStorm
description: Roguelite TD: only one tower and enemy type, but you've one choice per wave which affects both and stacks up for dramatic variance. Push far enough to permanently save some choices for future runs. Also a unique mazing challenge where walls (wires) and towers must be linked to a power source.

name: Thin Ice
description: Thin Ice is a point and click adventure game set in the beautiful and mysterious town of Sandy Lake Village. Meet curious characters, solve challenging puzzles and uncover what lies beneath the surface of this idyllic setting.

name: Endorfire Tower Defense
description: Place your towers to defend yourself against the onslaught of enemies, collect gems to upgrade your towers, and vanquish the evils back to where they came!

name: Blood Field
description: Explore a sinister world with environments based on Vietnam culture and a storyline inspired by Vietnam myths and folklore.

name: All Ashes and Illusions
description: A dark visual novel about a young prince's unhealthy infatuation with his nursemaid, and his misguided attempts to win her heart.

name: Vainly
description: Jump, explore sad locations and kill the villains for imprisoning Blue in this minimalistic action-platformer, Vainly.

name: FEAR background
description: FEAR - a horror game made in realistic 3D graphics, immersing in an atmosphere of horror and fear.

name: 巴哈姆特2-龍之新娘
description: When Clear sealed Bahamut again, he grew up for the second time and still aspires to become an adventurer. What awaits him is a more magnificent adventure story, and everyone is welcome to experience it.

name: Donutis Simulator
description: You can prepare delicious and richly decorated donuts in your donut shop by purchasing the ingredients written in the recipe. During the game, you buy new furniture in your store and provide the best comfort to your customers. Don't forget to pay the bills! Jump in your car and enjoy the fun.

name: Decarnation
description: Decarnation is a story rich adventure horror game. Solve cryptic puzzles, fight disturbing enemies, explore a phantasmagorical world of dreams and nightmares, and face the most terrifying monsters from the darkest parts of your soul.

name: Fragile Existence
description: Take command of the last surviving fleet of humankind in Fragile Existence, a sci-fi RTS with fully 3D planet surfaces and vast solar systems to explore. Dispatch expeditions to find resources, build settlements, construct vital parts and supplies, and evolve your technology to meet new threats.

name: Street Racer
description: A cross between Super Mario Kart and Street Fighter, Street Racer takes place in a kooky cartoon world with 3-D environments ranging from Mount Rushmore to Transylvania.

name: First Samurai
description: In ancient Japan, a young samurai watches as his people and his Master are massacred by the hands of the Demon King. He swears vengeance and invokes the power of the Witch... Thus begins the pursuit of the Demon King through space and time - a bloody crusade where there is no turning back...

name: I open the harem in the last days
description: What kind of experience is it to travel directly to a place like the end of the world? Fight, ambush, survive? No, no, of course, to start a "happy" harem life, full of wives and concubines~

name: The Chatters Show Free Version
description: The Chatters Show Free Version is designed for members of the community to create and edit question sets for their favorite Twitch streamers to play using the paid version of the game. Create questions sets for free and share with your community.

name: Wing Chun Pak Sung Bo Legends
description: WCPSBL. is a Fighting Beat ’em up Style with a touch of a Brawler and Survival Game where you try to defeat Dr.Chaos and Colonel Mason. The Fighting Base is build on many Mix Martial Arts Style like Wing Chun most and Pak Sung Bo mix in an MMA , where you can Attack any Enemy from any Direction.

name: ヘブンズブレイザーオンライン
description: Online action RPG (multi-platform)

name: FLYING PUDDING
description: [2D] Let's get out of the way!Pudding's Little Adventures to Create a Girlfriend!If you're desperate, the universe will help you...Pudding went on an adventure to Create a girlfriend.Will be able to make a girlfriend successfully?First, let's get our hands on the energy of the universe!

name: Pogo Rocket
description: Pogo sticks and Rockets, how could it go wrong? In this space-themed 2D platformer, you control an experimental rocket ship and must stop aliens from taking the Earth's resources. Play through a variety of levels with dangerous obstacles and save the world!

name: Surface: Lost Tales Collector's Edition
description: Not all fairy tales are just stories…

name: 锡安避难所 - 逃离
description: The perfect combination of game and learning creates the ultimate learning experience! Welcome to join the player QQ group: 749042893.

name: Suspect Enemy
description: Team game for 5-10 people in which there is a killer and crew.

name: Touhou Monster TD ~ 幻想乡妖怪塔防
description: Easy to learn but hard to master, Touhou Monster TD is a unique Tower defense Game. Control your character, level up and unlock tower skills and character talents, use your wisdom to defeat incoming enemies. Travel the Gensokyo, find out why the “Incident” happened this time.

name: construct.ai
description: construct.ai is a heavily story driven adventure, exploration and puzzle game within a unique Sci-Fi setting. Explore diverse biomes, figure out the puzzles and obstacles that lie within and ultimately, unravel the mystery of the AI construct.

name: Ancient Dino Runner
description: Ancient dino runner will allow you to travel through different historical eras and help the dinosaur and his friends collect coins for upgrades.

name: Waifu Covered 2 : Censored Edition
description: Rescue your possible WAIFU from the evil magic. Elaborated yet EASY TO PLAY shmup action game! Remove the curse from the clothes to save the girls from the ageing spell!

name: Somerville
description: In the wake of catastrophe, you must find the means to make your family whole again. Somerville is a Sci-Fi adventure grounded in the intimate repercussions of a large-scale conflict.

name: Cliché Adventure
description: Cliché Adventure is an open world top down adventure game. It can be played as single player, or with a friend. The game has five unique regions joined by a hub world. Each area contains an over world, a cave system, and a temple to explore. There are Six main boss fights, and twenty mini bosses.

name: Vanilla Inspector
description: This is an inspection! Stay calm and take all your clothes off...

name: 你的姐姐
description: Your sister is gentle and generous. This game lets you find a lot of little sisters. Want to interact with your little sister? Just click the mouse!

name: ABRISS - build to destroy
description: ABRISS is an atmospheric physics-destruction building game. Build structures from parts to let them crash into your targets. Unlock new parts, destroy more, witness entropy at its worst in digital-brutalist cityscapes. Build to destroy.

name: Like an Angel
description: 《Like an Angel》是一部成人向BL遊戲，包含養成以及文字冒險的元素，多達七條結局及豐富的CG等待玩家探索。

name: Wholesome - Out and About
description: You've come to help your Granny after a terrible storm destroyed her cottage and wreaked havoc in her idyllic coastal town. Can you find a way of restoring her home and uniting the townsfolk? Connect with nature by foraging, gardening, and cooking, then try out your new skills in the real world!

name: Flying Fury
description: A side scrolling shooter with a bullet hell influence. Does it explode? Yes. Everything does. Enemies show their battle damage through having chunks be blown off. There are multiple enemies all with unique behaviours, all which are designed in junction with each other.

name: 跳蛋的故事
description: 这是一款用The NVL Maker制作的情感类型视觉小说，主人公是一枚跳蛋。游戏UI采用了极简设计。菜单和UI都由匠师手绘，美术风格独特且引人入胜，获得了试玩玩家们的一致好评。 游戏支持简体中文。

name: Splash Road
description: Splash Road is a runner-style arcade race.

name: Golf For Fun
description: Golf for fun, is a 2D golf-based game, focused on generating challenging and entertaining players, where you can play precisely crafted maps to test your skills.

name: Athenian Rhapsody
description: Athenian Rhapsody is a comedic RPG game with fast paced real time dodging and many other mechanics. You're given the opportunity to complete your unique Rhapsody in the world of Athens based on your interactions with the other characters, and you'll be judged on the friends or enemies you make.

name: The Glassfire Amulet
description: Fantasy-themed adventure rpg where the player leads a band of mercenaries into the sexy dungeons beneath the kingdom in hopes to recover a stolen powerful talisman. Monsters must be defeated, shady deals must be struck, and hot priestesses must be seduced.

name: Star Vortex
description: Star Vortex is a casual game where you gather stars, avoid the asteroids and try to set a high score.

name: CYBERUSH
description: Rush through floors of a building on the way to get your revenge on the Boss up top in this fast-paced VR shooter! Choose from four different classes as you swing, blast and slash your way through CYBERUSH!

name: MADiSON
description: MADiSON is a first person psychological horror game that delivers an immersive and terrifying experience. With the help of an instant camera, connect the human world with the beyond, take pictures and develop them by yourself. Solve puzzles, explore your surroundings and most importantly, survive.

name: Devils Gold
description: Jeremy have signed contract with the devil. For whatever reason it might be, now he gotta pay the price. And we all know how expensive a devil loan's interest can be.

name: Lamia's Plan
description: A Lamia monster has kidnapped Pokato village chief's daughter into the forest. It's an emergency situation, Zel - a famous demon hunter has been invited over for help. A monster and a young girl in lonely forest... Will Zel able to save the girl in time?

name: Black Sun
description: Command your neural-network-powered assistant to fly a space ship through a 2D open world. Fight real-time space battles, upgrade your vessel and solve the conspiracy behind the Black Sun. Or if you decide so - just enjoy transporting space-made peach pastries.

name: Warp Soldier
description: A 2D retro monochrome Metroidvania adorned with a vast array of melee combos, movement options, and most importantly, monsters!

name: Ammo 666
description: Now it's your turn to survive! Kill various zombies that come in waves at you. Collect points by killing zombies to get new Weapons, Bullets and Health kits.

name: 家有汉服 之 我想开个汉服店 \Home has Hanfu - I want to open a Hanfu shop
description: I hope this game can become an opportunity for you to understand and like Hanfu.

name: Ultra Boat Game!!!
description: A reflex game you try to get the highest score by avoid the obstacles in the river with your small boat.

name: VR Balloon Flying over Tokyo and Hokkaido
description: In this VR world, not only the beautiful natural scenery of Japan is displayed in front of the players, but also the players are in a unique cultural environment built in Japanese-style scenes and experience a strong exotic atmosphere.

name: G-MODEアーカイブス28 セパスチャンネル
description: If we lose one thing at a time. The world will fall apart.

name: Death Realm
description: Once you enter the Death Realm, you are bound to abandon hope. Do you think you can take on the most powerful?

name: Logo Quiz Festival: Guess the Brands
description: You are trapped in an unknown place. If you want to go back to your world, you will have to overcome the creatures challenges. Will you be able to solve all the quizzes on the first try?

name: Jungle House - Prologue
description: Explore and make houses in a free version Jungle House Prologue! Can you build house in jungle wilderness almost with your hands? Yes, you can! Become an architect in the primitive times for building amazing houses in jungle wilderness with primitive tools.

name: Viking Berserker
description: In the Old Norse written corpus, “berserkers” were those who were said to have fought in a trance-like fury. Now, it’s a time for you to become one of them - to be a great Viking warrior, you need to learn how to be a Berserker.

name: AIRHOUNDS
description: Soar through the procedurally-generated sky islands of Alioth and defeat any foe standing in your way using your piloting skills, abilities and weapons. Airhounds is an aerial dogfighting rogue-like focused on fast-paced action!

name: Influence, Inc.
description: Manage a digital influence agency in this strategy-simulation game about modern-day propaganda and advertising. Manipulate social media and the mainstream news to promote celebrities, market products, and even sway elections. Research, share, leak, and target your way to influence.

name: Life Not Supported
description: You are the lone survivor orbiting a potential new home planet, tethered to what’s left of your ship. Gather nearby debris and assemble a make-shift vessel in an attempt to survive the harsh realities of space. Maybe you'll live long enough to uncover the truth behind the ships malfunction...

name: Volcano Princess
description: After the war between humans and demons, you found a baby on the battlefield and became a father. You will Plan time and courses for her, bring her into contact with various roles, and raise her up. The daughter's future and the ending of the volcano country depends on each of your choices.

name: Washed Up
description: An arcade-style top-down shooter game. See how long you can survive in a zombie-infested abandoned town.

name: Cassius
description: Cassius is a first-person story-driven puzzle game exploring the mysteries of Blackhaven Hall, a sprawling historically accurate colonial estate evacuated at the height of the American Revolution. Journey back to the 1781 and decode the dark secrets lurking behind America's founding.

name: My Personal Hilopet
description: My Personal Hilopet is an 8-bit monster raising game, packed into a digital recreation of a physical toy. Play with, train, and support your virtual friend as they become the ultimate fighter! And along your pet's journey, explore the world to uncover secrets about the its geometric inhabitants.

name: Tiny Room Stories: Pure Escape
description: It is a point and click adventure game with elements of the “Escape the room” mechanics. You have to solve many riddles and puzzles. Visit various places and locations, such as the "Tower of the Magician" or "Spaceship". There is no main story, only escape the room. Pure Escape!

name: 觉梦：赛博
description: 一个无所事事的网络侦探，有一天他的好友刘玄介绍了一个疑点重重的委托，拜托他去调查赛博梦境的杀人案，主角确卷入了更大的阴谋。

name: ChibiClubTD
description: Chibiclub TD is a Mazing Tower Defence game.Using 50 Towers must stop 40 waves of Chibi's from entering the S54 a very trendy nightclub. For reasons! Very Unique Concept in Tower Defence. Rewarding for New TD players and Veterans alike.

name: Rainbow Fuego
description: A fun, colorful, casual arcade game for all ages! Two games in one! Enjoy a casual solo mode in which you keep the ball inside the circle while listening to relaxing chill hop music, or challenge the AI to a game of space hockey! Developed by Jon Harvey Games.

name: 孑游列国
description: 《Travel the Countries》is a stand-alone card game based on the pre-Qin and Warring States era. Each profession has its own unique cards and skills, with unique neutral cards to form a variety of routines, go to defeat powerful enemies and attack every battle!

name: Sky Creator
description: Sky Creator - is easy to use software for fastest skybox creation. Setup and export high resolution skyboxes in a few clicks. Use presets or fine tuning.

name: The Tragedy of little Joy
description: The Tragedy of little Joy is a hand-built hardcore platformer combined with a deep and emotional story. Experience a dream full of memories and fears, overcome dangerous obstacles and explore complex characters.

name: Domination
description: Domination is a first-person horror, action and story game, where you get involved in conspiracies about the Reptilians

name: Help Yourself
description: Solve action-packed FPS puzzles by cloning yourself and playing around with time! Help Yourself is a puzzle shooter where you must work together with yourself! Cleverly plan ahead and cooperate with your clones in a time loop.

name: COYOTE
description: Step into the shoes of a child and harness the power of rhythms & soul to change a desolate parking lot into the beautiful living environment that it once was. Use your ingenuity, imagination and a touch of magic to balance a wildlife between different species.

name: Polygon Wizards
description: Pick an elemental wizard to duel your friends!

name: Biocide: Karver Island
description: Biocide takes place on Karver Island. You have been hired to infiltrate a facility on the island and recover data linked to experiments done by Celledyne a global leader in pharmaceutical and biogenetics.

name: Haunted Hotel: A Past Redeemed Collector's Edition
description: Ghosts are threatening your wedding day!

name: Spinstar
description: Spinstar is a precision puzzle platformer. Its core mechanic - manipulating gravity - provides a challenging experience throughout every carefully-crafted level that invites the player to a playful and exciting journey.

name: African Safari
description: African Safari simulator. Go on a walking safari in a 4000 acre nature reserve. Score points by spotting mammals, try not to get killed by dangerous animals.

name: Pluvia - Episode I
description: Pluvia is an investigative visual novel based on multiple choices and minigames.

name: Indigo 7
description: Indigo 7 is a fast-paced multiplayer puzzle game for up to 4 players, with a cool and fun single-player story mode plus more than 6 different play modes. Get the best score, conquer the territory before your opponent and don't run out of moves in this amazing adventure! Easy to learn hard to master!

name: Out There: Oceans of Time Playtest
Go Rocket
description: An arcade game about a rocket flying in endless space.

name: Retrowave Universe
description: Let the Retrowave be with you!

name: Northend Tower Defense
description: Live real time battle, micromanagement and survive the battle with your army of your chosen, Live with mayhem and explosions.

name: Demon Source
description: Demon Source is a soulslike roguelike game with procedural generated dungeons. Try new builds each run. Gather the Source to unlock new items and abilities. Solve the mystery of seven inhabitants of the Church. Try the Ultimate Challenge with great classical music. It is made by one person!

name: Rabbit Hole
description: Rabbit hole is a mystery adventure game inspired by Alice in Wonderland. You have to dig up mysterious murders at Rabbit Hole House. Play the game, gather clues, and find out who killed the murder case. And be the winner of the Rabbit Hole game.

name: Fingun
description: In a horrible tragedy, the world has been invaded by giant anime girls causing erotic mayhem everywhere.

name: The Fancy Pants Adventures: Classic Pack
description: The classic Flash game series, compiled as a complete desktop collection for the first time. Experience the series that set the bar for platforming games throughout the industry!

name: Aether Story
description: Aether Story is a JRPG-inspired massively multiplayer online adventure. Immerse yourself in a handcrafted world with an original real-time combat system. Battle ferocious enemies, party up with friends and help shape the world of Aethoria.

name: HamsterVeRse
description: Get on your headset and get ready to enter...the HamsterVeRse!!! Take control of a ragtag group of hamsters and lead them on an adventure full of platforming action, mind-bending puzzles, deep customization, construction modes, and more!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails from Zero
description: When Lloyd Bannings is assigned to Crossbell's Special Support Section, he and his new teammates must prove themselves as they fight to overcome the injustice of a city gripped by corruption.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails to Azure
description: The Special Support Section is back with more members and more cases to solve! How will this rag-tag group deal with the oncoming threats to Crossbell’s political stability while maintaining their team’s foundation?

name: The Legend of Nayuta: Boundless Trails
description: A fateful encounter with the fairy Noi sets Nayuta and his friends on a path to explore beyond the borders of their island home in order to stop a dark plot.

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails into Reverie
description: Three different legends are about to unfold! Determine the fates of Rean Schwarzer, Lloyd Bannings, and the mysterious “C” in this climactic chapter of The Legend of Heroes series.

name: Valor
description: Valor is a fun online multiplayer game, you can fight your friends to the death until only 1 remains while the deadly zone closes in and tries to kill you. Valor is still in development and will be getting loads of updates and changes.

name: Escape War
description: Are you ready for escape adventure? Do you answer is “yes”? Let’s go!

name: Radio
description: Chill Out sandbox. Customize. Listen. Relax.

name: Alina of the Arena
description: A roguelite deckbuilding tactics game that combines elements from 'Slay the Spire' and 'Into the Breach'. Play as a gladiator to survive. With roguelite deckbuilding and hex-based tactics, no longer bound by simple attack and defense. Make use of dodges and knockbacks to stay alive!

name: Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance
description: Firelight Fantasy: Vengeance - a game about spectacular sword battles from the third person.

name: Midsummer Madness
description: Midsummer Madness is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Beautiful Vikings
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Nature and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Spring and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Surfing and Girls
description: This game is a classic puzzle game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Virtual Amusement
description: Virtual Amusement is a single player VR puzzle game. You explore your own house and your imaginary world, find hidden objects and win mini-games to collect gems to find the key.

name: The Little Black Bestiary: The Salted Cookies of Carthaginia
description: A modern fantasy slice-of-life visual novel about what it's like to have a retired world-conquering lich queen for a girlfriend where you get to make inconsequential decisions about how you spend your afternoon together.

name: Once Upon a Jester
description: Improvise your own theater show in a musical adventure about friendship! Travel a fantasy world, impress your audience and do whatever it takes to earn a spot in the Royal Theatrical Spectacle.

name: A Sad Journey
description: A wonderful third-person adventure game about a rabbit looking for his missing parents. In this journey you will search for Paws that will take you to special places where you will get your memories back.

name: 念诗姬 Poetry Tuber
description: Poetry Tuber is an east Asia culture-based interactive wallpaper app. This app's virtual character(poetry tuber) will read ancient Chinese poetry and express the past masterpiece poetry words on your desktop, with selected beautiful background wallpaper.

name: 24 Killers
description: Out in the Indian Ocean somewhere is a tiny desert island where a multiverse spanning drama is unfolding. You play as Home, a cursed super intelligence bound to a soldier's corpse by an alien named Moon.

name: Dwarf Prison
description: Fight to escape this chaos-covered ancient prison. As a dwarf, choose your weapons and spells to face your enemies in this rogue-lite platformer with RPG mechanics about a fantastic medieval mythology.

name: SUPERゆきおんなちゃん
description: おばけ山のかわいいおばけたちとたわむれる。横スクロールの2Dアクションゲーム

name: Slime Story
description: Immerse yourself in the story and explore large, dangerous and exciting locations of new 3D platformer, filled up with many interesting and unusual mechanics that make this game unique. Go through the levels and try to beat the developer's best score!

name: PRODUCER (2021)
description: PRODUCER (2021) is a weird visual novel. You get hired to wrap up production on the first Brain-Computer-Interface while being (essentially) homeless.

name: SANYA
description: 2D narrative adventure game about the warmth of fleeting childhood memories: about a little boy named Sanya, his dog, his friends and many exciting adventures that await them in a small post-soviet Russian town set in the achingly strange and nostalgic period of the 90s.

name: Cute Cats
description: Cute cats want to play with you! Chill out with them in your free time! Find differences between two nearly similar artistic paintings.

name: Deep Excavation
description: Discover what happened during Cryosleep in Deep Excavation. Explore the unique mines that the planet brings and what lies with them. Escape the planet, and survive the creatures you encounter.

name: Fostering Apocalypse
description: The demon summoned to embark the second apocalypse is only a child, and a woman who has lost it all resolves to save her. A half-hour long narrative game with survival gameplay elements and two endings.

name: Chronotopia: Second Skin
description: Chronotopia: Second Skin is a unique rewriting of the Donkeyskin fairytale, a darker variation of Cinderella. Follow Kionna into a painful but ultimately rewarding search for her true self.

name: Dragon's Vengeance
description: Lead an elite group of heroes as they begin a treacherous journey to stop an exiled genius from becoming a tyrant, ruling a world filled with monsters and magic!

name: Swimmer Admiration
description: A visual novel about swimsuit girls and sports!

name: Junebug vs. Evil
description: Junebug vs. Evil is a chaotic, survival-horde game that takes inspiration from retro horror movies. Battle your way through waves of evil using anything you can find, from assault rifles to homemade firebombs. The terrors that lurk in these Appalachian woods grow stronger each night, but so do you!

name: Lost Intelligence
description: Explore and defend yourself as you navigate a mysterious labyrinth to decide the fate of Boxer, an entity trapped in a computer in this wireframe dungeon crawler.

name: Driftmaster
description: A fixed-angle, top-down, arcade drift racer. Race through different cities and gymkhanas throughout Canada to develop mastery over your drift. Your mightiest opponent...is yourself

name: Forgotten Journey
description: Forgotten Journey is a puzzle oriented platformer, where the player will follow a linear path jumping, climbing and solving puzzles with the help of an AI companion that will follow her.

name: Dodge
description: Dodge is an arcade scoring game.

name: POG 4
description: Cute, minimal physical puzzle.

name: Steve's HardCore WorldTour
description: A Speedy 2.5D Shooter where you cruise around Earth fighting galactic terrorists using the power of pure insanity.

name: More. The Eternal Utopia
description: Visual novel that tells the story of Thomas More, who will travel to the present from Utopia Island.

name: Raider Kid and the Ruby Chest Playtest
Puppet Play 🎬
description: Got a great story in your mind but neither time nor the skills to produce it? Turn your movie idea into reality in real-time with Puppet Play. Using your own movement in VR, quickly and easily animate a wide variety of characters (not only puppets) and props to realize your story in minutes.

name: Pirates Job
description: Forget all you know about the swashbuckling adventures on the open seas. Modern piracy is grim, bloody, and only the toughest and most ruthless gunners can survive in this vicious “business”. Witness all that and more in Pirates Job.

name: Aesoteric Collection
description: You encounter 9 obscure retro games of diverse genres and forgotten consoles, all but sharing one thing: Their common evil origin.

name: Metempsychosis
description: Everyone considers more than one time what will happen to them after they die… This is a story about a girl who was desperate for her life because her embarrassing pictures were exposed to the office. She plays an active role in the afterlife.

name: PHYSARUM: Slime Mold Simulator
description: PHYSARUM is a sandbox simulation game. Simulate the real world slime mold Physarum polycephalum by generating millions of living particles. Create and mutate slime species in real time to discover countless mesmerizing and emergent patterns.

name: Beautiful Mystic Defenders
description: Beautiful Mystic Defenders is a tactical tower defense, romantic visual novel game where you are the savior of the mystic realm's incredibly gorgeous ladies. Build towers wisely, level up heroines, obtain upgrades, defeat hordes of monsters and immerse in a stimulating harem love story!

name: 奥术行者  Arcane walker
description: How to play [/Players play an arcane mage in the game. At the beginning of each game, players need to master more than 50 kinds of arcane magic to attack all kinds of enemiesThe collision of roguelike's playing method and magic greatly increases the players' love for the gameb][/h2]

name: Mini ship wars
description: Infiltrate the lair enemy, full of traps, labyrinths and warships. You are faced with a difficult task - to get to the very end of the huge sea and defeat every enemy on your way, sailing 18 various locations-labyrinths, solving puzzles and engaging in dangerous battles.

name: Lone McLonegan : A Western Adventure
