description: Lone McLonegan is an old-school point-n-click adventure game inspired by old westerns with touches of acid humor. Help Lone become "The Most Wanted Outlaw In The Wild West" as you tackle fun puzzles and meet quirky characters.

name: Fiore I: Daffodil
description: Follow Solomon Knight, a new refrain agent. As he fights against Harbinger for his own sin. Will he overcome his sin…?

name: Anime Cards
description: Welcome to the game "Anime cards"! A real puzzle in the style of "anime".

name: Hentai Waifu Girls
description: «Hentai Waifu Girls» - is an addictive hentai game that combines beautiful art, good music and interesting puzzle mechanics! If you want to relax after a hard day - this game is definitely for you!

name: Candy land
description: In front of you are cards with different "delicious" images. The images are hidden from you. You need to find all pairs of identical images. You can open two cards at the same time. Remember the pictures, look for their pairs, and try to use as few attempts as possible.

name: Astra: Fading Stars
description: It's you who can make a change. Use your soul to fight the corruption that leaks in the mysterious and atmospheric universe of Astra. Dive deeply into the essence of this world and navigate around danger leaning on truths and secrets. The Stars are Fading! Soon the darkness will swallow them all.

name: Write 'n' Fight
description: The greatest writers of all time are fighting each other in the arenas that were inspired by their work. Each character can summon his own "magic" arena where he becomes the boss of the level for a short amount of time.

name: Selene's Nightmare
description: Face Selene's worst fears in this amazing Horror adventure. Find keys, pass through dark places and travel all the way to wake up.

name: Azimech
description: fight against waves of enemies to bring down the major forest entities !

name: Shoal
description: Hungry for shark games? Start fishing! Go fish for food as a hungry shark swimming in a shoal of fish.

name: Karanos Solitaire
description: Karanos Solitaire is a relaxing combo-building card game designed for short solo gameplay sessions.

name: Vacancy Unlimited
description: The dead fill the streets you grew up on. It's time to leave home in search for your father. Uncover the magical secrets of your family's past that will shape the apocalypse as you know it.

name: Yellow Ballman
description: High Speed 2D Ball Action

name: Crimson Glaive Sigma
description: Enjoy this 2D metroidvania-like bullet hell platformer. Jump, dodge and traverse using your jet pack. Find weapons and abilities. Fight bosses and escape an old space station drifting through the cosmos. You are alone, with nothing but a space suit and a gun. Just keep going! Persevere and triumph!

name: Soer Dolls
description: Soer Dolls is a horror adventure game in which you need to find enchanted dolls in order to save the small town of Lazyiville from the terrible curse that caused ghosts and monsters to appear in the city!

name: Parasomnia Verum
description: Parasomnia Verum is an atmospheric horror game about a recurring dream.

name: Dead Survival
description: Dead Survival is a tactical survival FPS, in a post-apocalyptic world!

name: Hypnagogia 無限の夢 Boundless Dreams
description: Meet colorful characters, discover mysterious secrets, and reassemble the fractured remains of an ethereal crystal as you explore a series of abstract worlds based on dreams, nightmares, and the places in between.

name: Brickbuilder VR
description: Brickbuilder VR is a high-fidelity VR model building simulator. With both decorative blocks and mechanical components such as axels, gears and motors, the game enables you to build a wide variety of interesting creations that move and interact with each other in the virtual world.

name: Grayscale
description: Grayscale is a story driven, 2D puzzle platformer centered around the main character Faela. The game follows her story as she attempts to save her world from its own instability. Take advantage of the bizarre plane swapping physics of their world to change everything around you and progress.

name: Blood Nor Water
description: Blood nor Water combines real-time with turn-based tactics for a new kind of tactics rpg. Take control of a small company of young fighters trying to make a difference as the world descends into warfare around them.

name: VR Future Wars: Aircraft Carrier-UAV Confrontation
description: It's time to show off your superb flying skills. Put on a VR helmet and you will act as an air force, fly a top fighter, and defend the aircraft carrier alone and annihilate the enemy.

name: VR Retro Combat Deluxe
description: This is a VR retro arcade game, you will enter the game console to fight your opponents! Players can switch between weapons such as bows and arrows, spells, and fists.

name: VR Ароматная Русалка
description: The player enters the river valley surrounded by bamboos and rocks in Maolin, crosses the forest path, dressed in a suit, holding a harpoon, carrying a fish basket, and coming to the river to start fishing.

name: Coalhero
description: 故事是從這裡開始的—某天主角因公司倒閉而失業，那樣的年代失業可不是小事，要是無法賺錢養家餬口，他們一家三口可不是要露宿街頭？這種時候不論做什麼工作他都願意！此時天外飛來的傳單，像是天降奇蹟般地拯救了他。於是他下定決心，去薪水高但充滿危險與怪物的礦坑工作。礦工作為礦坑中的勇者，雖然有著極高的薪水，但他們要剷除礦坑中的各種怪物，化解所有危機，能夠從危機重重的礦坑中，將煤礦帶回礦坑外的礦工，被人們譽為「黑金勇者」。

name: Historical Jigsaw Puzzle: World War I
description: Historical Jigsaw Puzzle: World War I is a traditional jigsaw puzzle game, which focuses on warfare and everyday life during the First World War. The game includes 40 authentic historical photographs and pictures dating from 1914 to 1918, complemented by information and facts about the war.

name: Seek Wife
description: Seek Wife is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: Dormant - Episode Galatea #1 -
description: リンクス螺旋機関による縦スクロール型2Dシューティングゲーム第一作「Dormant - Episode Galatea #1 -」シンプルな操作とオートボム相当のドライヴでシューティングゲーム未経験者でも楽しめる作品を目指しています。装備によって主人公ガラテアの見た目と性能が分かれる。ショットとドライヴを駆使して自分なりのプレイスタイルを確立しよう。魅力的なキャラクターたちによるSFをお楽しみください。

name: xPack Texture Packing
description: xPack allows you to create 'Packed Textures' with a clear and efficient user interface to build your Packed Textures, supporting RGBA PNG files and DDS files.

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 4
description: 1001 photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 4!

name: 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 5
description: 1001 photos of our fantastic planet! Discover the breathtaking beauty of our world alongside 1001 Jigsaw: Earth Chronicles 5!

name: Alice's Jigsaw Time Travel 2
description: See Alice and her friends! Solve 100 unique patchwork mosaics!

name: Fill and Cross Pirate Riddles 2
description: Britain needs your help! Explore 6 new different islands. Solve 120 new unique puzzles from great captains of the past!

name: Fill and Cross Trick or Treat
description: Guess all the pictures and get sweets from the ghosts! Solve 120 unique puzzles in 6 magnificent locations.

name: Griddlers Beach Season
description: It’s time for adventures at sea with Griddlers Beach Season! 120 unique griddlers will make your vacation even more fun

name: Griddlers TED and PET 2
description: 120 new Japanese crosswords - take a stroll through places long forgotten by time!

name: Halloween Patchwork Trick or Treat
description: Trick or treat? No tricks! Assemble 120 unique jigsaw puzzles in Halloween Patchwork Trick or Treat and get a whole sack of Halloween treats!

name: Squad Of Dangerous
description: War is going on. Go on 2d action missions, collect resources, cooperate with friends, send supplies to the frontline and watch the global war progress on the world map. Together, we'll get back our homeland!

name: LGBT Color by Number for Adults
description: Get LGBT Color by Number for Adults coloring book, ‘cause LOVE IS LOVE!

name: The Patagonians
description: Help the protagonist of this survival horror game find his missing daughter. Explore a variety of locations - from caves teeming with huge insects to a mysterious mansion. Uncover a terrible secret that marked the beginning of a series of unpredictable events.

name: I Am - a story of awakenings
description: I Am – a story of awakenings is a story-driven first-person action game. Game play features puzzles, stealth, dialogue, physics, grenade dodging, payback, and lots and lots of explosions.

name: Printersim
description: In this point and click resource management sim, you only have two weeks to print a report off for work. You have no ink. No money. Now get to it, that report isn't going to print itself.

name: Waltz of the Wizard: Extended Edition Playtest
Beyond Sunset
description: Beyond Sunset is an all-new first-person RPG featuring high-octane action, graphics inspired by classic DOS games and an original story in a highly-developed game world.

name: Soulmate
description: Soulmate is a game about what insanity can create, in a world full of coincidences.

name: Terra Ventura
description: Isometric action RPG with real time combat, where you need to balance skill tree paths, player development and character customization with limited semi-random loot. Push your way through the uncharted land, where mistakes have real consequences.

name: Pax Narcotica: Trafficker
description: Become a cartel boss and take over the US drug trade. Build smuggling networks across the country and negotiate sales with crime groups. Recruit soldiers to protect your shipments and expand your territory. Bribe police and politicians to protect your interests and disrupt your rivals.

name: Hentai Brick Breaker
description: Unlock beautiful hentai girls hidden behind bricks that you must break. Choose your girls and level from the gallery.

name: 重构 Refactor
description: Refactor is a light strategy tower defense game that tries to keep the core fun of the tower defense game as simple as possible, honing every detail of the rule design while making it a strategic and entertaining experience.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Tempestfall Playtest
Cheap Game 3
description: Cheap game 3 is simple roguelite where minigames plays the main role

name: 墨武群侠(Tale of MoWu) Playtest
Magic gems
description: Magic gems game is an unusual game for fans of the genre "three in a row", in which you have to break a combo of gems on your own to complete the level.

name: FIGHT BOTS
description: FIGHT BOTS is a robot fighting game where you can customize your robot with a huge variety of parts and brawl against a bunch of unique enemies and bosses.

name: City of Robots
description: Play as a super advanced AI- take control over the city of robots and expand your futuristic metropolis. Build your dream city and be the heart and brain of it. Craft technology and equipment for humankind or prepare for war against them.

name: Cryptid Crew
description: Cryptid Crew is a visual novel and dating sim. Play as a freshly-bitten werewolf and go on a road trip across the US. Meet various cryptids and monsters, befriend them, and then, if you want, date them! (And yes, that includes Mothman.)

name: Mighty Chameleon Brothers
description: Mighty Chameleon Brothers will remind you of old-school arcade classics, with bright and colorful visuals and fun cartoon characters! You'll love the simple yet addictive game play!

name: TRAIL OUT
description: Michalich, a Russian stuntman, came to conquer the roads of America. Drive though the streets of Los Angeles, San Francisco - and even his homeland of St. Petersburg - and crush your opponents in a brutal derby themed racing game with the ultimate vehicle collision system.

name: Venaitura
description: A retro-styled RPG wherein you assemble a party of 4 Heroes from 12 unique Classes and embark on a journey to rid the world of Tsufana from the titular tower's corruption.

name: Goosen't: Run or Die!
description: Help Duk, a goose wizard cursed to run endlessly or else perish, break the hex placed upon him by a demon in this fast-paced 2D platformer.

name: Monuments Flipper: Prologue
description: BECOME A MONUMENT RENOVATOR. Monuments flipper is a game in which you play the role of a professional monument renovator. You choose from among the world's greatest monuments, restore them to their former glory and learn about history and architecture.

name: The Teleport
description: The Teleport is a horror game where we try to escape from a spooky spaceship through the a camera system and the robot.

name: 東方実在相 ～ Dream Logical World
description: A reality-bending, strategy-oriented Touhou Project fan game. Shoot down enemies, dodge bullets and use Aspect Shifts to warp existence.

name: SENSEs: Midnight
description: SENSE/s: Midnight a 3d survival horror game inspired by Fatal Frame and Resident Evil, featuring TANK CONTROLS , FIXED CAMERA ANGLES, and LIMITED INVENTORY in order to capture the truest essence of classic survival horror titles. Developed by SUZAKU.

name: Archquest
description: Archquest is a classic CRPG that mixes a retro aesthetic, immersive first-person exploration, and tactical turn-based third-person combat based on tabletop RPG rules. Inspired by AD&D Gold Box games such as Pool of Radiance.

name: Fitness Center Renovator
description: Shape your future with Fitness Center Renovator! Build not only your clients’ muscles but also your unique brand. Create and expand a global fitness center franchise. Renovate old premises, customize them and sell with the profit!

name: VALAKAS: Immortal
description: VALAKAS: Immortal - An action shooter from the third person in the image of the greatest streamer Valakas. Mercilessly destroy the mighty empire of Detrov.

name: Shopping Mahjong connect
description: Shopping Mahjong connect is a tile-matching puzzle game. Simply connect pairs adjacent to each other and on the outer edge of the board!

name: Our Mind
description: Wake up in an abandoned laboratory not knowing how you ended up there. Explore the deserted hallways and try to find a way out. However, you are not alone. There is something else roaming around the halls.

name: ColorBlend FX: Desaturation Prologue
description: Desaturation is the prologue chapter of our upcoming game ColorBlend FX. Help Splatians blend the stolen colors back to the world and foil the plans of the Evil! Squash juicy slimes, get painted or slimed, solve puzzles, find secrets & survive the death while figuring out the evil plans of the Lord.

name: Academy of Magic: Dark Possession
description: Help Dennis and his friends in this magical match3 adventure against the dark forces of The Great Dark Wizard.

name: Battlemage: Magic by Mail
description: Will you defend your kingdom with forbidden magic, or backstab the crown? Win tournaments, kiss a prince/princess, or just seize power for yourself!

name: The Dragon and the Djinn
description: Make a wish! Can your djinn help you save the city from a dragon, or will you befriend the dragon and learn its secrets?

name: Tricks Magician
description: Tricks Magician is a game about a magician who has been trapped in an alternate reality because of his assistant rabbit's revenge, and now must overcome several challenges with a defying gravity and return to your normal world.

name: Idle Monster Frontier
description: Collect monsters and combine them to conquer the frontier in this challenging idle RPG.

name: Sonata Theory
description: 2D/3D story-adventure game

name: Coffee Talk Episode 2: Hibiscus & Butterfly
description: Dust off your coffee machine and prepare your warmest smile to meet your favorite customers again in the second episode of Coffee Talk: Hibiscus & Butterfly, a coffee brewing and heart-to-heart talking simulator.

name: Below The Ocean
description: Dive deep "Below the Ocean" in search of legendary treasures while using your oxygen lifeline to swing passed obstacles! Run, Jump, Swing, Bubble-Jump, Bungee, Slingshot, Puzzle-Solve, Platform, Treasure-Hunt, BELOW THE OCEAN!

name: Wrestling Cardboard Championship
description: In the WCC, cardboard boxes with unique skills and moves, fight in large arenas based on Madison Square Garden, Arena Mexico and the Tokyo Dome.

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle 4
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzles featuring hardcore sex scenes by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: Snake Deluxe
description: Nine different game modes, achievements, leaderboards and a quirky soundtrack. It's Snake Deluxe.

name: Code Correction
description: a puzzle game based on parity and hamming codes.

name: G-MODEアーカイブス15 ちゅら島暮らし
description: Where there is sky and sea, there is a story. Experience the "slow life" of your dreams on a southern island!

name: Thrice in a row: A new adventure
description: Continuation of the great puzzle. Available 28 completely new levels. Thrice in a row is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses.

name: The Last Oricru
description: The Last Oricru is an action RPG with a strong emphasis on storytelling and player choices. The player awakens in a sci-fi medieval world on the brink of a war and starts influencing the destiny of the whole world. Game is designed as both - single-player and a co-op experience.

name: Oldowan
description: Oldowan is a casual survival sandbox game that is focused on very early humanity and how it developed. The crafting is all based on real practices, but the survival aspects are relaxed.

name: REVO
description: Neon shoot ‘em up to a retro fueled synthwave soundtrack. You’ve drifted into a sinister space storm far from civilization. Dark ships quickly close in on you. Rescued by a mysterious symbiotic vessel, your only hope of escape is to equip for combat and fight for your life.

name: Castle Champion
description: Fight the bosses and save the king. In this top down shooter your goal is to go through each of the three bosses and save the king! With 3 health and bosses that you can't touch, have fun trying to get through this challenging top down shooter!

name: Salt and Sails
description: Salt and Sails is a naval combat style game where you control a ship.

name: Renai Karichaimashita: Koikari - Love For Hire
description: Due to family circumstances, Yuki has only one belief: money will make his little sister happy. And thus, he works part-time jobs late into the night. His plan is to start working full-time after graduation, but his little sister tells him that if he won't go to university, then she won't either.

name: GridlessDB
description: Stop using spreadsheets to create your game data. Instead, use a powerful and intuitive editor with a drag-and-drop interface to design, edit and visualize content for your games, like items, quests, characters, and more. Then export to a text file or Unity's Scriptable Objects.

name: Anatomy of Fear
description: ANATOMY OF FEAR; It is a survival, thriller, action and puzzle turn-based, multiplayer horror game that can be played with 1-4 people. Do your duty and escape before the mutated beings kill you as you embark on this adventure to reveal the dark side of the company!

name: The Loneliest Summer
description: A cinematic slice of life adventure.

name: Explosiver
description: In Explosiver you will live a story with many bullets and explosions, controlling William. You'll be able to play in first person or third person, and you'll have several weapons to help you in the main objective, besides, of course, a special ability that can be used by the protagonist.

name: Droid404
description: Complete an adventurous quest while parkouring through various enemies as a robot! Leap from platform to platform while dodging obstacles in this pixelated side-scrolling platformer. Fight bosses and uncover hidden areas while discovering the truth about your existence. Good luck, Droid404.

name: Amber Isle
description: Welcome to Amber Isle- a quaint, friendly village of prehistoric residents who are in need of a new shopkeep- That’s you! Craft and sell items, upgrade your shop, befriend your Paleofolk neighbours and customise the island to bring the village back to life and welcome even more prehistoric pals!

name: 女孩与七匹狼
description: This is a horror decryption game It depicts a girl searching the house for information to decrypt Scenes are small for a house and may be updated with multiple scenes for a clue to a scene The game is not saved and must be completed once

name: Airplane Tycoon
description: Manage your own air company! Be a businessman in the air industry, with control over everything in your business. Work, earn, grow and become an air transport tycoon!

name: Code angel
description: In a distant future, humanity found a new source of energy allowing them to break the limits of science. From this new discovery came challenges that changed the face of mankind. Computer viruses can now take physical form and wreak havoc in cities that use the blue EXSCELL. Eliminate them all.

name: Vandalhalla
description: Have fun in the online Fast FPS Vandalhalla ! Play in team to stomp on your opponents with more than fourty weapons and abilities, experience the Shifumi concept with a total freedom in your loadout, and interact with your surroundings !

name: Builder Simulator: Prologue
description: Welcome to Builder Simulator: Prologue! This is the place where you'll get your first assignment Builder! Make sure to grab your toolset, safety equipment and let's head out to build our first building! Construction awaits!

name: Chernobyl Liquidators Simulator: Prologue
description: Welcome to the Prologue to Chernobyl Liquidators Simulator. Take your first steps as a Liquidator, learn your duties and fight the catastrophe in the introduction to the full version of the game.

name: Junkman Simulator
description: Junkman Simulator, Build Your Junkyard! Repair Your Car and Start Exploring!

name: Heroes of Arcana
description: Heroes of Arcana is a turn-based roguelike with RPG elements in which a team of heroes embark on a quest to reclaim their future. Their journey takes them through four different dungeons with increasingly difficult challenges and powerful treasure.

name: Home Office
description: You work from home, take care of pets, plant vegetables and travel, living your life.

name: UROS: A Trip Through Shadows
description: Uros is a 2.5D metroidvania-style action platformer. Enter the nightmares, upgrade your skills, fight against creepy creatures and face the evil god of nightmares in your mission to restore stability to the dream world.

name: Twin Stones: The Journey of Bukka
description: Twin Stones: The Journey of Bukka is a challenging 3D platformer, featuring Bukka on his mythical adventure where he has to save a colorful and alive world along with the God Shiva.

name: Dead Box
description: Henry explores the depths of Purgatory attempting to pass on to the other side after death.

name: Dash Dash Delivery
description: Welcome to Dash Dash Delivery, a simulation where you play as a delivery person in a nearby mall. Have fun delivering items, exploring, purchasing items, customizing your character, enjoying delicious mall food items, as well as the upbeat atmosphere. Can you find all the easter eggs?

name: Quiet Valley 2
description: A 2.5D indie horror game with a strange reverse-fish-eye presentation. Explore and uncover lore and scares. Contains jumpscares and atmospheric/story-driven elements. Be thorough to unlock both endings if you are a completionist, but watch out behind you.

name: Dap: Prologue
description: Dap: Prologue is a short dive into the eerie world of Dap, the upcoming horror-action-adventure about protecting a pack of fragile creatures against the creeping corruption tainting the woods and its inhabitants. Lead, scavenge, and fight, in a race for survival against otherwordly horrors.

name: Human Apocalypse
description: A new virus is turning people into brain eating machines, etc. You know the rest. A cure has been found and all the infected people are now normal humans again. What is the problem then? Their skin color is still green. Play as an Ex-Zombie.

name: 昆仑
description: 《昆仑》采用虚幻4引擎开发，本系列讲述未来人类与人工智能集合体和来自河外星系的多外星种族之间的战争。游戏以独特的视角构建一个崭新的科幻世界，玩家将在《昆仑》的世界中扮演一名星际游侠，利用独特的互动系统和伙伴一同在广袤的科幻世界中冒险。

name: Ancient
description: Fight your way across this strange realm inhabited by a host of mutated creatures who want nothing more than to put you down. Obtain bizarre assortments of items along your journey to further your efforts at survival. Will this land and its hosts be your undoing, or you its?

name: Y: The Game
description: A Passion Project Platformer where you are a Y avoiding Enemies and Spikes trying to get all of the Objectives in levels. Perfect for hardcore speedrunners, imaginative level creators, and casual players.

name: Hot Pieces
description: Hot Pieces is an Erotic Puzzle. 15 girls, with many puzzles for each one, and also a special bonus mode! The soundtrack consists in relaxing live recorded classical music. All the fictional girls here depicted are over 21 years old. This game is destined for adult public.

name: Project Absentia
description: Fight your way through this cartoony FPS with insane characters, intense level design, and verticality like never before! This fully-voice acted FPS will push you to new levels.

name: 烈焰传奇
description: 是一款注重玩家对抗的3DMMOARPG游戏。游戏中的人物、怪物均采用全新设计的高品质模型，动作更为自然，形象精致生动；游戏场景精美宏大，音效清晰逼真，营造出良好的游戏氛围，极具带入感；华丽的技能和优良的操作手感带来极致的战斗体验，打怪PK更为爽快。寻昔日兄弟，战热血沙城，尽在《烈焰传奇》。

name: Dreamreaper: Grey Skies
description: Dreamreaper is an action-adventure game in which you play as unwilling partners in the form of an immortal man and an alien entity parasitizing him. Break through the hordes of enemies using feral powers, unravel the mystery of your existence and escape the dying world of the Grey Skies.

name: Moon Farming - Prologue
description: Tired from the same farming games on Earth? Now, take on the new role of a super modern farmer on the Moon! Explore new farming possibilities in a new Moon environment. Prepare land on Moon for your base and vertical farming inside of it. For sure, it will be farming like never Before!

name: Hyper-5
description: Hyper-5 is a cinematic shmup inspired by classics from the “golden era” of the 90’s. Responding to a distress beacon, deep space scout ship Hyper-5 is drawn into a terrifying battle with an unknown enemy.

name: House of Portals VR
description: Do you want to escape reality? Stick your head through one of the various paintings in the "House of Portals" & experience the whole atmosphere behind it. Walk, run, interact or just look around! Be part of something extraordinary!

name: Cowboy Life Simulator: Prologue
description: In the 19th century in the Wild West, you are a poor farmer wanting something more from life: you want an adventure. Sit on a horse and become a Cowboy, unfortunately it won't be that easy because many dangers await on that path and you are no hero yet.

name: Police Shootout: Prologue
description: Jump straight into Police intervention. Based on many real stories, feel the thrill of real action. As a police enforcer you need to help, protect and prevent crime in the field.

name: SacriFire
description: A modern JRPG-inspired game with a unique battle system, rich story, fantastic visuals and music by Motoi Sakuraba.

name: The Book of the Game
description: A turn-based open-world RPG, based loosely on the books of the same name.

name: Abandoned Croxon Mansion
description: Abandoned Croxon Mansion is a 2D Top-Down Survival Horror game based on the story of the Haunted Mansion, built during the 1960s.

name: Duelist
description: Duelist is a 2D multiplayer fast-paced shooter game. There are certain themes in the game which player can select. Take a gun and use every skill you have to eliminate your enemies.

name: CodeWorks: Visual Scripting Framework for GameGuru
description: CodeWorks is a visual scripting framework for Game Guru Game Engine. With it any one can easily script there game logic in matter of minutes. It will eliminate your time investment in coding part of game development and help you build games faster, eliminate worrying about API and syntax error.

name: Over The Ruins
description: Over The Ruins (Sobre as ruínas) Is an RPG and survival open world game with retro graphics that try to emulate oldschool computer rpg games. The player can explore the world, complete quests given by the NPCs, collect resources, craft items, vehicles, create bases, etc.

name: Sur
description: Sur is a survival horror game inspired by survival horror classics. Help Vanessa guide her wheelchair to explore the Uroko hospital and escape from creatures that chase her in her biggest nightmare. Whether hiding or shooting firearms. Survive!

name: Dead Ink
description: Dead Ink is a hardcore souls-like game set at dizzying height atop a perilous vertical world. Use harvested ink from your enemies to print weapons, inventory items and your corporeal form.

name: Apopia: Sugar Coated Tale
description: Apopia: Sugar Coated Tale is a comedic adventure with dark mysteries. Help young girl Mai to find her way home. Progress by solving puzzles and outsmarting enemies in minigames. Make friends and foes with talking animals. Unravel the mystery of Mai’s identity from her dark and blurry memories.

name: Inflatable doll
description: A beautiful woman will always catch a boy's eye. Where you look depends on your preferences. This game could be the start for you!

name: Tyfortress: Tactical Typing
description: Protect human race last fortress against the robots by typing phrases and single words! Build and evolve towers that will help while you destroy robots by typing their words! Oh, and don't forget... Before that, you'll need to type phrases fast to gather a good amount of resources to build towers!

name: Flesh
description: Flesh by @im_oab is a 2D-horizontal (fast pace) shmup game with hand-drawn(ish) animation and organic/fleshy theme.

name: The harem life of the violent swordsman!
description: Nick wants to become more handsome and stronger. On the way to become stronger, he meets Leslie, who is helpful and helpful. The powerful and beautiful Josephine and the outstanding temperament Pandora start a happy harem life.

name: 混沌小队（CHAOS SQUAD）
description: 《混沌小队》是一款集合了克苏鲁、战棋与生存要素的回合制类ROUGE游戏。玩家将在10位性格各异能力不同的英雄冒险者中挑选成员集结队伍。在雪山、草原等12个风格迥异的关卡内击败怪物、收集宝藏，并最终发现破裂大陆灾难突生的残酷真相。

name: Tanks: The Crusades
description: A top-down shooter with tanks that have various assorted abilities, with support for multiplayer and a level editor.

name: Windswept
description: Our feather-shelled heroes were swept away by a storm and they need your help getting home. In this '90s-inspired platforming adventure take on over forty handcrafted stages, discover the secrets of their world, the moon and beyond!

name: 龙鸣朋克
description: 这是一个直播文化高速发展的流量时代，坊间一直流传着“龙神”的传说……相传，龙神具有无上的神力，可以给人带来眷顾和加护。而人们只知道龙神藏匿于龙鸣山中，却从未有人见过他的存在。但近些年有些行为各异的人，在引得世人关注的同时竟获得了龙神的力量，有许多人为了追寻力量开始不择手段的模仿，成为其山上的附庸。而最近又传出了龙神即将易主的传闻…各方势力都蠢蠢欲动，而“要火哥”就是其中之一 龙神既然拥有神力和附庸，其手下大将们的实力必然不可小觑，那么等待“要火哥”的将会是什么呢？他能否揭开龙神的真面目，成为这山域之主？ 这一切的一切，都将由你来见证！

name: NejicomiSimulator Vol.2 (Gapping, Amputee sex slave, Petrify, Time Stop)
description: A faphole simulator about a girl you can control with the mouse! Enjoy as this slut animated in smooth Live2D is wrecked by your virtual cock! Plenty of status effects included!

name: LoveAndBetrayal
description: An online and local team work and betray game of 4-10 players.

name: wav ocs game
description: Race game inside an airport where you try over and over again to improve your time without dropping of the edge in your wheelchair.

name: Bubble Shooter FX
description: A great classic bubble shoot game.

name: Master Boy
description: "Master Boy" is a happy-paced cartoon casual role-playing game with Chinese cuisine as the theme. Players can accept tasks in charming urban areas, help friends defend farm and beach, exterminate invaders and collect ingredients to get rewards and improve their own attributes. Just enjoy it.

name: Colors Assemble
description: Help Brad reunite with his family and complete all hand-crafted 2D platform challenges in a colorful twisted world.

name: RE:Jump Boy
description: Jump one by one small steps, take a rainbow bath in the last toilet, and you will enter the next level

name: Wildlife Match
description: Jungle animals are going missing and Agent Blonde is on the case! Help her and her friend, Professor Fox, get to the bottom of the mystery! Match fun animal shapes, complete missions and face down powerful monsters on your quest to save the jungle!

name: Endless Love
description: Endless Love is an addicting game in which you have to solve puzzles with Lovely Girls.The game is perfect for relaxing.

name: The Wolf's Den
description: The Wolf's Den is a suspenseful first person experience through a dark atmospheric mountain. Explore a mysterious train tunnel on your way to escape from a tragic accident that destroyed you and your partner's lab and uncover the truth behind the mysteries that surround you. Enter The Wolf's Den!

name: Hoples
description: Hoples - 2D hardcore precision platformer with time limits.

name: Unreal Golf
description: "UNREAL GOLF" is a 2d physics arcade game with a side view. The main goal is to get your ball into the hole with 3 hits.

name: Party Host 85
description: Party like it's 1985! You're the host of the wildest party of the century and have to plan and execute a succesful event. Get to know all the crazy characters and discover what they will do once the party started.

name: Chess Valley 2
description: Play chess in a way you've never played. Face a board like a labyrinth and try to cross it with the king to join his army.

name: The Last Yandere: Cursed Dark
description: The Last Yandere: Cursed Dark is a sci-fi horror visual novel about dating a yandere and playing creepy games.

name: Invasion: Neo Earth
description: Retro turn-based strategy in a sci-fi world of sinister alien invaders. Take command of troops, tanks and aircraft as you position your units for the perfect strike or unbreakable defense. Plot the course of humanity's war against the insidious Sectyd by choosing your own missions.

name: Detective Story: Reporter
description: Detective Story: Reporter - is an exciting 2D quest game with horror elements. It is about a reporter girl called Emma.

name: UFO vs Bikini
description: Act as an alien driving a UFO and collect materials to upgrade the spacecraft. Kidnap bikini girls, extract purple energy, and study the function of purple energy. Avoid human attacks, strengthen the defense of spacecraft and alien technology.

name: Nura's Wish
description: Nura's Wish is an atmospheric puzzle adventure in which you carry the last light on the earth. Solve brilliant puzzles by illuminating ancient altars. Explore a mysterious world filled with riddles and secrets. Run and jump freely through diverse and open environments.

name: Mystery of Camp Enigma 2: Point & Click Puzzle Adventure
description: A thrilling puzzle adventure, inspired by hidden object escape room games. Picking up from the radio tower. You discover a remote signal being transmitted from somewhere on the island. Your objective to investigate, along with your continuing mission to discover the missing army personnel.

name: Upaon: A Snake's Journey
description: Help this sympathetic Snake on her journey to the hidden treasure, solve puzzles that mix mechanics of the classic game Snake with Sokoban

name: Decent Into Sector 32
description: Descent into Sector 32 is a 3rd persons flying mystery game. You are dispatched on a search and rescue mission to sector 32, a giant asteroid field with many mysteries. Make the right choices or your squadron might need rescuing yourself, and the truth is, nobody is going to come for you.

name: Redacted Epilogue
description: Set a few years after the events of the comic book "REDACTED: Revival", this 2.5D first-person RPG with turn-based combat continues the story of the former Black Ops experimental soldier known by the codename "The Black Anvil", as he prepares to defend civilization from another latent threat.

name: Fantastic Honey
description: Fantastic Honey - A hentai puzzle game in which you have to piece together images of elves, who are striving to take off some of their clothes! A lot of beautiful pictures await you, in which every player will definitely find what he likes!

name: Neon: Eternal
description: Neon: Eternal is a 2D Retro-styled Arena shooter. Blast your way through seamlessly never-ending action-packed levels of radiating colors while eliminating over 50 unique enemies!

name: Swooping Justice
description: A humorous tongue in cheek Action-Adventure game. You're an Australian Magpie, swooping and pooping on societies wrong doers. Inconsiderate parking inspectors, Abusive cops, Corrupt politicians, scooter and roller blade kids at skate parks, drop bears...the list goes on!

name: Atoll
description: The earth has been struck by an extinction level meteor, eliminating most of humanity. Survive by managing resources beneath the ocean surface in a single-person submarine craft. Test your survival skills to see if you can once again reach the ocean surface and uncover the fate of the earth!

name: Rain Island: Orange
description: Rain Island: Orange is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty!

name: H-Isekai Loves
description: What will you do when you are accidentally transported to another world? Looking to survive and return to the old world ? Or become the main character of this story? Try our new game. And of course, this is your chance to make your own Harem. Definitely !

name: モン娘ぐらでぃえーた
description: 「モン娘ぐらでぃえーた」はモン娘育成ローグライトRPGです。 モンスターブリーダーのあなたは様々な困難を乗り越え、パートナーと共に最強のモンスター娘を育て上げ闘技場を制覇しましょう。 戦いに勝利して育成カードをゲットしてデッキを構築。自分好みの最強のモン娘を育てましょう！​能力を取るかイベントを取るか、プレイヤーの選択が生死を分けます。戦いはAPが溜まったら技ボタンを押すだけです。簡単操作で倒れるまで戦い続けましょう。

name: Be The ONE
description: You are the last survivor. Your friends and allies got killed during a raid. Can you survive the endless waves of enemies?

name: Mouse Hunter
description: Mouse Hunter - a puzzle game with a top view, executed in 2D graphics, where you have to catch the mouse.

name: Gray Death
description: In a world full of demons and the undead, a man searches for his lost wife. Resources are limited. Death is instant and waiting in the darkness. You will be running, jumping, climbing and searching in this 2D or 2.5D puzzle platformer.

name: Invertigo
description: INVERTIGO is a science-fiction puzzle game where the player has to use creative outside-the-box thinking involving gravity manipulation to discover their fate, after being awakened in an eerily and seemingly abandoned place.

name: Nekoba RocknRoll
description: The ultimate 2D action game where a cat with a bazooka fights! A variety of missions await you and your cat. Regain love and peace!

name: Fallow
description: Clinging to the memory of her vanished sisters, an isolated woman wanders a dying reality.

name: Living Legends: Voice of the Sea Collector's Edition
description: The dark seas are calling...

name: 7th Chance
description: 7th Chance is a short story-based exploration adventure game where you make choices that determine the fate of your character.

name: Bunny Flush
description: Just go up, don't look down. You will be addicted to this platform game that will challenge you to the fullest.

name: Devileader
description: Devileader, a fearsome space demon who once have destroyed countless planets of the solar system is about to be resurrected by his minions and fanatics, who want to bring chaos to the universe. Pilot the agile space interceptor Deviship and survive the terror of this demon lord.

name: Overlord - RPG Online Battle
description: Enjoy awesome Real-time Multiplayer Battles PVP. Use your excellent skills to kill the other players to be survivor.

name: Puzzle Cafe VR
description: Puzzle Cafe VR is a relaxing jigsaw puzzle game made for VR. Relax in a nice cafe and solve some jigsaw puzzles, complete challenges and upgrade the cafe scenery.

name: Fall Tower
description: 2D action game that aims to go up

name: Charisma X: Bulk Instagram Media Downloader
description: Charisma X: Bulk Instagram Media Downloader is a software for downloading Instagram profile, photos, videos, your saved post or insta feed or any specific insta item in matter of seconds with just a simple click. etc in bulk with single click.

name: THE LAST DEFENSE!
description: A classic tower defense game with ordinary graphics didn't fascinate you? Well, let's give a try and see how long you can defend! Show your commanding skills and prove no enemy can break your defense! Be a hero and save humanity with the LAST DEFENSE!

name: Unholy Neighbourhood
description: Embark on an amazing mission in Unholy Neighborhood - an atmospheric adventure game point and click, full of surreal locations and plot twists. Find the missing wife of Peter Grim and face the forces of evil. Experience a mysterious cataclysm that will change the world forever.

name: Snowboarding
description: Snowboard on slopes and on ramps, perform stunts and get points.

name: TD Worlds
description: TD Worlds is a dynamic, highly strategical game that challenges your skill. Build an impenetrable defense and get ready to plunge into a new, unknown world to uncover its secrets.

name: BoF1LL: A Withering World
description: Together two companions will explore and restore their shrouded landscapes. Playable solo and in Couch Co-op!

name: Sprite Sequence Chapter 2
description: A short wacky adventure about the discovery of one's self. In this second chapter, our nameless hero learns to fight and survive alone in the wild before discovering the reasons of his ordeal.

name: Hour Night
description: An online multiplayer game with 3-10 players where you survive against a shapeshifting monster. Do you know who you can trust?

name: The Last Chimera
description: This is RPG use only mouse. The player "chimera" changes to next generation by execute specific events. You will know the meaning of "your birth" when you get to "that place". There are three levels of difficulty. If it's "Easy", you can enjoy the story purely without any trouble.

name: Virtual Becomes Reality: A Stanford VR Experience
description: With Virtual Reality technology widely available, it’s more important than ever to understand its impact on people and society. Explore highlights of nearly two decades of research from Stanford's Virtual Human Interaction Lab and discover how we can use this medium to enhance our everyday lives.

name: Space Drone: Rescue Mission
description: Space drone is a minimal puzzle game with grid movement where you remotely control a drone to find and rescue your lost mates in space. Be aware to don't be without energy!

name: Zyconix
description: Zyconix is an exciting old school arcade-style puzzle game with four funky modes where you must match similarly colored blocks to clear them from the play area. These falling blocks can be grabbed in any order, but once you’ve grabbed one, it will sink like a rock when you let it go!

name: Revelation
description: Revelation is an intense arcade-style puzzle game from Krisalis where you spin color-coded interconnected dials inside clockwork locks to match colors and create chain reactions to open each safe. Thinking ahead is crucial, as each lock will affect adjacent locks when spun.

name: Grandmaster Chess
description: Whether you’re a beginner or a veteran, this fully featured chess game from Capstone has all the tools and features you need to learn and master the game of chess. Challenge an opponent with five adjustable skill levels from beginner to grandmaster.

name: Black Hair Girl is Best Girl
description: This visual novel is a 2-in-1 combo featuring two stories where both heroines have black hair.

name: Eiyuden Chronicle: Hundred Heroes
description: Eiyuden Chronicles: Hundred Heroes is designed to bring players a modern take on a classic JRPG experience. Get ready to lead 100+ playable characters through a war-torn world only you can save.

name: stock wolf
description: New gameplay, fresh style, unique stock market themes, so you can't stop playing! How to combine financial games with adult content? Invite you to experience the unprecedented, ridiculous but unstoppable way of lewd wolves in the stock market!

name: Dress-up Pups
description: Pattie is an animal-lover, working at the Dress-Up Pups fashion agency for dogs. Help her deal with ten different clients, each with their own dog and their own special requests, in this hilarious and exciting Match-3 adventure.

name: The Mountain Hunting
description: Whether you hunt freely in the open world with the "Free Hunt" mode, or try to complete the missions given to you with the "MISSION" mode. Besides that this mode also includes interestingly extraordinary missions from time to time.

name: AudioClash: Battle of the Bands
description: Create a band and dominate the competition in this new music-themed auto-battler developed by Big Boat Interactive in conjunction with The Living Tombstone. Take part in 4-player battles and unleash your abilities to win and earn rewards. AudioClash features all members of The Living Tombstone!

name: Thukothea Defender
description: A strategic tower-defense where you control powerfull drones. Unlock new tower and use specific technologies to defend your base on Thukothea!

name: Night Dreamer
description: 「Night Dreamer」はシングルプレイヤー横スクロールアクションゲームです。 動いたり消えたり、見えないブロックを利用したり、ワープ弾を特殊ブロックに当ててワイヤー移動を行いゴール扉へ向かいます。 特殊オブジェクトを順番に触れることでカギが与えられるので、その後ゴール扉に触れることでクリアになります。 道中立ちふさがるモンスターが出現するので、銃で攻撃し倒していきます。

name: Tube Rolling
description: A fast-paced arcade ball rolling in a tube in which you have to dodge obstacles, unlock new skins, and constantly improve your latest score.

name: Christmas Stories: Puss in Boots Collector's Edition
description: Why would anyone stop Christmas?

name: Another Path
description: A single-player puzzle exploration game sets in a desolated land in the post-apocalyptic world. Explore the forest, abandoned civilization, and a monumental building. Use an arcane amulet to explore this obscure island, enter the core of the building, and discover its mystical hidden artifacts.

name: Mr. Sleepy Man
description: A 3D Platformer Adventure focused on the interactions you have with characters in a non linear open world. Your actions will have consequences.

name: Cactus Cowboy 3 - Fully Loaded
description: Cactus Cowboy is back, in a fully fledged story shooter made for experienced VR Gamers.

name: VR Office Experience
description: ‘Vr Office Experience’ sanal gerçeklik oyunu hem gerçek dünyada yapılan içerik gözlemlerini hem de sanal dünyada bu içerikleri deneyimleme şansını sunmaktadır.

name: Quiz Carnage
description: If you love a great quiz, especially one that is action-packed with unexpected twists and turns, then Quiz Carnage is your game!

name: Anime puzzle
description: Anime puzzle is a classic puzzle that offers you to put the picture together from a huge number of details!

name: Word Escape
description: Create words to remove letters and flee through a procedurally generated dungeon. Armed with a customisable loadout of powerups, puzzle-solving and quick-thinking are required to escape the incoming wave of lava.

name: Worlds Of The Future
description: Worlds Of The Future is a sci-fi open world, action/adventure game. Explore a fully seamless solar system full of adventures, mysteries and colorful characters. Build your space delivery company, climb the company rankings and become a legend among the worlds!

name: Soulfire : Weapon Master
description: Soulfire is a souls-like, side scroller action competitive game, integrating (stitching) multiple game modes, including the classic battle royale mode. Whether it is melee, long-range, or support, there will always be a fighting style that suits you. May you survive to the end in the cruel fighting!

name: Tower of Guardian
description: Tower of Guardian , is 2D Fantasy Platformer RPG, tells about adventure of a wizard princess from Kingdom called "Aluria" exploring The Tower of Darkness

name: Twig & Flipper
description: Twig & Flipper is a 2D platformer With the ability to Run or Fly.

name: Suspicious Downpour
description: Suspicious Downpour is a very short single-player comedy horror experience about getting stuck in a storm while out camping. Sit in your tent with your trusty flashlight in the calm rain and just relax. Just be warned If you look for trouble you might find it.

name: Star Chaser in Sea World
description: Shoot all stars with one shot!

name: Super Shield Dash
description: Super Shield Dash is an arcade game where you smash enemies with your shield, while time moves as you move. No powerups, no fancy weapons. Just you simply dashing around, throwing shield to destroy enemies. So plant your feet, grit your teeth and eat those horses.

name: The Elysian Field
description: A gorgeous 3rd person casual adventure game centred around a dying soldier wondering through the elysian field witnessing the final moments of those already gone before leaving his own final mark. Uncover memories and a final conversation before laying to rest.

name: Cyberflight
description: Cyberflight is a high-speed, cyberpunk racing game where you can explore a detailed, living, procedurally generated city, backed by an atmospheric and original 80's soundtrack

name: RIOTOUS
description: RIOTOUS Is a Third-Person Shooter supporting cross platform play, players battle on 32 player maps in a variety of environments and settings.

name: Fluffy Cubed
description: In Fluffy Cubed the player must push boxes to their correct positions on the map in order to advance in level.

name: Express Simulator
description: This is a challenging leisure strategy game. Players have to go to different places to get express delivery, and send them to different destinations to get the corresponding reward. Players need to get the required reward in a limited time.

name: Escape: Forced Overtime
description: The heroine of this game was not lucky to meet with the thief when she came to work in a non-working day. Now she is tied up and she needs to find a way to free.

name: Mercenary Operator: Wolves
description: Mercenary Operator: Wolves is a 2D top-down shooter with a focus on methodical, tactical gameplay.

name: Schematic
description: Casual inventive puzzle with original solution and optional smart challenge that need thinking.

name: Dungless
description: Dungless is a 2D platformer with a procedurally generated world that will create a unique adventure for you every time that never happens again. Fight monsters, collect gold, go deeper and deeper into the dungeons.

name: Hoverboard Chase
description: HoverBoard Chase - 3d hoverboard race where you have to dodge cops, earn influence points for tricks and monitor your character's health bar, because in the end you can get caught!

name: Shaped Touches
description: 'Shaped Touches' is a simulation game of our future public spaces. Every 60 seconds, the game restarts in the same spaces with new sensory perceptions, experiencing the same place in new ways. This game was installed as part of the 17th International Architecture Exhibition - La Biennale di Venezia.

name: Whim
description: On the surface, a 2D platformer right out of the '80s video game playbook. The eponymous Whim walks and jumps his way through static rooms, avoiding the baddies and other hazards, and collecting various items. But this game is so much more than that...

name: Maptroid: Worlds
description: A metroidvania experienced entirely in the map! Explore and fill the map of several planets in this minimalistic and abstract metroidvania game, collect powerups to get to new places, and discover lore items to read. Have extra fun in the puzzletroid maps, or relax in zentroid.

name: Erotic Jigsaw Puzzle 3
description: Challenging 6 x 6 jigsaw puzzle featuring hardcore sex scenes by Lolita LineArt, on a smooth luxury graphical background.

name: RFM
description: A real-time roguelike action game where time is on your side. Play, pause and plan in a stylish retro-future invaded by another dimension, and ride the frequencies between worlds to discover the secrets of a new reality.

name: SlimeTime
description: Ever want to know what it's like to be Slimed? Yeah, neither did we - but we do now. Take a splat solo or with your best friends (or maybe make new ones?) through custom (and familiar) levels. Locations ranging from 'Slimy Sewers' to the sun drenched sands of 'the Island'. Slime or be Slimed!

name: The Adventures of Herbie & Katt LeChatt
description: Cats, Crime & Comedy, delivered in a stylish, old school point n' click fashion!

name: Phantom Train
description: In this game you have to find a way out of an endless train, and also meet an alien world.

name: My Sexy Waitress
description: My Sexy Waitress this is exciting, puzzle game with Fancy Girls. Control your tube and find the way to pass the level and unlock a lot of beauty in the gallery My Sexy Waitress contain a nice mechanic, cute girls and awesome story.

name: SYNCHRONIZERS: UNDEAD MARINES
description: This is a high-quality three-lane tower defense game for a single player initially (and online coop in a near future) for Windows. This is a twist of the Tower Defense genre, keeping what we all love and including interesting mechanics, characters, loads of action and an incredible soundtrack!

name: Slime VS. Female Hero Party
description: In this game you, as a slime, defeat four female heroes.

name: Freebooter of SPLORR!!
description: A retro style dungeon crawling parody game where you drink beer to improve your attack and try not to poop your pants while collecting jools!

name: Shoganai
description: This is simple action hentai game but if you want to win you must try more times. If you want to relax you have to pay the price but this price is time and experience. Don't never forget, the simple glory is not glory.

name: Fishermen's Haven
description: Fishermen's Haven is a tranquil manager game in which you take control of a small coastal settlement located on a remote island. Guide your people through the hardships of life on a tropical isle, manage resources, and find the means to expand the village.

name: A wave of enemies
description: A wave of enemies is an FPS game where the goal is to defend against hordes of monsters. There are 3 types of enemies in the game. With each wave, the speed and number of enemies increases. Use a machine gun to kill enemies. Break your previous record.

name: Speeder
description: Speeder is a game that aims to avoid obstacles. The speed increases with every minute. Break your records. Dynamic music will enhance your experience.

name: Training Leah
description: "Training Leah" is a SRPG with adult content, where you play as an unwilling hero/mercenary that fights to protect a village at the request of a woman named Leah. Fight monsters, train Leah, and save the village from monsters in this turn-based tactics SRPG.

name: Team:Cars
description: Team:Cars lets you take the most badass cars to fight in 15-minute team-based battles. Race and complete laps to gather XP and gold to improve your gear and fight with guns and complex abilities to secure victory for your team. Skill, teamplay and strategy will lead you to victory.

name: Mrs.Cat In Mars
description: Help Mrs.Cat to complete a mission: Explore Mars and collect the energy gems.In this 2d precision platformer, you'll have to memorize and face the invisible and visible deadly objects, running, jumping and meowing!

name: Lovely Kitchen
description: Lovely Kitchen is a 2D arcade game filled with donuts, pizzas and pies. Jumping from donuts and avoiding all clever traps, reach the final goal and wake up the cook.

name: Baseball Adventure
description: Baseball Adventure is a 2d game designed for the speed and reaction of the player, each blow must be calculated and hit in time, watch the moving objects around and have time to pull out the glove to catch the ball.

name: Slime's Journey
description: A mini metroidvania with retro style graphics about a Slime who have his parents took by an Evil Shaman, and now fight against lots of magical creatures to get them back!

name: Uboat Mechanic Simulator
description: The new kind of mechanic is in the town - if you've ever dreamt about reparing big large underwater boats this is the place just for you! Check the damage, repair and fix the boats and make sure they're ready to be manned.

name: System Under Surveillance
description: System Under Surveillance (SUS) is an upcoming stealth indie game with adventure and puzzle elements inspired by classic retro games. Take control of Adam and Turbo, and use their vastly different abilities to trick and avoid enemies. SUS is pure stealth at its core, and has no combat system!

name: Turbo Tempest
description: A Multiplayer Speedboat Battle Arena where you fight to be the last boat standing using a range on weapons on the map.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 6
description: Spend a Sensational Summer Vacation helping Rangers run Pinecreek Hills National Park. It’s Conservation Challenge year and Pinecreek’s better than ever before

name: Kings and Pigs
description: Kings and Pigs - fun pixelated 2D platformer with the ability to play together.

name: World Legends
description: A first-person shooting game, different types of weapons and equipment that make you not leave the game. The game is a tournament between dimensions and time.

name: New Slippery Samurai
description: Nobunaga was captured by Ninja Castle and remodeled to overflow from his whole body with lubricant.! He cannot even walk due to the slimy texture, but is able to kick the wall and slip with taking advantage of the lubricant! Let's cut off Ninjas' heads one after another, and escape from the Castle!

name: Hentai Jigsaw
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Theseus - Mythological Hero
description: RPG with a complex maze, full of traps and some puzzles, where the hero must fight the furious minotaur. And also a battle against the god Chronos, to retrieve Athens' treasure and save the souls of his old friends. Where Princess Ariadne is his only help.

name: GlassSmash 2
description: GlassSmash 2 is the sequel of the puzzle game where you have to smash all glass objects by sledgehammer.

name: The Fear Island
description: The Fear Island is an online co-op survival horror game where players accidentally land on an island full of supernatural entities and need to find an escape vehicle and its necessary resources.

name: Switch It
description: A bit frustrating game where you have to reach the end using the different types of blocks that you have.

name: Thirty Minute Nightmare
description: A short and sweet Survival Horror story with terrifying environments, a dark-ambient soundtrack and creatures hiding behind every corner. This is both a 90's classic PSX-style experience as well as a horrifying modern day adventure: The era and style of graphics is your choice. Good luck...

name: Alpaca Stacka
description: A 3D adventure platformer where you play as a kind alpaca dedicated to helping their animal friends.

name: Combat Engineer
description: Experience war from engineer perspective Take part in stabilization mission in the middle east Provide engineering support for your detachment Use proper tools and modify weapons and vehicles for your unit. Become Combat Engineer!

name: 明明如月
description: Rougelike map generation makes your every adventure different. Reasonable match of lineup, selection of talent and purchase of equipment will affect the success or failure of every adventure. Whether you can become the Savior of this continent, let's have a try.

name: Horny Girl Hentai Puzzle
description: Horny Girl-Hentai Puzzle is a puzzle game, the ultimate goal of which is to swap the blocks to collect the image. But remember, the purpose of this game is to let you relax and enjoy the process. To do this, we added a minimalistic interface and relaxing music.

name: Witchaven
description: Witchaven is a first-person fantasy slasher set in a dark medieval times. Dare to enter this 3D Hell... Dare to enter Witchaven!

name: Witchaven II: Blood Vengeance
description: Continue the story of the knight Grondoval in this first-person fantasy slasher. Get ready for bloody encounters with vile creatures and vicious warriors. Stop an evil witch from carrying a titular blood vengeance in revenge for him having slain her sister.

name: Battle for Antares
description: Battle for Antares is a fast-paced strategy game. You grow your empire, colonize star systems, build planetary infrastructure and combat drones to battle your opponent. Will you focus on research to crush your opponent with superior technology? Or do you outnumber and overwhelm the enemy early on?

name: The Curse Of Esrevni
description: Turn-based strategy game Use your cards well Survive Board game Don't give up !

name: The Seagull
description: A young woman grows up on the shores of a lake and loves it as the gulls do, and is as happy and free as they are. But a man happens to come that way and destroys her, just because he can.

name: Adventures of Human Being
description: ONE GAME, TWO COLOURS. ONE ADVENTURE, MANY PUZZLES. A short story-based 2-D Puzzle-Adventurer with a 1-Bit Pixel art style.

name: Bigger Trucks
description: Bigger Trucks is a simulator of big cars that deliver cargo, in off-road conditions.

name: DAMA GALLERY
description: First Exhibition: "Digital Genesis" Freely explorable digital art gallery

name: Kochu's Dream
description: A 3d bug adventure game 🐜🐛🐞 Run, jump and shoot while you chase an elusive fairy . . . Can you turn back into a human?

name: Sigma Impact
description: A physics-based combat roguelite set in a dungeon of glass

name: Orakyubu
description: A game about 2D puzzles in 3D space.

name: Changes
description: A puzzle game about living structures that evolve every time you move.

name: Overdosed VR
description: Overdosed (VR) You are a police officer in the crime run country of Colmbia. Every callout you respond to, you step into the dangers, of an anti-police state. Putting your life on the line, to serve those who matter.

name: Nanoscape
description: A first person exploration of a cancer cell deep in the human body, featuring a highly detailed simulation of cellular anatomy and processes based on the latest scientific research!

name: MayBlues
description: A so-called Tsum Tsum-like puzzle game. Let's connect and erase the substances in his brain that have been sick due to May disease and make him happy!

name: 仙剑诀网络版
description: 这是一款3D仙侠国风MMOARPG游戏，来挑选天刀、画师、剑仙中的一个职业，扮演TA来顿悟绝世道法，自由搭配技能，体验仙侠的魅力！

name: 孙美琪疑案：雨儿胡同
description: 1992年7月16日，后海湖边槐树下，发现一名女尸，衣着整齐坐在槐树下，颈部缠绕着一根吉他弦，为主要致死原因，双手有被吉他弦勒伤的痕迹，初步判定为自杀。死亡时间约凌晨2点左右，死者叫关雨珑。林警官，请你在错综复杂的线索中，寻找凶案的真相。

name: Light2Live
description: Light2live is a procedurally generated roguelike with crafting, stealth, exploration and asynchronous multiplayer mechanics. Improve your skills and discover secrets as you advance through the floors of this mysterious fortress in search of your missing friend. Stay in the light ...

name: Hentai Pleasure
description: Move all parts to form the complete image.

name: Propulsion
description: A fast-paced stylised 3D platformer where you must use your rocket launcher to boost through levels as quickly as possible!

name: Terebron
description: Guide Gwlader and his companions on the journey of a lifetime to save the dying god ! Solve puzzles with the mysterious Terebron, that the dying god sent you in order to reach your destination, and your destiny.

name: Anagraphs: An Anagram Game With a Twist
description: Anagrams with a twist! From the creator of the popular word game Synonymy, an addicting new word game where the anagram possibilities are greater than ever before.

name: Gang of Paws
description: Gang of Paws is a Roguelike Deck-Builder with a hybrid turn-based and real-time battle system. Inspired by the amazing Megaman Battle Network.

name: AudioSpace
description: The best audio visualizer this side of the galaxy. Experience your favorite music like never before!

name: The Little Tank Hunter
description: Your mission is to destroy the tank master, can you do it? Shoot yourself through various levels and collect coins. Be careful, if you die you lose some of them. Find the hidden emeralds and use them to upgrade your tank.

name: Zannon
description: Zannon is our take on the classic shooters of the late 1980's and early 1990's. Blast your way through 10 challanging levels, collect awesome power-ups, battle numereous different enemies, base and gun platforms. - Love retro and you'll love Zannon.

name: Rise of Humanity: Prologue
description: Experience the first events taking place in Rise of Humanity – a game that uniquely fuses turn-based strategy & deck-building. Build decks for each hero, collect, upgrade & merge powerful cards, and plan your strategy wisely to save humankind from the machines!

name: Frozen Memories
description: Is what is recorded in a photograph necessarily true? I don't think so. "But I think that even if it's a fake photo, the emotions of its creator are real after all." She said. So, your memories, then, must be real? Visual novel "Frozen Memories" gives you a fictionalised version of a real memory.

name: Smashroom
description: The faith of the forest is threatened by evil forces. A mysterious curse has turned your human body into a small mushroom and your world is invaded by molds, but not all is lost. Your new form comes with new abilities!

name: My Jigsaw Adventures - Roads of Life
description: Jump into an adventure and travel through fabulous hand-painted jigsaw puzzles! Play the way you want using different number of pieces, shapes and helpers.

name: Psicose?
description: Running away is your only option, but beware, it can also be your end. Nathanael must go through a mysterious mansion while fleeing from something that pursues him, but ends up getting involved in an occult ritual that puts him on the threshold between reality and the surreal.

name: Fire Escape
description: A neo-Hitchock murder mystery set in Brooklyn. When the clock strikes eight, a suspenseful thriller begins to unfold in real time. Watch closely from the fire escape as your suspicious neighbors embroil you in a simmering, interactive crime.

name: Inner Worlds
description: Inner Worlds is a side-scroll fantasy action adventure, in which you play the role of a strong and beautiful woman / she-wolf Nikita.

name: Naked News
description: Join in the fun with an unforgettable experience unlike any other! Naked News brings some hardcore, crass, dirty, vulgar, dark humour into an easily offended world, not pulling any punches and making fun of everything with this visual novel-style comic, Sitcom-esque episodic!

name: G String
description: Slip into the Standard Issue Biosuit as Myo Hyori, a gifted Korean teenage girl who must face the perils of the future. Survive many hazards, explore a seemingly endless metropolis and beyond as the world around you implodes and history marches towards its inevitable conclusion.

name: Absolute Zero
description: A race known as the Snastipods has destroyed the Earth and enslaved its population. Your quest is to help Samantha Snark AKA "Sammy" survive on the Absolute Zero Space Station, end Snastipod tyranny and invoke revenge for the people of Earth.

name: Jump To Die 2 - Bloody Soul
description: Watch them die.

name: Super Arcade Boy in Goodbye Greenies
description: A Retro Style Classic Shoot'em Up! In this second installment of the series, fly Super Arcade Boy through 8 levels while defeating waves of aliens and big bosses. Have funny conversations with the alien leader you are destined to defeat, then save the planet from this massive alien invasion!

name: Avaria: Chains of Lust
description: Avaria: Chains of Lust is a hentai dungeon crawler that lets you explore the mines of Arden to search for the truth behind its villagers going missing. As you traverse through these mines, you will fight a slew of monsters while also dealing with the strange inhabitants of the town.

name: 洞穴探险队 Caver
description: 《Caver》 is a pixelated, card and rogue-like game. The game follows the basic setting of the traditional card game, such as energy consumption, discard card and so on. It's also a rogue-like game, with different NPCS, events, items and even scenarios for each time the player encounters them on the train.

name: Wanking Simulator VR
description: The best wanking experience known to mankind, from the comfort of your home. Visit Gay Bay and deliver some delightful changes to the town's community.

name: Tennis World Tour 2
description: Play as the world's top players, master each surface, perfect your game and strive to dominate the world circuit. Choose from multiple game modes, with singles and doubles games, local and online.

name: KIWAYA
description: KIWAYA is a unique action weapon testing-game. Destroy rocks & bugs, get as deep as possible and receive advice from a penguin.

name: Creepy Tale
description: Creepy quest with the atmosphere of the Brothers Grimm fairy tales. Go through a dangerous adventure filled with puzzles and challenges! Perhaps it is you who will be able to solve all the secrets of forest and save the peaceful creatures?

name: Battle Bandits
description: Battle Bandits is a top down tank shooter with customisable tanks and 30 levels to complete!

name: Mira's Tale
description: Swing, jump and glide your way through an ancient world, uncover secrets, explore the past and solve puzzles to restore peace to the village.

name: Jerking Off In Class Simulator
description: We all knew that one pervert that would jerk off in the back of the classroom. You ARE that pervert!

name: Sisterly Lust
description: After the sudden death of your father you come back to your hometown and move to a new home to live with Liza, Bella, Rachel and Susan. You control the protagonist as he settles in his new life, surrounded by beautiful women.

name: Xevorel - The Way Of The Feather
description: The armies of darkness are pouring in from another dimension! Explore beautifully hand-crafted locations, rediscover long-forgotten stories, and fight to save the future of civilization in Xevorel - The Way Of The Feather!

name: STRTK1NG-Beta v1.3.0
description: Two Rules:Don't be last & Don't get caught. StrtK1ng is a racing game offering new modes and variations reminiscent of pre-existing games

name: Horizon's Gate
description: Voyage into the wide world of Eral as an explorer, trader, or privateer. Defeat your enemies on land or at sea in deep but straightforward tactical combat. Unravel the secrets behind Dominio's betrayal – or sail off in search of your own adventure.

name: Secret City: Chalk of Fate Collector's Edition
description: An otherworldly adventure in the heart of the Big Apple!

name: Grim Ember
description: An Epic RPG in which you set out on an action packed rogue-lite journey of turn-based strategic battles in a medieval fantasy world. Discover powerful spells and abilities as you journey forth to cleanse the lands plagued by unimaginable horrors and abominations.

name: Somewhere: Sect of Relic
description: Year 1990. Hakan received a squeaky call by his wife. He came around in an her place and tried to find her. Wandering down narrow roads he suddenly understood... It was the place where supernatural had been spilled. And A sect comes to the city.

name: MHL
description: Recruit, train, equip, and build the ultimate team.

name: Buddy Bash
description: Buddy Bash is a physics-based multiplayer 2D platformer fighting game that combines parkour moves and firearms into a cute, yet brutal, cocktail of friendly competitive fun!

name: The Savana
description: The Savana is a Survival game in the savana theme in multiplayer Online on a 60KM² map, on a realistic sheet on a world open to the third person.

name: Super Rocket Ride
description: Hardcore retro action. Rocket go boom!

name: Mad Ball
description: Physics-based aerial batball game. Online multiplayer. 1v1 to 3v3. A mix of many sports. Baseball, tennis, hockey, golf and nfl. Maybe even more. Added melee and tackles.

name: Light Fingers
description: Light Fingers is a magical mechanical board game where thieves compete in a test of skills to prove who among them is the most deft!

name: Recoil
description: Recoil is a 2D action couch competitive game, in which you can only move using the recoil of your own guns.

name: Relieve
description: Stories about people who stucked between life and death, in the middle-world called "World of Agony". Help them escape and try to relieve fate of those who left there forever.

name: Full Service
description: Play as a workaholic young adult who finds romance in an unexpected place, an all-male massage parlor.

name: Dryad
description: Island-building adventure

name: ManaTech
description: In ManaTech, fight as a mage trying to maintain relevancy as a new age begins to dawn, or fight as a commoner utilizing your new found energy weaponry to establish independence in this fast paced twin stick arena shooter. Will you fight for magic or technology?

name: VELUCITY
description: VELUCITY, a rhythm game with a new feel, is released in Steam through Early Access! Enjoy the game with a keyboard that anyone can easily start with.

name: Cragls
description: Cragls is an online multiplayer car racing game for 2-8 players

name: Hotel Afterlife
description: Design your own hotel in hell, expand it, purify the souls of sinners by torture and manage the hellish staff by developing a network of Afterlife corporate facilities.

name: Xenovaders
description: Arcade classic games are back! Test your skills shooting away the xenovader hordes and clean all the stages, wave after wave, in this frantic shoot'em up from alternative 80's.

name: Minnano Gensokyo Single
description: 《大家的幻想乡单机版》是一款卡牌对战养成游戏。 玩家扮演博丽神神社的新助手，帮助博丽神社获得信仰，以维持博丽神社正常运行。 玩家需要尽量完成各种委托，与幻想乡的各方势力搞好关系，以应对随时都可能发生的异变。

name: Ami
description: Ami is a puzzle-platformer with a deep story. Together with the main character you get to learn the drama of this world.

name: Emily Archer and the Curse of Tutankhamun
description: Lady Archer is invited to Egypt to see the priceless treasure of King Tutankhamun by her friend Lord Carnarvon. She arrives to find her dear friend murdered and the mask of Tutankhamun stolen. Collect evidence to solve the murder in this hidden object game!

name: BalloonBoyBob
description: Ball named Bob-platformer game with rotation, parkour and jumps!

name: Misshapen
description: A story-driven body-horror simulator where you can’t kill your enemies but you can distort their bodies in creepy ways. Grow lumps, build weird living structures and dive into the mysteries of Zheltikov’s military base.

name: CyberLink PowerDVD 20 Ultra
description: Redefining Entertainment - The Best Media Player for WindowsPowerDVD is more than just a Blu-ray and DVD player – it's an all-in-one, premium multimedia app that allows you to get the most out of your viewing experience.

name: Cardsweeper
description: Reinvent the puzzle game of numbers!

name: Zombie Towns
description: Zombie Towns is an FPS which you'll need to eliminate the zombies. In order to complete a level, you must find a key to open the gate and you will go to the next level. But look out, you can die quickly if you dont pay enough attention.

name: Escape From Russia
description: This is an adventure horror game, the action of which takes place an alternative reality, in which it is necessary to help Alexei Marginalny to collect an American passport without getting caught by Vladimir Vladimirovich Vrutin and escape from an unprecedented Russia.

name: Castle Torgeath Redux
description: Strap yourself in for an epic dungeon adventure! Trapped inside a legendary castle, slay anything that moves with your trusty sword and spells all while looting everything in sight. Uncover the castle’s dark secrets and barter with its hapless denizens. With full 3d motion and a fistful of potions what can go wrong!

name: Dish Life: The Game
description: In Dish Life: The Game, experience the life of a stem cell researcher by managing the daily life of a laboratory and growing your very own stem cells. Manage your laboratory and nurture your stem cells to become a celebrated stem cell scientist.

name: Beardy McStrongarm
description: Beardy McStrongarm is an Indie developed 2D Platformer with unique mechanics and challenging game-play. Take on the role of Beardy, a bearded strongman with questionably endless strength in his one arm, joined by his buddy Jorgy, a purple cat, to travel across the distant lands on a grand adventure.

name: Beyond The Underworld
description: As you wake up as a different being with no memory of why you are here, you will explore a gorgeous underworld with spirits and unique creatures to help you find the way. Go from the red fields of The Crimson Zone to the vast beaches of The Silver Coast to the final run to Elysium.

name: A Player's Heart
description: Find love, fame, and intrigue on the stage of the city's all-woman Opera! Put on a show, survive drama on and off-stage...and win your lover's heart. A Player's Heart is a 222,000-word interactive lesbian romance novel by Melissa Scott.

name: Slotracers VR
description: Slotracers VR is a full slotracing experience built for VR. Race miniature cars against your friends on race tracks created by yourself, your friends or the community. Build your own tracks together with your friends and share them on the Steam Workshop for other people to enjoy.

name: Need for Speed™ Heat
description: Hustle by day and risk it all at night in Need for Speed™ Heat Deluxe Edition, a white-knuckle street racer, where the lines of the law fade as the sun starts to set.

name: Dragon Age™ Inquisition
description: Winner of over 130 Game of the Year awards, discover the definitive Dragon Age: Inquisition experience. The Game of the Year Edition includes the critically acclaimed game, all three official add-ons - Jaws of Hakkon, The Descent, and Trespasser - and more.

name: Journey To Planet Earth
description: A GAME ABOUT FUN, HOPE AND URBAN CONCIOUSNESS...This game takes place in a real world location, a small village called Fornovo, on the Taro River.It’s a game about lot of things...like everything happens around you from childhood to human extinction.World could be Different.

name: STAR WARS™: Squadrons
description: Master the art of starfighter combat in the authentic piloting experience STAR WARS™: Squadrons. Feel the adrenaline of first-person multiplayer space dogfights alongside your squadron, and buckle up in a thrilling STAR WARS™ story.

name: _space_train
description: What if there was a train, in space? Embark as a simple passenger or take a longer-term role as a member of staff in an asymmetric gaming experience like no other.

name: VALKYRIE CONNECT
description: Enjoy deep character growth and co-op boss battles in this JRPG.

name: Goalienator
description: Start your journey into virtual goaltending. Train your reaction skills in multiple game modes and tweaks training settings to fit your skill level. Prove your skills by competing in leaderboards and collect achievements.

name: Super Squash
