description: Super Squash is a top-down Shoot 'Em Up arcade game which features multiple playable characters who must all unite together to stop the unrelenting hordes of enemies and bosses.

name: 黄河大合唱 Song of Yellow River
description: The Song of Yellow River focused on the Anti-Japanese War from 1931 to 1945. This game will lead players to experience one of the most brutal battles in human history. From far to near, from north to south, guide players to understand the history of the anti-Japanese ancestors.

name: Family Tree Heritage Gold
description: Family Tree Heritage Gold 16 provides exciting, easy to use new features, including a new Descendants View, printing of background images on many charts, improvements to the ability to sync with FamilySearch™ Family Tree, recording non-traditional couple relationships, and more!

name: Lights, Camera, Reaction!
description: The ultimate party game for get-togethers! Grab your phone or tablet and battle head-to-head with our IRL Edition! Feeling some VR? Play the solo reactions mode, or battle friends with the multiplayer VR modes! Spice up those boring holiday parties, and enjoy countless hours of hilarious fun!

name: BustaShip
description: BustaShip is an action rhythm arcade game in which you fly a ship through a tunnel whilst trying to avoid all of the obstacles in your way, backed by some wicked beats and stylish visuals! Do you have what it takes to overcome all of the challenging musical tracks available?

name: Touhou Mechanical Scrollery | 幻想討幻経
description: A 3D bullet hell mid-air hunting action game based on the Touhou Project. Fly freely through the air and face down humongous foes with both melee action and 3D bullet patterns (Danmaku)!

name: 千里の棋譜 ～現代将棋ミステリー～
description: 「最強の名人は、どこに消えたのか？」 かつてない深さで勝負師の真実に迫る推理ミステリーADV

name: Feeling Square?

description: Orum's Death Run is a multiplayer TPS game, often with silly and funny scenes. This game has existed as a mini game of several games. The background is a jump map made of containers, grass and concrete.

name: Moe Moe World War II-3 Deluxe Edition 萌萌２次大戰（略）３豪華限定版
description: 《Moe Moe World War II-3 Deluxe Edition 萌萌２次大戰（略）３豪華限定版》Developed by SystemSoft Alpha, 《Moe Moe World War II-3 Deluxe Edition 萌萌２次大戰（略）３豪華限定版》 is a classic beauty strategic game sequel authorized by Interwise Media. Now available on Steam.

name: Classic Card Game Canasta
description: As a card game in the rummy family, Canasta stands out as a true classic. The tactics and strategy required make this game one of challenging fun.

name: Little Shop of Junk
description: Turn a bunker into a busy shop in a world where no one even remembers what the apocalypse was all about. Sell everything from canned soup to rockets, build wonders of junkyard engineering and do your best to not explode along the way!

name: Good Goods Incorporated
description: Good Goods Incorporated is a cute logistics tycoon game set on Earth

name: Fareo: Shadowlands
description: "Fareo: Shadowlands" is a turn-based RPG with unique core mechanism. Build your team with 40 different Champions and defeat the nightmare hidden in Shadowlands.

name: Tropical Air Hockey
description: Tropical Air hockey is a VR game for everyone, with five modes available to choose from, you can have non stop fun enjoying the beautiful surroundings of a tropical island while playing air hockey.

name: Escape Rebooted
description: This is a 2D puzzle jumping platformer in the dark.

name: Ollie & Bollie: Outdoor Estate
description: A cute sandbox game about restoring an estate. Work with your (real or AI) friend Bollie to cut trees, catch sheep, build a shed and more in this outdoor autumn sandbox game.

name: Zup! Z
description: Minimal physical puzzle with explosions

name: Xecute
description: Xecute takes a more platforming focus approach on the metroidvania genre. Explore 12 different areas and uncover many items and weird discoveries.

name: ETERNAL BLOOD
description: ETERNAL BLOOD is a high-adrenaline arcade-action FPS. Face legions of demons, harvest their souls and become a God of Destruction.

name: 战神七魄
description: 《战神七魄》是一款大型多人APRG游戏，游戏中拥有养成、冒险、打斗、社交、互动等各种丰富多样的功能。玩家可以通过点击空白处的方式控制自己的角色，在3D静态地图配合2D动态模型的即时光影成像技术下与怪物战斗，和兄弟结盟，挥洒热血，激战沙场。玩家能遇到磨难与考验，锻炼出不屈的意志。会面临诱惑和选择，寻找到真实的自我。可以锄强扶弱，劫富济贫，一展大侠风范；也可以呼朋唤友，自成一派，彰显领袖本色。侠之大者，为国为民，力量越大，责任越大，拿起手中的刀剑，书写属于你自己的传奇。在服务器架构上支持多服务器动态支撑技术，能容纳数万玩家在游戏内娱乐。游戏美术设计上汲取了东西方的美术元素，使用玄幻而写实的美术风格，人物造型华丽而独特，富有真实立体效果和绚丽的光影。

name: Pastel: Blind Karma
description: Pastel is a Single-Player 3D Adventure Puzzle Game. Play as Pastel, a nine-tailed fox who has just woken up in an overgrown forest with no memory of who she is or how she got there. You will need to travel through time to recover her memories and prevent a great calamity from taking place.

name: No Game No LIFE
description: "No Game No LIFE" is a puzzle game that erases cubes that increase and decrease according to the rules of "Conway's Game of Life".

name: Kili's treasure
description: Kili's dog Rosco had to be sent to the farm recently. To cheer Kili up her mother has organized a treasure hunt with a surprise at the end! Help Kili solve the clues one after another and get to the treasure!

name: HellScape: Two Brothers
description: Hellscape: Two Brothers is an Athmospheric, 3D, Adventure, Puzzle game.A journey through Hell inspired by Dante Alighieri's Divine Comedy.Two brothers take on a quest to find and save their loved one kidnapped by the devils servants.

name: Spirit of the Blade
description: Test your combat skills in an epic samurai fight against other players in FFA and CTF. Win, upgrade and customize your character for a unique feeling.

name: Your little story: Valentine's Day
description: Love is such a silly feeling. Can you really live for it? Why would you die for it? Empty words... But what if someone's life can really depend on your love?

name: 回门 Way Back Home
description: "Way back home" is a 2D horizontal board horror puzzle game. It takes the Republic of China period from 1905 to 1926 as the background of the times. With a large number of exquisite original paintings, rich playing methods, excellent music and dubbing, delicate script and narrative game style, it creates a strong historical...

name: Game Of Puzzles: Space
description: Game Of Puzzles: Space - is a simple puzzle on a space theme.

name: Coromon
description: A JRPG-like monster taming game set in near future. Explore a charming pixel world filled with challenging puzzles, interesting creatures and titanic bosses. Dive into this compelling story that leads you to a mysterious disruption.

name: Rhythmic Retro Racer
description: Rhythmic Retro Racer is an 3d arcade racing game where you can drive classic sport cars in a neon illuminated 80's world with fantastic art style... Retro Racer mostly offer rhytmic based gameplay including unique synth wave soundtrack, time challenge and free ride levels.

name: We Went Back
description: We Went Back is a time-looping horror game in which you wake up in an abandoned space station utterly alone. The exit door is locked and you must find a way to escape what lurks within. Find clues, experience dynamically changing environments and confront terror in order to find a way out.

name: Sono
description: Sono is a 2D exploration game where players effortlessly glide through an abstract microcosm collecting lost fragments of sound.

name: Bad Guys at School
description: In Bad Guys at School you can play as students and revolt against school system by completing missions, or decide to become a teacher that must maintain order despite the violence and brutality in the school.

name: Gjana's World
description: Hard action-platformer that tests patience.

name: Zack 2: Celestine's Map
description: Fulfill your greatest quest in a world full of secrets, magic, and supernatural creatures.Choose how you converse with the world carefully.......each choice will have massive consequences.

name: Luna : The Dimension Watcher
description: 'The Luna Expeditionary Force's Dimension Crack Adventure!

name: Birds Are Real
description: Are Birds Real? - Just another day flying over the city & monitoring the plebs. Welcome to the United States Department of B.I.R.D.S. Choose your drone then keep the peace and make sure everyone keeps Believing in Birds.

name: rook
description: rook is a short survival game where you play as a bird on a remote farm

name: Tanks 2020
description: A computer game for two players in the arcade genre. The player must, controlling his tank, destroy another player.

name: Chase
description: Chase is an arcade racing game. You control the spacecraft following the creek of the river on some unknown planet. You are chased by enemies who want to destroy you. Your spacecraft has limited health and each collision with creek walls damages spacecraft. The goal is to reach finish and stay alive.

name: SkyPrimal
description: Having lost your tribe, you, as the sole survivor, find yourself in an era of deadly danger and exciting adventures. You have to build yourself a shelter, make weapons, protect yourself from wild animals, and prove that you are not a prey, but a predator.

name: Let It Happen
description: Let It Happen is a physics-simulation game inspired by recent democratic protests in Russia. Place protesters and police in the square, click on Let It Happen! and enjoy the show. Explore the city: it has a bunch of interactive locations.

name: Neko Neko
description: Relax puzzle game to keep you in a good mood

name: LastShot
description: Last Shot - A fast platformer shooter where you can jump, smash, blow up enemies with your own bombs.

name: Solous
description: Rhythm game with a leaderboard. One level, one song and only one chance to collect all data for 100%!

name: Lasting Solstice
description: After suffering from amnesia, Kazu tries his best to regain his former self. Without his memories, he has trouble remembering close friends and family. With the help of old and new friends along the way, Kazu slowly goes on to his path through self-discovery.

name: ILY
description: Two Mushrooms, lots of puzzles!

name: Beyond Enemy Lines - Remastered Edition
description: The world is near of nuclear apocalypse, a soviet seperatist group captured the control chip of a military satelite. It is your job to recover the chip! Equipped with state of the art weapons and equipment, you operate in absolute secrecy as a lone wolf far beyond enemy lines.

name: Topfold
description: This is a classic tetris game from a different angle. You see the playing field from above and the pieces fall down from you.

name: Khimera: Puzzle Island
description: She's back just in time to do all the puzzles in your Sunday paper! It's a Khimera Nonogram adventure!

name: Angry food
description: Angry food is a logic game for creating chains of identical elements. The goal of the game is to put in a row from 3 identical elements, get points and go to the next level There are also bonuses. Not all bonuses are useful. Some may do harm.

name: Royal Rescue SRPG
description: "Royal Rescue SRPG" is a role-playing game with a turn-based combat system. From here out of nowhere Princess is kidnapped from the Kingdom, you get a secret mission to save her! Challenge yourself in several quests, face the enemies of the kingdom and save the princess!

name: Box Kid Adventures
description: Box Kid Adventures is a dynamic, top-down puzzle game. You play as Box Kid – a toy made of cardboard – going through various levels, full of nasty enemies and brain challenging puzzles.

name: Recluses
description: More than 30 orthodox sectarians underground. They locked themselves in man-made caves. You're a negotiator. Your task is to rescue recluses before Apocalypse.

name: Chronostation
description: Sci-fi Tower Defense real-time strategy with pleasant adaptive music. Play as a commander of a space station which got stuck in a time anomaly.

name: VR Jetpack Game
description: Physics-based VR with full freedom of flight. VR that feels and controls like a real jetpack. A real-time multiplayer VR arena.

name: Dr Dick Dong: Stripper Underworld
description: NSFW: Dong, Dick Dong is the name and secret agent stuff is my game! Featuring the return of the Lap Dance sim! Dig deep into the Stripper Underworld and investigate your predecessor's disappearance. Expose a crime syndicate that is the embodiment of human darkness.

name: Bots & Belts
description: Bots & Belts is a fun and hectic toy-building game! Use quick-thinking to keep the factory running efficiently. Play through 27 unique levels featuring different machines to utilize, toys to build, and belts to manage! Beat the game by yourself or join your friends online or couch co-op!

name: HGFaceDD
description: Hgfacedd is a live virtual role simulation software, which can capture the face state changes of the captured person in real time through the webcam, and copper step it to the user's own virtual role

name: Factory Rally Madness
description: Factory Rally Madness mixes real time action racing with puzzles and reasoning, inspired by robot programming. Robots race through factories trying to reach objectives points, having their movements programmed while racing. Chaotic, crazy, casual and also not so casual gaming.

name: Operation Deep Magic: Cryptanalysis
description: Reconnaissance operatives infiltrated a corporate building and extracted electronics and files encrypted with 56-bit DES. Items were handed over to you, the cryptanalyst. Your mission is to decrypt the files.

name: 孟德大小姐与自爆少年THREE KINGDOM FANTASY
description: 《孟德大小姐与自爆少年》是一款文字冒险（AVG）游戏，完全原创剧情，将带给大家一段穿插了过去与未来的棋局与因缘。游戏中，玩家将扮演普通大学生郭风笑，开启一场独特的奇妙旅程。

name: Cold Winter Morning
description: "Is this justice?"

name: Frontier - TRS
description: Frontier – Tactical Response Squad is a fast-paced top down shooter based in a dystopian future where mage corporations are in control. The corporations driven the environment to the edge with excessive resource extraction and humanity is forced to live in a high-tech bio domes.

name: Tyrania - A Kinetic Visual Novel
description: Tyrania is a kinetic visual novel, meaning a text-based game with a one ending linear story. The story is focused on the opposition of two different ideas of Justice when dealing with crime and terrorism.

name: Barnard's Star
description: Snipe your friends, electrocute your enemies and rain down acidic slime in the Barnard’s Star system, 6 light years from Earth. A multiplayer, turn-based tactics battler with no micro-transactions and no random chance — ingenuity is the only way to victory!

name: Terminal Singularity
description: The black hole is approaching, the singularity is inevitable! It is too late to run now, your only way out is a miracle. Your salvation lies in the power of the Grid - claim it for yourself and use it to escape your dark and terrible fate.

name: Beach Bar VR
description: Beach Bar VR is an arcade game about bar tending. See how many tips you can earn in the time limit. Learn to make different cocktails.

name: Hybrid Instinct
description: Hybrid Instinct is a action fighting Puzzle Platformer. Unlock special abilites and collect all Magic Fruits. Defend your territory against challanging Enemys. Fly, Climb, Fight, Swim, Teleport, Ride Motorcycles, solve puzzles and explore all hand-painted Levels.

name: Guardians of Greyrock
description: A tactical, turn-based high-fantasy adventure card game like no other. Take charge of an elite party of heroes to search out and purge the realm of darkness. Save the ailing Kingdom of Greyrock... in this life or from beyond death itself!

name: GORILLA TOWN
description: SCIENCE! A 1920s Art Deco world chock full of giant gorillas, spiteful robots, and highly combustible blimps. Battle friends in turn-based combat or play alone and help Victor the gorilla escape 22 levels of robotic revolt! Inspired by the classic artillery game, Qbasic Gorillas.

name: Lessons with Chii-chan
description: Kouta, a timid university student is tasked with tutoring the outgoing yet dense Chieri to help her get through her exams. However, they couldn't be more different. Find out what hijinks ensue in Lessons With Chii-chan!

name: Green Elephant: Epilogue
description: Green Elephant: Epilogue is a first-person detective quest set at a Soviet military base after the events of the Russian art film “The Green Elephant”.

name: Pro Player Life
description: In Pro Player Life you can make your dream of becoming a pro player come true, and maybe even become a legend in the world of e-sports. Manage your career, level up your skills, and come up against increasingly stronger opponents in your journey to the top of the world.

name: Network E.L.E.
description: Network E.L.E.™ is an open-world, survival story set on Planet Mercury in 2184, an abandoned city — military base filled with deadly radiation. You play as Myorah, a NASA exploration pilot going after four Mercury-980 single board Space-VPX chips, which activate a dormant spaceship left within the city.

name: God's Challenge
description: In the role of an ancient God who has been stripped of his power, along with the two swords of darkness and light, the player must be very agile and skillful to be able to overcome all challenges, to once again regain the power of a God

name: VasterClaws 3:Dragon slayer of the God world
description: Defeat the God-devouring Dragon in this deceptively simple squad building game! Designed from the ground up for low power consumption, low temp, zero load time gaming. The game text has been fully translated into English.

name: Pawnshop Tycoon
description: Start with a garage full of old junk and expand to a thriving business. Manage sales and train staff to automate redundant tasks. Relocate or expand your shop with many options across the city. Learn all the ins and outs of becoming a big city Pawnshop Tycoon!

name: Shaolin vs Wutang 2
description: The sequel to Shaolin vs Wutang! Shaolin vs Wutang 2 is a INDIE love letter to Martial Arts and classic Kung Fu films. Made for casual game fans not intended for Hardcore Fighting Game players.

name: Gunfire Reborn
description: Gunfire Reborn is an adventure level-based game featured with FPS, Roguelite and RPG. Players can control heros with various abilities to experience diverse Build gameplay, use randomly dropped weapons to explore random levels. This game can be played by single player, or Co-op up to four.

name: Der Geisterturm / The Ghost Tower
description: Der Geisterturm is a futuristic turn-based dungeon crawler with survival horror elements where you fight your way to the top floor of a mysterious tower while piloting your own Robotic Combat Suit. Will you reach it alive or die trying?

name: Border Of Insanity Origins
description: Do you know what insanity is? The illusory perception of reality and the repetition of the same actions. Immerse yourself in a world where nothing can be considered real. Where you are alive and dead at the same time and surrounded by the walking dead. Feel what real madness is.

name: Mega Hasan
description: 32 levels of platforming awesomeness.

name: Riftnote
description: Write into perspective - with a simple and intuitive spatial notebook.

name: Log 141
description: Log 141 is an indie game originally developed as a high school computer science project. Inspired by text-based games of the past, this game was created to be played entirely within a terminal window. Traverse a text-based adventure filled with puzzles and mystery as you uncover the secret of Log 141.

name: Fantamal
description: It's a Stardew Vallley-meets-Pokemon experience! Build habitats, catch Fantamals, collect their produces and test their combat potential on battles to earn credits at college. Explore the universe to discover and learn about different Fantamals in different towns.

name: 浮世万千之前世今生
description: "Floating world before the world this life" is an independent stand-alone game, this game is floating world myriad game series in the second.The game is a full-length xiuxian novel stream game, using the traditional turn-based combat system.

name: Grimm 1865
description: You play has Hebert Grimm For the last nine years, You've been studying abroad. You return home six month ago, and found out that you're father died over six years ago. Apparently, the letter had never been delivered, or so they say...

name: Immortal Legacy: The Jade Cipher
description: Delve deep into the origins of a sinister Chinese legend, and unearth the secrets of an island’s forgotten past in this pulse-pounding adventure.

name: E.B.
description: E.B. is a simple and easy strategy tower defense game where players can match their own skills and trick to defeat enemy tanks.

name: Timeless Paradox VR
description: Our champion failed in her mission two years ago. Everything about this battle remains mysterious. Now you have the chance to go back. Will you change the history? Will you defy this fate with her?​ Your hearty VR journey Starts here!

name: MyBot
description: Help Mybot find his home through a 3d maze of traps. Beware of shuttering glass, sliding ice, blocking walls and reset traps. Challenge yourself or your friend in multi-player. Have hours of fun and never run out of game-play as you create your own levels. Make your game the cool place to go.

name: One True Cuddle
description: A top-down platformer where you play as a rabbit that's kidnapped, to avoid all obstacles and find your way back to your owner. But... *something else is happening*

name: Terminal squad: Swarmites
description: Terminal squad: swarmites is a game with indirect control where you must erect a chain of buildings, which generate resources for construction or the combat units for destruction of an enemy.

name: Anime Studio Tycoon
description: In Anime Studio Tycoon you replay the history of the anime industry. Witness rise of Otaku culture to end cell shading. Start your own company, your decisions will make or break your studio. Create bestselling anime and ascend to greatness in the anime industry.

name: Pentasma
description: Pentasma is a side-scrolling arcade shooter inspired by Williams Electronics' 1981 classic 'Defender'. Protect The terraforming Humanoids from the deadly Aliens and raid the Alien planets to keep the galaxy peaceful!

name: Classic Card Game Spades
description: Take the least number of tricks and have a blast. Build your card counting skills and trick-taking tactics. From start to finish, you will adore this card game in spades.

name: Encore Classic Puzzle & Board Games
description: It's Game Time! Throw the dice, shuffle the cards and put your strategy to the test with latest version of Encore Classic Puzzle & Board Games. This classic game collection features all time classic games including: Chess, Backgammon, Dominoes, Kakuro Crosswords, Mahjongg, and much more!

name: Some Some Convenience Store
description: A game about starting a relationship while working part-time at a convenience store

name: Darkevo
description: Darkevo is game about exploration, combat, and management. Explore an open world finding new monsters to fight, aliens to befriend, and areas to conquer all on a new planet.

name: Fishy2
description: 150 levels total! through 10 worlds start from beginner levels, advance levels or expert levels.

name: Player's Eleven
description: You're the manager and it's your team. Play Player's Eleven now! Run the club of your choice or work your way up from the bottom to the top. Extensive editing options available.

name: Slimey
description: A multiplayer game where you play as Slimey.

name: Zombase
description: Survive through progressively harder waves and build defences to protect your respawn orb! Post Apocalyptic Zombie Survival Builder. Build defenses! Blast zombies! Have fun! Perfect for any gamer! As always, HAVE FUN!

name: Lone Land
description: Don't be afraid of heights to find the way out. Lone Land it's about reflection, calm, and relaxation.

name: QUICAL
description: It is a casual and easy to play Battle Royale FPS game.Battle Royale mode is single player only - no need to worry about inconveniencing your teammates or being verbally abused on voice chat!Enjoy small scale Battle Royale with up-to 8 players!

name: Hentai Pansuto
description: Enjoy the beauty girls picture and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Hentai Sakyubus
description: Enjoy the beauty girls picture and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: 匿名信：隐匿者 / Anonymous Letter ：Prowler
description: Anonymous letter puzzle series 2，A novel form of puzzle solving combined with interesting gameplay，It has beautiful pictures and rich plots.Players need to explore puzzles step by step through rigorous scrutiny and logical ability，Puzzle solving enthusiasts are advised to have an in-depth experience！

name: Human Delusion
description: A transformation from being restrained inside the human experience to being free and present. Human Delusion is an exploration of one’s emotions, consciousness, mind and their perception of reality. Are you ready to choose true Freedom?

name: Military Base War
description: Top Down Shooter, Face a group of enemies where each type has its own behavior, trying to either destroy you or the blue cube that you have to protect. Eliminate all enemies in the stage, then move to the next stage

name: Vikings Wars
description: Lead your army into battle, fight for your lands, you will win!

name: Hell's Pharma
description: Welcome Intern, to Hell's Pharma! A lot of sick demons are coming here to get cured. Read their prescription and make sure you gave them the right mixture of potion! Don't do illegal stuff and keep doing your job! Good luck!

name: Color ball
description: You need to find the assimilated ball, choose him and let him assimilate. In a limited number of steps, see how many levels you can stick to. When the ball is selected, you need to find the adjacent one in the big ball below Color and click to make the surrounding balls assimilate with him.

name: Coloring Game 2
description: Coloring Game 2 is a sequel of the existing color-by-number game which so many users have liked. The sequel features new options and images.

name: Boiling Steel: Preface
description: They promised a good job and a bright future. But advertising posters always lie. Instead of a quiet life - war. Instead of a body, a steel shell. Instead of weapons - tools. Thousands of light years from home. You are alone. Nowhere to run. Good luck my friend...

name: Asterook
description: You crash-landed on a giant asteroid, broke both your legs, but thankfully always have a trusty grappling hook, and a laser cannon with you. The asteroid you landed on, however, is not a safe place. Danger is just around the corner and the entire comet seems to be about to collapse.

name: My Diggy Dog 2
description: Diggy Dog 2 is a game about a brave archaeologist dog named Marty, who helps his elderly master find his wife and solve the mysteries of the universe.

name: Sweet Holiday Jigsaws: Halloween Night
description: Bright and cozy fully customizable Halloween Jigsaws

name: Shieldwall
description: Shieldwall is a funny third-person tactical battle simulator with strategy elements. It allows you to feel like a squad leader right on the battlefield.

name: Vampire vs Devil
description: Use corpses of your enemies as weapons. Run through 666 levels to hell.

name: Time Hacker
description: Time Hacker is an addictive VR game where your creative ability is what gets you through the levels. Your only weapon is the power to stop time. That means, like Marvel’s Quicksilver, you can enjoy playing with the scene while your enemies are effectively frozen.

name: DarkLight
description: Darklight is a small secret room escape decryption game You need to play the role of an unknown woman who discovers the crimes of a mysterious organization in the dark basement

name: Get the Banana
description: Play as a trapped monkey who must solve puzzles to reach food. Learn the rules behind the puzzles as well as the motivations behind the experiments. Get the Banana is inspired by classic Sokoban puzzle games.

name: Knock Harder
description: The only way to wake up is to die. The player must decide for himself whether he is inside a dream or is in reality.

name: William's Love Prelude
description: William, a boy living in the woods village of "Woodbell", fell in love with his childhood friend Emilia. He dares to convey love, but she likes a strong man! William decides to get stronger to turn her around ...

name: Clicker Age
description: Clicker Age - A classic clicker with a beautiful visual style and a variety of monsters. The player buys various improvements to facilitate the game process and further advance on endless game worlds.

name: World War 2 Zombie Attack VR Coronavirus Simulator
description: Immerse yourself in the terrible atmosphere of World War II, playing in the VR WW II Zombie Attack driving shooter. Enter the role of a brave fighter pilot, whose plane was shot down by the enemy during an air battle. Rescuing your life, at the last moment you manage to eject from a flaming plane.

name: Haustoria
description: A cosmic entity reveals itself to a young boy in an unforgiving picture-book world.

name: The Spirits of Kelley Family
description: What the hell has happened to the Kelley family?? The Spirits of Kelley Family is an amazing hand-drawn point&click adventure game!

name: Hero's Journey
description: A platformer designed by an enthusiastic programmer, featuring an equally un-enthusiastic main character

name: Casina: The Forgotten Comedy
description: Written by the Roman comedian Plautus in 184 BC, Casina was considered one of the most famous and funny comedies in Ancient History. "Casina: the Forgotten Comedy" is a modern adaptation of this ancient work of literature, brought to you as a fully voiced and animated Visual Novel.

name: Just Arms
description: After a terrible fall you wake up confused and without legs. All hope is not lost though, for there is a tale of a witch with the power regrow limbs. Punch yourself to the top, find the witch and get your legs back!

name: Naked Story (Sports Festival Ver)
description: This is a game arranged from [NakedStory] based on [CutePuzzle].This is a sexy puzzle game with easy rules.

name: Banana for Scale
description: A Virtual Reality game where you measure things with bananas.

name: Model Railway Easily
description: Model railway builder with true 3D graphics. Place all the highly detailed objects on different landscapes and create exciting model railway layouts! Start your trains and enjoy this fully functional model railway simulator!

name: The Walking Evil
description: The Walking Evil takes you to the great classic of the survival horror of the 90s, where you guide the main character with a fixed system of cameras, which enhances the feeling of being in a real horror movie.

name: The mysterious Case of Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
description: After a respected member of Parliament is found murdered, it’s up to you in this suspenseful Hidden Object game to search for the killer, the notorious Mr. Hyde!

name: Ramiwo
description: The trippy and wondrous exploration-walking simulator. Arty, surreal, different. Grant your brain some sweetmeat.

name: Forever Ago
description: Following a tragic stroke of fate, Alfred embarks on a journey north in search of redemption. In this single-player road trip adventure, you'll travel to beautiful places, capture memories with your camera, meet interesting people, and even make some new friends.

name: Getaway Mayhem
description: Survive the fast, chaotic roads of Getaway Mayhem together!

name: P-BOT
description: P-BOT, the skill-based sci-fi platformer. Take control of the many robots inhabiting this futuristic city, and survive as long as you can.

name: Raven Quest
description: Raven Quest is a little adventure on an island where everyone is transforming into crows by a terrible curse. Get lost in this land of strange ruins and creatures to find the solution of all this mess.

name: The Final Stand: Breakout
description: The Final Stand:Breakout is a wave based survival game. Call of Duty: Zombies fans have stated "The Final Stand:Breakout feels like a spiritual successor to the Cod Zombies gamemode."

name: RhythmDanceVR
description: RhythmDanceVR is a rhythm game where you have to try to hit as many beat fields as possible. Filled with a large selection of songs, it turns your surroundings into a dance club.

name: Wildfire Swap
description: Swap tiles, fight fires! Consider your moves carefully: fire spreads fast, and an out-of-control fire is unstoppable.

name: Last Week
description: The inhabitants of a small portside town begin to fear the worst when they hear the news. This is the last week before the end of the world. With the limited time you have left you must decide which of the town's folk to try and help.

name: 坦率的小红帽和爱说谎的狼
description: 温馨而有趣的短篇剧情游戏，讲述了可爱小红帽与笨笨狼少年的森林冒险故事，总计4种结局，不含黑暗成分哦（笑）

name: Dawnthorn
description: Dawnthorn is a topdown, pixel-art ARPG with a character and experience firmly rooted in the 8bit era. It features action-adventure style gameplay. Players will experience hectic, item-driven real-time combat, puzzle solving, and Metroidvania-style progression across a sprawling, dungeon-filled world!

name: The Beasts Of 9500
description: Come to the world of beasts 95 million years ago, you can experience prey, grow, die, and survive as best you can.As you grow, you will hone your speed, stamina, and aggression to become the king of the century.

name: Shining Song Starnova: Idol Empire
description: The girls of Starnova are back in a new business simulation game! It's up to you the producer to build your office, re-hire the girls and get the money flowing to put on the greatest live concert ever. Do you have the management skills to once again accomplish everyone's dreams?

name: Efflorescence of Lust
description: Efflorescence of Lust is a combination of puzzle and clicker games. It helps enhance your agility and reaction capability. It can also help you get a relief from anxiety by playing it.

name: Down the Rabbit Hole
description: Down the Rabbit Hole is a VR adventure set in Wonderland prior to Alice's arrival. You will guide a girl who is looking for her lost pet by solving puzzles, uncovering secrets and making choices about the story along the way.

name: Mask of Mists
description: Mask of Mists is an action-adventure game in a first-person view in which you are immersed in exploring the world full of magic and dangers!

name: DragonScales 3: Eternal Prophecy of Darkness
description: A slaughtered caravan of mages. Cultists of an arcane and evil prophecy. Form color combinations of DragonScales through 150 tile-matching levels! Throw down the cult of the Eternal Prophecy of Darkness!

name: Piczle Cross Adventure
description: Piczle Cross Adventure takes the classic nonogram logic-puzzle and turns it into something never before experienced in the genre: a story-driven, RPG-style 2D graphical adventure! Follow our heroes Score-chan, Gig and professor Matrix as they tackle their most daunting challenge yet.

name: Danko and the mystery of the jungle
description: "Danko and the mystery of the jungle" - the action takes place in abandoned catacombs, where once an alien civilization mined crystals. Using antigravity, a magnet and other devices, Danko will find all the treasures and save his friends.

name: AudioWizards
description: AudioWizards is an accessible audio game full of arcade action and charm! Embark on an audiotistic journey to defend the world of Sondveiw. Master the sounds and defeat elementally imbued monsters together with your mentor Saundaman.

name: Economica
description: Overproduction Crisis Simulator

name: Animal Revolt Battle Simulator
description: The ultimate physics-based, sandbox battle simulator where you can create funny battles between all sorts of ragdoll creatures! You can also make your own monsters with the unit creator or even join the battles yourself in the first-person mode!

name: Radio Commander VR
description: Radio Commander now in VR! Be there, right next to the battlefield, in a commander’s tent in the middle of a Vietnamese jungle. Step into the shoes of an experienced leader and lead your soldiers to victory… or at least give them a chance to survive the Vietnam hell.

name: Sproots
description: Sproots is a colony management survival game where you control a group of 'sproots' - small pikmin-like creatures - that are in constant need of food and water. They can explore different biomes, pick up objects and study them, learn skills, craft structures and items and teach each other about their findings.

name: Make Me LAG
description: Make Me LAG is the first game that features a revolutionary new control scheme: your character actions are determined by the game frame count! Use external softwares and other tricks to lower the FPS count and control your character to defeat evil monsters and save the world!

name: Cattle Admission Challenge
description: The year is 2087, the Technotron rules the world. All biological creatures have been exiled to the wasteland. In a remote section of the Grasslandia border Sentry 49-42 must protect the zone from bovine scourge! The sacred grass must be protected. All moo cows must be exterminated.

name: Aldred Knight
description: Aldred Knight is a 2D action adventure game. In it you will meet Aldrid, the most powerful swordsman of the divine flame. With him you will pass through innumerable obstacles and war bosses to rid the kingdom of a great evil force.

name: Data Dream
description: In this 3D platformer, a bio-digital landscape filled with walking, talking computer components finds itself in a state of peril following a malicious invasion. An unlikely hero must brave this surreal world in order to rectify and restore the jeopardized system.

name: Realistic Tower Destruction
description: Game allows you to build many kinds of towers from a variety of bricks and experience their dynamic destruction physics in a sandbox environment.

name: News Agency Simulator
description: Manage a news agency and present the news. View the sociological consequences of your actions. Buy sensational news from special sources. Observe the political trend of your channel. When doing all this, be sure to check the channel rating and budget.

name: The Legend of Eldridge Scrolls: Woop
description: Welcome to my first-person-shooter adventure game. Use your wit and shrewdness to solve puzzles and collect items. Time travel to the past, shoot arrows; to the present, collect keys; to the future, solve mysteries.

name: Snaliens
description: A group of Snaliens just collapsed on an unexplored planet and now they need your help! Help them to reunite and escape by solving intricate puzzles.

name: My Funeral Home
description: Start your own funeral home business and whether it is the right fit for you. Build your hearse, transfer the remains, prepare bodies for burial, and make a decent income. With all the work, there’s little room for downtime. Death knows how to keep you busy.

name: Slaughter 3: The Rebels
description: Slaughter 3 is the third-person shooter with lots of guns, fun and a nit of dark humor. The single player campaign offers a threadbare story, taking the player character Russell through a bunch of levels and missions. Break through the enemies, destroying everything that moves!

name: Brain vs Zombies
description: Brain vs Zombies is a puzzle VR shooter that challenges you to kill each level’s zombies on a limited number of bullets. Enjoy figuring out the increasingly complex mechanisms for triggering zombie death in a world of realistic physics.

name: The Line
description: Winner of the 2020 Primetime Emmy® Award for Outstanding Innovation in Interactive and Best VR Experience at 76th Venice Film Festival. “The Line” is a 15-20 minute interactive story about love and routine. Narrated by Rodrigo Santoro, “The Line” is great for first-time VR users.

name: New Planets
description: Save your teacher, who was teleported to another world, by an unknown creature, on that journey based on a new solar system!

name: STRAYLIGHT
description: Fly, swing and soar through a beautiful and deadly universe in a new kind of VR platforming experience. Using the Fling Engine - a propulsion mechanic designed for totally comfortable movement in VR - you will soar too high, fly too fast, and die way too much. Can you master the STRAYLIGHT?

name: Free Agency
description: Free Agency is the life simulation where the agents gradually become self-aware and try to find meaning in their lives. Meanwhile, you have to keep them too busy to think about it.

name: Memeow & Comodore: Reloaded
description: Memeow & Commodore: Reloaded is a fascinating adventure where your pets are the heroes.Travel around the globe, even through space to discover a mysterious menace coming from another world... or dimension? To save Kim and all the Earth.

name: A.V.I
description: Explore the halls of a decrepit mansion and discover it's horrifying secrets from the lens of a missing man's smartphone, revealing his fate and the fate of the family that populated this ominous manor.

name: My Friend is a Raven
description: You return to your old apartment one last time, in search of a sickened raven. You must speak to him, and discover the cause behind the calamity that has spread across the world.

name: DeeperRed2028-WeAreEscape-
description: 二〇二六年，东京湾超大地震，弓形列岛开始了缓慢的沉没。 身患绝症的少女·樱叶栞，反而在灾难中看到了新生的希望。 二〇二八年的某一天，日本沉没一周年。网文写手·柳生和泉（本名：刘虹桥），在自家大院撞上了某一难民。于此同时，姓名奇特的麻将少女·吕南雀十三幺，从遥远的南方乘硬座前来投奔柳生。

name: A Percent of a Pirate
description: A captivating pirate adventure to learn math while having fun. Available in some schools, this game will teach you different ways to manipulate percentages and ratios.

name: Zooma VR
description: Zooma is a virtual adventure in which you will have to be smart, demonstrate your ability for rapid decision-making, and exhibit significant accuracy and coordination skills. Check out what happens if you mix shooting, puzzles, and classic match-three in virtual reality.

name: Tank Ball
description: This is a game full of procedural generate! Infinite random mazes, each level is different and more difficult than the previous level, The complexity of the maze will become more and more. Enhance your ability by defeat enemies to overcome the increasingly difficult random challenges!

name: Hentai Breaker
description: Break all the blocks to save the girls!

name: GraFi Lunar
description: GraFi Lunar - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, dragons and changing gravity.

name: Pro Gymnast
description: THE 100% physics-based athlete simulator.

name: Coin Commander
description: The enemy is invading and resources are limited. They look to you, their newly elected war commander, to use your limited funds to pay for mercenaries to protect against the oncoming hordes of enemies. You will be outnumbered, but with better tactics, you will prevail.

name: SUPER CIRCUIT BREAKERS
description: Back with new weapons, new enemies, and with more circuits to break than ever! Destroy millions of robots in this free-to-play shooter with up to 6 players.

name: DriftOn
description: DriftOn is an infinite racing game in the surreal fracturing world.

name: The Puzzle Box Society
description: Welcome to The Puzzle Box Society. Break in, bypass their security systems, find the secret areas, steal the valuables, and get out.

name: Bandapes
description: Bandapes is a rhythmic battle game. You command a squad of apes that listen to rhythmic patterns you can play with drums. Battle against the squads of other players and rise in the rankings!

name: The Hour of the Rat
description: The Hour of the Rat is a platformer about an assassination attempt on an emperor. Use limited resources to succeed within a limited time.

name: That Lava Escape Game
description: 'That Lava Escape Game' is a local multiplayer 2D platformer focused on escaping rooms filling with lava! Rooms full of traps and other challenges will try to stop you and friends from escaping with the time you have!

name: Rainy Night
description: Rainy night is a Survival Horror game with resource management, sparse ammo and puzzle solving.

name: Block Assembly Simulator
description: You can assembly blocks in this game. Create your own things with it!

name: 轻梦谭 - 瓮之篇 -
description: 铸灵剑酬天地兮，入式神见幻梦 跨越了千年的宿命，迎来终结之刻

name: Frequency Shift
description: Drive the world and make it dance as you piece together the geometric puzzles and build musical tracks that are intertwined.

name: Shine's Adventures 4 (Nightmare)
description: Shine came to Nightmare Space and Shine wanted to explore these unknown spaces to search for demons. There are Shine props in these spaces, and Shine will become powerful. This is a survival game. The game is between Roguelike and arpg, with moderate difficulty.

name: SCIENCE SHOW VR : THE ABYSS
description: A five-sense, deep-sea scientific exploration VR content that travels through the five oceans in search of marine topography and secrets of reproduction.

name: TRIOS - lofi beats / numbers to chill to
description: TRIOS is a relaxing, minimalist maths puzzle game. Take your time, chill out with some numbers. Deceptively simple, surprisingly challenging.

name: Frog X Log
description: One Frog, 3 Colours, and a variety of Annoying Multicoloured Fly's invading your beloved marsh. Its time to take action. Use your super-tongue to catch the right coloured Fly corresponding to your constantly changing tongue colour, but be warned... if you swat the wrong coloured fly, its an instant game over! Hop to it!

name: World Seed
description: A simple game with big ambitions. Fight creatures, explore the world and progress your character in this ever changing world.

name: SKYE
description: SKYE is a relaxing explorative game where you venture into a world inspired by the Western Isles. Fly around the captivating islands, help the locals with their troubles, and set the fastest time in races while absorbing everything around you through the painterly environment.

name: Zombie Mutant DNA
description: Zombie Mutant DNA is a retro style top-down shooter. Focused on action-packed zombie shooting fun. Travel through a post-apocalyptic world infested with mutated monsters. Acquire new weapons, fight epic boss battles, and discover hidden secrets.

name: FEB - Brazilian Elite Force
description: After an alien arives in Brazil, the brazilian army created the FEB - Brazilian Elite Force, a high tech agency with only the best of the bests. Choose one of three agents: Samanta, Zolrys and Silva, and save Brazil from an alien invasion in this 2D platform/shooter game.

name: Into The Valley
description: A single player third person detective adventure RPG set in ancient Egypt. While the game is primarily a quest game in which you have to follow clues to find your daughter who has been kidnapped by slave traders, it does contain elements of combat and exploration.

name: Solitaire Forever II
description: 3D solitaire includes Klondike, Eight Off, Miss Milligan, Simple Simon, Eliminator, and more

name: Finding the Soul Orb
description: Finding the Soul Orb is a medieval fantasy game. In it, you use your crossbow both as a weapon against werewolves as well as a tool to solve puzzles.

name: Spirit of the North
description: Spirit of the North is a single-player 3rd-person adventure game inspired by the breathtaking and mysterious landscapes of Iceland. Play as an ordinary red fox whose story becomes entwined with the guardian of the Northern Lights, a female spirit fox.

name: Fight Crab
description: Welcome to Fight Crab.A new 3D action game where you take control of a crab, and fight off other giant enemy crabs.Physics allows for crabs to move powerfully and quickly in this hardcore battle arena.Freely control your pincers to use weapons and develop your own crab fighting style.

name: Path of Zen
description: Path of Zen, a game that will help you let go of your worries about the past or the future and bring you back to where you are supposed to be, here and now.

name: Basic Warfare
description: Basic Warfare is a combination of RTS and Action genres featuring realtime multiplayer action combat and strategic economic simulation.

name: Strings
description: Experience fast-paced VR combat without sacrificing comfort. Battle enemies using unique items scattered throughout each level. Move quickly by throwing teleport orbs. Store items in your inventory and equip them instantly. Confront fearsome bosses with challenging fight mechanics.

name: HyperBlade
description: HyperBlade is a tactical sword fighting game inspired by titles such as Jedi Knight, Blade Symphony, and Super Smash Brothers. Combining physically-based tracers with mechanics found in traditional fighting games such as grapples, and combos HB aims for a unique blend of arcade and competitive

name: Cut Smash Wrap
description: Destroy blocks using the combinations of the famous Rock, Paper, Scissors game! Smash scissors blocks using rock blocks, cut paper with scissor and wrap the rocks! Match 3 or 5 blocks to multiply your score!

name: Kill The Santa
description: Have you ever received unwanted Christmas gift ?You will have perfect occasion to take revenge on drunk Santa's clones ! Grab your weapon, choose the most perfect spot and shoot them as many as you can !

name: Frostford
description: Defeat monsters and grab the control in Frostford!

name: Minotaur vs Theseus
description: Online asymmetrical gameplay. As the minotaur you will stalk your prey with your animal instincts in the comfort of your labyrinth. As a hero you will evade the minotaur through stealth and heroic abilities while solving puzzles to harness the secrets of the labyrinth against your foe.

name: Cranky Cannon
description: A quirky challenging puzzle game! How many levels can you master?

name: CZAR: Decision
description: CZAR: Decision is an Adventure and JRPG with classic side-view battle system. Play as Sagara, the mysterious man who was involved in Miasma Incident five years ago, seeking the truth about it.

name: Mr. Fast
description: Mr. Fast is a top-down shooting game with a bullet time twist! Enemy's time moves more slowly than yours. You're fast enough and you can kill others with one shot.

name: Starship Inspector
description: Starship Inspector is a Space Roguelike in which every choice you make matters. Save a galaxy or rescue your crew member? Serve an evil empire or help an ancient tribe? You'll constantly have to make hard decisions and deal with consequences.

name: VR Fantasy Island
description: This is an early stage for the game VR Fantasy Island. We are trying out a concept to see if people would be interested in playing a game like this in VR.

name: Texas Holdem Poker: Solo King
description: SoloKing Poker - AI coaching and training poker software. Poker training complex tools: Poker Hand Evaluator, Showdown Calculator, Table Simulation, Equity Evaluator,Draw Evaluator, EV Evaluator, Advisor Coach. The Strongest Poker AI Opponents. No-Limit ring games, MTTs, heads-up tournaments.

name: Deity Driving
description: An adventure car game. A pleasure trip. A dubious method to get rid of superfluous braincells. Deity Driving!

name: Smerch Battle Arena
description: Clash in furious combat in the yellow circle of the arena! Here, everyone will face bloody battles in PvP game modes and co-op to the last survivor. Fight for the leading positions and get valuable prizes for victory. Conquer glory in the arena as a Gladiator ..

name: Devil's Kiss
description: Find out how it all started in this enticing Visual Novel prequel for "Lair of the Clockwork God". Join heroes Dan and Ben as they navigate a rough first school day stuffed with flirting, demons, a vast conspiracy and all manner of compromising personal information.

name: Cave Quest
description: Play a thrilling Match3 game! Match gems of the same kind to destroy them and to get bonuses and power-ups.

name: Peppered
description: Face off in a series of snowball fights! Wreck the entire neighborhood.

name: パトルの軍事博物館３ 超絶無敵究極兵器
description: 所持金すら分からない……！？ 驚異のパンジャンドラム操業RPG！

name: Flirt Balls
description: Flirt Ball

name: RUN HARE RUN
description: Being a rabbit is not an easy task, especially if thou are an endangered species listed in the red book.

name: Deadly Runner
description: Help the Girl to overcome her fears and get out of the world of nightmares. Jump over obstacles, spikes, traps and beware of monsters!

name: Doler
description: Doler is a game about being a mouse in a giant spooky maze filled with treasure and scary spiders where you search for a big stash of food. The maze resets everyday and is the same for all players. You can communicate with other players by leaving messages in your droppings! Can you find the goal?

name: Ayahuasca
description: In the jungle at night, a journey awaits for you... are you ready to embrace the experience? Ayahuasca, the vine of the soul, and how to find your inner space.

name: Knight Dice
description: Knight Dice is a turn-based dice game, upgrade and reroll your dice to defeat the dangerous enemies on your adventure.

name: COCKHEAD: BIG KAHUNA BAR
description: Our days, godforsaken place, somewhere on the Mexican border. The sheriff, who had packed his belongings in a cardboard box a long time ago, was going to vacate the office and take a long-awaited rest, while this case was supposed to be the final, unremarkable chord of his career.

name: In Her Eyes
description: A maiden(Meme) from another world is trying to summon you to help her prevent an assassination that is going to happen in 30 days. Your choice will not only affect your card deck and your battle style, but also affect the personality of the girl, which may lead to different ending.

name: Ink.
description: Ink. is a semi-procedural/random RPG action shooter. You'll play in a blank book, trying to write your story as a small ink creature but with great powers. Start your adventure, fight bosses, find items and discover new incredible synergies and combos.

name: Pioneerz
description: Pioneerz make you a pioneer in a fantasy world, it's a sandbox RPG focus on town protection. Help your town, improve your ability, expand your kingdom! The road is harsh to make a peaceful empire!

name: O.M.S
description: O.M.S is a casual story-driven 2D Sci-Fi Platformer where you control L10 as his world is threatened by SIMPHONY the very AI that powers his planet. L10 will be avoiding dangerous obstacles and enemies as he hopes to repair SIMPHONY and save his world.

name: This Is Not The End
description: Be a slime monster and go on a journey to become a king, god, demon, pie and more!

name: Hero Mini Maker
description: Build fantasy miniatures using over 800 stylized parts. Export them as STL files for 3D printing, or use one of our online 3D printing partners to bring your creations to life.

name: Command & Conquer™ Remastered Collection
description: Command & Conquer and Red Alert are both remastered in 4K by the former Westwood Studios team members. Includes all 3 expansions, rebuilt multiplayer, a modernized UI, Map Editor, bonus footage gallery, and over 7 hours of remastered music.

name: Wagrrr
description: Give your viewers more FUN and INTERACTIVITY with your broadcasts! Let your viewers respond live on-screen to your gameplay, send text and questions, and make FUN wagers on your Battle Royale Games! ADD AN EXTRA LAYER OF FUN TO YOUR BROADCASTS!

name: Awaking GODSOUL
description: "GODSOUL" is a light cyberpunk + mythical beast girl card battle + character development RPG game. The "rebel" girls who resonate with your soul and possess the power of "God Soul" can travel through the different space of the soul.

name: My servant and the stranger Astensia
description: (Changing dungeons, turn-system rogue-like RPG) The sex scenes are mainly cuckold scenes. Two girls you are intimate with (old playmate, fiancee) are violated by another hand, and finally their bodies and minds are both destroyed.

name: Beglov Style
description: KB was just a dangerous prisoner, but then something went wrong....The protagonist fights for survival in a post-apocalyptic world

name: Gaia's Decision
description: Dr. Gaia believes that planets are living beings with the natural system within them. From his point of view, the people who kill nature are the cancer cells of this planet. The world needs treatment.

name: The Blueness of a Wound
description: Experience a dark fairy tale set in the Blue Mountains of Australia. Lana is a young woman who is haunted by the loss of her sister and must venture deep into the primordial valleys of the mountains to seek the truth.

name: EVECTOR, Acid Thirst
description: EVECTOR is a fast-paced arcade FPS shooter with run-and-shoot action, intense battles with short respawn times, and checkpoint based progress (no more save/load cheating). If you're looking for a classic FPS game experience, then try this one!

name: Joan of Arc：The Beginning
description: Psychedelic dreams, burning Magic gates, petrified boy, floating castles… The Player will act as Joan of Arc explore the world with the simple screen click to analyse the information, and solve the mystery behind the truth. The process is also the process of Joan’s self-growth.

name: Budo War Girl: maid of desire
description: you will get 500 diamonds to start the shop.Maids of different styles are taught by the store manager.Each maid has her own props and interactive dubbing for more than 10 seconds;

name: Pretty Neko
description: Relax class puzzle game to keep you in a good mood

name: A Lanterns Glow
description: ALG is a challenging top-down survival RPG. Explore an expansive, randomly generated world shrouded in darkness. Gather resources, craft items, construct buildings, fight strange creatures, and study magic and science to survive and solve the many mysteries of the forest.

name: CONSTRUCT
description: "CONSTRUCT" is a game where two constructors battle it out for the title, "Best Builder". In this game you place blocks in order to gain high ground against your opponent. Play with many Power-Ups as well as 4 MODES!

name: Divine Legacy
description: Divine Legacy is a dark story/character-driven action RPG with hints of humor, friendship, and bonds. Fight your way through hordes of demons, and move one step closer towards the truth!

name: トトのおもちゃばこ
description: さあ、おもちゃの世界を冒険しよう！！ このゲームは、仕掛けがいっぱいの子ども部屋を冒険して、様々なキャラクターとわちゃわちゃしながらゴールを目指すアクションアドベンチャーゲームです。

name: CHAMELEON
description: Psychedelic Art Puzzle. In this world, you can expand your territory by changing the color to match the around colors, like a Chameleon. Simple play, variety of rules and attractive characters.You should be addicted by Chameleon.

name: Undead zombies
description: This is a third person action game，The player is surrounded by zombies，Players are free to explore the surrounding area or enter the building to see what's going on，Players must maintain health, avoid zombie attacks or kill zombies.

name: Cyborg Earthworm
description: Make a Snake AI using simple visual commands. Develop a strategy, let the computer do the hard work, sit back and watch it play the game for you.

name: Ai no Uta
description: Eleanor, the daughter of Count Vale, learns the secrets of her birth on her 18th birthday. Eleanor was not a human being, but a princess of the “Spirit” who has now become a distant mother. The player becomes the main character and chooses his own destiny. Bring happiness to his beloved and many people.

name: Seek Girl Ⅳ
description: This is a fun casual decryption game that trains your observations. At the beginning of the game, the game will show a white shape, you need to find one or two items of the same shape as white to complete the task.

name: fishy
description: A game about a hungry fish 🐟 Eat to grow bigger, but watch out for fishes bigger than you! Grow big, strong and explore! Can you escape the pond?

name: Knockback: The Awakening
description: Fight against hordes of zombies in this physics-based co-op game loaded with humor, and loads of customizable weapons.

name: Diamond Mirage
description: Follow Ellyn, a young elf kidnapped from home to be trained as a slave. The nightmare begins. Can he escape the oppression or will he succumb to the world of pleasure?

name: Sokbots
description: Sokbots is an online multiplayer robot battle game

name: Ravesta Racing
description: ★★★ Ravesta Racing! Get behind the wheels and race against 2-9 other players in this multiplayer racing game, Race devious opponents through a comprehensive 'Online' mode. Also enjoy a multitude of Music Exclusive by Ravesta Records.

name: deer hunter II
description: An archaeological survival game. Survive the desert, craft items, find remains of other players, and face your final challenge . . .

name: Kony 2020
description: Joseph Kony is in deep peril! Will Jessica J. Kellen be able to save him and defeat an inter-dimensional demon that only she can defeat, or will she crumble under the weight of her newfound burden. What even IS Field Hockey? Find out in Kony 2020

name: Kubble Star
description: Destroy all the cubes! Use the laser to launch your cubes and match your colors by 3 or more, to remove all cubes from the level to move to the next level.

name: Reek
description: Let off some pressure! Fly propelled by your diarrhea jet through a bunch of levels full of traps, enemies and nasties. Prove your navigating skills, leave no corner unstained and never squeeze your cheeks.

name: Alien Frontline
description: This is a casual game, the player has five fighters to choose, Each fighter has exclusive perk, There are five fighters, Fire, Shield, Boom, Wingman, Bug. Unlocked by game currency.

name: Skin Stealers
description: Naughty skeletons want to steal your skin for unknown purposes, perhaps as a fashion accessory or at the nearest black market, so what do you do? Slap their hands away of course! Its time to save your own skin and perhaps your credibility amongst the fashion savvy undead.

name: Ven Adventure
description: Ven Adventure is a single-player 3D platform game. You happen to meet Ven on his unknown planet, invaded by Bruce Nelson, who wants to destroy the magical world.

name: INU
description: She run around the screen and disturb your work...

name: Boolean
description: Everything is either ON or OFF. Boolean is an open-ended problem solving game where you build circuits and send signals!

name: SpaceGeon
description: SpaceGeon is a 2D colourfull shooter-rogulike game that supports users' modifications. Fight your way from Space Dungeon and return home!

name: Heroines of Swords & Spells
description: An epic and funny jRPG adventure with intricately detailed world and story. Guide a party of wayward heroines through the perils of this fantasy world.

name: Lucid Aether
description: Lucid Aether is a new kind of bullet hell shoot 'em up game.

name: Forest Woodman
description: Immerse yourself in the everyday life of a simple forester in a large northern country.

name: Mineirinho Shooter DC
description: Miner is back and he called his very beautiful friend Lil' Pauline(Paulistinha) to enjoy a new adventures , they need to overcome the threat of space gluttons !!! Very cool and fun physical shooter style game, a unique game mechanic experience !!!

name: Caveman The Game
description: Even in Prehistoric times love existed. Play as the Caveman and help him rescue the love of his life who has been taken by a gang of rebel cavemen. Lead the Caveman through 20 levels of jumping over tarpits, climbing vines and fighting dinosaurs to free his love from the clutches of the rebel caveman gang!

name: Fourthy
description: You will have to think a lot to put everything in the right order.

name: Labirinto 3
description: Labirinto this is a simple game in which you need to get square to the other end of the maze.

name: Trantor: The Last Stormtrooper
description: Betrayed by his people, TRANTOR is abandoned alone on an Alien planet. His only chance of escape is to actvate the planet's main computer that lies within the terminal building. Armed only with a flame thrower, fight your way to freedom as TRANTOR...THE LAST STORMTROOPER.

name: UFO ESCAPE
description: Help Bob escape the aliens by finding the proper portals to make it back home in this game of chance and skills.

name: Ruin Hunters
description: Take command of your heroes in this turn-based tactical game. Wander into the deep of the dungeons, defeat enemies, gather treasures, while your party grows in power.

name: Infferno
description: Infferno is a post apocalyptic isometric top down shooter for 1-2 Coop Players Online or Local Offline

name: Last in Orbit
description: Last in Orbit is a Horror game with a focus on surviving a A.I. gone Crazy. Your the first to arrive on a new space station meant for human living but in the preparations ahead you found out that the A.I.

name: Bad Girl
description: Bad Girl - Hardcore platformer made in the old-school style where there is nothing superfluous

name: Live checkpoint
description: The game is a 2D platformer with a side view of the game. The main task of the game is to protect the checkpoint from bloodthirsty zombies and prevent them from breaking inside

name: Ghost on the Shore
description: An exploration game about emotional ties that transcend even death. Riley is faced with a headstrong ghost, urging her on an adventure across atmospheric shores, uncovering the island's tragic secret. Choices in dialogue shape the bond between the two, ultimately deciding Riley's fate.

name: Sheol
description: Play as Charon's servant and try purify to your own soul!

name: Food Girls - Bubbles' Drink Stand VR
description: "Mr. Consultant, I need your help! I need you here right now!” When opening a new branch, Bubbles got into trouble. Will you be able to help her through this? Come experience working as a busy part-timer in Bubbles’ Drink Stand VR!

name: Aurora: Weather Warfare
description: An adventure game set in the near future in a world of cataclysmic climate changes. As one of the few lucky survivals, you’re about to embark on a full of peril, pitfalls, and difficult choices journey to the epicenter of the weather disaster to solve the mystery.

name: Skopje
description: Explore a city thrust into disarray by an unknown event and survive the hordes of mutated abominations that lurk at every corner. You’ll have to fight through enemies & bosses, scavenge loot and survive the hostile city.

name: Void's Calling ep.1
description: "Void's Calling" - is a visual novel with RPG elements where every decision you make can drastically change the course of game's story.

name: ARIDA 2: Rise of the Brave
description: ARIDA 2: Rise of the Brave. The continuation of a survival and adventure story in the Brazilian backlands. Overcome a long travel on foot and discover the paths to the land where the dreams dwell.

name: Paws & Effect: My Dogs Are Human!
description: A quirky, comedic visual novel where dogs transform into people and nonsense ensues! Your choices will teach them about the human condition, but beware: They're not the only ones listening. Mysteries and irreverence await you in Paws & Effect: My Dogs Are Human!

name: Journey to New Atlantis
description: Journey to New Atlantis is a post-apocalyptic adventure game that follows Lana and her friend Marco in their quest to find water for Lana’s ill grandfather, in a world almost completely dried up. Lana’s grandfather tells them of an oasis city called New Atlantis, and the two children will need to brave sandstorms, roving bands of...

name: Orbit of Death
description: Orbit of Death is a dynamic multi-player action with realistic physics, where you pilot your space warcrafts.

name: The Note of Red Evil
description: 在有着“超能力”、“科技”与“魔法”的架空世界中，您将扮演“侦警”展开一系列充满幻想的宏大冒险。

name: NEOMORPH
description: This is a simple tower defend like game,click mouse left button to shoot enemies, make sure you don't get hurt. Defeat Neomorph, fight with ladies!

name: World of Voidia（虚亚世界）
description: World of voidia is a classic style RPG game. We try to create a quite different game and story, By making the game an openworld RPG game. Players will be able to decide everything with the story, the world and NPCs.

name: Math Path
description: A maze that can be passed with the help of math.

name: bobo robot
description: A wacky metroidvania. ⚡ Meet weird characters, unlock new abilities and complete a mysterious mission . . .

name: Tune the Tone
description: Tune the Tone is a rhythm game. Reach to light speed with your fingers at challenging levels. Show your skills and make everyone see your name on online leaderboard. Feel the bass and feel the great atmosphere. Master your beats.

name: The Jackbox Party Pack 7
description: Five new games: the hit threequel Quiplash 3, the collaborative chaos of The Devils and the Details, the fierce drawing game Champ’d Up, the speech game Talking Points and the guessing game Blather 'Round. Use phones or tablets as controllers and play with up to 8 players, and an audience of 10,000!

name: Dead Motherland: Zombie Co-op
description: A dark co-op top-down shooter in a post-soviet zombie apocalypse setting. You appear at a random location in the city. The goal is to get to the transport, and you will make the path yourself. In the day - look for resources and build fortifications. At night - destroy the dead and their bosses!

name: Cirno's Perfect Summer Vacation
description: When Cirno discovers a magical item in Gensokyo, her power grows as she freezes all the land! Not satisfied with just Gensokyo, she opens a portal to try and freeze New York in the summer! Join us for this free short visual novel Touhou adventure!

name: Once More
description: Write the ending you've always deserved in life

name: Mission:Amazing
description: Mission: Amazing Is A top Down Shooter Game.

name: Ephemera
description: Guide your character through it all, from their birth to their last breath. Make sure they remember you.

name: Universe Quiz
description: The quiz game about astronomy.

name: Petal Crash
description: Crash blocks together into huge chain reactions in this frantic arcade action puzzler! Pick your favorite character and experience their tale in the Story Mode, solve tricky brain teasers and make your own in Puzzle Mode, shoot for high scores in Solo Play, or go head to head in Versus Mode!

name: Catch Your Kitty
description: Catch kitties that are thrown down by birds.

name: Breaking the 4th wall
description: Breaking the 4th Wall is a point and click adventure game taking place inside a world of comics. Adrian, the main character, deals with daily life struggles and goes out on a journey for self-realization and breaking out of the confines of his world.

name: Legend of Streets
description: Show them who is the ruler of the streets by cleaning up gangs, pirates, mafia and cops and other enemies on the streets!

name: Trifox
description: Trifox is a colourful and cartoonish action-adventure featuring a phenomenal fox with a multitude of talents! Choose from a trio of classes – Warrior, Mage, Engineer – or mix-and-match abilities to create a tailor-made hero! Inspired by the golden age of 3D platformers.

name: Berserk Soccer
description: A soccer game with a brutal playing style.

name: 生物大冒险
description: 这是一款高中生物学科基础知识问答的冒险小游戏。

name: Art Heist
description: Get past the guards, get the prized artwork and get out! You have a silenced pistol for this mission, use it if needed...

name: Rocket Ghost Aidan
description: Ever want to experience a game that makes you want to play Rocket Ghost Aidan 2? Just play this! Its completely inferior to RGA 2.

name: Pipeline Of Emperor Yu
description: "Pipeline of Emperor Yu" is a puzzle game combining historical legends with classic water pipe gameplay! Facing all kinds of obstructions of the heavenly visions and unsuccessful grievances of three people, you need your wisdom to solve all these problems. Various elements such as sky mine, ground motion, fog, ice skating, etc.

name: Lithium City
description: Lithium City is a stylized isometric action game set in a neon-drenched world of electricity and violence.

name: lil' Sherman
description: lil' Sherman is a 3rd person action tower defense RPG that takes place in a stylized WW2/Alt-Universe.

name: XYLITH - Hostile Planet
description: In the vast subterranean world of Eldriss recently discovered monoliths are fueling more than just the humans fears. Sent by Nimbus you must investigate the mysterious Xylith and use any means necessary to quell an alien uprising.

name: ESCAPE ROOM VR
description: This game is a VR escape game. Solve the mysteries in each stage and uncover the hidden truth.

name: Daemonic Runner
description: Grab a rusty sword, gain some momentum, and send everyone flying in this aggressive joust. Sweep your foes away like a hurricane and cross bottomless chasms with giant leaps.

name: Silent World
description: A post nuclear apocalyptic world that has lost light. Survive by escaping from mutants that roam the city!

name: 封神纪传奇
description: 这个世界需要真正的大佬

name: Skull Rogue
description: Skull Rogue is an RPG in the classic rogue-like style. You have to pump your ordinary skeleton to an incredible level from scratch.

name: Lumin's Path
description: Lumin's Path is an atmospheric 3D platformer using light and darkness to impact the world in mysterious ways.

name: Battle Team
description: Fps game low-poly multiplayer

name: Flatspace
description: Flatspace is a top-down space trading game with the emphasis on freedom and exploration. You become captain of a spaceship in a living simulation of a distant galaxy. As a space pilot, you decide how to earn a living; command your crew, buy new and better ships and equipment, and explore.

name: RC Plane VR
description: RC Plane VR is a fully immersive RC flying VR experience with free flight and plenty of games and races.

name: labyrinth
description: A relaxing labyrinth game.

name: Super Kickers League
description: The best alternative to conventional football games is here!

name: Dusk Warlocks
description: Ever wished to fight using large scale spells? Dusk Warlocks is an online multiplayer spellcasting game in which up to 4 players compete in a tactical battle.

name: PARANOID
description: You are not safe anymore, the past is here.

name: Matrix Brain Twister
description: A brain twisting puzzle game, where you have to fill the whole matrix with the same color to solve the riddle. Only recommended for clever people and those who like to suffer from difficult riddles.

name: Carpet Bombing
description: Carpet Bombing is a retro-style, 2D aircraft arcade game. Fly a jet fighter and engage enemy at land, sea and air! Choose from different aircrafts - each with their own unique flying profile. Arm yourself to the teeth and get ready for some serious action!

name: Midnight Ride
description: Can you get her home unmolested?

name: Ageless
description: Ageless is a story driven puzzle platformer where you must alter the age of animals and plant life around you to progress. Play as Kiara, a young girl who braves through heartache and loss as she journeys across a mysterious world to discovers its secrets and herself.

name: Circle
description: This is the game that nurtures “Circle” and adventures in the "Outside" of the room.

name: Suits: Absolute Power
description: A business planet full of mystery, relics of power, dangerous jobs and terrifying monstrosities. Will your company defy the toxicity of this environment or will you find yourselves courting the power of corruption itself, in absolution.

name: Island Saver
description: A group of amazing islands need your help! Horrid plastic waste has washed up and you need to sort it out with your trusty Trash Blaster! But look out for the Litterbugs. They love mess and they’re out to muck things up.

name: Thunder Kid II: Null Mission
description: Thunder Kid, come in. The Robot Empire is back, and they're kidnapping all the humans! Run 'n' gun through colorful environments, dodge bullets, blast enemies, and face off with challenging bosses in this engaging, 3D action platformer. Do you have what it takes to save humanity?

name: Breakneck City
description: Old school 3D Beat-Em-Up Action! Use your wits, reflexes and environment to take on the ruthless gangs of Breakneck City!

name: War Trigger 3
description: Destroy, smash and blast your way to victory! Use advanced weapons and vehicles to dominate the battlefield.

name: Bingo VR
description: It is unheard of that a casual BINGO! game is a weapon of choice which drives aliens to their homeworld and defeats them forevermore. Yet, it is based on a true story.

name: The Adventures of Bluke Bifton
description: The Adventures of Bluke Bifton is a bizarre point-n-click adventure game set in a world of complete absurdity. Ally (or make enemies) with a cast of strange characters, and make choices that determine your fate.

name: YesterMorrow
description: YesterMorrow is a single-player time travelling 2D platformer, mixing action sequences with puzzle elements. Follow the engaging story of Yui, who travels back into the past to save her family and the remnants of a world now trapped in Never-ending Night.

name: Triuna
description: Set between two realities, Arthur must brace his everyday life in the modern world, whilst adoring more and more for his different life in the fantasy world of Triuna... and save it from a power hungry mortal.

name: The Island Story
description: The Island Story is leisure simulation game. Players can change the appearance of the island by placing different animals, plants and decorative items freely. Plants and animals also produce fruit and dust resources for further exploration and play.

name: Machina of the Planet Tree -Unity Unions-
description: From the developer of Machina of the Planet Tree -Planet Ruler-, comes the next installment in the series, Unity Unions! A young jewelmancer must stop the reawakening of a great evil and discover the truth behind her powers.

name: Coloniam
description: Colonize islands and grow your population. Manage trade routes and resources to meet the ever increasing needs of your colonist.

name: FlowState
description: This simulator is a true FPV Drone Racing simulator. The goal is to make it look and feel as similar to a standard racing drone as possible. As such, the goal is not to make the most HD/GoPro-esque visuals. Instead the focus is on simulating what pilots see through the goggles, static and all!

name: Aloe and Cal
description: Dive into the world of Aloe and Cal and experience a gently paced visual novel about the importance of food. With thousands of fun choices to make, over 100 CGs to look at, and 7 colorful characters to meet, you will undoubtedly walk away satisfied!

name: 子夜之章:历史的终局～MidNights of Desperado～
description: The protagonist of this lonely life is you. You leave your hometown and come to a strange world. The world is prosperous and cold, strange but real. You may like it or wish you could tear it to pieces. The good news is, you have the choice!

name: Cyndaria
