description: 3D RPG COOP ROGUELIKE Explore the mysterious Crypt of Cyndaria and unearth its secrets. A plethora of traps to avoid, puzzles to solve and devious creatures are waiting for you to step into this ever-changing dungeon, with lan and online support.

name: The Gladhollow Nasties
description: A beast stalks the forest by night. It will take cunning, stealth, and strategy to survive long enough to untangle a mystery through one wooded village and many despicable generations. Discover the stories of the sinful, pernicious, malicious morsels themselves: The Gladhollow Nasties.

name: Britannic
description: Welcome aboard the HMHS Britannic, the sister ship to the RMS Titanic. Experience first-hand how the biggest ship in the world met its demise in 1916 after striking a mine during World War 1.

name: POLITICAL KOMBAT
description: Classical fighting game featuring characters like Nikola Tesla, Putin, Trump, Hitler, Napoleon, Stalin, etc

name: Blind Descent
description: Blind Descent is a multiplayer open-world survival adventure game with up to 4 players set in the Martian underground.

name: CaveBugBoy
description: CaveBugBoy embarks on an epic adventure through dark and mysterious underground caves in search of a better life. The journey will encounter evil floating and screaming skulls, flying dead ants and flies, falling lava rocks, and collect bugs body parts.

name: sok-stories
description: A simple game making tool. Draw objects, drag them onto a canvas, and make rules to make a game! Easily upload your stories and share them anywhere, with anyone. What will you make?

name: 노베나 디아볼로스
description: Novena diabolos is an Ocult mystery adventure game. The main character, Park Joon-sung, has to find a single human woman who doesn't know who she is and get out of town safely.

name: Exit the Gungeon
description: Exit the Gungeon is a small, spin-off 'dungeon climber' immediately following the adventures of the misfit Gungeoneers.

name: Hand In Hand
description: An atmospheric platformer with co-op play in single-player mode. Immerse yourself in the ethnic world of two heroes, solve puzzles and overcome obstacles together, explore the fairy forest and other locations, help each other in battles against bosses.

name: Smart Moves
description: "Smart Moves" is a puzzle with a turn-based mechanics. . Different worlds with levels of increasing difficulty, sneaky monsters, unexpected obstacles and great treasures await you. Smart moves are the key to survival!

name: Cosmos - Escape From Freedom
description: Cosmos is a rogue-lite shoot-em-up bullet-hell, in which you pilot the last hope for humanity in a last-ditch attempt to save the world, pitching your upgradable craft against bosses in succession. Can you save planet earth, and put a stop to the Cosmic Dragon once and for all?

name: Virtually Real Life
description: "Reality. A term concocted by creatures to give worth to their version of reality...But what is reality if there are so many realities?" What happens if a being of a 2D world is dragged into the virtual world of a 3D realm?

name: Green: An Orc's Life
description: A life-simulation card-swiper. Grow an orc. Pilot it through a life of pillage, plunder and gluttony. Build up your horde, become filthy-rich with loot, even become a god!

name: Oil Wars
description: Strategy and simulation game where you will be faced to enemies for control of oil refinery and strategic resource locations.

name: FireTry
description: Firetry is a beautiful and fun game. There are more than 50 episodes in the game. You can design a section yourself or modify an existing section design. It also has a feature that makes this game different from other games. In this game you can manage the characters with your own code.

name: Kanojo x Switch
description: Switch around puzzle pieces to complete images.

name: The Blackbird of Amor
description: When there is an unsolved mystery, Stein can't let it go, he must pursue it till the end. In Amor there is a certain woman that interests him, she is rumored to have eternal youth. To solve the mystery of this woman he must tear heaven from earth. His journey will take him far beyond the world he has known.

name: FLAGFIGHTS
description: FLAGFIGHTS is an online action shooter in which you can choose where you want to fight and the side to play for. The goal of the game is to capture the flag as long as possible against the other team and at the same time shoot as many opponents as possible.

name: Civlands
description: Civlands combines elements from legendary RTS titles with epic turn-based strategy to provide a unique hybrid of tactical, real time strategy, with the grandeur, minutia, and depth of turn-based gameplay.

name: BomberX
description: Take control of atypical characters and blow up as many enemies as possible. Single player or multiplayer, fight for wealth and get equipment that shows your power!

name: Freight Simulator
description: Manage your transport company! Be a transportation entrepreneur, with control over everything in your business. Work, earn, invest and expand!

name: BlazeSky
description: BlazeSky is a space opera action RPG that tells the story of one person changing the fate of an entire galaxy. Explore stunning hand-crated star systems, fight against strange alien races, and negotiate with key allies in this fully voice acted epic adventure.

name: Cyber Hunter
description: Cyber Hunter is an open-world battle royale game featuring an unique combination of gaming elements, including survival, shooting and exploring. Any vertical surface in the Cyber Hunter world is climbable and players can glide down from high up.

name: Cowboy
description: This is a third person role-playing game，Players have swords, bows and arrows, and guns（You need to be on a horse to use it）,Players are free to explore the surrounding area,Players must maintain health，Players can kill nearby monsters or dodge attacks from monsters.

name: Defense and Revenge
description: Defense and Revenge is a turn-based strategy set in fantasy universe. You have to lead orcs tribe, provide defense and take revenge on enemies invading your land.

name: Peace Data
description: Peace Data — hard "Roguelike" game, in which you have to play for Bitard, saving Rusland from the tyranny of the authorities that destroyed the opposition and led the country to ruin, making slaves of citizens.

name: The Square Game
description: The Square Game is an insanely hard 2D action platformer with 24 short action packed levels.

name: 匿名信：失心者 / Stayer
description: Anonymous letter: the loss of heart is the beginning of the series of anonymous letter puzzle game, mainly tells about the intern detective man because of receiving an anonymous letter and broke the original quiet, when the letter instructions came to the abandoned 13 high school, found that everything has changed, is the trap?

name: Steamliner
description: Welcome aboard the Steamliner! As a carriage tester, you will experience anything from classic escape rooms to physics-defying surrealistic scenarios. Try to solve brain-melting puzzles inside a Victorian railway traveling through space!

name: Mompreneur: Pizza Cooking Life Sim
description: Live the life of a new mom in this story-driven cooking game.

name: DUMB Infernal
description: Enter the infernal hellscape as a lone warrior fending off an army of monsters in arcade style combat.

name: PhyxBox
description: PhyxBox is a physics based sandbox in VR, construct anything you can imagine!

name: Deserted
description: Deserted is a stylized 3D action adventure with light RPG and narrative elements. Inspired by the alien atmosphere of Out Of This World, Deserted combines narrative storytelling with survival and fast paced strategic combat to deliver a thrilling adventure.

name: Path
description: In the world of lightness and darkness, Let's make a Path by connect the dots.

name: Small War
description: You need to choose your camp and build the building! Build combat units through barracks and factories, and then manipulate combat units to destroy enemy bases!

name: The War Enders Evolution
description: The War Enders Evolution is an arcade style single-stage bullet hell game. Beat the game with the choice from three different fighters and two different styles.

name: Super Crystal Hunter
description: Enter this Arcade-RPG adventure incarnating the young thief Slade. Go through multiple places to loot in the Eastern Lands, visit special zones, face several bosses and discover various mini-games and additional extras.

name: Foxfall
description: Welcome to FoxFall! Super Satisfying Adventures waiting to you!

name: TAXIDERMY
description: An 80's VHS style first person horror experience, in this game you are locked in a house of a mad taxidermist and surviving is up to you!

name: Former Future
description: Former Future is a strategic top-down 2D shooter where you face an invading alien threat on the frontier world of Saturn and its neighboring moons.

name: Kingdom Warrior
description: 在一个王国里 你即将成为新国王， 但是你会遇到各种各样的困难。

name: The Alchemist's House
description: An invitation from a stranger... There's something evil in this house... Will you survive?

name: Royale Age: Battle of Kings
description: Auto Chess & Battle Royale combined into a charming game about Kings, Queens and Bishops!

name: DanielX.net Paint Composer
description: DanielX.net Paint Composer recaptures the magic from 30 years ago... create beautiful music simply and easily! Save your compositions and share them with friends and the world. The interesting characters are fun for both kids and adults.

name: Hiro's Escape
description: Help Hiro sneak past Yamana clan mercenaries during the Onin War of 1467 feudal Japan and reunite with his scattered family in this refugee tale.

name: Red Rush
description: Take care of restoring the economy and the status of a superpower of a once great country in one of the most difficult times for Russia.

name: SUPER 3-D CRUNK BROS.
description: SUPER 3-D CRUNK BROS. is an action-adventure platformer which tells the tale of a hash brown named Crunk, his "brother" Paco, and their journey to thwart the plans of a nefarious corporation bent on taking over the world.

name: View From Below
description: An emotional, story-driven, turn-based RPG about a sad kid put through hell. Literally! Escape a nightmare world, to save your own.

name: Saber Fight VR
description: A VR game focused on laser sword fighting. Cut your enemies and environment to pieces in a physics-based world. Use your powers to pull and push any object! Deflect enemy projectiles with your blade! Rebuild your destroyed temple! Train and become a master!

name: Let's Learn Japanese! Vocabulary
description: Learn over 200 Japanese words by completing fun challenges. Unlock mini-games, art and music.

name: Axiel
description: Axiel is a casual puzzle game. No timers, no scoreboards, no rush. Take your time.

name: Shine's Adventures 3 (Sea Fight)
description: You can control Shine to fight the enemy again. This time you will meet large robots who dominate the ocean. But I want to say: 'Let them know how powerful we are and see whose firing fiercer. ' This time survival mode is very interesting, don't miss it.

name: Cable Guardian
description: Prevent cable twisting effortlessly! Cable Guardian keeps track of your rotation in VR and lets you know when to turn the other way. Forget the cable and focus on the fun!

name: Herbalist Simulator
description: Become a herbalist in a small village. Treat various diseases using natural methods. Prepare healing mixtures. Travel to search for better ingredients. Do not wait. Find your vocation to heal people…

name: Prometheus Wept
description: Prometheus Wept is a party and action point turn based RPG set in a near-future, post technology Earth. The game offers hardcore squad-level combat, meaningful choices, deep character progression and an advanced crafting system.

name: Hentai Like a Boss 2
description: Hentai Like a Boss 2 is a Memory Clicker game

name: Adventures in Space
description: The learning adventures in this science curriculum unit include the opportunity to pilot a spaceship, as well as a Mars Rover while learning some of the most important lessons about the Universe.

name: Samurai Simulator
description: Venture on the way of the samurai! Fight epic battles, serve your Daimyo, defend your honour. and train followers in the Samurai Simulator – first ever feudal Japan life simulation game on Steam.

name: Wooden Nickel
description: Step inside the curiosities of an Old West newspaper to explore a frontier town. Meet the locals, wander the desert, make choices that shape each morning's paper in a growing spread of possibilities.

name: Escape from Life Inc
description: Escape from Life Inc is a quirky story-driven puzzle platformer, where you switch between three animals: a walking fish, an arrogant eagle and a stuttering reindeer. Together with plenty of wacky characters, help these three unlikely friends escape the alien lab!

name: Reach Coin
description: Sometimes I'm hungry, I put a coin in that kind of machine but the candy just won't get out. What happens with my coin in there?

name: RC Service Simulator
description: Accept service orders or build your own unique RC Model. Manage your time and finances. Buy only the best parts on the market and bring your RC dream model to life. Compare its capabilities on the race track, sell it for money or put it on display with a certificate to earn bragging rights.

name: Pupper park
description: A cute sandbox game about dogs in a park. Fetch balls, run around, scare frogs, play football, and earn bones!

name: Coffee Break
description: Cafe management and crafting sim where you live the hectic life of a Barista. Play alone or with friends for the price of a latte!

name: Aigor Escape from Bishop
description: Relive the taste of the 90's point and click with stunning graphics! Help Aigor, a scoundrel zombie, to escape from the secret crypts of the perfidious Bishop Antoine Santolamazza. Explore the dungeons of the cathedral and solve the many riddles!

name: Puzzle Frame
description: Enter a quiet place where you can relax and solve sliding puzzles. There's no tracking scores, no hidden doors, and no plot twist, just a zen place for your mind to wander.

name: Builders of Egypt: Prologue
description: Builders of Egypt: Prologue is a city-building economic strategy taking place in the Nile Valley. Immerse yourself in a world full of pyramids, where you will become a part of the ancient world. Create history, be history!

name: My Work Is Not Yet Done
description: My Work Is Not Yet Done is a pilgrimage simulator. Tasked with tracking down the source of an inscrutable signal, Avery must navigate, survey and survive an eerie, ever-shifting landscape reclaimed by nature — and perhaps something stranger.

name: Infinite Beyond The Mind
description: Infinite - Beyond the mind is a slick 2D action-platformer where you take on evil Queen Evangelyn Bramann, ruler of The Beljantaur Kingdom as she works towards her dream of world domination.

name: Planet Bounce
description: Planet Bounce is an action packed arcade-style space game. Navigate solar systems, fire unique weapons, unlock powerful new ships in your quest to conquer the galaxy.

name: Wish
description: Soma, driven by destiny, begins his quest to save his home, Israfil Continent, which trembles in fear of an evil empress… Elf Pontifex, princess knight, the first vampire, etc , with the many beautiful women waiting for their stories to unravel, what will happen in the end of this adventure...?

name: Mix-Sign: Girl with 3 Signs
description: Mix-Sign: Girl with 3 Signs is an RPG game with a mix of adventure and thriller. It's the story of a girl named Luna. She woke up in the park and discovered that she's gained the powers of the signs.

name: Dimensions: Story Mode
description: Dimensions Story Mode is the stories from the Dimensions universe, without the gameplay from Dimensions VIP. If you are playing Dimensions VIP for the stories, then Dimensions Story Mode is your perfect companion.

name: Project RTD: Random Tower Defense PvP
description: Project RTD is a Random Tower Defense PVP Game. Players will compete against each other, defending with randomly built towers or attacking other players by summoning monsters to become the “Final Winner”. The thrill of randomness and Strategic Tech Tree. Experience both in one game!

name: Brick Blaster
description: Brick Blaster is a classic brick breaking game with 100 levels to complete, power-ups to grab, and bosses to defeat!

name: Many Faces
description: Many Faces is a classic, retro arcade shooter from the 90s. Blast your way through randomly generated levels to confront the Many Face King!

name: The foreigner
description: 一件往事，一次邂逅，一段旅程，一丝乡愁，还有埋藏在砂尘的异国他乡的追忆

name: Seduce Me: The Complete Story
description: Introducing the COMPLETE STORY of "Seduce Me", the popular English Dating Sim where you get to tell your story with a family of five demon brothers. This Complete Story includes both main games, 13 mini-episodes, and both Audio Otome CDs as well as a basic compendium for lore comprehension!

name: FlickerMAZE
description: In this game You have to get through several levels of mazes by controlling a bouncy ball by shooting it.

name: Gray Zone
description: Gray Zone is best described as Men of War meets Commandos in a futuristic coat. It's an odyssey of a slave who turned against his masters. Use stealth or direct combat in a squad-based encounters. Expect memorable characters, fun dialogues and lots of action!

name: Primitive Hunter
description: In „Primitive Hunter” game you are moving to the old times and become a trapper who deals with hunting by using ancient technics of creating weapon and hunting tools like: spear, stone or arc and learning how to trucking animals by searching their traces.

name: Adventure Boy Jailbreak
description: Puzzle your way through the small town of Estivale, brought to life with a range of characters who all have a problem to solve. With each person you help, Benson gets one stop closer to breaking his friend Mike out of the county jail.

name: Ghosts'n DJs
description: Inspired by the classic arcade hit Ghosts'n Goblins and fully created by the house music legend Dr. Kucho!, Ghosts'n DJs is a pixel-art run and gun side-scrolling action platformer set in a parallel universe in which the music scene is being dominated by fake artists and DJ’s.

name: Klym
description: A 3D-Platformer about climbing buildings and finding ducklings.

name: Chico
description: Chico, an epic tail of survival on a peak in the middle of nowhere. Customize your screensaver and help Chico make his life comfortable.

name: My Adventure（我的冒险）
description: A girl, a sword, some magic, an adventure.

name: kraken's curse
description: A rogue-like pirate adventure game. Explore a skeleton-riddled archipelago in search of a giant monster. Find treasures, weapons and secrets. Can you defeat the terrible kraken?

name: Omnify Hotspot - The Best Wi-Fi Hotspot & Repeater
description: Turn your PC into a Wi-Fi hotspot & repeater with the best virtual router. Share any Wi-Fi, Ethernet, VPN, tethered and 3G/4G LTE connection and experience a cleaner, faster and safer web. Easily create a guest network in seconds.

name: Spaß Taxi
description: Spaß Taxi (Spaß is German for "fun") is a fun retro arcade game where you bring passengers from one station to another in a flying, rotating taxi. It's a clone of the classic game "Space Taxi" from 1984 with a modernized gameplay using physics and more freedom of movement.

name: Infinite Dronin
description: Your challenge: defeat waves of enemies, level your drone and survive as long as you can. Infinite Dronin is a roguelike hack-and-slash arena fighter with a Twitch twist.

name: Wamu Wamu 2
description: A cute short experimental game about cleaning fruits that are infested by big worms.

name: Lost Roads
description: Lost Roads is a psychological horror game in a world where undecipherable mysteries hide, are you ready to start the game?

name: Pinball universe
description: Pinball universe is an arcade game in which the player collects game points by manipulating the ball on the playing field. The goal of the game is to score as many game points as possible. Two playing fields are available.

name: Physical Glitch
description: Physical Glitch - this is a casual game using physics. Pink squares accidentally appear on the playing field, and your task is to collect them as much as possible and not touch the red objects. How many squares can you collect?

name: Bizarre Barber
description: Grab your VR controllers, and get ready to snip away! Bizarre Barber is a surreal, fun & fast-moving haircutting game set on a subway platform.

name: FLYING SHOT
description: FLYING SHOT is a voxel first-person shooter that involves dismembering opponents, physical blood, realistic destruction of glass and walls, and slow-motion parkour

name: Malediction
description: Malediction is a third-person puzzle/platformer that gives the player the ability to control space and time! Use your magic to solve puzzles, navigate through a cursed city, and fight magic clones to reclaim your powers.

name: Cloudlands 2
description: Award winning Cloudlands: VR Minigolf has an official sequel that's bigger and better than ever. Cloudlands 2 builds off of the fun of playing and building minigolf courses and adds the ability to play full sized golf courses. Arm yourself with a putter, wedge, and driver and hit the links in the clouds.

name: Me and myself
description: Lily, a little girl who lost her parents in a car accident, lives in a big empty house. She really wants to have a friend with whom she could pass the tough time. One day, she finally get a friend, from mirror...

name: FLS
description: FLS is a Scifi Sandbox Racing game.

name: Agent Emerson
description: In this immersive 360 degree first-person POV VR film, the viewer is dropped into a visceral, action-packed 3D cinematic experience usually seen in movie theaters, only this time YOU are the action hero.

name: VUP- VTuber & Animation & motion capture & 3D & Live2D
description: VUP is a VTuber tool, based on real-time capture technology, low-cost, zero-based to realize animation video production and multi-person cross-platform virtual livestream, opening a new era in which everyone is a VTuber.

name: Kart kids
description: A chaotic racing game in which up to 60 tiny karts race each other in the hood.

name: Talvisota - Winter War
description: Talvisota for Rising Storm 2 brings players from the steaming jungles of Vietnam to the frozen forests of Finland, during the Soviet-Finnish Winter War of the late 1930s.

name: Pilfer
description: A stealth game in which the player explores a small town, breaks into houses, and steals silverware.

name: Wrecker
description: Wrecker is an 2D arcade game set in space. In it you will fight off an endless horde of aliens in waves using your special issue high powered missile turret.

name: Thunderflash
description: Thunderflash is a "love letter" to the arcade games of the 80s. It is a Run 'n Gun game inspired by gems like Ikari Warriors, Commando and Heavy Barrel.

name: Tranject
description: Tranject is a 2D-space-shooter with a complex story about cleaning space and collecting green essence. The base game as well as a possible expansion is developed by Jadon-K. Fischer.

name: Primitive Survival
description: Conquer the stone age! Primitive Survival is a skill-based survival RPG. You begin as a primitive human and progress through the first steps toward civilization. Become a hunter/gatherer in a primitive world. The skills you learn are based on what you spend your time doing.

name: JORRY
description: JORRY is a horror point & click game inspired by the classics of the 90's, including an action and survival game play.

name: Tin & Kuna
description: Spin and smash through the colorful, chaotic worlds of Tin & Kuna. Explore levels filled with puzzles and peril.

name: The Unfinished Swan
description: From the creators of What Remains of Edith Finch. Enter the surreal world of The Unfinished Swan and explore a mysterious, hidden kingdom by splatting paint to reveal the world around you.

name: Infinity Wars 2
description: A Simultaneous turn-based strategy card game, honoring the original Infinity Wars, with refurbished systems and a stronger codebase, for the best possible Infinity Wars Experience.

name: Suspicious Slide
description: Suspicious Slide takes the "ice slide" puzzle to the next level.

name: Ultimate Disc Golf
description: Disc Golf is a fun and easy to pick up sport that involves taking a disc and throwing it into a metal basket with chains on it. UDG is a disc golf video game with a unique take on "golf" style games. Featuring a character creator with real DG brands and explore-able courses. Come and play a round.

name: The inside of a drawer
description: ESC, Tab, W,A,S,D Space Bar, R, Mouse wheel, Drag

name: Kick Of Dungeon
description: Collect and combine different cards, challenge all kinds of monsters, encounter different random events!

name: Alchemelee
description: Alchemelee is a potion-brewing party game that can be played with up to 4 players. Grow ingredients, make potions, and use them to affect the actions of other players, or be the first to make all three of your designated potions to win

name: Almighty: Kill Your Gods
description: Hunt demons, monsters, and gods solo or online with friends in this action RPG. Run, leap and fly across islands, ripping your foes to pieces, and rebuilding your home with their remains. Bring low the oppressive false gods, protect your kindred and become Almighty.

name: Soul Axiom Rebooted
description: The new enhanced edition of Soul Axiom - a first-person story-driven adventure puzzle game, set in the beautiful, haunting cyber-world of Elysia. Collect unique hand powers, discover multiple endings and choose your own destiny as you unravel the mystery of your digital afterlife.

name: Monster Capture King
description: A monster taming game that's good enough to share with your dad! Start off with a little Doggy and tame more monsters to become the Monster Capture King!

name: Drive 4 Survival
description: Drive 4 Survival is a struggle for survival mostly in the frozen wilderness, where you have to rely only on yourself and your car. Try to survive!

name: Alwa's Legacy
description: Alwa’s Legacy is a modern retro game full of dangerous dungeons, magical items and ancient secrets. By upgrading your magic, any way forward is right in this non-linear adventure game full of exploration.

name: My Cute Fuhrer
description: A small satiric anti-war game with a cute Fuhrer as a lead character. Will you be able to melt her heart?

name: DonDon Busters!!
description: KICK, PANCH, BALLOOM!! BATTLE IT OUT WITH YOUR FRIENDS!!

name: Justice Strikes
description: JS (Justice Strikes) is a third-person-shooter action game.The player is a special agent in a city populated by two types of people: thugs and common people.Several thugs form a gang. The goal is to seek and defeat gangs.

name: Rhythm of the Gods
description: Join the strongest mortal warrior, Lyrik, and slide, jump & slash to the beat to please the Gods of Rhythm! Solve the problems that the mortal realm faces in this auto-running, Greek-inspired rhythm game. Keep in time and reveal each gods’ true tune with unique beatmaps.

name: Sea King
description: Fast-paced naval combat party game.

name: Zombie World Coronavirus Apocalypse VR
description: Welcome to the world of the apocalyptic future, where in the laboratories the best scientists tried to create a cure for all known diseases, but the test led to terrible consequences that you will have to find out!

name: BORE DOME
description: BORE DOME is an experimental and exploratory game. You are invited into an alternate world where the mundane and awkward is your only entertainment. A space of abstracted social interactions for you to experience and reflect upon.

name: Frontline: The Great Patriotic War
description: A tactical scale strategy game that invites the players to take command of the URSS forces in an epic struggle for the control of Russia during World War Two.

name: Frog struggles
description: A fast and difficult action game in which lots of insects fight for control over the pond.

name: Position
description: Welcome to meditative story adventure about worlds, fantasies and eternal reasoning of mankind. Do not get lost.

name: Taimanin Yukikaze 1: Trial
description: The long-running visual novel Taimanin saga continues! Mizuki Yukikaze and her senior Akiyama Rinko volunteers in an infiltration mission in order to rescue her long-lost mother. From the depth of the underground city awaits a trail of incidents full of suspense, betrayal, and debauchery.

name: Abyssal Mirage
description: "Abyssal Mirage" is a fast-paced action-adventure game that includes Roguelike elements.This game has a smooth and refreshing battle system. You can use different weapon magic together. Continue to explore, fight, and defeat powerful enemies in the maze...

name: Palace of sky
description: 突如其来的变故打破了山村的宁静， 一名不速之客的到来，造成相依为命的爷爷亡故。 为此，一名原本应该平凡的少年，为了替爷爷报仇，踏上了修行之路。 随着对事情的调查深入，他逐渐解除到了传送中的东西——九霄仙阙。

name: ReversiQuest2
description: ReversiQuest2 is a single-player tactical JRPG with a battle system based on Reversi. Those good ole days of pixel art, characters, and sounds reminiscent of video games of the mid 90's. No need to know the previous ReversiQuest to enjoy ReversiQuest2!

name: i Have Powers!
description: SuperHeroic SuperHero Arcade Fighting Game, make a Superhero using the classic 4 color costume design of comic-book Heroes. See how powerful you can make your character, see how long they can survive. Choose lots of different SuperPowers, stop crime by any means!

name: Game of the Year
description: A rhythm arcade about the importance of simple moments when you can just fool around with your friends and forget about all your worries.

name: Defending Frontiers
description: Defending Frontiers is a city defense, 2D graphics with a side view, a memorable and atmospheric soundtrack, colorful and beautiful graphics and unforgettable experiences.

name: Hexon
description: Just a nice puzzle, which you can spend a couple of hours.

name: Toy Killer
description: Zombies take the island. You! Come to the city, find new weapons, and kill a maximum of them to get the higher score.

name: Defeated Girl
description: Defeated Girl is a jigsaw puzzle.

name: Magin: The Rat Project Stories
description: Magin is a combination of a narrative-driven adventure RPG with a deck-building card game. The nonlinear plot, comic book esthetics, full voiceover and game mechanics are all tightly attached to the represented world in a unique fantasy setting.

name: Asset Flip Tycoon Simulator
description: A real-world data-driven Steam tagging game. Tag your game with the most correlated tags to make maximum profit!

name: Counter-Fall
description: Dash as fast as you can! Dodge the oncoming walls and obstacles and don't forget power ups!

name: Dissection Simulator: Dogfish Edition
description: VictoryXR’s virtual shark dissection software is a hands-on opportunity experienced through the power of VR. Join Wendy Martin, national award-winning science teacher, to guide you through a virtual reality shark dissection.

name: Birth to Death
description: Embark on the wonderful adventure that is life. Form meaningful connections with the people around you. Be comforted by material wealth. Experience a vast array of achievements… Unless you screw it up and die before doing anything.

name: The Elder Scrolls Online - Greymoor
description: Join over 18 million players in the award-winning online multiplayer RPG. Explore the frozen tundra and snowy mountains of Western Skyrim and stop a powerful Vampire Lord from enslaving Tamriel in The Elder Scrolls Online: Greymoor, part of the year-long gothic adventure The Dark Heart of Skyrim.

name: Shmup Arena
description: Shmup Arena is a fast and frantic arena shooter where you need to survive several waves of enemies and some powerful bosses. We don't want to bother you with long stories, just bullets and explosions. Come have fun and challenge yourself at Shmup Arena.

name: Spacebase19
description: Defend Spacebase 19 from the asteroids swarming down on the station! Shoot down waves of stones and equip different powerful weapons. How many waves can you last? A simple nostalgic retro arcade turret defense shooter.

name: Tunnel Vision
description: Tunnel Vision is a Retro Space shooter that harkens back to the early 80s Arcades. Fun simple addictive gameplay.

name: GeoWar 2
description: GeoWar is a simple real-time strategy game where you have to capture all the bases from the enemies.

name: REFUGE
description: The third-person singleplayer rogue-like adventure - REFUGE, with an massive, handcrafted open-world and hardcore challenging action. Choose your fighting way through hordes of monsters. Unlock new loot, and find a way to survive and finish that path.

name: Schrodinger's cat simulator - PT
description: Schrodinger's cat simulator Participate in Schrodinger's famous experiment.

name: Bionic Hunter VR
description: Hunt down Monsters in a Sci-Fi Horror Survival Shooter and test your Skills among other players! Live an immersive experience with latest generation graphics.

name: Wings
description: Spread your wings and fly in this open world, casual multiplayer VR experience. Powered by WRLD3D maps, the world is yours to explore!

name: Music Visualizer Engine PC Live Wallpaper
description: Interactive 3D wallpaper that reacts on any sound. Play your music on YouTube, Spotify etc. and enjoy the spectacle.

name: Hop Step Sing! Astral Piece
description: Niina's first solo live!! For it's fifth song the new Hop Step Sing! VR Music video goes into interactive VR territory. Follow Niina around as she sings and dance with her classmates after school hours.

name: Shot in the Dark
description: Armed with nothing but a six gun the lone bandit will need a quick hand and a sharp eye to fend off the nightmares lurking in the dark.

name: Cecil Run
description: Arrows fall randomly on Cecil as he continues to run away from danger avoiding pits and gaps while collecting meat and treasure. Survive long enough and the dentist will become agitated, get into his B-52 and bomb Cecil like the Dresden Cathedral. Once Cecil collects 10 pieces of meat, the hamburger will drop.

name: Hell Pub
description: 这是一款独一无二的策略rpg游戏，难度和标题都是地狱级的。 您需要组织一支4人战队，去通过冥王试炼。您的对手实力恐怖是不会让您失望的。 从来没有人类能走到最后，这次轮到您上场了。来接受一次终极考验吧。 当您击败血量 伤害都是几倍于您的对手，您会爱上这款游戏的。

name: Milkcraft
description: Milkcraft is a multiplayer RPG social sandbox game. In this mysterious world of Norse mythology, you can freely build your own territory and village, or start a survival adventure to challenge the dark dragon. Come with Us!

name: TriangleWingXXXX
description: A STG game. To prove your strength to the strange sound, you must defeat your campanions who have fought together with you.

name: Jack troubles
description: This is a first person shooter game,The player is a shooter with multiple weapons,Players are free to explore the surrounding area,Enemies are scattered around the player and inside buildings,Players can kill enemies or avoid enemy attacks and maintain health,Players can also grab enemy weapons.

name: Not Your Eyes
description: Your eyes cannot be trusted. A girl finds herself questioned by a twisted psychiatrist, helping a fallen angel, and followed by a bizarre stalker, descending to a beautiful, terrible world where nothing is as it seems.

name: Granny: Chapter Two
description: You have to escape Granny and Grandpa...You have five days...

name: Rock, Paper, Scissors Simulator
description: First person view "Rock, Paper, Scissors" game

name: Dark Gravity
description: Shoot, destroy, collect, craft and destroy even more! "Dark Gravity" is a fast-paced, low poly vertical shoot'em up game that features non-linear campaign mode with lots of enemies and bosses. Craft new weapons, upgrade your fighter and build an ultimate aerial war machine!

name: Kika & Daigo: A Curious Tale
description: Kika & Daigo: A Curious Tale is a local splitscreen co-op game where you go on an adventure to find your lost grandpa. Use your unique abilities to work together to solve the mystery of grandpa's disappearance. Can you find back grandpa?

name: Calamari Clash
description: Calamari Clash is a multiplayer versus game which takes you into the role of a Calamartian who crashed on an unknown planet along with its companions. Dash it out against each other to charge the spaceship’s battery and escape. Only one can escape… who will it be?

name: Decadent Thinking
description: Over 100 short stories told by a mysterious girl. A "read" prescription for those of you who are tired of living.

name: Super Magbot
description: A precise 2D platformer with a twist. NO JUMPING. Master your magnetic powers to beat each level with speed and skill. Enjoy classic 16-bit gaming vibes, tackle challenging achievements and compete for global leaderboard supremacy along the way.

name: Ephemeral Tale
description: Ephemeral Tale is a classically inspired RPG for the modern age, featuring hand-crafted dungeons, classic JRPG-style combat, and a loot-driven progression system.

name: Fight,to the last
description: This is a 2D dungeon rogue shooting game. Players can kill enemies to stick a variety of dropped weapons, free combination, through a variety of different combinations to define their own attack mode.

name: Blink Cam
description: Blink Cam is a role-playing game, you will be transformed into a data life, and access different timelines from the perspective of the camera to explore what happened of Blink Project

name: UIFO DEFENSE HD
description: UIFO Defense has a special gameplay of tower defense. Utilize the terrain and different turrets to eliminate alien invaders and protect the crystal cores which are critical to science and technology of your civilization.

name: CityWarHeroes VR
description: In 2050, alien spaceships suddenly approach peaceful earth. The spacecraft lands in Incheon, South Korea, making the area a shambles. You'll have to fight against aliens as armed special forces, armed with armor and weapons packed with the most advanced technologies of the future. But what if the aliens are cute?

name: Kosmokrats
description: Experience life in space using cutting edge drone simulation technology. You can never fail — build ships, make friends, live forever.

name: The God Unit
description: The GoD Unit is a first-person physics-based puzzle game set in a near pre-apocalyptic future, featuring the mass manipulation ability and other familiar and beloved puzzle mechanics.

name: Space Elite Force II
description: Space Elite Force II is a frenetic space-shooter with weapon customization and insane bosses battles. Embark in your ship and fight for the survival of the human race!

name: Candera: The Forgotten Realm
description: Follow the story of Zaelor, a Guardian of Candera, as he embarks to take down the corruption in his land. Meet companions, delve through dungeons, craft equipment, find secrets, and travel the world to see his quest through! Use each party member's abilities strategically to take down difficult challenges.

name: 武儒绘卷 - 启示录
description: "Wu Confucian Painting Volume-Apocalypse" is a three-country background development game. Players can formulate their own development routes in the game, or assist the emperor as a counselor, or assist the emperor to seek the Quartet as a military commander, and he can be the monarch himself

name: Cold wires
description: Cold wires-is a 2D arcade game with a side view, the essence of which is to clean the playing field and charge with the battery.

name: Pictassembler
description: Engineer a production line to build pixel art images one at a time. Get your timing and placement right to match the solution image and finish the level!

name: Kamtris
description: KamTris is a small game that combines the Kama Sutra and Tetris.

name: Photos
description: 这是一款把绘图和拼图相结合的新颖小游戏。

name: First Contact
description: Strange radio bursts have been detected! Embark on an immersive adventure as you analyze radio signals coming from space, decipher hidden messages, symbols, sounds, and translate alien languages. Follow an engaging story with countless dialogues and game-changing choices.

name: Firefight!
description: Put out the fires and rescue the hostages in this fast-paced arcade game!

name: Pirates Treasure II - Steam Edition
description: Pirates Treasure II is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Pirate theme, oriented from left to right. For Amusement Only

name: Better Boyfriend
description: Improve your boyfriend so he’s better than all the rest! Nag and encourage your boyfriend to level him up… If you are vigilant, your boyfriend will learn to complete tasks without you reminding him, and will start proactively doing nice things for you!

name: Talshard
description: You awaken in a mysterious world plagued with strange portals. Embark on a journey in this turn-based adventure RPG as you unravel the story and explore themes of fear and self-doubt.

name: DEAD FURY
description: Descend into hell in Dead Fury! - A fast-paced action-adventure title set amongst the rugged mountains of a post-apocalyptic New Zealand, a native blossom is the last hope for humanity after a virus brought back from Mars triggered a zombie apocalypse.

name: Void Breach
description: Void Breach is a low-res, retro point-and-click adventure game where an experiment has gone unpredictably wrong. Your daughter is whooshed through a tear in space! Embrace the void and follow her. The only way to bring her back.

name: Yang2020 Path To Presidency
description: Andrew Yang is unstoppable on his path to presidency! Play through all of the ups and downs of his campaign journey as you battle the other candidates, the naysayers and of course President Trump!

name: Swing & Miss
description: Swing & Miss is an adult visual novel, or eroge. It is a mostly linear story centered around themes such as swinging, netorare (or netorase), moral degeneration, and female domination. It contains a lengthy story and beautiful artwork to illustrate the characters and (erotic) event scenes.

name: Hotaru
description: Hotaru is a difficult space style shoot 'em up with different waves of enemies, bosses and power-ups.

name: Protagonism
description: You are the narrator of this game. Morgan is the protagonist, who knows about your existence. Narrate his life and talk to him. Make or break his life. Or something in between. Just remember things aren't always what they seem and consequences aren't always predictable.

name: Slay The Bigies
description: Slay The Bigies is an anime style hack'n slash action rpg game with randomized loot and inventory system.

name: Infection
description: Infection is a relaxing and minimal puzzle game. Infect all the cells by virus to get success in each level. Correct operation sequence and timing is the key to success.

name: Mirage Online Classic
description: Retro free-to-play spiritual successor to 2001's Mirage Online. Create your hero and journey through 20+ quests, battle enemy guilds, craft recipes and train your champion in this open world 2d top-view action-packed MMORPG.

name: 九州仙玉  Kyushu jade
description: This is an experimental visual novel with a length of about 30-60 minutes. It tells a story of a female crossing.

name: Arabian Treasures: Midnight Match
description: This is the rags to riches story told in a match 3 puzzle adventure within an Arabian themed game!

name: The Last Haven
description: The world after a nuclear war. Manage the settlement, learn technology, make decisions, produce weapons, ammunition, organize defense, raid for supplies on other areas, do not let residents die, survive the nuclear winter.

name: ZERONE - Spinoff Arena
description: ZERONE is a PC-based high-quality VR game, and it is a Hyper FPS game that competes with the enemy units of the mechanic series.

name: Mystic Ruin: A New Dawn
description: Mystic Ruin: A New Dawn follows the protagonist Faust and the remainder of his crew after crash landing on a strange new world. Slay beasts, gather treasure, and most importantly learn the secrets of this strange new land throughout your adventure.

name: Other Realms
description: Dwarven based survival multiplayer game, craft, build your kingdom piece by piece. Set foundations, forge devices and conquer your dwarven realm.

name: The Warmth Between Us
description: It is late December in Taipei. The pavement glows like silver under the winter rain. That's when we met for the first time. The warmth between us has a certain comfort that I’ve never felt before.

name: Shine's Adventures 5(World Of Box)
description: Girls came to a world of box. The robot NPC in here has an abnormality. We must sanction against these NPCs. In combat, players need to eliminate blocks to launch skills. You can combine blocks to get props and skills, or you can gain extra abilities through passive skills.

name: 人偶馆绮幻夜 Dreaming on the last light（DOLL）
description: design of four main ending lines to make the game a non-one-time customs clearance product, and at the same time show you the story of the puppet hall through a total of more than 700 CGs, plus interesting brain-burning room levels and collection elements

name: Night Witch: 588
description: Join the legendary female aviators that struck fear into the hearts of Nazis in this plane-stealth game.

name: Pixel Studio for pixel art
description: Best pixel art editor. Simple. Fast. Portable.

name: Nightfall Hacker
description: Plan, hack, and fight your way against rogue software in Nightfall Hacker, a turn-based strategy game.

name: The Dictatress
description: Top-down pixel-raytraced keyboard-controlled chaotic dungeon crawler looter shooter describes this game quite well. You play a soldier, enforcing the law and protecting yourself in civil war.

name: The Big SokoBang
description: Explosion of new game features and elements enhancing the classic.SokoBang ("The Big SokoBang") is a brain trainer game for people who enjoy intellectual challenges.Each level is an exciting puzzle.

name: Mommy
description: Meteor storm falls on Sweet Country. All country inhabitants disappear. Help little Toby survive, find his Mommy, safe locals and restore his home!

name: 4th Generation Warfare
description: As the leader of a nation, dispatch and control your team of characters all around the world to destabilize your enemies and establish your supremacy. All methods are fair game: hacking, sabotage, political interference, military strikes, corruption, treachery, assassinations, data theft…

name: C.Y.S.M.A.
description: C.Y.S.M.A. is a third-person action about a man lost in the maze. You will die. Not just eventually, but it keeps happening often. And after every death.. it will happen again...

name: New Year's Eve 2020
description: Although New Year's Eve of 2020 is over, natural simulation and built-in piano still relax you

name: Renegade Grounds: Episode 2
description: Agela, Ingus, and a new ally, a lizardman Rhask, try to clear their names and take on the sinister General Danyll, as well as more dangers, more cultists, and more Ogoz. A continuation of a short, light-hearted story with turn-based combat.

name: Core Defense
description: A roguelike tower defense game with a dash of deckbuilding. Choose a reward, improve your build, survive the next wave, repeat. Highly replayable, difficult, and addictive. You'll want just one more wave, just one more run!

name: Winter Break
description: Grab your slingshot and start throwing snowballs at the opposing team in this amusing and family friendly VR game. Dodge the enemy snowballs and compete in side mini-games to become grand winner of the winter break!

name: Witchcraft: Pandoras Box
description: In this fantastic Hidden Object Adventure, the Crow-Witch has seized this world and has kidnapped your daughter with the help of Pandoras Box. Travel into a parallel world where extraordinary and magical creatures await you and your task is simple... survive!

name: Miss Neko 2
description: Welcome to the magic island — Nekoland! All good things you want will happen here! Solve the match puzzles, collect the magic coins and then you will see miracles!

name: Rescuers2019
description: This is a first person action shooter game，The player is surrounded by enemy troops，Players are free to explore the surrounding area to familiarize themselves with the terrain，Players can kill or evade enemy attacks and must maintain health，Players are free to switch weapons or grab enemy weapons.

name: MechanicalFuture
description: For some reason, human beings become petrified and fight against evil forces...

name: Koo & Yuu
description: Koo & Yuu is a minimalist game. Solve the puzzles and take Koo and Yuu to the teleportation bases.

name: Earth Analog
description: In this space flight adventure game you take control of exploration vessel Eurisko XI on a quest through deep space. Visit fascinating fractal-based exoplanets and solve their mysteries. Fly through dangerous landscapes. Collect artifacts to unlock new pathways. Your goal: find our new home.

name: Planet Colonization
description: Real time strategy and society management game. Explore the planet, build and defend your colony. Trade products and armaments and take advantage of price changes. Let your colonists establish their own businesses or build the buildings yourself. Fight against the enemy colonies and alien lifeforms.

name: Dorky Fork
description: Dorky Fork is a simple yet сhallenging puzzle game about pushing cubes.

name: Everyone Dies
description: [Great time killer game] People have never been so close to extinction, and all because of one mistake of nature. A dove a symbol of peace, love, purity, hope? Not in 2027.

name: HexON
description: A relaxing puzzle game. Turn on each board by connecting all magnetic pieces to it.

name: Photo Quiz - Animals
description: Can you guess the words from pictures and unlock the levels? Then try Photo Quiz - Animals. You will love this amazing new Photo Guess game. Guessing the pictures will be so much fun. you'll have endless hours of brain training unscrambling fun! Can you Guess The Picture? What's The Picture?

name: Zombie Slayers
description: Zombie Slayers is all about staying alive as long as you can. With plenty of weapons and defence options available you will face increasing amounts of zombies trying to end your career as a slayer. So, how long will you survive? Including playing as zombies (multiplayer-only).

name: Blood Metal
description: Blood Metal is a brutal, experimental, single-player project featuring a full body-destruction model. Experience uncensored 3D gore blended with relentless action. Welcome to Blood Metal.

name: Guiding Light
description: Guiding Light is a co-op game in which you and a friend need to rescue stranded aliens from all kinds of sticky situations. One player is an alien who goes down to the planet to execute the rescue operation, while the other pilots the UFO to help guide the alien on the ground.

name: Kz CTool
description: Kz CTool is a powerfull crytology tool. Developed for improve user's security and privacy.

name: The Girl of Glass: A Summer Bird's Tale
description: Join Kristal as she sets out on her journey to better understand herself and the world around her in a point and click adventure game, featuring turn-based combat and hand-painted environments.

name: Builder VR
description: Simply build what you want in virtual reality. You are the first in the world ready to experience an original and revolutionary component joining system. Plus your work of art can be moved in a unique method.

name: A Moustache in the House
description: You are not alone in your own house.... solve the puzzles and find a way out.

name: Tiamat's Drink
description: Tiamat’s Drink is a shoot ’em up roguelike game inspired by the 16-bit era consoles. Fight against powerful enemies, defeat unique bosses, unlock challenging levels and obtain extra powers! So get ready and don't forget to enjoy our exclusive soundtrack!

name: North Of Iraq Part 1
description: North Of Iraq Part 1 || The pandemic : expands upon the team-based action gameplay that it pioneered . Covid:19 features new maps, characters, weapons, and game modes, and delivers updated versions of the modern content

name: Nordic Storm Solitaire
description: Help northman Elof lead his people to a land promised by the God Feyr! Beware… this land is under dispute by the Jotun Idyl, an archrival of the ancient Gods. Play through 130 challenging solitaire levels and chase away the Jotun Idyl!

name: RaidTitans
description: RaidTitans is a classic real-time strategy role-playing game A hero who lost everything at once is deported to a remote village, but his story is just beginning

name: ArchiTac
description: Stranded on a deserted planet, you must explore and gather resources to craft buildings so that TAC can find and repair his spaceship.

name: Breakwaters
description: Adventure through an ever-changing oceanic world that evolves the way you interact with water. Swim, sail, and fly to find new islands with unique resources to build, craft, and survive. Join friends online and build a home to defend, or defeat massive Titans bringing calm to the waves.

name: Remember
description: Someone somehow gets in touch with you. And you don't know what they are.

name: Brawl Hopper
description: A New Procedural Arena Brawler - Battle Between Up to 8 Players Per Match - New Levels Generated Daily.

name: Tiles Shooter Puzzle Cube
description: A cool puzzle on the surface of a 3D cube. Shoot colored bricks on the playing field, making three or more blocks of same color together.

name: Fix it - The Renovation Simulator
description: With Fix it - The Renovation Simulator, the player experiences the profession of a craftsman in all its facets. Whether electrical work, installation, gardening or renovation - all fields of activity are covered.

name: Escape the Ninja Room
description: You are trapped in Ninja Room. Can you escape from this room? This game is a point click type escape game.

name: Marco & The Galaxy Dragon
description: Marco, an orphan with missing memories, and Arco, a dragon who rules the galaxy, were hunting for treasure in space! On one of their adventures, Marco was given a clue to the whereabouts of her mother. Their next stop, her birthplace - Earth!

name: Zombie Busters VR
description: - The professional zombie eradication task force 'Zombie Busters ‘ - There's a rumor that there's a lot of zombies on the ruined 501 Street...Now, why don't we go out hunting zombies? - Increased game quality by the appearance of various monsters with individuality.

name: Hero Index
description: Hero Index delivers the superhero-like flying experience that everyone has dreamed of. Fly like the superhero and wipe out everything stands in your way!

name: Aquarius
description: Aquarius is a 90's style arcade game where you play as a cave diver in search for treasure, guarded by the ocean's fiercest predators and its cuddliest minnows. Navigate through the caves, collect the treasure, and survive!

name: Beyond Eden: Dear Edward

Hone his skills as detective, psychic, or gambler, seek fortune and adventure in the streets and salons of 1890s London, and romance two desirable young men!

name: StretchBot
description: StretchBot is a retro platformer with tonnes of action, a compelling story and an ear warming soundtrack that will keep players coming back for more. The adventure is set in a rundown world where both steam-punk and cyber-punk aesthetics collide in stunning 16-bit pixel art.

name: The Walsingham Files - Chapter 2
description: After discovering a major clue concerning the double homicide in Willowdale Nature Reserve, Sara is mysteriously convicted on false bribery charges that brings the investigation to a grinding halt. Fortunately, an old friend investigating a related case just so happens to be around the corner…

name: Hentai Tights
description: Enjoy the beauty girls picture and relaxing music to complete the puzzle.

name: Gift Girl
description: This is a desktop pet, Can be placed on the computer desktop, Character's chest has a physical softening effect, Can add a layer of sexy to the desktop !

name: Elizabeth
description: Elizabeth is a decryption leisure game.The protagonist is a young man who has just stepped into the society, shuttling through the picture frame in search of freedom and love.The game screen is fresh and lovely, each level has rich puzzles waiting for players to solve.

name: Santa's Christmas Solitaire 2
description: An old foe has returned to ruin Christmas this year, can you help Santa defeat him and recover the Christmas presents?

name: nStations
description: Construct and manage your colony anytime, anywhere, any device!!!!

name: polyfuru feat. MaRiNaSu (β) / ポリフる feat. まりなす（仮）
description: Enjoy the concert dancing with a virtual idol! This is a rhythm action game where you dance with glow sticks during VTuber’s performance. Enjoy the VR concert with MaRiNaSu!

name: kirakira stars idol project AI
description: "I want to be an idol!"The story of the beginning to the top idol singer starting from the accidental reunion of the new face manager " Nobuyuki Kinoshita " and childhood friend " Ai Amane" of the talent agency.

name: Theme Park Simulator: Rollercoaster Paradise
description: Theme Park Simulator is a physics simulation game in which you experience a wide array of different attractions. Ranging from rollercoasters to bumper cars, there’s a ride for everyone in Theme Park Simulator!

name: Lost Brothers
description: Lost Brothers is a single-player first-person adventure, taking place in an abandoned mine. All you have is a walkie-talkie and a map. Explore a mysterious forest and a labyrinth of underground passages to rescue a mysterious lady.

name: ROAD HOMEWARD: Open world
description: An open world adventure in which you have to get home, through forests, deserts, sea and snowy locations. At your disposal a variety of transport and no one forbids you to explore the world on the way to home.

name: Melbits™ World
description: THE CUTEST CHALLENGE ! The cooperative puzzle-platformer game that will equally charm and challenge your friends and family. Communication and coordination are the key to success in the Melbits™ mission!"

name: Cyberception
description: Fast-paced, brutal, cyberpunk FPS shooter game. Fight for your right to exercise free will again. Fight through hordes of mindless crooks of the Corporation to reach the executive floor and put an end to contract they put on your head. There will be blood and pieces of neuro fiber everywhere.

name: Sterio
description: Sterio is a programming tool to allow 3D graphics engineers to use standard photographic units to take, import, and adequately convert the stereoscopic images into 3D model maps, apply appropriate textures, and subsequently enter them into the Unity 3D game engine.

name: Spacer Project
description: " You are sent into space aboard your spaceship to eradicate any alien threat trying to invade the galaxy.... Facing waves of enemies drawing their strength from the genesis of video games, and armed with rudimentary weapons or slaloming in an asteroid field! Face the growing difficulty of Spacer Project.

name: Assemble with Care
description: From the studio that brought you Monument Valley comes a story about a globe-trotting antique restorer. As she arrives in the sun-soaked town of Bellariva, she has no idea just how broken it will turn out to be.

name: FallNation
description: FallNation is a free-roaming army based RPG adventure mixing a Worldmap stage and FPS battlefield with Real Time Tactics in the middle of an apocalyptic environment where the future depends on you.

name: Boom Boomerang

name: Gachi Revenge

name: Pieces of Me: Northbound
description: You find yourself standing at a trolley station shortly after midnight. Confused as to where you are, the mystery of how you came to be there will slowly unravel as you interact with those you encounter.

name: Bodyless
description: * Special screening for Ars Electronica Festival 2020. Valid until Oct 15, 2020. Bodyless is a surreal VR experience based on the director's childhood memory during Taiwan's martial law period in the 1970s. The player becomes a deceased political prisoner's ghost in his journey to find his way home.

name: Fateful End: True Case Files
description: Solve your own murder in this thrilling true crime adventure game. You've come face-to-face with your fate and someone close to you is going to kill you...unless you find out who it is before the time runs out!

name: Portal Dungeon: Goblin Escape
description: Portal Dungeon is a medieval fantasy action game where you have to activation a network of dungeon portals and free yourself from the slavery.

name: SpelunKing: The Mine Match
description: Dig into this deep match-3 expedition! Take a dive into the mine, search for your grandpa’s lost items, and collect precious stones to help the villagers around town rebuild Farnsbury. Reach the bottom of the old mine and become the Spelunk King (or Queen)!

name: Choco Pixel
description: Choco Pixel is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: Barbarous: Tavern Of Emyr
description: As a fantasy world innkeeper, face the problems of a prematurely retired hero!

name: Egypt Solitaire. Match 2 Cards
description: Egypt Solitaire. Match 2 Cards is a card game and an exciting adventure. 120 new deals for seekers of adventure!

name: Fighters Wizards
description: Challenge your friends or other members of the multiplayer community on the game Fighters wizards. It's a little PVP game where you play as little wizards who are ready to fight to find out who's the best of them

name: LUXAR
description: In LUXAR, you control an extra-terrestrial luminescent organic entity that has just been born and must pass its first survival trials to show its adult peers that it deserves to grow among them.

name: Slave Princess Sarah
description: Play as Sarah, the sexy warrior princess, as she fights to restore peace to her kingdom! Enjoy ultra-low res pixel animations, 8 bit chip tune sound, and a cutting edge hardcore story to tie them all together! Nostalgia and newness come together in this 8 Bit hand-held game style action RPG!

name: Eternal Liiivie - EP1 Liiivie Isolated From the World
description: One night, Ita and Margarcia escaped from the village and became traitors. Various mysteries and conspiracies hidden in the mountain village have also begun the prologue.

name: Sakura Succubus
description: Sakura Succubus is a lewd visual novel about amassing a harem of sexy succubi. Featuring a cute idol, a domineering businesswoman, and a spacey social media star, there’s no shortage of women to woo!

name: Frontier
description: You will lead a three person team to take risks in dense forests, snow, caves, deserts and other places to protect outposts in those places. Eliminate the enemies you meet, understand the local strange animals and plants, and acquire powerful weapons and equipment.

name: VR Gigapixel Gallery
description: The "Gigapixel VR Gallery" is an opportunity to view extremely high-resolution pictures in various sizes exactly up close in 6DoF. The gallery has 48 motifs ranging from 136 megapixels to 15.9 gigapixels.

name: Spermula 1
description: Sperms in Space! But also in Sex Robots, Witch Lairs, Ghost Castles and places we can't name here.

name: Moves
description: Moves is a minimalist puzzle game where you must use your mathematical skills to solve tricky puzzles.

name: Treis Zoes
description: Treis Zoes is a visual novel where not only choice is important, but also the motive of choice. Explore the world of living skeletons on the experience of past travelers and add your own to the encyclopedia of the dimension of Death.

name: Peasant Uprise
description: Peasant Uprise sets a group of peasants on a deadly quest against the new lord that has taken over their province. Unskilled in the arts of war, they will use their only known skills and tools to regain control of the Province of Swayne.

name: 36 apples
description: Collect apples and uncover the secrets of a self-contained world.

name: For The Warp
description: A roguelike deckbuilding game in space! Explore randomly generated systems, enemies and strange encounters. Build your deck, survive and reach For The Warp gate!

name: MAN STANDING
description: The ALFINA GAMERS team together with ALFINA WORLD GAME PUBLISHING are pleased to present a unique game experience. Get ready to challenge nature, incredible dangers, serious enemies, and most importantly - yourself.

name: Cubic Chess
description: Cubic Chess is a twist on traditional Chess, setting the pieces onto a 3d cubic board, you can rotate, revolve and plan around the board itself and is perfect for players that want a new way to think of their favorite game, without too many more bells and whistles.

name: Drinks With Abbey
description: Drinks with Abbey is a short, slice-of-life visual novel about a first date.

name: The North Pole
description: Put on your Santa suit this Christmas and get ready to play at The North Pole!

name: Desert Armor
description: Desert Armor is a turn-based strategy wargame. Move your armored vehicles across the arid landscape of the Gulf War and engage enemy vehicles over thousands of meters in battles against a friend, artificial intelligence, or yourself.

name: Cook Dungeon
description: Cook dungeon is a highly Random Dungeon exploration type roguelike game that makes you crazy! There is only one mission for you! Save the princess in the dungeon!

name: 末日临晓/The Dawn
description: The Dawn is an interactive game. In the end-time background, how do you survive in the face of various indescribable horror monsters? Faced with the intertwining of human good and evil, what is your choice? In Dawn of the end, everything will have an answer.

name: Lust of the Apartment Wives
description: A small apartment complex...The type that might exist anywhere... Our main character is a grocery deliveryman who's polite demeanor and pleasant smile. But his smile is not as innocent as it seems... He has an ulterior motive...Sampling some of these finely aged apartment wives!

name: Nakadashi Banzai
description: Today, he's off to the big city, and on the hunt for girls! Once a target girl has been selected, you'll need to sweet talk her into letting her guard down, ram it inside, and don't forget the creampie! Welcome to the world of Nakadashi Banzai!

name: I Am Your President: Prologue
description: I Am Your President: Prologue is a free narrative strategy simulator. Play as the previous US president, decide the fate of the world and run the country any way you like! Enjoy the unique storyline, make choices and carve your path to victory. Election Day is coming – can you secure your victory?

name: Election simulator
description: Election simulator is a political satire game where you gain Voters by literally throwing cash at problems in society.

name: HAMMY
description: Become an "Internship God" and master HAMMY's life.A group of lovely but ignorant HAMMY, a small island with nothing, all of which will change in your hands. Go to give HAMMY different lives and guide them to different future!

name: Puck Buddies
description: Puck Buddies is a bouncy multiplayer sports game that combines the best elements of hockey and minigolf into non-stop fun. Challenge your friends to pass, shoot, spin and bump into things in this chirpily competitive deflection derby. It's time to bounce!

name: Hooligan Simulator
description: Become a hooligan, get respect in your neighborhood and try any unethical ways can get you rich quick & fast.

name: Not For Broadcast: Prologue
description: Take control of the National Nightly News, as a radical government comes to power. In this immersive, high-pressure, propaganda sim, you control what the people see and determine what’s Not For Broadcast.

name: Easy Hentai
description: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

name: Solar Baron
description: As head of an interplanetary corporation, your goal is to extract resources from across the solar system and bring them home faster and cheaper than your competitors. Construct trade depots and colonies. Build rockets and spaceports. Master realistic orbital mechanics and maximize profits.

name: LRRL or RLLR
description: LRRL or RLLR is a puzzle game in which you enjoy increasing your score by choosing left or right according to one recursive rule. You can enjoy it as long as you don't make the wrong choice. All choices are divided to the left or right when you start, and either contains all of your later choices.

name: aBANdon02
description: When a android named AI marryed with human, she woke up and rebuilt humans.

Descend into the paper dungeons on your own, recruit computer-controlled companions or join other gamers in fast-paced tactical card battles against the armies of darkness and the Archdemon himself!

name: Repo Man VR

Your goal is to help Ollie lose 10kg collecting all the natural and healthy foods and destroying the fast foods that come on Ollie's way. This journey will not be easy, but you will make it!

description: A really cool 3d platform game, lots of extreme adventures with our friend Miner, now we have the option Double Miner and the adventure gets a lot cooler. Director's Cut version has unpublished scenes that have never been seen.

name: Island Explorer VR
description: Island Explorer is a short, relaxing VR experience with no quests, tasks, or enemies to disturb you. Nothing but you and nature... with some tunes. Keep calm, stay relaxed and take a zipline or drive around a beautiful Island.

name: Mystic Hammer
description: Mystic Hammer is a genre mashup of a lane defender strategy game with an Action RPG. Unlock powerful abilities and new characters while following a compelling story throughout multiple environments.

name: PRISON OF SON
description: Prison of son is a text based game and its purpose is to give a small awake to users about their knowledge in history and geography of the world. So have fun and enjoy it.

name: Taurus VR
description: Jump into a thrilling, adrenaline-fuelled VR Space-shooter with Taurus VR, a reimagined retro game for VR.

name: Kari
description: Explore mysterious lands after a magical storm strands you on the shore of Vanaheim. Seek out help from the gods inspired by Norse Mythology in a Singleplayer Combat-Free Adventure-Puzzle Game. A game about helping each other, Kari is developed by students from BUas.

name: Colossals
description: Colossals tells the story of a vagrant, who, together with his love interest, the soon-to-be-Empress Khalida, interpret the fairy tales they read in front of a windmill to be fact, telling them of a faraway land where, once upon a time, giants roamed.

name: Long loot the King
description: Pac-Man inspired retro action horror game about a king, who has to face his own made horrors in the dungeons. All because of his greed and selfishness. YOU REAP WHAT YOU SOW

name: Unlock The King 2
description: The continuation of the successful Unlock The King, now in a tridimensional board. A originally designed puzzle game inspired by Chess. Move the pieces and create a path to Unlock the King.

name: 2DTo3DModelEditor
description: This is a tool to convert multi-layer pixel images into 3D models. You can build your favorite 3D models in the way of pictures without modeling skills. It is a simple and easy-to-use tool to generate models from pixel images

name: Mouse Mayhem Shooting & Racing
description: Help the cute little mouse 'SUEAKY' as he race, shooting and destroying enemies and overcomes hurdles with nothing to lose!

name: Afterbern Democralypse
description: Brawl for a brighter future!

name: Ninja Run
description: Run jump slide and battle your way to a high score in Ninja Run by CooperAce Productions

name: Happy Engine
description: This is a puzzle game that supports extended content !

name: A Space For The Unbound - Prologue
description: Prologue chapter of A Space For The Unbound, an upcoming slice-of-life adventure game with beautiful pixelart set in the late 90s rural Indonesia that tells a story about overcoming anxiety, depression, and the relationship between a boy and a girl with supernatural powers

name: Blocks!: Hammer of the Scots

As English, you seek to pacify Scotland by controlling all important nobles. The Scots also seeks their allegiance to support the struggle for freedom.

name: LoginToShootingRangeInServer00 VR
description: This FPS game is telling a small story. Find the password in the first level then try to survive 100 seconds by shooting down big numbers of robots in the second level. You can find some small easter eggs in the game to know what this server00 world is.

name: Deathground
description: Deathground is a solo and co-op survival horror game that throws players into a desperate battle for survival against deadly AI dinosaurs.

name: Mini Island: Night
description: Mini Island: Night is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty.

name: Necrowarp
description: If you are looking for an epic scaled 80s Scifi/Cyberpunk action shoot'em'brawl opera, fully packed with tons of weapons and customization options, plenty of gore and carnage plus bad and naughty b-movie kind of humor, then this cranky little shooter might be something for you!

name: PyroNinja: Fire Dodge
description: Dodge fireballs for as long as possible and collect coins.

name: The Good Time Garden
description: Explore a throbbing pink world full of strange naked creatures to gather food for your friend in this short, surreal experience.

name: History Racers 2
description: This is a very funny 2D racer game that mixes karting and running gameplay, with historical characters across the world!

name: Crypto: Against All Odds - Tower Defense
description: Crypto: Against all odds is a tower defense game, where you take the role of a cybersecurity expert to fight against hackers and other blockchain threats in this cypherpunk interactive fiction. Combined with squad customization, base/tower building, and simulation. Defend the blockchain!

name: Pet Chan
description: "Pet Chan" is a desktop pendant, Sexy character design, Dynamic character, Change of clothes, Add a layer of sexy to the desktop !

name: Art of Deception
description: Art of Deception is an interactive killer simulator. Deceive, manipulate, steal, substitute others-all methods are good.

name: love the game
description: After being cast into a cold and lonely world, rusty robot (thats you) must prove to a taunting god that even robots can love. Go show him whos boss by opening your heart to the public, chocolates and flowers will best do.

name: Reincarnated As A Monster
description: Reincarnated As A Monster is an RPG game that you became a monster and try to survive in a fantasy world. Uncover the truth about the world, and make your choice to help or destroy others. Of course, it will affect the story's ending. The battle is not just lost or win, but you can also escape from battle!

name: Guardians Of Rings
description: be a magic hero bear and collect hidden magic rings and avoid different powerful enemies

name: Awesome Pea 2
description: Greedy Pea is back in game! Dark dungeons, deadly traps, everything is green, a lot of gold everywhere!

name: Sick Way
description: Sick Way is a hardcore game about a guy stuck in an abandoned school

name: HELLO PLAYER
description: A little nice adventure spoiled by bloggers! Help me reach them and make them my friends by using various mechanics of movement! Also game absolutely doesn't have the fourth wall!

name: Law Law Land
description: An adventure about a factory worker, who becomes the most influential politician in the country.

name: Ascent Free-Roaming VR Experience
description: A premium highly-immersive VR experience developed for haptic feedback via motion floors, body suits and climate control. Go it alone or play with up to four friends in LAN co-op to destroy the infestation at the FuriCorp Research facility.

name: One Gun Guy
description: One Gun Guy is a straight forward no nonsense action platformer, one giant level littered with player upgrades, hazards to tackle, enemies to destroy, a boss to kill, and multiple difficulty settings.

name: Nine Circles of Hell
description: A simple strategy game: rotate a ring, align the notches and your marbles fall towards the center. Drop all your marbles through the central hole and you win.

name: Jitsumi's Gaming Overlay
description: Jitsumi's Gaming Overlay is a lightweight program that is meant to provide conveniences to gamers around the world. We do this by allowing users to have quick access to default apps or custom user-added programs and allow quick access to make other features with a click of a button.

name: Fright
description: Move around a hauntred maze trying to find books of power.

name: The Disguiser Of Fate
description: Windward_Birds' new game, The Disguiser Of Fate. Is a traditional fantasy RPG game.

name: My Home VR
description: This game is a VR relaxation game. You can freely replace the furniture and create your own space. Enjoy a wonderful VR experience surrounded by beautiful scenery.

name: I Have Lived
description: Welcome to the end of an unnamed world. Its last wishes have materialized as two entities. Become a part of their journey and give the world another chance by recollecting the world's remaining Essences.

name: BadLads
description: BadLads is a neo-noir multiplayer roleplay game centered around each player having their own job. Cities are ruled by President. Civilians are assaulted by Gangs and protected by Police. Adventure, collect, craft, base build, gamble, socialize, overthrow, customize yourself and your belongings.

name: Making*Lovers
description: Making*Lovers A story about the way love can bloom after dating begins. The focus in Making*Lovers is on the things that come after a relationship's beginning. With "start dating, then fall in love" as the concept, you will work towards the moment when love truly blooms.

name: Shady Lewd Kart
description: Shady Lewd Kart takes go karting party games and mashes it with a dating sim to give you fast power sliding game play, sexy power-ups and lewd unlocks. The first ever Ecchi Kart game!

name: 乔乔的铁拳 Joe's Fists
description: Defeat enemies, dodge obstacles, destroy institutions ... how will you break through to reach the end

name: Dimension of Dreams
description: "Dimension of Dreams" is a unique strategy card game with rogue-like elements. You play an adventurer who embarks on an exhilarating journey through the dream world, where you engage in thrilling, fluid combat. Obtain and add cards strategically to your deck via exploration and upgrading existing cards.

name: メモリーズオフ-Innocent Fille- for Dearest
description: 『メモリーズオフ -Innocent Fille-』のファンディスクは、これまでのシリーズ作品と同様に各エンディングの続きをお届けするオムニバスストーリー。

name: Armorgeddon
