description: In the game, a large number of enemy troops will continue to hunt you down !! you have only one purpose!! kill all the enemies !! Now !! Be mentally prepared !! You are about to land on the battlefield !!

name: Wteruna
description: A turn-based game, role-playing. Through the role-playing way to deduce a depraved love and hatred of morality or humanity.

name: City Sniper
description: This is a first person shooting game. The player plays a soldier,Players are surrounded by enemies, and they are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can dodge the enemy's attack, or kill the enemy to survive as much as possible.

name: Explode On Contact
description: Ventur through the levels with a robot character. But be careful, your robot buddy will explode if they hit those spikes.

name: Nimoyd - Survival Sandbox
description: You’ve crash-landed on Earth in 2702. Craft, dig, fight through a vast and colorful post-apocalyptic open world full of wonder, generated cities, dungeons, aliens, mechs, and an underworld. Find love. Or beat the ultimate Underlord!

name: Beautiful Light
description: Beautiful Light is a hardcore multiplayer tactical first-person shooter with a deep horrific atmosphere. Featuring player versus player, puzzle-solving and complexe situation to achieve various objective on a horrific run to survive.

name: Let Them Trade
description: You, on behalf of the king, need to construct flourishing towns and ensure steady supply and demand of their goods! By doing that, you attract cunning tradesmen to trade between your settlements and - in turn - pay a decent amount of customs to you!

name: Election Year Knockout
description: Become President in this hilarious Punch-Out-inspired political sim where all laws have been replaced with boxing! Each opponent has unique tactics and special moves to test your skill and strategy on your way to the White House! Form your own third party and hit the campaign trail. Literally.

name: Epocria
description: An infinite open world survival game for 1-8 players to explore. Journey into the deepest caves, enter alternate dimensions, and release an ancient evil's grasp on the world of Epocria.

name: Living Legends Remastered: Ice Rose Collector's Edition
description: Return to Rosemount to stop the Ice Queen this updated classic!

name: Underfire
description: Underfire is a dynamic multiplayer team war game. You have to fight on stragic maps using various weapons up to 8 players. By correctly managing your current arsenal and skills, you must lead your team to victory!

name: Einsteins Riddle
description: A pure, simple game of logic and deduction. Random generated puzzles enables unlimited replay. Custom board layouts let you adjust the difficulty and time needed to solve a puzzle.

name: Really Trash Game
description: The Mafia wages war on you! Cut your way through cohorts of gangs and dirty cops in this bloody battle. Grab the guns, use the med kits to heal your wounds, and try to survive.

name: Slimes
description: A game about two guys that hate each other.

name: FM
description: A mysterious radio announcer describes a recent murder-suicide as the unknown protagonist navigates through an ever-shifting environment.

name: CryptoClickers: Crypto Idle Game
description: CryptoClickers is a complex Incremental Game revolved around Cryptocurrencies that's full of unique game modes, upgrades, challenges, events, and a double layer prestige system!

name: Aternia: Deep
description: Aternia: Deep – a successor to immortal genres of roguelike and hack & slash. Take on a role of the Protagonist, imprisoned in an ancient dungeon’s Depths. Bring down throngs of enemies to finally reach the surface and your homeland, Aternia.

name: Pursuit of Redemption
description: Join the journey of S, a drawing boy searching for his creator and help him find his painter. Unfold the memories of your maker to uncover the mystery behind his vanishing, find your way out of a confusing maze, and ascend through the darkness in an emotional Hand-Drawn platformer puzzle adventure.

name: The Lost Marble
description: The Lost Marble is a platformer in which the player controls an intrepid marble. Roll fast, hop gaps, push cubes, explore and avoid enemies to find the goal of each level. Create and share levels too! Includes 20 hand-made levels, unlockable marbles, and an in-game level editor.

name: Be My Mom - maternity simulator, take care of your child
description: Become a mother and experience the best of maternity. The game for future mothers, so they know what to expect and also for their partners, so they can experience things their women do. The adventure begins just as you see the pregnancy test is positive.

name: Schlag den Star - Das 2. Spiel
description: SCHLAG DEN STAR is finally going to the next round. ELTON and the studio shine in a completely new graphic design and are therefore more beautiful and realistic than ever.

name: Dreams Keeper Solitaire
description: Rescue children from nightmares! Classic Solitaire set in the dream dimension! Choose the abilities that suit you, literally!

name: Rainbow Hills
description: An old school platformer inspired by the greats of the 80s. Rainbow Hills focuses on a tight controls, smart level design, good game feel, and bubbles!

name: Rompe
description: Rompe! is a platform game where everything you touch breaks! destroy and rebuild the world around you to escape the dungeon!

name: World End Echo
description: A visual novel in the world of post-apocalypse with match 3 games, in which you meet beautiful girls for every taste and get to know them better by beating the levels.

name: Awkward Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: WWII: Rising
description: Become a hero during WWII in an Epic Online Multiplayer battles. Play up to 4 different maps with 4 game modes. You can choose to support your teammates with the support class or either fight off the enemy from a long distance with the Recon. The battle has started, come and fight for your country.

name: Sky Beneath
description: This narratively driven puzzle platformer puts you in the role of Cassie, an intrepid scavenger seeking salvage in abandoned mining facilities. Embark on an adventure with your inventor friend Annie, take control of the gravity, and solve challenging puzzles in a mysterious sci-fi setting.

name: Cannonship
description: Cannonship is an action-packed shootout in which your plane must fight a horde of enemies. You can fight your opponents alone or with another player. Upgrade your ship and tip the balance of victory to your side! Will you accept the challenge?

name: Cult of the Lamb
description: Start your own cult in a land of false prophets, venturing out into diverse and mysterious regions to build a loyal community of woodland worshippers and spread your Word to become the one true cult.

name: Enchantress
description: Enchantress - A Psychological Thriller Game. Play as Megan Sterling in her journey to discover the secrecy hidden within the walls of WhiteRose Orphanage. Lose yourself with different discoveries and beware you don't meet a similar fate.

name: Shop Tycoon
description: Shop Tycoon lets you build, furnish and run your own shop. Hire employees, order goods and face various challenges on the way to success! Develop your business, discover new districts and try to meet the expectations of new customers.

name: Rubikingdom
description: Run your very own kingdom on a rubik's cube. Collect resources to develop your kingdom. Fight off raiders. Face events like famine, disease, and corruption of the land. Buy a favor from your god, pay tribute, or ignore them and feel their wrath. How long will you reign?

name: ODIA
description: Slaughter the defenders of this dark land to claim the Cathedral. Utilize arcane weapons and dark magic to smite your enemies in this hardcore retro FPS inspired by early first-person shooter games.

name: The Passage Of Time
description: Challenge the passage of time and try to survive in dark dungeons while fighting with their inhabitants. Create unique weapons, develop skills and explore caves. But be careful - time is running out ...

name: Golden Moon
description: Golden Moon is an old school, 3D Third-Person puzzle platformer game about finding treasure and working your way past ancient robots, booby-traps, and other menaces.

name: Paper Shakespeare: Very Naked Hamlet
description: So, like, either know Shakespeare's Hamlet, or don't get laid. That's it. That's the game.

name: The United SPACE of America
description: The United SPACE of America is a high action, arcade style, run-n-gun bullet hell, twin stick shooter that allows you to absorb enemy bullets with your Proton Sabre while you blast through countless enemies and unlock new abilities. There's air dashing, giant Proton Shots and more!

name: Eternity Convergence
description: Eternity Convergence is a Sci-fi RPG. The player begins their journey as a pilot in the human controlled galaxy of Ennae. After building up a crew and a small fleet of ships the player can explore hundreds of planets and a number of galaxies to uncover a plot that is preparing to consume all life.

name: Hyde and Zeke
description: Hyde and Zeke is a stealth game about a boy using light magic to escape a dark castle. The stakes are higher though as a cloaked figure chases him through the castle.

name: Spooky Spins Deluxe Steam Edition
description: Spooky Spins Deluxe is a 4x5 reel, 40 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Spooky theme oriented from left to right.

name: OMG: One Million Guns
description: OMG: One Million Guns is a fast-paced, 2D, top-down, twin-stick shooter set in space, with LOTS of guns. Blast your way through waves of enemies with a multitude of weapons at your disposal. Full controller support included.

name: ハンターハーツ Hunter Hearts
description: Have you ever had that feeling of looking back in the past? Well, Hunter Hearts is about the past of the protagonist, before the tragedy happend. Find out in this visual novel what he's been going through.

name: Zoo World VR
description: Intentio Education Game Studios gives you a passport to all parts of our vibrant planet. As you crisscross the globe you’ll be able to study and learn about the native species while you help out your new four-legged friends through a series of challenging, environmental-themed quests.

name: Jackalope
description: Jackalope - is a psychological horror, with supernatural elements. You have to survive in a dangerous forest and not go crazy, defend yourself from monsters, solve puzzles and be prepared for the worst. You can play Jackalope alone or with your friends (up to 4 people).

name: Beodara
description: You and your opponent will control a character who will be able to gather resources with different aims : build your village, hire peasants as well as knights and many other soldiers.

name: Music Ball
description: The "MusicBall" game, fun music arcade game with many levels. Thanks to carefully selected music and addictive gameplay, the developers managed to achieve an incredible experience for the players!

name: Robot Invasion
description: Robot Invasion is a game set in the near future when robots have invaded Earth. There are robots everywhere and they are deadly. Avoid them at all costs.

name: Couple in Trouble
description: Challenge yourself in a world of obstacles and dangers, test your skills in a fun and challenging game.

name: Little Terror
description: Little Terror is an interactive exploration Horror simulator. Interrogate every detail of a seemingly normal house to discover the story of the people who live there.

name: Wrap It!
description: Beat your high score by traversing a genitalia through a wave of STDs.

name: Return to Sector 9
description: Spread across a campaign mode and 8 mini games, take on a variety of missions from bug hunts, protection detail, desperate last stands and rescue missions!

name: Zero-G Gunfight
description: A 2D arena shooter set in outer space where you use your guns to move and kill each other! Prepare yourself for the fast paced arenas of Zer0-G Gunfight where only the best will survive and bring their nations one set closer to intergalactic supremacy!

name: Pink Island
description: Pink Island is a one small hold & Gun, boss Rush mini-game of Casual difficulty.

name: Astro Dash
description: A colourful retro physics game for causal and pro gamers alike. Whizzing round the cosmos in your flying saucer dodging asteroids, black holes, cannon fire & assorted obstacles picking up crystals. Thrusting, dodging & speeding through the 30 obstacle filled levels.

name: Cruel Galaxy: Discordia
description: Cruel Galaxy: Discordia is a turn-based role-playing game, including tactical space combat, strategic elements and original story, filled by despair.

name: Autumn-Chess
description: The single player self-propelled chess game template and experimental works made by myself contain the basic elements of self-propelled chess game. However, due to the lack of funds, the monster setting and ending screen were not done.

name: Don't Be Afraid - The First Toy
description: Don't Be Afraid - The First Toy, is an introduction to the dramatic story of a boy kidnapped by a psychopath. Exploring the giant house of your torturer you will soon discover things worse than your childish nightmares. Take on the role of Jamie and see what phrase “The First Toy” actually means.

name: HIVE
description: Take on the role of a man forced to take down the Hive-mind that has taken over the world - One monster at a time.

name: Escape from the hospital
description: Escape from the hospital is a small quest puzzle. You find yourself in an abandoned hospital for unknown reasons and you have no choice but to start looking for a way out. On your way you will meet various monsters and not difficult puzzles. The playing time is about 30-40 minutes.

name: Their Radiance
description: Their Radiance is an unconventional walking simulator about love.

name: Arena Experiment
description: Arena Experiment puts you in the role of a participant in a reality show, where your only task is to survive in a closed zones called Arenas for as long as you can.

name: 看白海豚的好日子 A Perfect Day for White Dolphin
description: 改編自乾綠郎的小說《完美的蛇頸龍之日》。 在這個時代，人們可以透過SC裝置和植物人進行感應。 感應淺者知道自己正在虛擬世界之中；感應深者，則會分不清虛幻與現實。 即使如此，黃芷欣還是決定和植物人弟弟芷樂進行感應，她必須找出芷樂自殺的原因。

name: Lost Alone
description: You are an intern headed to a secret military lab. Your plane crashes into a helicopter on arrival and you are the only survivor. Now you must hunt down different items to survive. But it's not so simple.

name: Embracelet
description: Travel to northern Norway, solve puzzles using a mysterious, magical bracelet and make new friends on your journey to discover the past - and yourself!

name: The Wake: Mourning Father, Mourning Mother
description: The Wake is a record of past wounds opened at a three-day funeral. The journal is encoded with a simple substitution cipher that the player must break in order to reveal the writer’s psyche and discover the contradictions that define him.

name: Drone Zone
description: Multiplayer team-based tactical shooter in a postapocaliptic world. Create modules and use them for assembling battle drones. Fight for resources in a world full of hostile anomalies. Use active skills and get advantage depending on which enemy module you have destroyed.

name: Desecrators
description: Desecrators is a fast-paced sci-fi co-op shooter. Pilot nimble gunships through alien derelicts while facing a wide roster of deadly enemies.

name: The Hunter's Journals - Red Ripper
description: A diplomatic mission...with a lethal twist!

name: Swarm
description: The Network has been infested. Face a giant creature ruled by music to cleanse it. Fight while switching between 2 complementary Game Modes!

name: Helwyr
description: Embark on an adventure traversing the town of Nevstell and its surrounding areas to uncover the dark secrets behind this world and uncover the truth behind your past.

name: Friendly Fire
description: Can you save the world from an unknown destiny?

name: The Forsaken Ruins
description: The Forsaken Ruins is a first-person atmospheric horror game. As prisoner of Ever-Bleed Keep, your chance to escape has come. Delve deep into the ruins and try to survive long enough to unravel its dark history and your true identity.

name: Bubble Tea : game for thinking and imagination
description: Let's find legendary bubble tea to cure grandpa! This is a puzzle RPG Maker game that take you on an adventurous journey across the world, through various dangers to find legendary treasures according to Grandpa's orders.

name: lost cube
description: The game uses the experience of a cube to enter an unknown space and escape to illustrate the relationship between matter and consciousness. When the consciousness is stronger, it can break through the bondage of material and become a God.

name: Boreal Tenebrae Act I: “I Stand Before You,  A Form Undone”
description: Delve into the dream of a dying town in 'Boreal Tenebrae' , a retro-style adventure with horror elements.

name: Image To Normal Map
description: A convenient tool for game design, which can convert 2D plate into normal map of picture, and display tool of WYSIWYG

name: Sexual Void
description: Nothing in here, except Vicky, sexy outfits and a JOI game

name: DRazor
description: Defend the energy planet from the orbs. An easy to play but difficult to master casual game.

name: RussianPunk 2007
description: The worker from the factory thought like everyone else that 2007 will not be returned!Until he accidentally stumbled upon magic mushrooms on his way home.

name: Dark Existence
description: Dark Existence is an upcoming multiplayer atmospheric horror game. You will be able to walk the halls of horror alongside your friends and share the horrifying experience together.

name: Slime Climb
description: A terrible storm has compromised the alchemist's tower. This is your chance! Jump, glide, and bounce your way through 20+ stages to get out at the top! The other slimes got stuck though, so don't leave them behind!

name: Long Car Journey - A road trip game
description: Traverse the never-ending desert searching for provisions. Look for fuel, fix the engine, pay attention to the battery, change the turbo charger! Explore abandoned buildings, sell the objects you find, check the condition of your car. Collect provisions and hide them at home!

name: Apollon 88
description: Apollon 88 is a 2D Top-Down, survival, shooter game. You play as 88, where your goals are to survive by destroying the one who hunts you.

name: Hentai Monster Quiz
description: This is a quiz game in which you can meet the beautiful 10 ladies.

name: Virus Madness - Dungeons of your Body
description: Fight your way through vicious viruses, bacterias to save all humanity in this cute shooter game. Advance through dungeons of your body and destroy them all

name: Johann Weiss
description: Caught off guard, Johann Weiss had his sister kidnapped by the LaVey Order, a satanic cult led by Behemoth LaVey who's going to sacrifice her to Satan to summon Hell on Earth. In this take on Metroidvania and early Duke Nukem games, you must help Johann save his sister Joanna from LaVey.

name: Mine Trap Reborn
description: An arcade-style PvE platformer, with 130 differing levels. Dig, trap, and fill blobs to drop them to their doom, and to take you onward to victory! 100% of proceeds are currently going to a charity, read description of game for details.

name: Tankfight
description: Put down all the enemy tanks coming towards you! Collect points. A tank game that won't tire you on quarantine days.

name: Jumperbird
description: The boxes you do not crash will earn you points. Each score you earn will prove how good your reflexes are. You have to go through the space between the boxes.

name: Haymaker
description: Haymaker is an 80s boxing game that takes place in the blue-collar rustbelt town of Kint. You play as Jackie Elliot, a 21-year-old who's impressionable life is swaying between corruption and commitment; the path to becoming a great boxer, or the path of crime. Your choice, your story.

name: Handy Harry's Haunted House Services
description: Team up with up to 8 friends online to explore the haunted, randomly generated depths of these dusty attics. Find and repair the objectives, flip the master switch and escape before the ghastly ghoul that lurks in the darkness catches up to you. Experience procedural AI, jump scares and levels!

name: Tank Battle
description: Drive a tank, destroy enemy, defend your homeland. Act alone or co-op with a friend and have fun!

name: The Sight in a mirror
description: 'The Sight in a mirror' is a game that collects items and escapes from the monster's house. Find the location of the monster with a mirror at home and find a way to escape!

name: Hedera
description: HEDERA is a story-driven 2D horror game about dealing with trauma through dreams and videogames.

name: disc party
description: Disc Party is an online multiplayer disc golf arcade game. Compete with your friends on windy, procedurally generated islands and find out who's the best disc golfer!

name: Booklice: Prologue
description: Follow Liz the Librarian in this thrilling narrative adventure game about murder and ancient books. Explore many places, meet interesting characters, and find a dangerous agent of the Order gone rogue.

name: Valiantia
description: Valiantia is a role-playing game. Solve the puzzles. Altis, a female knight, and you, Leonale as her confidant, were ordered to do missions. You can help her ease the problems, making the decision, or make them more complicated. Her fate depends on you.

name: The Adventures of Eggbert
description: Help Eggbert collect eggs and keep them safe until they hatch. Avoid the pesky foxes - they’re out to get you!

name: 动绘（Drawing）
description: Drawing is a brand new video puzzle game, where you can experience the excitement and happiness brought by artworks.

name: Into the TIMEVERSE
description: Into the TIMEVERSE is a hard non forgiving action platformer game. Into the TIMEVERSE is a constant"runner" game that you need to match your color to the appropriate color of the enemy platforms. Expect to die a lot in this game.

name: Family Mysteries 3: Criminal Mindset
description: Take on a role of a famous scientist drawn into a dangerous game, where the goal is to save the mankind and uncover family secret. Get ready for a pulse-pounding adventure in the world of experiments, mysteries and espionage!

name: Decently Bad Tower Defense
description: This is a bad short Tower Defense game made from scratch as a new game developer. This game does all the basic things you expect from a tower defense. We have 3 types of enemies and 3 types of tower to destroy them with. Strategic placement of the towers will make your victory certain.

name: logiCally
description: Test your skills in this challenging game of logic, observation and mental calculation. Solve problems of increasing difficulty and exceed your limits. How far can you get?

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 10
description: Enjoy a beautiful collection of Hidden Object Scenes and puzzles set in the great outdoors. Tidy up the Park and do your bit for the environment by collecting all the bonus trash items to Recycle. Earn extra bonuses for finding all the Lost & Found items scattered around the Park

name: Lorera
description: Hook your way through the colorful world of Lorera and solve its biggest mystery. From a little flower to a vicious warrior, Lorera is all about growth and persevering your way through obstacles.

name: Space Probes
description: Space Probes is a Shoot Em Up (SHMUP) inspired by productions from the 90s released on SNES, MEGADRIVE, NEO-GEO, PC-ENGINE etc.

name: Creature Lab
description: Conduct crazy experiments in the Creature Lab! Mix mutagens, analyze their properties, grow bodyparts, and attach them to your test subjects. Manage your inventory, expand your lab, and make sure your hideout is safe. Send your creations into the city to obtain necessary salvage and test subjects!

name: Video Editor Tycoon
description: based on tycoon games, this one provides a way for you to manage a video publishing company, where your mission is to maintain a financial balance in the face of monthly payments and also a professional balance for employees who are not fired

name: Finding Fido: The Journey
description: Join the quest to find your dog! Featuring fun environments to explore, strange characters, and riddle to solve.

name: Elliot
description: Elliot is a colourful 2D platformer inspired by 16-bit classics, with a touch of hardcore. Don't be misled by appearances: it's a colorful game, but really it's technicolor hell!

name: CORONAVIRUS BATTLEGROUNDS: Covid-19 News
description: The first coronavirus online game. Run away from sources of infection to win, or infect healthy people to prevent them from breaking ahead!

name: Cyber Seraph
description: The alien invaders have launched their final offensive on an already crippled Terra. Only one brave pilot can turn the tide of war. Cyber Seraph is a boss focused vertical shoot 'em up with unlockable abilities.

name: Chromalition
description: Chromalition is a third-person skating platformer where you play as a graffiti artist who can become graffiti and bring graffiti to life. Find and complete graffiti murals around the city, unlock new abilities, and take down Company Corp!

name: Goodbye Volcano High
description: Goodbye Volcano High is a cinematic narrative adventure about love, change, and the end of an era. Guide Fang through their final year of high school as they try to make things right before time is up.

name: Loco Road
description: Have you ever dreamt of participating in a deathrace where everbody blows up??! Me neither! But thanks to the sick minds of our Game Design students now you can do it! In this frenetic game you have to avoid beeing last in each lap or you will die and look bad doing it!

name: Dungeon of Trials
description: Looking for a good, balanced and challenging dungeon crawler? Your quest is over! Dungeon of Trials is the adventure you were looking for! Take the role of the Adventurer's Guild Master and lead a group of four heroes to glory! Face the dangers of the 5 levels of the Labyrinth of Fulerus!

name: Sweet House Love
description: Sweet House Love is a dating game. Do you like dating game ? Try this.

name: Road To Death
description: Shoot and loot your way through the dark while making it to extraction.

name: 西游-琉璃盏
description: This is a plot type interactive game, interspersed with action adventure scenes, with the three worlds of human, demon, ghost and God as the background, telling the story before laosha's journey to the West

name: Far Eastern Federal University Virtual Expo
description: Take a look around and get to know the Far Eastern Federal University, campus life and medical research facilities in this virtual reality experience!

name: Sqwark! A Nutty Adventure
description: Sqwark is just your average Green parrot who lives at 85 Acorn Drive. But when some multidimensional beings show up and attempt to take every delicious nut in the world to use as fuel for their weird and wonderful contraptions, he has to do something about it.

name: Line War
description: A new type of multiplayer RTS-style game with elements from 4X, Wargame, Auto Battler, and Real-Time Tactics genres. Draw commands and execute a superior strategy to win over your opponent without the need for micro-management.

name: Bears In Space
description: Dive headfirst into danger with nothing but your wits, tools and an abundance of weapons as you bring the bullet hell carnage to the oil thirsty Robot Scourge!

name: Devil's dream
description: In Devils's Dream you play as James, a student which want to examine an abandoned place. He and his girlfriend Sophie drove in the late of the Night to the place and get what they hadn't expected. Try to Survive Night. and dont forgot you cannot hide or run from him.

name: The Stone of Madness
description: The Stone of Madness is a hardcore real-time tactics and stealth game set in an ever-changing Spanish Monastery. 5 inmates are imprisoned under different pretences. In order to escape they must face their phobias and risk worsening their conditions before madness completely takes them...

name: EVERGLORY
description: Stockpile resources, build your settlement, raise an army, and wage war in this love letter to RTS classics. Experience the epic story through a fully scripted single-player campaign, then create your own scenarios and write the next chapter yourself.

name: Infinity Imperium
description: Choose your civ, expand your empire, fight for the supremacy, travel through time to change the course of history, discover what’s happened to the Infinitians before the end in this new space RTS!

name: Last Gang Standing
description: Gather up a gang of your friends, build a base, add a factory, add some turrets, add teleporters, doors, foxholes and decorations. Arm yourselves to the teeth and go forth to raze, loot and t-bag all who stand against you. Be the Last Gang Standing

name: MODERN NAVAL COMBAT
description: This game is a naval battle simulation real-time strategy game for military enthusiasts. Our goal is to restore as far as possible a long-sea battle from the 1970s to around 2020.

name: City Eye: Prologue
description: City Eye presents a very detailed urban area, in which you may find that the inhabitants are not as calm and righteous as they look. Use your abilities to prevent any offence and make sure that you can secure peace and order in the city.

name: INFINITE GUITARS
description: INFINITE GUITARS is an Action RPG Rhythm Adventure about Powering up Mechs with Guitar Solos and fighting in Turn-Based Anime Mech Battles!

name: Space Battle
description: It's a frenetic space action game. You must survive the enemies and the dangerous environment. Prepare your arsenal before battle and try to eliminate as many enemies as you can before they do. Trade, explore and survive this challenge!

name: Way of Heroes
description: You have to choose a hero and go through the dungeon levels of the city of Vorms. Collect the unworthy pages of the Book of the Dead and destroy it. Level up the hero and get new magic abilities. Play with other guys on two joysticks and have fun.

name: 3D Math - Ultra
description: Math Ultra - is both simple and complex challenges!

name: Corners
description: A logic game for two or four players. The goal is to get all the balls home faster than other players. Play with friends or with a computer opponent.

name: Shadow of Valhalla
description: Visceral physics-based VR combat set within an ancient realm of Viking lore and mystic powers! Discover magical runes and unlock spells while battling evil forces throughout eternity!

name: New Homestead
description: New Homestead is an online turn-based, strategy game. To build up a functional economy, you have to develop your cities and conquer your enemies on a procedurally generated map!

name: The Hilltop Mansion
description: Can you escape from this cursed mansion? Rely on the clues left by the ancestors to break the curse of the mansion and survive through it!

name: Aphelion
description: Jump into a commander chair and strap in. Explore a vast and changing universe as a Federation combat pilot. Fight your enemies and expand the influence of the Federation across different regions and constellations. Gather resources and research technologies to aid you on a conquest of the frontier.

name: Axegend：Episode I
description: Axegend：Episode I is a Rogue-lite action strategy game. The game is inspired by Orcs Must Die.Play as the knight, kill the orcs and save the princess!

name: Gun Master
description: Gun Master is an independent game of strategic shooting type.There are many game levels, and it has a wealth of firearms.

name: Wizardry: The Five Ordeals
description: Simplified dungeon crawler world is here ! This game which comes from 2006, is now available on Steam with scenario editor and some modern UI improvements.

name: Hentai Roguelike
description: A Naughty Roguelite with an MMO style Gameplay

name: Ruth's Journey
description: Ruth's Journey is a free demo set in the timeline of The Long Way Home, made by Nifty Llama Games. Embark on a journey with Ruth, an adventurous hobbyist photographer, as she escapes her boring office job to chase down the rare Golden Finch.

name: Mesmer
description: A unique revolution simulator where every encounter matters. Mesmer! The pearl of the old world. At least it used to be. But this city has failed its people. Unite the people, spark a revolution and storm the castle. Build a better Mesmer.

name: West Legends
description: Wild West Theme, MOBA Shooter, Various Modes, Battle Anytime, Anywhere.

name: The Medic
description: The Medic™. The first Coronavirus-themed topdown/platformer published on Steam. Can you beat the anti-vaxxers and the virus to save the Earth?

name: 鲸走：前篇 Whale Left Part 1
description: To become Alice's friend!

name: 时间卡牌  TimelineCard
description: In time card, what you have to do is to keep moving forward, explore and use all kinds of combats to attack the enemy's weakness. This game allows players to experience the fun of cards from the perspective of martial arts.It is strategic and easy to operate, but the game is difficult.

name: Consternation II
description: After an unfortunate accident at Sorley Paper Mill, the facility was abandoned and left to rot. Multiple urban explorers venture into the facility, never to be heard from again. Police eventually walled off the mill in order to keep trespassers out... Or to keep something in...

name: Cyber Ops Prologue
description: Become a military hacker and help your black ops team reach their goal in this noir cyberpunk tactical game. Scan, hack, overtake, control and manage high tech devices, vehicles and even enemy cyborgs with cutting-edge implants.

name: Nightmare Simulator 2 Rebirth
description: You have lost your memories. You wake up in an unknown town... Try to survive and find the answers you seek on WHO YOU ARE!

name: Misc. A Tiny Tale
description: Join Buddy and BagBoy, two tiny robots made up of miscellaneous items on a heartfelt adventure taking you through their world. Hop chapter to chapter, meeting a quirky cast of characters along the way while collecting cogs to repair gates. A tiny tale, a big adventure!

name: Bhop PRO
description: BhopPRO is an amazing game mode where players have to jump on blocks

name: Rooster Rampage
description: Rooster Rampage is a chicken based zombie shooter. Engage your inner chicken in the single player campaign to fend off hordes of zombies across amazing chicken inspired worlds, or locate a nearby Rampage in action!!

name: Dungeon Throne
description: Explore procedurally generated dungeons. Retrieve artifacts and use your magic to fight your way through the dungeon. Rescue prisoners and destroy the dungeons.

name: Succubus Hotel
description: Due to a poker game, the powerful succubus Carmilla is close to losing her precious hotel. Now, you need to Follow her life trying to Collect Fragments of Desire from humans, at the same time she teaches Corina, a young Neko maid, how to be slut. Can you do that before the 31st day?

name: Orbals
description: Orbals is a fast-paced, rolling adventure puzzle game with wonderful graphics and sound. Quickly solve puzzles to master the Mojometer, find new Orbals characters and unlock special abilities.

name: Out of Shapes
description: A derpy, dialogue-heavy RPG with multiple endings and choices with consequences, set in a factory run by robots.

name: Knight Bewitched 2
description: Knight Bewitched 2 is a jRPG featuring the story of a group of heroes and mercenaries as they work together to restore a lost kingdom and face a new threat in the world of Ambrose.

name: In-Home Streaming
description: In-Home Streaming allows the user to view videos on the device to other devices in the network allowing for easy streaming with no other login or downloads on devices except for an internet search page.

name: Empire of the Wicked
description: A magical challenging indie top-down RPG where you have to dismantle the Empire of the Wicked by leveling up, completing quests, training skills, slaying bosses and collecting items/equipment. Compete online with other players in the gladiator arena to claim exclusive rewards!

name: Deer Hunter xTreme Focal Plane
description: It's open season! The deer are overpopulating as we speak. Sgt. O'doyle must thin the herd!

name: GUN JAM
description: GUN JAM is a rhythm first-person shooter where the player must shoot to the beat to survive. It features an original core mechanic and firefights choreographed to the soundtrack in a vibrant world. Prepare to obliterate enemies whilst blasting to the beat.

name: Rolling Cube
description: Can you help the red cube to sprint toward the end while crowding out another pile of obstacles? By only moving from left to right, the excitement of gameplay can reach beyond your wildest imagination.

name: Halloween Horrors Deluxe Steam Edition
description: Halloween Horrors Deluxe is a 5 reel, 25 payline slot machine (pokie) with a Scary theme oriented from left to right.

name: Journey to the Centre of the Cell
description: The Journey to the Centre of the cell takes users on a journey to the microscopic world. Explore the surface and interior of a cancer cell, exploring and learning about cellular anatomy and processes.

name: Kalidazkoph
description: Cleaning up in your attic you find strange VHS tapes on which are recorded some experiments. Understand the secrets surrounding these tapes and understand the purpose of the dimension machine.

name: Corona Runner
description: As part of a government experiment, your rover has been shrunk down to microscopic size to find a cure for the evil Covid-19. Unfortunately, while you are exploring the inner surface of your patient's lungs, the Novel Coronavirus strikes! Dodge angry virus balls for as long as you can!

name: Cyberspace: Infinite
description: Cyberspace: Infinity is a strategy-oriented idle game. Multiple automatic combat systems can be easily played without complex operations. Dominate the world with your legendary team, let your enemies know who is the real champion of cyberspace!

name: Speedrun
description: You're trapped in underground cities! Run and use your special dash movement to survive.

name: The Legend of HyperStar
description: The Legend of HyperStar is a roguelike,Darksoul like indiegame.Play a well-trained, beautiful and powerful brave girl, challenge various levels. Get more powerful props, strengthen runes and skills, and get better weapons and equipment in random events.

name: Costa's Classic Cosmic Pizzas
description: A wacky 2D platformer about delivering pizza in space and saving the galaxy! Journey throughout the Omnicluster Space Station to deliver within the time guarantee and on a limited oxygen supply.

name: Rogue Robots
description: A roguelite twin-stick shooter. Your mission is to defeat the cops gone mad in this action-packed game. Beware, their mission is to destroy humanity. The fate of the whole mankind is in your hands. Are you brave enough to take on the mission?

name: 一星的我与最强地下城
description: 测试文档

name: Kinda Heroes: The cutest RPG ever!
description: Side-View & Scroll RPG made with love!

name: Cybxus Heart
description: Cybxus Hearts inspired by classic Japanese shooting games. This is a game where you control three different characters at the same time.

name: Simple Machines
description: Simple Machines is a minimalist physics puzzle game.

name: Queerskins: a love story
description: Take an emotional journey down a country road in rural Missouri along with Ed and Mary-Helen, Sebastian’s parents. Uncover Sebastian’s life as you interact with his belongings found in the box next to you. Was he a “disgrace” like his father says or a “good man” as his mother believes?

name: Hanoi Puzzles: Solid Match
description: A new game concept inspired by the classic Tower of Hanoi. Assemble towers stacking pieces of the same color on a hexagonal board with a mysterious and relaxing atmosphere.

name: Dark Sales
description: Dark Sales is a 2D action RPG that takes place in a modern office setting.

name: Rift Runner
description: Rift Runner is a fast-paced precision platformer built for speedrunning! Shave valuable milliseconds off your time by discovering hidden paths as you deal with falling spikes, icy platforms, crumbling towers and more! Activate the Chrono Echo for the ultimate timed challenge!

name: Quartet
description: A series of unlikely train robberies. A mysterious deck of cards. A fleet of deadly airships. An accidental mage. Choose from four stories, in any order, and see how they eventually intertwine in this turn-based RPG.

name: Agence
description: Agence places the fate of artificially intelligent creatures in your hands. Will you help to maintain their peaceful existence, or throw them into a state of chaos? A dynamic film that merges cinematic storytelling, artificial intelligence, and user interactivity, Agence is never the same twice.

name: Craft city
description: Sandbox game. Build, destroy, have fun. Create huge buildings. Create huge worlds. Several types of blocks are available: 1.brick 2.concrete 3.tree 4.metal

name: Bust a date
description: Bust a date is an adult dating sim in POV, you are the protagonist!

name: Drive & Drift
description: Fasten your seatbelts and here we go! Drive & Drift is a simulation game that will allow you to drive one of many available vehicles!

name: Orb Overload
description: Go on a adventure through outer space in Orb Overload. Play, make and discover planets in this journey to get back to your ship while not dying from oxygen by connecting to Orbs!

name: Possession 1881
description: Demon sigils. Talking dolls. Delve into the dark world of Possession 1881, a point and click puzzle adventure. A game about intellect, art, and the occult in the Victorian Era. Science, history, and art all inspired numerous unique puzzles that will dare your mind to find new connections.

name: BorderCollie Game
description: BorderCollies are great dogs. Here you can play FETCH! with your virtual friend. Walk your dog - see your dog jump over benches, running through rivers and try 5 different dog toys. This FMV (FullMotionVideo) game is the real BorderCollie experience!

name: Pizza Heroes (Closed Beta)
description: Pizza Heroes is an action multiplayer team arena game. Hone your skills and clutch up for your team in a variety of fun game modes. Play for FREE now! Choose from a variety of classes to reflect your gamestyle.

name: ArrowBall
description: ArrowBall is a fast-paced Arrow-Sports game where you use explosive arrows and acrobatics to outmaneuver your opponents and control THE BALL. Engage in 1v1 or 2v2 local multiplayer battles across a variety of unique Stages. Run, jump, slow time, build up your Super Bar, and unleash your Super Arrow!

name: Frop
description: Join Frop as he adventures through mountains, dungeons, and many other places. What's happening in the Kingdom? What's this dark essence? This game will have you solving puzzles, learning spells, battling in a turn based manner, and crafting.

name: Rain City
description: Rain City is a point-and-click adventure game. The player is taking the role of a cat who comes to the Rain City - where it rains all year round - to find his missing sister. During the journey, the player will meet different people and witness various, bizarre stories.

name: ISOLAND: The Amusement Park
description: ISOLAND: The Amusement Park is the latest installment of Isoland series from CottonGame, featuring the classic and unique art style, and intriguing puzzles. As always, Isoland: The Amusement Park has a second-run mode, which presents puzzles and paths different from the first play-through.

name: THE KNIGHT OF QUEEN
description: Dive into the world of old-school RPG in VR !! Become the Hero of her majesty the Queen, and travel to defeat the evil Devil King, bringing peace to the world !!

name: Indoor Sniper Shooting Alpha Strike in Corona Virus Lockdown
description: You are the last commando left in the combat in which you need to kill all the enemies who are trying to surmount your country. Be a brave army commando, ambush and kill the enemies before they kill you .Step into the arena and get ready for an all out battle.

name: Street Sniper
description: Give it your best shot with Street Sniper First Person Shooter (FPS Shooting) game and take contract to shoot all the unjust dishonest and make the world a better place to live.

name: Not My President - Level 1
description: This is a 3D-action-shooter. You were sent to a foreign planet to free the kidnapped Earth people. Find all the rocket parts. Assemble the rocket. Free all captives and put them in the rocket. Start the countdown and try not to die during this time.

name: Infection Maze / 感染メイズ
description: ‘Infected Maze’ is a zombie FPS game set in a hospital in Japan. The player heads down the randomly generated, maze-like hospital to help his sister, who is in the basement asking for help. The inside of the hospital is filled with zombies. Take down zombies with a gun and sometimes hide from them.

name: DEMON'S SWORD SNAKES -Sweet Dreams of the Cursed Snake-
description: This is a simple fantasy RPG game where you go on a journey with a few girls to break the curse of succubus.

name: 魂之石/Spirit Stone
description: This is a casual adventure game, players can freely choose to go through the gate, hang up, automatic combat, etc., but continue to develop pets and upgrade equipment to make themselves more powerful.By matching pets with different attributes, activate different spirit stones!

name: Choco Pixel 5
description: Choco Pixel 5 is a minimalist colorful puzzle which goal is to get the toy car to the finish using 4 directions in space and avoiding traps.

name: The Unexpected Quest
description: Adventure game with strategy and management elements in a medieval fantasy setting - drawing inspiration from classics such as Warcraft 3 and The Settlers. Embark on quests, hunt down treasures and manage your resources as you build, battle, cast magic and brew potions to bring order to the world.

name: Vetrix
description: This ain't your Grandma's Tetris! Vetrix is a puzzle game inspired by Tetris, but with its own original mechanics built for virtual reality.

name: SEX HENTAI VR
description: SEX HENTAI VR - PORN GAME

name: Sue's Story
description: Sue's Story is a classic sci-fi adventure game in the spirit and tradition of a classic space alien thriller. Awakening on a cryo ship hurtling towards destruction, Sue is thrust into a terrifying game of hide and seek to fix the ship, and dock successfully at the orbital platform.

name: DodgeBall VR
description: The Year is 3020 & Earths way of life has changed forever from the way we know it. Individuals are competing for freedom through your favorite childhood game, Dodgeball...

name: Call of Coronga
description: Have you ever thought about facing hordes of people with the flu with your friends? "Call of Coronga" is Perfect for you. In the game you are given the noble mission of saving the world from the new deadly "corona virus" created in the laboratory. Are you prepared for that?

name: Left on Read
description: It’s March of 2020; you were just sent home from college because of the coronavirus, you have a few small regrets, mainly not telling someone how you really feel.

name: Missing Children | 行方不明
description: Missing Children | 行方不明 is a Japanese horror-themed adventure game about a bully detective searching for reported missing children.

name: Mayhem Brawler
description: Mayhem Brawler is an urban fantasy themed beat 'em up that brings back the 90s arcade vibe to present day. With comic book style art and kick-ass soundtracks, it offers a unique experience that you can tackle solo or as co-op with friends while defining the next step in the story with your choices.

name: 黑色花与红山羊 / Black Datura & Red Goat
description: 苏醒之时，他正处于昏暗的木屋之中。自己的身份、过去的经历，全都无法想起。很快，他发觉自己正处于一个异常的空间，到处都是谜题和陷阱，还有一些古怪的居民。在前行的途中，也不断与同样被困在此处的人成为了同伴。道路的前方，是救赎，还是绝望？这是一个围绕着“诅咒”与“救赎”的故事。

name: Time Agent
description: Use your time power and avoid bullets successfully.

name: Revival: Recolonization
description: Set in a post-apoc version of Earth, Revival is a 4x strategy game where the world and its rules can change at key moments, creating a deep and highly replayable experience.

name: Pledge: Extra credit
description: PLEDGE is a relationship simulator where you manage your time in order to not only boost your personal stats but also interact with other characters. You got 30 days to achieve your goals and it's up to you which path you'll choose.

name: Putin kills: Coronavirus
description: Great showdown 2020: COVID-19 vs BIGCOCK-19

name: Ancient World War
description: This is a Sandbox + Moba Third-Person Game, Players 2 vs 2 compete with each other; Players can create flame towers , city walls and soldiers on the map and You can kill enemy merchants so that enemy players can't buy items.

name: Sea War
description: Sink all the ships that fire at you! Collect points. A ship game that will not tire you on quarantine days.

name: Cemetery War
description: Put down all the monsters coming towards you! Collect points. A monster hunt game that won't tire you on quarantine days.

name: BadBee
description: Race against the clock to the levels exit by crossing the vacant honeycomb sections and avoiding scatter guards. BadBee is an escape game that is full of surprises and extremely addictive.

name: DICHOTOMY
description: Team online game for 4-10 players, about the fight against traitors among the crew.

name: Fireside Hero
description: Can you find and defeat five legendary monsters in twenty days? Plan your moves carefully – the lair may be right in those woods! Buy rumours, hire adventurers, explore the map, and win tactical combats. A compact strategy with an old-school look and a puzzle twist!

name: Diluvian Ultra
description: Battle through a living ship made out of flesh and stone, in this pulse pounding retro first person shooter.

name: Wanderlust: Bangkok Prelude
description: Take your first step toward a great adventure. Play the introduction to the Wanderlust: Travel Stories anthology. See the many faces of Bangkok in a narrative game from the makers of The Witcher, co-created with real-life adventurers.

name: The Hostage
description: Would you dare to be the voice of reason, when somebody's life is on the line? The Hostage is a text-based companion-simulation game, that tells the story of medical assistant, who becomes a hostage of a group of ruthless rebels in the jungles of Africa.

name: Ezaron Defense Alpha
description: A classic 3D Tower Defense fantasy game, made by a very small and dedicated team.

name: Angkor: Celebrations
description: Angkor: Celebrations is a family friendly Match-3 with engaging gameplay. It tells the story of the player’s quests for the ancient heirloom, the ceremonial Kīla.

name: Get Over Blood
description: In this game your main aim is to climb up to the top of a tower. To do this, you should use a blood rope.

name: Boston AInamics
description: HARDCORE!!! The goal of the game it to reach the finish by getting through different obstacles. To do this, teach your robot particular movements - place the icons onto the appropriate place and watch the robot's progress.

name: Freelance Trucker: Insurance Fraud Edition
description: Driving a big rig in a rigged economy has its risks, but that's why you have insurance.

name: Light and Embers
description: Relax. Listen to the crackle of the fire and the chirping of the birds. Add a log or two if the fire starts to burn out. Enjoy a calm and stress-free campfire.

name: ClickCells: CPU girls
description: A casual clicker puzzle simulating real physics.

name: BRAVE PINBALL
description: The world has been changed into pinball by the Demon King? A unique RPG-style pinball game has appeared!

name: Wibbly Witches
description: Wibbly Witches is a fast and frantic couch competition for 2-4 players. Navigate evolving arenas and use magic spells to outsmart your opponents in a wyrd and wobbly battle to the death! Only one witch can claim the tiny crown...

name: Cosmodome
description: Cosmodome: a wrestling inspired, intergalactic, arena-based, ship combat game where the audience decides who wins or loses. Fight with 4 different characters each wielding their own unique ships and weapons.

name: Beyond Hope
description: Pvp tower defense

name: Remedy
description: Remedy is a first person puzzle adventure game where the player awakens in a world of darkness. Solve puzzles to unlock new abilities, areas of the map and guide the orb back to paradise. Use the power of dissolve to transform the plagued world of darkness back to beauty.

name: アルティメットダンジョン「紅」
description: Form a party with your favorite Touhou characters and challenge the dungeon! Characters from "紅魔郷" to "輝針城" are lined up! Are there anyone who will walk through the ultimate dungeon of all 51 areas !?

name: Delores: A Thimbleweed Park Mini-Adventure
description: Delores is back home and working as a photographer for the Nickel News. Thimbleweed Park hasn’t changed at all in the year she’s been away… or has it? Sample Ron Gilbert’s new adventure game engine in this free prototype that uses “found art” from the award-winning Thimbleweed Park.

name: Way To Yaatra
description: Get aboard on a thrilling voyage in search of the truth after the desolation of your village, using spears to climb a huge mountain while you walk the way to Yaatra.

name: Succubus Throne
description: Exciting magic duels in the form of an addictive puzzle game. Have fun stripping lovely succubus!

name: Battle Barn: Tactics
description: Build the ultimate team and battle the barnyard! Saddle up for turn-based tactics, bite-sized battles, and rogue-lite strategy.

name: Lunar Axe
description: After a big earthquake in the city, ruins of an old building collapse and you end up trapped inside an abandoned house. Find a way out and unravel the mystery of inexplicable tremors, revealing ancient secrets and a mystical artifact, before the city is destroyed.

name: Apparitions: Kotsmine Hills
description: Team up with the Peter Wren Agency to find hidden clues and investigate paranormal activity in the town of Kotsmine Hills.

name: Ambush: Convoy Strike
description: Deploy unique and powerful unmanned military turrets and stop the advancing enemy convoys!

name: 武林桃源乡 The Arcadia Of Wulin
description: 《武林桃源乡》是一款轻松休闲的建造经营主题的个人独立游戏。在游戏中您将从一无所有开始打造一座美丽繁华的世外桃源。精心规划每一座建筑，使建筑产生天地灵犀，让生活在这里的居民领悟绝世武功。这里有世外的高人，这里有归隐的侠客，正所谓良辰美景真乃人间仙境，赏心乐事恍如化外洞天。

name: 不二臣The Only  Master
description: “你应该吝啬你每一次说‘爱’这个字的机会。而不是对着我这种老男人练习。” 现代恋爱耽美游戏——《不二臣》，以王寅视角代入，触发狗血盖顶事情真相 ，又或是遍地暴雷的恩怨情仇...

name: elphame
description: Elphame is a story-driven RPG with a "programming puzzle" battle system. Join four heroes as they conquer Elphame by using the hostile beasties' attack patterns against them.

name: Virus Blast
description: What if you could use yourself as a bullet? Virus Blast is Fast paced Shooter where YOU are the bullet, try to steal as much data as you can while climbing an endless procedural generated matrix! All of this while the firewall is stepping on your toes trying to stop you!

name: GearBlocks
description: Explore a world of creative building, interactive machines, and gears - lots of gears. Build all things mechanical: cars, trucks, cranes, tanks, gearboxes, engines, clocks, anything you can think of. Test your creations to destruction in challenging scenarios, and share them in the workshop!

name: The Lost Legends of Redwall™ : The Scout Act 2
description: A whimsical puzzle-adventure game set in the world of the bestselling Redwall books. In this second episode, fresh off your defeat of the murderous Scumsnout, you wake to hear the sounds of battle — and must make your way into the fray to find your lost (and injured!) beloved!

name: UniDuni
description: UniDuni is a fun and light hearted 2D co-op puzzle platformer game that features nostalgic pixel art graphics and aims to be an experience for everyone, even non-gamers!

name: Game Director Story
description: Game Director Story is an unflinching and satirical look behind-the-scenes at how big-budget AAA games are made. Based on first-hand accounts by industry veterans, Players experience the emotional roller coaster of guiding a team through the agonizing decisions and compromises needed to ship a game.

name: Aria: Dragon Eater
description: "Aria: Dragon Eater" is a fantasy action top-down shooter game set in a magical era. Begin your journey to unravel the mystery surrounding the death of the dragon!

name: SteamDolls - Order Of Chaos
description: SteamDolls is a steampunk inspired metroidvania with a grimy touch of brutality, featuring AAA talent like David Hayter. Lose yourself in a labyrinthine city, full of secrets and madness, and reveal the truth lurking in the shadows. You know but four words: Action, Exploration, Stealth, and Blood.

name: My Train World
description: Take playing with toy trains into the virtual world with ‘My Train World’! Master a variety of puzzles at different difficulty levels in Puzzle Mode. Let your imagination flow in the Sandbox Mode and build the train-set of your dreams. (Note: Saving layouts is disabled in demo)

name: RavenHeart Hospital: A Medical Visual Novel
description: RavenHeart Hospital: A Medical Visual Novel is a surgery simulation visual novel. Take on the role of an ace surgeon in training at the world's greatest hospital. Operate on patients with a variety of conditions. Befriend and romance a colorful cast of doctors. Save lives and melt hearts.

name: Belongings
description: Belongings is a Point & Click adventure game. Dispose of the belongings of Jennifers late spouse Marion. Jennifer must contend with her own memories, and have to face hard truths she might not want to know. Do you wish to step into the bitter future, or stay in the sweet past?

name: Pandemia: Virus Outbreak
description: 2 in 1, Swipe cards to face the deadly virus threat in this story driven strategy game. Step into the world in which you will face the decisions that world leaders make in the event of a deadly virus threat. Every decision have consequences. Create Vaccine in special Arcade mode.

name: VR Fitness Gym (Cycling, Marathon, Football, etc)
description: VR Immersive Fitness Gym: 6 New VR Exercises You Never Experienced.Bored with exercise? Virtual reality, immersive fitness might help you.1) VR Football Battle; 2) VR Immersive Cycling; 3) VR Immersive Running & Marathon; 4) VR Apple Games; 5) VR Immersive Shooting; 6) VR Yoga (Coming)

name: Gel-Tank
description: Casual but profound! Simple, authentic 16-bit 2D style that will satisfy everyone from beginners to experts The action shooter is here! Dive into the soft and hard world of the ultimate 16-bit world, down to the resolution! Ugh!

name: Agrou
description: Your new favorite Werewolf game! Seat around the fire with friends, play a villager, a werewolf or another type of character and use strategy to win!

name: Crystal Valley
description: In Crystal Valley they explore alien landscapes mine raw materials and build new tools and fight against a large number of enemies.

name: Death Tales
description: Play as a new reaper, completing quests, collecting spells, and gathering equipment to fight through hordes of enemies in this grim but whimsical 2D adventure!

name: 16bit vs Reality
description: Retro-style platformer inspired by the 16bit classics. Jump and shoot your way through challenging levels. Watch two distinct visual styles collide. Enjoy the awesome rocking music. In the name of all that is childhood!

name: TOWER
description: The Tower continues to stifle the darkness at the world end. Waiting for the rapture time that has erased all the darkness. Collect pastel colored cubes, Defeat enemies more faster and more accurately, And protect your TOWER.

name: Up until the end - Otome/Visual Novel
description: This was supposed to be an ordinary day, in an ordinary life. But it isn't. You were in the town library, reading a good book when…You don't really remember. You know you passed out. When you wake up, you are surrounded by flames !

name: Captain Disaster in: The Dark Side of the Moon
description: A comedy scif-fi point & click adventure game with several odd characters (all voiced by the same person) and multiple strange inventory objects to try out! References to classic sci-fi and point & clicks abound.

name: Piroku
description: The demo contains 3 levels and basic combat mechanics, and also allows you to evaluate the visual style of the game and animation. The game is in the early stages of development and the final version may differ significantly from the demo

name: Rusty gun
description: Nothing could ruin a sunny day, but the universe had its own plans. The invasion of Earth by hordes of mutants and robots, capturing the mind of living creatures, could not leave aside our hero.

name: Vagrus - The Riven Realms: Prologue
description: Embark on a perilous journey across a realm forsaken by the gods and devastated by an arcane cataclysm. Accompanied by a hardy crew, you must trade, fight, and explore your way to success as the leader of a traveling company in Vagrus, an award-winning turn-based post-apocalyptic fantasy RPG.

name: The Magister
description: The Magister is a murder-mystery card-battler RPG. Build and customise your deck to fight in battles, or use ‘Tactical Diplomacy’ to pacify those who stand in your way. Gather clues and discover motives as you investigate the death of your predecessor and unmask the guilty culprit.

name: Nongunz: Doppelganger Edition
description: Nongunz is a roguelite action-platformer. Battle grotesque creatures, kill quickly to maintain your combo meter, and rescue worshipers to become part of your idle army to buy upgrades.

name: 罗马之链
description: This is a text adventure game, your identity is a general Cicero from the Roman Empire, through the choice of words, you will walk into several battles experienced by the three giants of Rome, see the glory and achievements of ancient Rome, and realize the true meaning of life and freedom.

name: FOREST OF THE DEAD
description: In FOREST OF THE DEAD you must survive huge waves of undead. You are stranded in the middle of the forest. No help, no hope. Your only chance is to defend yourself with the available weapons against the approaching find and stay alive as long as possible.

name: HANI
description: HANI is a Roguelike game that explores dungeons by combining various skills and artifacts.

name: Gravity Well
description: Save stranded astronaut, don't let him crash to the planet surface or suffocate in endless space! Fun and brain-teasing puzzle game will challenge you with lots of levels from easy to super tricky problems for you to solve.

name: Motel Murder
description: Your sister calls you for help. You go to the Motel where she's staying at only to find horror, Mannequins have come to life and are killing! Using the knife you find, you search for answers to find your sister before it's too late. Welcome to Motel Murder.

name: My Hidden Things
description: In the beginning there was nothing, only a chaos of dreams, out of which came Xary. He tried to understand people's nature and help them. Yet he is too young. And here you are. Together, you need to figure this all out…

name: Kingdom Karnage
description: Kingdom Karnage is not your average TCG experience. Battle in this Turn-Based, Animated Combat, Cross Platform Game. Choose your deck, conquer faction campaigns, explore dungeons for rewards, and revel in the glory of PvP.

name: Lightless
description: Lightless: The 21st Sacrifice is the first episode of an atmospheric horror game series set in 2018 Iran, Saqqez that tells the story of Navid, a writer who finally comes home, only to find himself strangled by a dark past that will not let go.

name: Super Cable Boy
description: Super Cable Boy is a retro inspired platformer, where you are playing a living handheld gaming system with a power cord. Collect game cartridges to become more powerful and take on your quest to defeat "the Glitch", an entity that 1▧01☠01௹1‱☣∰0␢⌀▧ ..

name: Viking Simulator: Valhalla Awaits
description: Don’t just play as a Viking. Become a Viking! In this realistic simulator you will be able to sink into the history of these fearless warriors.

name: Die Again
description: Die Again is an innovative shooter where you kill enemies shooting and dying. If, when dying, there is an enemy nearby, you can possess their body and keep playing. But be careful, the enemies can do the same to you. Shoot to kill, die to survive, kill yourself to overcome!

name: SCP: Nine-Tailed Fox
description: You are a leader of Foxtrot Unit 1 "Nine-Tailed Fox", a highly trained force tasked with re-containing a multitude of terrifying anomalous monsters that have broken loose inside of a top-secret research facility.

name: Phogbound
description: The story about hungry creatures, who are living in the Fog.

name: Progressbar95
description: Progressbar95 is a unique nostalgic game. It turns vintage GUI elements like panels, buttons and icons into game elements! Fights againts virtual office assistans, calculators, annoying pop-ups and maddening visual glitches.

name: Stolen Recovery
description: Locate lost cars, smash groups of criminals and explore thieves hideouts in a realistic simulator of a stolen vehicle hunter.

name: Big Tiddy Goth GF Simulator
description: Explore the college campus, and work your way up to telling the goth girl you have a crush on how you REALLY feel. Solve puzzles, buy food, and explore a eerily empty dorm.

name: Lab Rat
description: This satirical adventure stars a metrics-obsessed AI who will monitor, profile, and entertain you as you progress through over a hundred genre-bending puzzles.

name: The Insider – interactive movie
description: The Insider is an interactive film where a viewer’s choices decide how the story goes. It has five different endings and her fate depends entirely on your choice.

name: Mini Motor Racing X
description: Welcome to the world of Mini Motor Racing X! Strap yourself in, or strap on your VR headset, and jump into a nitro fueled world where little cars mean BIG fun!

name: Training Lab
description: A laboratory simulator to do virtual experiments in a simulated laboratory for training

name: Extra Terrestrial Nation
description: In the year 2045 scientists discover a new planet that has extraterrestrial life on it, which they brought back to Earth to study. It wasn't long before they mutated and escaped into the city. The only safe place left is on the outskirts of town, can Nicole and Rocky make it safely out of town?

name: The Adventures of Fatman: Intergalactic Indigestion
description: Emerge from the Fat-cave once more and help Fatman defeat the Intergalactic Indigestion! A cheap and cheerful continuation to The Adventures of Fatman series, by Mike Doak.

name: Color Game
description: Color Game is a puzzle game about getting to the end. Change your color, unlock the path to the exit and avoid enemies along the way.

name: ReRoad
description: ReRoad is a Tower Defense game with a brand new concept where the players dig their own paths. You need to consider the locations of the randomly placed towers of the stages as well as the towers you will build and strategically create a path. Stop the enemy through a path you have created!

name: Spellbearers
description: Spellbearers is a top-down, 2D, twin stick shooter inspired by "Super Smash TV". Battle against hordes of magical enemies to liberate the rulers of three kingdoms that have been overtaken by dark forces. With staff in hand, do you have what it takes to uphold the title of The Spellbearer?

name: Drifter King Online
description: Precision drift racing solo or against friends.

name: The End of Labyronia: Nerubis
description: Travel through time and the four seasons to avert the apocalypse in the last part of the popular Labyronia saga.

name: Call of Corona: Micro Warfare
description: A dangerous mission to travel into the human body and meet the Corona virus face to face and send it back to microscopic hell.

name: Fantasy Mosaics 34: Zen Garden
description: The penguin family discovered a "Zen" way to play multi-color mosaic puzzles also known as picross,nonogram,griddlers hanjie!

name: Ace of Space
description: You and your spaceship versus thousands of aliens! Blast through waves of aliens with upgradable spaceships in this sci-fi shoot ’em up game and become the Ace of Space!

name: 重装无限·Metal Infinite
description: 或许在某个时空里他已经战败了 但是在这里或许可以改写一切，传说最强的赏金猎人！ 那段未完的故事 将如何开始又如何结束...

name: Monster Energy Supercross - The Official Videogame 4
description: Cross is Super Again! The official videogame of the Monster Energy AMA Supercross Championship is back with its fourth edition, the most extreme ever!

name: Urge
description: You are driving through a mysterious town where your friend has gone missing. Damaged road will cause your car to crash. You're trying to survive while holding your Urge and fighting overgrown insects or other uncanny creatures.

name: Dumb Roguelike-like RPG
description: Venture into a forbidden cursed city in the hopes of rescuing your sister!

name: Covid Tale: Ignorance
description: Discover the truths about COVID19... according to the internet. And the internet never lies, right? Play a witty story of how it all may or may not happened.

name: The End of Dyeus
description: Go in a quest for Dyeus in a primitive and cryptic open world ! Face mysterious assailants in intense and fast paced sword fights, and survive against a carnivorous fauna. Will you uncover the truth about Dyeus?

name: runflexio
description: This is a narrative runner about the fate of a little jackal, who decided to leave his home and go to another place more pleasant for him. During his trip, the hero of the game reflects on the past, reflects on actions and emotions, as well as whether he made the right decision.

name: Dura Vita Online
description: Dura Vita Online is a multiplayer RPG in a medieval fantasy setting. You are an ordinary citizen living your life when The Occurrence happens. Now evil has started to spread across the land and you have no choice but to take up arms and destroy it!

name: Creep
description: Experimental dark platform game that takes place inside a struggled man's inner world represented as the worm world. You control the worm form of this man as he shows why this world exists and how it's like to live there. You also visit past memories/analogies and gain new abilities.

name: Rachael Savage
description: Play as a fearsome bounty hunter in this adventure game about hunting down an unbeatable threat! Turn invisible to sneak past enemies, slash with your sword, and use other unique items you find along the way to help acquire new bounties across the land.

name: Parabolus Two
description: Shoot your way across the galaxy in this thrilling adventure! It’s the sci-fi shooter which blends old school game mechanics with modern story driven cinematic experiences. Unlock the mystery of strange events all over the Milky Way and find out who (or what) is behind them.

name: Geometric Sniper
description: Immerse yourself in Andrew's story and feel the pressure of being a sniper. Find and eliminate the target in the crowd before he runs away.In living environments, designed exclusively for this fantastic game, you will not have a second chance, precision is everything!

name: Alien Egg: Ascent
description: Jump your way into outer space to help a lost alien egg find its way back to its homeworld!

name: Charge Blade Hero
description: A fast paced 2D hack and slash, adventure game. Attack, Dodge, and Charge Up to maintain your weapon's durability as you take on waves of enemies.

name: Love n Dream
description: 《Love n Dream》 is a puzzle game with many kawaii girls. You will be transformed into multiple roles to approach all of our girls. Your job is to unlock their desired, characteristic, favorite, hate by using your skill to solve all the puzzles and understand more about them.

name: Knife Quest
description: Knife Quest is a platform videogame where the character will have to find 3 coins that will allow him to open a new portal to go to the next level.

name: Beware of the Blob
description: Eat people and craft limbs in this third-person puzzle exploration game. You'll need brains, arms, lungs, and more to escape from Black Hawk Industries HQ in one piece.

name: Aim Master H
description: Aim Master H is the first 2D Aim Game on Steam, designed to warmup and boost your aim quickly and easily.

name: Polter Pals
description: Make ghost friends by steering the living into deadly hazards to release their souls. Puzzle through diorama-style levels and make as many friends as possible using comically fatal accidents. Keep up with the latest memes by getting popular on the afterlife's hottest social media app, LiveBurial.

name: Mischance
description: Mischance is a game about surviving as long as possible with a curse that guarantees an imminent death. Everything in your day-to-day life is now much more likely to kill you. Your objective is to make smart choices and hope that the most simplest of activities don't end up taking your life.

name: SkunkHunter 101
description: 2020 port of the 2009 title. Grow and sell weed.

name: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai
description: Faraway Lands: Rise of Yokai is a fantasy survival strategy game set in Feudal Japan.Build your town, gather resources, explore new lands, trade with other cities and defend your town against the risen Yokai threat!

name: Small Ball
description: This is a casual game,control small ball arrive at the destination,include 4 mini games

name: Drift Racing Rally
description: Grip the wheel, pull the handbrake and drift like a maniac, Making donuts drifts like a champion.

name: Ungeon
description: Fight your way through a cursed dungeon filled to the brim with undead enemies in hopes of finding your lost father, or at least your way out. Ungeon is a randomly generated dungeon crawler with a large focus on combat and exploration.

name: Dirt Bike Motocross Stunts
description: Go ahead and live out your bike stunt racing dreams with Dirt Bike MotoCross Stunts.

name: Rocky Mayhem
description: Rocky Mayhem is a hardcore space shooter where you play as a pilot, receiving distress calls outside of Neptune from a fellow co-worker. Your mission is to retrieve him but it’s not as easy as it seems...

name: A Lot of Universes
description: Jump from world to world searching for an interdimensional fugitive. Collect items and use them to resolve tricky situations that threaten to delay your progress.

name: Whisker Squadron
description: A fresh take on forward scrolling aerial combat! Choose your pilot and fight your way through procedurally-generated worlds and epic, randomized boss fights. You've got one life, and your tactical upgrade choices will be crucial to your success in this aerial roguelike.

name: CAMEO: CCTV Detective
description: Play as CCTV Detective Lopez as he solves crimes through the ever faithful lens of a security camera. The crime rate in the small City of ChurchView is rising, and it is up to Lopez to lower it.

name: Noise Hunters
description: Noise Hunters is an action stealth video game where noise is your tool, but also your enemy. Don't let them hear you, HUNT or be HUNTED.

name: The Arcane Tower
description: Immerse yourself into a hidden underworld where state of the art mechanics meets ingeniously crafted puzzles. Use the handcar to go through the mine and get face to face with the arcane tower.

name: LeftWay 2
description: Nampung encounters the nightmare again and this time also includes her relative people.

name: Pandemia
description: Choose who lives and who dies in a small peripheral hospital in a pandemic situation.

name: Radio Viscera
description: Radio Viscera is a fast-paced top down shooter without bullets. Hurl enemies into brutal traps and blast your way through walls with your air cannon, in this bloody, arcade action game.

name: 大明王朝1789 | Ming dynasty 1789
description: In 1789, the Ming Dynasty had survived for a hundred years. At this time, just before the Great Revolution, what will the Ming Dynasty look like under the influence of players?

name: Tormans
description: Tormans is an open world, tactical RPG in a post-technology setting. You can do anything, go everywhere and become adventurer, rogue, to travel through the ruins of an ancient unknown world of about 1220 km. Do your best to write own history in this harsh realm and understand what happened here.

name: Hero.EXE
description: Hero.EXE is a card collecting action RPG. With visual novel cutscenes and grid based action combat; modeled off of the classic Battle Network series. Choose your Ava wisely, as you both become a central part of the story!

name: Zombo Buster Advance
description: Zombo Buster Advance is a tower defense game taking place inside buildings with interchangeable elevators. Deploy, swap and shoot like a boss!

name: Chair F*cking Simulator
description: Use our innovative patented funky fresh ChairF*cker simulation tech to meet the chair of your wildest dreams.

name: Telomere
description: A minimalist journey though life.

name: Kooring VR Coding Adventure
description: Let’s ride the Blockstar and go on a journey to the Coding World. Help Kooring catch the troubled Tooring in the beautiful Block World! Having fun playing block coding fosters logical thinking and creativity. The Highest Level of Immersion Brings The Highest Learning Effect!

name: Tails of Trainspot
description: "Tails of Trainspot" is a relaxing puzzle game that lets you explore the diverse landscape of the Packan Islands, by laying tracks to build a variety of stations and interacting with the characterful residents.

name: Assembly Planter
description: A farming / automation game, that allows you to progress from a poor hard-working farmer with just a few old tools to a lazy rich guy that watches his machines do the work for him while he tries to optimize production.

name: Yuldigard's Fate
description: The capital of his native Yuldigard Alzia is torn apart by a civil war, in order to avoid death, the prince has to flee the city, pretending to be a wanderer. He has to find refuge in the provincial town of Torchbergen, but this visit is destined to drag on for a long time ...

name: Cricket Captain 2020
description: Cricket Captain 2020 is the perfect companion if you are missing live matches, as the hugely anticipated season is disrupted. We have created the 2020 season as it was originally intended, including rain-delays in one-day matches, and the new 100 ball competition.

name: Tanky Panky
description: Fun, chaotic, cut-throat multiplayer vehicular mayhem. Let theft, carnage and cunning be your motto. Support your teammates, outwit and back-stab your enemies. Snatch flags, grab power-ups, but don't forget to protect your base.

name: MARDEK
