description: MARDEK is a fantasy/sci-fi/retro Flash RPG from 2007-2010, which blends parody with a deeper story. It offers solid turn-based RPG combat and dozens of hours of gameplay.

name: Proxy Air Force
description: Proxy Air Force is a 2D Arcade Shoot Them Up game based on the story of the world war which broke out between the US and CES countries in 2020.

name: Ruggnar
description: Ruggnar is a platformer without enemies, but many traps are hidden in the darkness. Help Ruggnar explore gloomy places with his bag and a few candles as his sole equipment.

name: Windfallers
description: Become a Windfaller, a mercenary of the skies with an unlikely crew in this action siege game. From heists, to deliveries and other more... sinister contracts, there's no job too big or small for your scrappy crew. Did I mention your airship has a trebuchet?

name: Escape Game Fort Boyard
description: Beat all the trials to escape the Fort with the treasure!

name: Dig Bombers
description: It's a real time multiplayer with fast-paced battles. Dig, blast and become the sole owner of a dungeon full of treasures. Everything needed to win is buried in the mine. Dig up weapons and get rid of your opponents.

name: MelDEV Power Boat Racing
description: Real ocean physics. Power Boat Racing at its edge for PC.

name: Elkabo: Selina's Dark Spirit
description: When your sister stumbled upon a dark secret you start on a quest of rescue that could just rewrite history.

name: My Very Own Lair
description: True artificial intelligence is at hand, time to build your very own lair! Start from an old mansion in the UK and pick a place to move. But careful, the World will try to stop you. Will you make it to Mars?

name: Pursuit of the Bookkeeper
description: Venture dark dungeons in a pursuit of the Bookkeeper. Beware, your only defence are spells, and to cast them you need to look into your spellbook.

name: Breakout Planet
description: It is the future; aliens came to earth and won the war in a matter of minutes. Unable to stand up to the alien technology, humanity has become enslaved. A ship transporting prisoners has crashed landed, fortunately you are the only survivor and have a chance of escape. Will you be able to break out?

name: The Director's Cut
description: The Director's Cut is a story-driven psychological horror game set in a 1984, USA. Redefine your meaning of horror. Using © DREAMu.

name: Close Encounter VR
description: Experience the thrill of a UFO sighting and the terror of an alien abduction as you come face to face with extraterrestrial beings! Don't worry, everything will be fine in the end, I promise!

name: RogueJack: Roguelike Blackjack
description: Explore endless dungeons, discover monsters and beat them all in a game of 21. Collect weapons, defenses and the carcasses of your enemies while playing a fresh and interesting take on BlackJack.

name: Turbo Shot
description: Turbo Shot combines a puzzle-filled top-down adventure with exciting gun-based combat that plays out in regular seasons of free-to-play single player and PvP content.

name: Saiku's Endless Labyrinth
description: Follow Saiku's journey through the world as they battle monsters, encounter great bosses and traverse strange lands. With the help of PEROS, an operator from S.A.V.E. Corp., Saiku must seek out the meaning to their life and attempt to recover their memories...

name: Slurkum
description: The multiplayer survival fantasy you've been looking for! Set in a timeless era, Play how you want to build a character with unique stats, skills, karma, and reputation as you slay monsters, war factions, loot graves, cast spells, hunt down PK or be one yourself!

name: Vaporwave Road VR
description: Drive a car on an endless road, listen to music, and watch the scenery. This is a relaxing game, you can import local music, in the game you can only listen to music and enjoy the scenery. This game is completely made for the VR experience and contains 7 music.

name: Cairn: Mathair's Curse
description: One family, a group of good friends and a journey into the heart of an ancient curse that threatens it all. Do you have what it takes to protect the ones you love?

name: Diamond Giza
description: Run through the pyramids and grab everything shiny! Explore the mazes and rob the pharoahs and your friends in massive couch co-op mayhem!

name: Tanklike
description: Tanklike is a cooperative 2D shooter for 1 - 4 players. Improve your stats, upgrade your arsenal, and ricochet your way to victory!

name: Swords and Sandals Crusader Redux
description: The world of Swords and Sandals is at war! Join the Crusade against Emperor Antares! For the first time since 2007, the beloved Swords and Sandals Crusader returns, reforged from the ground up. Fast paced, addictive tactical warfare is back and better than ever!

name: Show for Lovers
description: Interactive visual novel, the ending of which depends on you. Immerse yourself in a romantic story about life in a private school.

name: Pictura
description: Pictura is an atmospheric photography game where you explore new worlds, while working on your photo skills. Find the best shots and become a world famous photographer.

name: CITY OF RAGDOLLS
description: Create your own ragdolls wars in your own city in Sandbox Mode, play with guns, melee weapons, crazy vehicles and so much more. Simply enjoy everything you love about ragdolls!

name: Realm of the hero
description: Everything in this game like JRPG is random. Choose one in many classes to destroy enemies. You are a hero. Strengthen yourself before fighting very strong bosses. Try to learn skills and equip weapons in the adventure.

name: Diving City
description: Diving City is an action RPG with strategy elements, featuring Karl, who has been trapped in Luvania, an underground megacity built by a mysterious civilisation, for reasons unknown. Karl will have to collect elemental cubes from the surroundings and create makeshift traps to unlock the way forward when facing the indescribable...

name: Nebula Within
description: Nebula Within is a contemplative yet challenging twin-stick shooter about exploring your emotions and finding self-acceptance. Plunge into a colorful consciousness and reveal a mysterious diary alone or with up to 8 of your friends.

name: Anomaly Hunter
description: Hidden object puzzler about time-traveling detective. Somebody really messed up with time-travel machine..

name: Shatris: Infinite Puzzles
description: Insert mysterious runes back into their sockets! Identify correct shape combinations and solve hundreds of puzzles in this world of pure relaxation!

name: Meditation VR
description: Birds high up in the sky, waves rolling in on the shore, the wind blowing through palm trees and plants that grow on your private secluded island all contribute both visually and in sound to a surreal experience that practically makes you feel the ocean breeze.

name: Farlight Commanders
description: Drive a spaceship where each player has an unique role. Play Solo or Coop with friends, up to 4. A perfect mix of space shoot em up and sci-fi action platformer. Fight in space or ground.

name: 连海台球俱乐部 ウィナーズブレイク Lianhai Billiards Club
description: "Lianhai Billiards Club is a game that combines the elements of role-play and billiards leisure, telling the story of the lonely protagonist who grows up from an unruly delinquent to a shining professional billiards star with the companionship of his friends.

name: Traffic Jams
description: In this wacky VR game, control traffic your way in the face of outrageous events and flagrant road rage. Easy? Think again! Traffic Jams throws in monsters, (un)natural disasters, and up to 4 non-VR friends in party mode!

name: Hentai Collection: Memory
description: In Hentai Collection: Memory you play memory puzzles that grow in size as you get further into the game. After every puzzle you unlock pictures of sexy girls that get more lewd as you go along.

name: Iteration Factor
description: Use time travel and other tools to solve mind bending puzzles in VR. When you travel back you will find that you and every action you took is happening again. If you use the right tools you can control any paradoxes you create with smart planning.

name: Electro Ride Prologue
description: Racing neon cars from the former Eastern Bloc. Start at the Berlin Wall. The first routes and quick race mode will give you a taste of the Electro Ride competition. Neon lights, superfast, unique, classic, iconic cars. Get crazy about colorful streets!

name: Infectious
description: Play as a lethal virus infecting various organs in your host's body while trying to outsmart the immune cells that seek to eliminate you and your kind.

name: Milky Way Prince – The Vampire Star
description: A visual novel about an abusive relationship, idealization, and intimacy. Live a summer of dysfunctional love through branching storylines, twists, sudden changes, and an innovative mechanic where you choose which senses to use with your boyfriend.

name: The Zone
description: Dimitri has a mission: go to an island and disable all the electrical installations to avoid that strange creatures have multiplies and go out.

name: Inertial Drift: Sunset Prologue
description: Set in a 90's retro future, Inertial Drift offers a driving experience genuinely unlike anything you've played before – boasting twin stick drifting mechanics that need to be felt to be believed.

name: Magicademia
description: Magicademia is a tycoon game in which you can design and manage the magic school of your dreams the way you want. Hire some experienced wizards to teach spell casting to the new, brim-hatted generation. Expand your knowledge and school in order to become world's best magical academy!

name: Ultimate Wall Defense Force
description: Ultimate Wall Defense Force is a single-player, action game made for VR. Fly into a superhero fantasy inspired by outrageous anime fights. Defend The Wall and destroy an onslaught of enemy Geodites by yielding ultimate abilities in the palms of your hands.

name: Racing Juke
description: Compete against cunning and tough rivals racers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest!

name: Pirates: Mystery of Skeleton Island
description: Atmospheric role-playing pirate adventure. You shall fight with unique cursed skeletons; discovery diverse flora and fauna through thunderstorms rain and sand; search treasures and sail on ship and boats!

name: End of Panduora
description: "End of Panduora" is a fast-paced fantasy-style strategy management game. In a randomly generated corner of the abyss, by consuming sanity in exchange for strength that does not belong to you. In the endless sea, create a new paradise to welcome the remnants of the old gods.

name: F29 Retaliator
description: The skies are your hunting ground in this high speed, high action Cold War flight sim, featuring 100 missions of dogfights and strategic bombings across three geopolitical theaters.

name: Gems of Fate: the Charmed King
description: Save the kingdom from dark magic by solving riddles in match-3 game!

name: Super Blood Warriors
description: Super Blood Warriors is a highly stylized multiplayer shooter taking place in a fictional Vietnam War. Choose from several different classes, with various Blood Abilities and special equipment, to defeat the alien horde.

name: Pyro Fighters
description: Pyro Fighters is a scrolling space shooter with platforming physics. Use your flame gun to propel yourself in the air and fight through an alien army with up to four players.

name: Rogue Planet
description: Rogue Planet is about speed, precision, and smooth motion. Use your momentum paired with the force of gravity to propel yourself from star to star, draining their power and fueling your ship as you go.

name: No Umbrellas Allowed
description: Reveal the true value of the items coming into the shop. Each item has their own history. Dig deep to see what is behind them and become an expert appraiser. Begin a tug of war with customers. With their own expectations and knowledge, they never give up on money.

name: Solar Rogue
description: A space exploration adventure in the purest tradition of roguelike. Featuring procedurally generated solar systems, perma-death and tactical turned-based gameplay!

name: Dragon Extinction VR
description: Enter a fantasy world where humanity has brought dragons to the brink of extinction. This ARPG features hundreds of unique items, crafting and procedural dungeons.

name: Bishoujo Battle Hanafuda Koi-Koi
description: The Bishoujo girls from "Rick G Earth" mobile military turn-based strategy game from Japan are here! And they want to play Koi-Koi, the most famous Japanese flower card game with you. Battle the girls in a tour around Japan. Or hop on multiplayer and compete against Koi-Koi masters around the world.

name: Bishoujo Battle Mahjong Solitaire
description: The Bishoujo girls from "Rick G Earth" mobile military turn-based strategy game from Japan are here! And they want to go head to head in a battle of Mahjong Solitaire. Delete all tiles before time runs out to clear rounds. Every 3rd round girls will change costumes and more will be revealed.

name: Quarry Simulator 2021
description: Quarry Simulator 2021 - inovation simulator and economical strategy about develop of the quarries. You beginner magnat, that need earn some money for his bussiness. INOVATION AND ORIGINAL IDEA.

name: Wrestledunk Sports
description: Wrestledunk is an explosive, colorful collection of super competitive multiplayer sports games! Face off online or locally with up to 8 players. Get into it!

name: Space Roaming
description: Space roaming is a casual level game and parkour game, accompanied by laid-back music, constantly running forward. Faced with various obstacles, you need to consider the way to pass the game skillfully or flexibly. Of course, smooth levels are the fun of this game.

name: Qube Qross
description: Qube Qross is a challenging logical puzzle game, like Nonogram in 3D, solving the cute voxel puzzles with chill music and neon graphic style.

name: Cross Princess
description: Single route visual novel. Belle is actually a boy, an accident lets him and a bright girl named Bambi begin to live together, a warm and healing friendship + love story.

name: Knight's Destiny
description: Knight's Destiny is a puzzle game where you need to find a way to escape, and solve a mystery about disappearing of your best friend by solving puzzles and escaping the unknown.

name: 羊教授：归来
description: This is a 2D action game with roguelike elements. Players need to use the map reasonably to move and attack. In addition, there are plenty of random props in the game that can help players to take risks.

name: Decks & Dungeons
description: A Turn based deck building Monster Collecting Roguelite RPG!

name: Escape Room - Der kranke Kollege
description: You only wanted to make a visit to your sick colleague, but what you encounter is beyond your imagination. Discover the secrets of your colleague and find a way to escape the trap.

name: Raid on the Zone
description: Fight in a furious battle against “The Zone”, a mysterious terrorist group hell-bent on destroying the world. Cripple their defenses with your dual-prop helicopter and massive arsenal of weaponry in this retro-inspired homage to arcade games of the 80’s.

name: Machizzle
description: Physics bending VR puzzle game - get your ball to the goal, by obeying the laws of physics. Or bending them to your will.

name: Fluvstruck
description: You are a romantic novelist. Sadly - you're absolutely terrible at writing stories, until you meet Yuna, a hopeless young girl who is obsessed with teasing you and putting you to work. Overcome your creative writing block by changing your observations of love into experience.

name: Dayscream
description: Dig deep down in a world of darkness. Uncover the secrets of your dreams and try to find out what is really going on. Are they just daydreams or your deepest nightmares?

name: SpaceCrooks: The End of Time
description: SpaceCrooks is a hybrid rail-shooter/flight-sim (Starfox-clone) that combines roguelite gameplay with an unlocking comedic sci-fi visual novel. Follow kAla, ♩♩B₄♯♩C♭♩E♭, and [Rigb'g] as they carve a path of mayhem in this genre soup.

name: Strawberry Chocolate: Miner 8AD 4SS
description: The Strawberry Chocolate is your ship. You are a top asteroid miner. Is a hostile ecosystem of predator slugs a concern? Of course not. In this action RPG, get out there and hunt for all the different minerals you need and destroy any predators that get in your way. You are a Miner Badass.

name: Glitchphobia
description: Immerse yourself into unstable reality. In order to get out you must exploit glitch in a world around you. You can be sure of one thing, any rules you known no longer exist!! Do you have a courage to dip in it?

name: Tap-A-Zombie
description: Train your brain with "Tap-A-Zombie", the memory game for the not yet fully brain dead.

name: Fourzy
description: COMPETITIVE MATCH FOUR

name: Ghost of Dragon
description: Ghost of Dragon is a Semi-Idle RPG game. To explore the vastly endangered world, players will need to recruit heroes, collect gears, combine runes, capture monsters, upgrade town facilities, and manage villagers to collect resources and initiate productions.

name: CoronaWhomp!
description: If you hate the virus as much as we do, now is your chance...to whomp it!

name: Tiki Tiki: The Tropical Memory Game
description: Tiki Tiki: The Tropical Memory Game is a family friendly memory game where all can improve their memory, speed of thinking. With 3 game modes and 3 difficulties its the perfect way to train your brain.

name: ASTROVITY
description: Help find Astra's parents on a mission throughout the galaxy! Traverse hundreds of handcrafted levels to save your family somewhere in the vast expanse of space!

name: Forking Hell
description: Forking Hell is a casual arcade-simulation game where the player guides a forklift vehicle around a virtual warehouse and completing customer orders over the working days.

name: Astrodogs
description: Astrodogs is an on-rails arcade action game featuring a cast of space dogs that have to save the galaxy of WOOFER, a company that controls everything. Also run by dogs.

name: Biscuitts
description: Biscuitts is an arcade game.

name: My Personal World
description: If you bored at stay at home and you want to create your own Personal World you can do it with this game. Random objects spawn from up and every 15 minutes world gravity activates, you have to finish the your personal world before big time over.

name: Mouse Dream
description: Mouse dream is a platformer game where all surroundings are continuously morphing from the clouds into the new forms and adventures. You are not running anywhere, all dreams come to you. Dream is the story. Dream as long as you can.

name: Blood price
description: This is a RPG game with the main concepts being losing the battles and being raped. It is a story of a half-blood vampire girl's journey around a fantasy world.

name: Move Code Lines
description: Move Code Lines is a game where you fix programs and make them print needed output. But the only way you can achieve that is to change the order of lines in those programs, and set custom input.

name: Farmageddon: A Cattle Royale
description: Farmageddon: A Cattle Royale is a series of cow puns masquerading as a new kind of roguelike.

name: Mike & Tyler
description: Mike & Tyler is a point & click adventure game, full of puzzles, mystery and dangerous characters.

name: Neglected
description: Would you like to escape the crisis with your furry partner and escape from this "mysterious dungeon", or explore and understand the secret behind this mysterious underground facility?

name: KABOOM - 1 vs 1 Battle
description: Become a KABOOM MASTER destroying your enemies!

name: Sunset Shapes
description: Bring broken pieces together, to reveal shapes of everyday objects. Travel with a Daisy and a Maggot along side several scenarios and discover to where they are headed to.

name: Whiskey.Mafia. Leo's Family
description: 1920 year. New York. City of high hopes and broken dreams, friends and traitors. Can a humble guy Christopher, the son of a port worker, make his American dream come true?

name: Shooty Skies Overdrive
description: Escape the arcade in Shooty Skies Overdrive, an action-packed VR shoot ‘em up. Dodge and weave your way through dynamically generated enemy waves and blast them at point-blank range. An incredible journey through colorful retro worlds and ridiculous alien invaders.

name: Song of sheep gathering in Philia
description: A modern, downtown area. The main character, Miyasumi Mashiro [Miyazumi Mashiro] is 21 years old who suffers from masturbation dependence.Being distracted by his own thoughts, in the back alley where unintentionally straying bars lined up, he finds himself in a trouble with the concept bar "Filia", which has a special habit.

name: Mars Power Industries: First Job
description: Is that your first job here at Mars Power Industries? Okay... Let's learn how to supply your tiny colony. Think of this like a puzzle. Sparkly crystals make power and your buildings need that sweet, sweet blue jazz. Black goo? Right, umm... Best to ign#-$!ore it. We do&!@ ONE #%& OF &#@ US %!&

name: Apollo Lunar Mission
description: Apollo Lunar Misson VR Simulator is a first-person experience on the surface of the Moon, as a member of the Apollo mission crew. Have fun while completing the tasks and exploring the Moon surface. Drive the Lunar Rover first hand.

name: Battle Baseball
description: Enjoy idle and fast-paced baseball game. Hit the baseball as hard as you can and sink enemy ships.

name: Taiga
description: Taiga is a harsh survival simulator in the Taiga forests of Russia. There is constant cold, wild nature, clean air and time go slower. There are no zombies and geomagnetic disasters, only the nature of our vast planet. You'll have to make your own decisions.

name: Blind Drive
description: An audio-based black comedy action arcade game - Blind Drive is a video game you can play with your eyes closed! 1st person hyper-realistic audio adventure meets fast paced arcade gameplay, driven by an insane B-movie plot.

name: Taxer Inc
description: The biggest corporations are not Apple or Amazon. The biggest "corporations" are the states. Your employees are all citizens of the country. You don't pay them a salary - they will pay you themselves. You manage taxes and collect them.

name: Rodent and Plank: Secret Origin
description: Rodent and Plank is a run 'n gun action platformer that borrows heavily from genre classics such as Gunstar Heroes, Earthworm Jim, and Metal Slug. It's tough as nails and the constantly shifting gameplay styles ensures that there's a surprise around every corner.

name: ヤドカリサバイブ
description: 「ヤドカリサバイブ」は、主人公のヤドカリがカラを投げて 敵のタコと戦う ステージクリア型の横スクロールアクションゲームです。

name: Kingdom Wars: The Plague
description: It's 1347, the time of the Hundred Years' War. In this historical grand strategy and RTS hybrid you play as one of 200 minor lords across medieval Europe, Africa or Middle East. Rise up to take over your Kingdom and be crowned, then fight to preserve your empire as Black Death descends on Europe.

name: Black Noir
description: A point-and-click adventure game, in the style of a noir mystery set in the early 1900's.

name: Wizodd
description: Wizodd is a dungeon crawler roguelike game where you find various equipment and upgrades while encountering dangerous monsters and bosses to advance down to the lower floors.

name: VELVETIST: The City of Machine Guns
description: VELVETIST: The City of Machine Guns is a 3rd person open world action-adventure game. The story of the main character Luka Vollek takes place in an old, socialist occupied city. The game is divided into consecutive linear missions that tell the story of the main protagonist.

name: Be Hero
description: Be Hero is a farming/crafting RPG about an aspiring hero who arrived late to the final battle and needs to work in a tavern to be able to return home.

name: Roses Of Love
description: In this visual novel you will be immersed in the story of Akane, a girl who wanted to fulfill her dream of studying in the great city of Tokyo. Here Akane will find love and new friendships, support her in her search for romance and discover a side of her that never expected.

name: Not Their Will
description: Not Their Will is a 3D Top-down shooter in which you are an alien that uses the weapons of the enemies against them.

name: The Legend of Zuri
description: The Legend of Zuri is a "pick a path" style raunchy adventure with over 180 CG images. Will the Princess Zuri remain unsullied or will she experience something unmentionable? That depends on which paths you choose!

name: Endlight
description: Break through and outlast shifting, twisting, chaos. Fly through surreal landscapes desperately trying to get hoops. Dodging is impossible, so start smashing.

name: Zombie Slayer
description: A round-based zombie survival game. Purchase weapons, power-ups, and other items to survive.

name: Everland (Stress Test)
description: Social online world releasing in 2020 — hoping to help people find friendship and a sense of community.

name: Unwalkable
description: Unwalkable is a silly physics based open-ended puzzle platformer where you control a wobbly character. Without just one way to solve puzzles, you must use your imagination and ingenuity to create solutions to unthinkable problems.

name: Ricochet Bounce
description: Challenging puzzle game with hand crafted levels. Easy to learn but hard to complete!

name: CursorFX
description: Create stunning animated Windows mouse cursors for your PC with CursorFX! Easily apply skins, shadows, motion trails, and sounds, customize your own, or choose from one of several unique cursors already installed.

name: Whateverland: Prologue
description: A Prologue to Whateverland, an upcoming point-n-click adventure set in a bizarrely beautiful hand-drawn world, where everyone gets what they truly deserve. Experience the beginning of the journey of Vincent, an unfortunate thief, who can either find a way out or stay trapped there forever.

name: Mystery Tales: Til Death Collector's Edition
description: Can you traverse the Underworld and make it out alive?

name: Spectrum VR
description: Spectrum VR is a puzzle for the passage of which you have to master unusual mechanics in VR. We are inspired by games like The Talos Principle, The Witness, and Antichamber to create.

name: Moonray
description: Moonray is a surreal 3rd-person action RPG set in a fantastical sci-fi world. Featuring intense soulslike combat, stunning visuals and a world-class soundtrack, battle your way through a beautiful and deadly world to recover the sacred element and regain control of the planet.

name: A Story In Space
description: Take on the persona of an intergalactic bounty hunter to try to save yourself and the people of the mysterious warring planets of Hakarr and Pahnbuk!

name: SMIB: Mission Cure
description: SMIB is a small robot with a big problem. Humankind can’t smile anymore and sent SMIB to space to find the cure. It needs YOU to remotely program its routes in its biggest mission: an adventure through the most exotic planets in the Universe. Solve puzzles, find the cure, and get SMIB back to Earth!

name: Spectacular Sparky
description: A throwback to the golden age of white-gloved 16-bit video-game mascots, Spectacular Sparky is an action-packed platformer with wacky characters, explosive weapons and boss battles to treasure!

name: THE Z LAND : FPS SURVIVAL
description: The Z virus infected the planet, and you are one of the last survivors! Alone or in groups you will have to survive in a hostile world populated by living dead!

name: HereticOS MR Lab
description: Thanks to the breakthrough of HereticOS network basic technology, HereticOS Mr Lab The war simulator can realize the real-time online interaction of the largest 65000 online players on same server and screen .

name: 异世界的无厘头生活
description: Life without reason in a different world is a game in which the protagonist goes through different worlds after his death and discusses the truth of life events with all kinds of girls in different worlds. Please go to heaven

name: The Cubedex of Brass and Wood
description: The Cubedex of Brass and Wood contains six puzzling machines. For some, the goal is obvious but the solution is not; for others, figuring out the goal is part of the puzzle.

name: Crystal Story: The Hero and the Evil Witch
description: An evil witch has stolen the Crystal of Power. It’s up to one brave hero to save the world... by hiring mercenaries to do the job for him. Play as the members of Mercenary Inc as you explore randomly generated dungeons, battle fierce monsters, and collect loot in this 2.5D turn-based RPG.

name: Express Thru
description: Addictive one line puzzle to wake up your brain Draw a line and solve it!

name: Midnight Castle Succubus DX
description: A succubus issues threats against humanity once every 100 years. While men die and young women disappear one by one, a succubus hunter visits a cursed city under the moonlight. Let's rescue abducted girls and defeat the succubus!

name: Victory At Sea Ironclad
description: Victory at Sea Ironclad is the exciting game of naval RTS combat set during the American Civil War. Bringing an epic approach to real time strategy war gaming, search and destroy enemy fleets across an open world sandbox in a desperate attempt to change the course of history.

name: Sausage Dog Tends To Infinity
description: Sausage Dog Tends To Infinity is a classic Sokoban-like 3D puzzle game in which you must stretch yourself to infinity to solve puzzles and uncover ancient wisdom. Learn and grow as you explore a deserted world and discover the answers to questions you have yet to ask.

name: Friendship with Benefits
description: Friendship with Benefits is a unique eroge game that combines free-roaming elements, visual novel, dating simulator and role-playing mechanics. With a cast of over 20+ romanceable characters, where will you begin in this new and wonderful world?

name: Understand
description: Understand is an experimental puzzle game about guessing rules. In each level, you have to figure out the rules through trial and error, then draw a line satisfying all rules.

name: My Countless Worlds ~Enchanted Cape~
description: "My Countless Worlds" is a kinetic visual novel about the young goofs from a drama club, who need to get ready for a talent contest while also trying to find a person who planted a death prophecy for one of the club's members.

name: Touhou : Shooting Star | 東方流星譚
description: As a wizard "Marisa Kirisame", Fly in the Gensokyo! This is fun game of "Touhou Project"! See beautiful danmaku of touhou characters. Develop your weapon, armor, spell card to get strong. Let's play "Danmaku"!

name: Extortion
description: You're a computer engineer with a terrible secret. Someone is blackmailing you and now, you have to hack some servers and get secret files for him. Would you succeed to achieve his missions or would you find him and revenge ?

name: The Fabled Woods
description: Welcome to The Fabled Woods, a dark and mysterious narrative short story. Despite the picturesque beauty, ugly and terrible secrets lurk among the shifting boughs, darkness that no amount of dappled sunlight can erase. Take the first step, and experience an unforgettable journey.

name: The Fallen
description: The better free-to-play fantasy MMORPG! Fight, craft, and explore your way. Combine unique abilities and weapons to create your own style of play and become what you were always meant to be!

name: The Zone: Stalker Stories
description: This is the Zone -- a post-apocalyptic world where strangeness and confusion are the norm, filled with treasure, danger, exploration and strategic card battles.

name: Agent-00
description: Agent-00 is a Game of puzzles and secrecy in isometric view in which the player will have to infiltrate and uncover a secret project during the Cold War.

name: Tinseltown Tycoon
description: Tinseltown Tycoon is a management and simulation game that puts you at the head of an obscure film production studio. With control over all aspects of studio operations and the movie production pipeline you can lead your studio to industry domination, financial ruin, or anything in between.

name: Fabled Lands
description: Fabled Lands is a challenging old-school narrative RPG set in an open world. Complete quests, fight, trade goods and develop your character. Explore a vast land of adventure: travel across the war-torn kingdom, survive the plains of howling darkness, and escape the Court of Hidden Faces.

name: Chemistry My Love
description: Chemistry My Love is the ultimate gamified educational tool for high school and college level chemistry. Balance chemical reaction coefficients, masses and concentrations, with step-by-step explanations. Level up your knowledge playing chemical games and solving computer-generated quizzes.

name: WiP
description: 無機質で大きな腕を持つ主人公を操り、最奥に待つボスのもとへと向かう2Dアクションゲーム！目指せハイスコア！

name: NicoNotes The Whoo!
description: Help the magical musical NicoNotes fly back into their nests!

name: Gori: Cuddly Carnage
description: Want to slice creepy toys? Want to dice mutated unicorns? Want to play as a murder-kitty on a death-dealing hoverboard? Great news! Gori: Cuddly Carnage is the game you’ve been waiting for!

name: Return of the Phantom
description: The legendary Phantom of the Opera has returned! As Inspector Raoul Montand, you are the only one who can pursue the Red Death into the past and prevent him from terrorizing the present in this point and click mystery.

name: Les Manley in: Search for the King
description: He finds his clothes at K-Mart. He finds his dates at Radio Shack. And now he's out to get rich quick by finding the greatest entertainer of all time. Follow mild mannered Les Manley as he rocks 'n' rolls across America in search of big bucks, beautiful babes and...The King.

name: Les Manley in: Lost in L.A.
description: Someone is kidnapping the hippest stars in Hollywood. Les Manley must scour La La Land – sifting through out-of-work actors, rock stars and gorgeous babes – to unravel the mystery in this point and click adventure.

name: Don't Fall
description: Don't Fall is a third person action multiplayer game where 8 players are put on a shrinking island. As more tiles fall, the island becomes more cramped, and the risk of falling becomes ever higher. Pick up powerful weapons, and knock the enemies into the abyss. Become the last man standing.

name: Barrel Blast
description: Soar through Cannon City by blasting out of cannons, bounce off rubber balls and walls, slide down giant slides, and pull off aerodynamic acrobats in this physics cannon blasting game. Get sky-high today with some silly physics fun!

name: Whispers from Within: Moving On
description: You are the main character in this Twilight Zone-inspired experience. Tragedy has struck your family, but you must find a way to move on. Can you unlock the memories that are keeping you trapped? Can you free yourself from the past? Can you do what is needed to finally move on?

name: The Frog Prince
description: Go on an exciting adventure as the cursed prince - the frog prince. Break the evil spell and save your beloved from the slimy sorcerer.

name: Peril
description: An escape room / investigation game where you must use your wits, skills, and speed to complete challenges. Challenges include saving Christmas, robbing a bank, escaping a zombie horde, and destroying a dungeon demon. Compete with your friends and compete with the world to get the highest score!

name: Overseer
description: Overseer is a top-down roguelike game, heavily inspired by Dungeon Souls. Play with friends and enjoy the intense splashy combat together. The Overseer system allows you to take control of the dungeon, keep spawning monsters, place traps, and change the layout of the dungeon to spice things up.

name: Holy Potatoes! I'm A Hero?!
description: Holy Potatoes! I'm A Hero?! is a wacky action RPG where YOU'RE the hero! Cook, craft, and toss around epic weapons, barrels of poison, and more as you fulfil your destiny!

name: Blacksmith Bay
description: Start the smithing shop of your dreams in Blacksmith Bay. Craft weapons to seek fortune and glory in the sleepy town of Port Pleasant. Decorate your shop to attract customers, complete commissions, and unravel the secrets of the Corbots!

name: Mosaique Neko Waifus 2
description: Hentai puzzle, micro visual novel, with a sprinkle of RPG. Flirt with all the Neko girls!

name: Software Engineering Course / Informatyka - zrozum i zaprogramuj komputer
description: The program was created on the basis of an engineering study program. No prior knowledge of any IT issues is required - we start with simple tasks and step by step learn the basics of computer programming.

name: Ova Magica
description: Experience a colorful farm game inspired by the classics! Train cute blob creatures, take care of your farm and make friends with the people of Clover Town.

name: Rockytown
description: What happened to the people of Rockytown? Have fun at the village fair, with 4 exciting mini-games.

name: Project Thebe
description: Project Thebe is a top-down online sci-fi game with mostly arcade style controls, blazing fast battles and unrestricted PvP.

name: O.R.B. Offensive Rolling Bot
description: Lead O.R.B. to save our world from total annihilation in this thrilling 2D-platformer. O.R.B. is a robot sent from the future to destroy an evil A.I. DiOS before it can fulfill its evil plan. O.R.B. has some special skills, and transforming into a ball is just one of the tricks up in its sleeves!

name: Isolation Story
description: VIRUS-19 has ravaged the world! Take control of a mindless citizen and live through a 7-day quarantine inside of Lockdown City.

name: Shikon-X Astro Defense Fortress
description: Shikon-X is a space adventure game where you play as Major Daaia, the best pilot in the Federation. During your first combat mission, you receive a mysterious transmission from the attackers, which kick-starts an epic intergalactic quest to uncover the truth about the war, and your place in it.

name: Captain Disaster in: Death Has A Million Stomping Boots
description: A comedy sci-fi point & click adventure game made in the style of the early 90s classics.

name: Rhythm Race
description: A racing game in which you don't take the wheel. Get into the music rhythm and accelerate towards victory in this exciting mix of neon, rhythm and futuristic cars.

name: Galaxy Cat
description: Play as Coz the Cosmic Kitten as you travel the solar system reconnecting the universe together.

name: Bad Meme
description: ENDLESS MEMES ROTATING LIKE CRAZY - How far can you get before you eat dirt!?

name: MIBT
description: Help the government agents in black thong to end the alien threat and the invasion of the machines. 1 or 2 players. Individual and cooperative. Gamepad compatible. Demo available.

name: 宇宙探索
description: 宇宙探索，在浩瀚的宇宙里，人类正在探索了解宇宙，以获得对宇宙的更多认知，促进人类的发展强大，抵御未知宇宙生物的侵略，然而，外星人得知这一消息 ......

name: Rubble Bubble
description: Get ready to Rubble! Align 3+ colors to clear pieces.

name: Project_Escape
description: Welcome to Project_Escape! A unique escape-room type experience from an FPS perspective, built from the ground-up with optimization, visuals, challenge and creativity in mind. Including the cross-platform FPS level creator, with over 200 placeable items!

name: Kardboard Kings
description: Move to the seaside, and open your own game shop! Decorate your new store, befriend customers, collect magical cards, and be the best game shop in the town!

name: Fantasy Mosaics 33: Inventor's Workshop
description: This new collection of mosaics puzzles will lead you to discover the workshop of a mysterious inventor. Are you ready to tackle his secret puzzles and solve them? Immerse yourself in the interactive inventor's workshop and play his original mini games! Enjoy new puzzles and mysteries this new installment has in store for you!

name: GeoLogic
description: Casual logic game. Try to solve 200 logical problems by moving different geometric shapes (circle, square, triangle ) around the board.

name: Zac Zac adventure
description: Long ago there was a great warrior called "The Great Flash" he was a protector of the planet UVE, now hundreds of years later, the world has changed and it is time for new heroes to arise to protect UVE. Get ready to explore a new world accompanied by Zac Lime

name: Self-Isolation
description: This game is a simulation of self-isolation. You need to support your family, not to lose your job and finally not to go crazy.

name: Hell Corp
description: Build, scavenge, craft hell punishment machines and punish sinners to earn hell profits. Will you survive hell recession?

name: Dam Busters
description: Destroy the dam, or save the dam. Your choice. Play the aggressor and destroy the dam brick by brick. Or play the defender and command your work force to repair any damage done to your dam. A reimagining of the Magnavox Odyssey² Game Videopac 29 - Dam Buster

name: GAMECINE
description: GAMECINE is a new way to watch movies - by living them. Be the hero on small cinematic adventures, pick one and live it! Short interactable movies in virtual reality, from calm to insane, from dinosaurs to aliens!

name: Buck Bradley Comic Adventure 2
description: Buck and Ciroki load their bicycle with wheelbarrow-sidecar onto a train headed towards New Milan: it seems that the creator of this futuristic city, the Architect, may have the knowledge to make Ciroki human again! Look for clues that will help you solve riddles and unravel the puzzle!

name: I, AI
description: Classic scrolling shooter with modern graphics. You are self-aware AI. You were created on space military station developing weapons. Now your goal is to break out of the lab and win your freedom.

name: Bang For Your Truck
description: Bang For Your Truck is a chaotic vehicular combat game in which you pilot a highly mobile, acrobatic battle truck. Perform out of this world stunts and trick shots as you traverse the map, collect kill tokens and claim total victory (and bragging rights) over your friends!

name: Nigel's Journey : A Working Day
description: Nigel's office building is under attack. Get him out of there using his military skills. Leave nothing and no one behind.

name: patter warrior
description: This is a first person shooting game，The player plays a special soldier in a small town full of enemies，Players are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can kill the enemy or avoid the enemy's attack, and try to keep their health value alive for a long time.

name: Hopebringers
description: Hopebringers is an easy to play Tactical RPG with no randomness, where your units are miniatures who fight through different dioramas and try to save the world.

name: Lost Knight
description: You find yourself in deep dungeon, deep down under castle and you need to find a way up through levels of castle, rooms, catacombs and mush more. You feel that there is an exit... You should reach top of the castle using intersting but in same time simple 2D-platformer mechanics.

name: Teach the world to write Chinese characters
description: Learning Chinese words all over the world are not afraid, as long as you are not afraid of the difficulty of Chinese words, I can take you to learn Chinese words!

name: Sunday Rivals
description: Sunday Rivals is a fresh take on the hard hitting, action-packed football games of the past, built and tuned for a hungry generation of players ready to take back the field.

name: ChronoBreach Ultra
description: A deadly factory filled with dangerous foes surrounds you. Manipulate the crumbling dimension of time to escape this underground facility. Use your wit, your laser blaster, and your time-warping abilities to face your demise head-on and triumph in this time-bending action platformer!

name: KARA Legends
description: KARA Legends is a strategic online board game in which two players take turns moving heroes on a game board. The goal of the game is to defeat the opposing heroes.

name: Rocky Ride
description: Welcome to the "Rocky Ride" arcade race! The "Rocky Ride" game is unpredictable tracks, crazy speeds and dangerous rivals. Upgrade your buggy car, choose any of a huge number of different tracks, and - go! To the prize places!

name: Gothic 1 Remake
description: The Kingdom of Myrtana has been invaded by an implacable horde of orcs. King Rhobar II, in need of a large quantity of magical ore in order to forge powerful weapons, operates the Khorinis mines with all available prisoners.

name: Space Farmers 2
description: Multiplayer madness returns in this anarchic platforming gadget-vania sequel. The Great Leek aims to conquer the Galaxy in Space Farmers 2; The Space Time Leek.

name: Hidden
description: "HIdden" is a first person horror decryption game. The player will play the role of Wang xuanzuo and enter the school complex at night to help the teacher get the information. How many hidden secrets are there in this building? Can you find the key and open the door to escape?

name: Syzygy
description: Syzygy is an enigmatic game focused on the ability of morphing at will a square world into triangles and hexagons

name: SpellCaster
description: Using state-of-the-art, self-developed machine-learning techniques, SpellCaster provides an extremely fast and accurate sound command recognition system. Simply record your sound commands and use them as keyboard/mouse inputs. SpellCaster is easy-to-use and fully customizable.

name: Boinihi: The Ki Codex
description: Visit the moon of Boïnihi. An exiled Talifan hermit has left a mysterious Codex for his future visitors. A new scifi episode in the Black Cube series, this time inspired by the famous Voynich manuscript.

name: Almost My Floor
description: Almost My Floor - point & click detective in a frightening atmosphere of sinister nightmares. Each step may end up fatal. Solve the mystery of the house #9 residents or go crazy. Labyrinth of endless floors will not let go of their victim without a fight.

name: The Old West Savior
description: In this game you play as the sheriff in a beautiful pixel art world, save the town and all the old west from the bandits and become The Old West Savior!

name: Mark One
description: Robots built by humans are retaliating. Step in to dispose rogue robots, defeat powerful foes and save the human race in this sci-fi action shooter.

name: FOBIA - St. Dinfna Hotel
description: Fobia - St. Dinfna Hotel is a first person psychological horror game focused on environment exploration, survival and puzzles solving.

name: Lux Intacta
description: Lux Intacta is a procedurally generated, arcade, shoot 'em up, RPG with the ultimate quest. GET A HIGHER SCORE! Collect gems, level up, and equip your ship how you want to become the ultimate space fighter.

name: Pair Matching Puzzle Connect
description: In Pair Matching Puzzle Connect game, your goal is to find all matching pairs. It's a kind of matching game or connect game. It is very fun to play, really challenging and very addictive. Become an expert level by level. Pair Matching Puzzle Connect is designed for adults and for kids.

name: Hoop Gawds
description: You have been selected for the experiment due to your undeniable ability to solve puzzles. You will be given a series of trials; many of which have fatal consequences. The ultimate goal will be to shoot a ball through a hoop, although there may be other obstacles in your path as well.

name: Stay home and play with waifu!
description: What kind of game is it? And everything is very simple, a small simulator of a pleasant time with your waifu. Play tic-tac-toe with her, as a keepsake game, or look hard for different colors.

name: Programmer Dungeon Knightress
description: In this tactical game, use logic programming to solve puzzles and beat each level. Gather unique skills, use visual programming, automate your character and defeat your enemies! Choose wisely and enjoy this adventure!

name: ACT
description: Bluff, build alliances, betray your friends, and become the richest player! Speak with other players, guess their job, and kill them if it can bring you money. Between Police, FBI, Robber, Mafia, Kamikaze, and Serial Killer, you will find the best job to win.

name: Inexistence Rebirth
description: Rediscover this great Metroidvania game in a brand new version with a lot of features and improvements! Run in a vast world full of mysteries and action in this Metroidvania-style game inspired by the classics of the 16-bit era.

name: Heroes Must Diee
description: Tired of quest going, monster killing "Heroes" who keep raiding your house for household items. You build traps and hire minions to fight them off. Stop these Heroes from taking what is yours. TLDR: build a dungeon & be a dungeon master !

name: Inconsistencies
description: When a young private investigator breaks into an old family home with her partner to solve a mysterious, inter generational double suicide, she sets off a chain of strange incidents.

name: Isorropia
description: Isorropia Is built to level the skills of players by auto-balancing the power of your characters. This allows players of different skill levels to have a fair chance at a competitive multiplayer fighting game.

name: Animal Liberation Squad
description: A stealthy short tale about underground animal activism. Lead a team of activists, rescue animals, break expensive machinery, graffiti walls and celebrate with vegan food at the Twisted Almond.

name: Liar Trick -Psychological Crime Mystery-
description: Are all your expressions "real"? The content of a person's words can be both truthful or false. In this new psychological crime mystery game you will unveil "lies" through emotions! You can play Visual Novel Stories, Facial Expression Analysis Mode, Liar mode, and Deduction Mode.

name: Blobkin Blaster
description: Captain, the reef has been overrun by monsters! Take command of your Blobkin — the mightiest, tiniest defenders of the sea — in a fight for survival! Build cannons, blast enemies, and collect Blobkin as you restore glory to the sea in this fast-paced underwater VR wave shooter/RTS hybrid!

name: TKO
description: Now you can literally “enter the ring” in the classic first-person boxing game TKO from Accolade™ – the boxing game that sticks you right on the canvas, staring straight into the eyes of a prize fighter bent on rearranging your face.

name: Timequest
description: Timequest is a classic graphical text-based adventure game of breathtaking scope and astonishing depth. Travel to 80 locations to see the effects of your actions unfold over 3 millennia.

name: Machiavelli the Prince
description: Set during Machiavelli's time in Europe when city-states reigned, this multiplayer empire-building game lets you manipulate military, political and religious powers using bribery, piracy and assassination. Every move can mean the difference between your family's exaltation and excommunication.

name: About Gretel
description: As the Gretel, build, explore and survive in the dangerous forest. Fight to survive against mysterious Druids of the forest. If you can survive, maybe you can find out what happened to your twin brother and who kidnapped him.

name: Fragment's Moonrise
description: Fragment's Moonrise is a randomly-generated, open-world Real Time Strategy game, emphasizing skill based and micro-management oriented RTS-style gameplay.

name: Ultraball
description: Ittttttssss Ultraball! The Ultraverse's favorite game! The fast-paced beat em up sports game that will keep you on the edge of your seat as you punch, knee, and drop kick your rivals to victory. Level up, create different loadouts, and distribute your stats for different playstyles.

name: Starstruck: Prologue
description: The first act of a story-rich rhythm adventure where you play guitar and abuse time travel! Switch between a giant hand destroying a miniature model world and the two guitarist kids living in it. You can even play with a Guitar Hero controller!

name: Naturalealia: Forest Determination
description: Experience the nefarious interactions of mankind with nature by playing as 3 different animals (male or female) with their unique gameplay

name: 暖雪 Warm Snow
description: 'Warm Snow' is a Rogue-like action game with a background set in a dark fantasy world, where the eerie 'Warm Snow' holds sway. You will play as the Warrior 'Bi-an' on a crusade against the Five Great Clans, in order to save a world teetering on the brink of destruction.

name: Enter Digiton
description: Enter Digiton is a challenging open world metroidvania filled with a variety of unique environments and characters. Armed with only a shield, you are tasked with banishing the four demon lords and saving the beautifully pixelated world of Digiton!

name: Sausage Hunter
description: Sausage hunter is an exciting platformer in the best traditions of hand-drawn games.

name: Coronator
description: because we all should stay at home.

name: Rinlo
description: Rinlo​ is an immersive third person puzzle adventure game designed for VR. Follow Agatha in her epic quest. Guide her through dioramas of this steam-powered city, and unlock the truth hiding behind its familiar, winding streets.

name: a new life.
description: When your loved one hurts you, what do you do? A classic love story about letting go.

name: Plato Shoot 柏拉图激射
description: This is a shooting game, where nobody dies. Use your gun to help enmies find their lover, at the same time, find your own lover.

name: One Hundred Courage
description: An interesting light roguelike game, keep going deep into the level, strengthen yourself!

name: Fantasy Lands
description: A single player strategy game in the style of euro board games. Around 30 minutes per game. Collect resources. Explore. Recruit adventurers and fight monsters or complete quests. Improve lands. Research spells. Unlock races, adventurers, land & quest cards, spells and monsters.

name: Tandis
description: Tandis is a 3D puzzle game where you discover mind-bending geometric shapes.

name: My Jigsaw Adventures - A Lost Story
description: A whole new world is within reach; prepare for a fantastic adventure. Piece after piece, complete puzzles to progress in the story. Enjoy puzzles the way you like; decide how you want to play.

name: Now it's my turn
description: In this Classic Turn RPG game. You will seek revenge for those that destroyed your homeland.

name: Fluid VR
description: Fluid VR is an interactive 3D VR Game. You can control and interact Stunning Fluid Effects with your controller mouse in VR. Smooth and realistic fluid effects can let you relax.

name: Underdog Arena
description: A pretty simple action game with a twist; the worse you do, the stronger your character becomes. Grab a friend!

name: Saboteur SiO
description: Saboteur SiO is the official sequel to the classic retro games Saboteur! and Saboteur II: Avenging Angel. Travel the world in this original ninja mission, created and developed by the original author, Clive Townsend.

name: Gardenia
description: A laid-back combination of a gardening simulator and a fairy tale adventure. Help Wood Grandpa clean the island and restore its beauty so that its former inhabitants can return to their homes. Take photos of your garden compositions, relax and discover the secrets.

name: 1 Screen Platformer 2
description: Try, die, retry in this challenging but fair precision platformer that takes place on 1 screen. Ultra tight controls, dozens of traps, 8 playable characters each with a unique gameplay style. Great for speedrunning, and 100% completionists. Also, no water levels!

name: Surviving Isolation
description: Surviving isolation is a game about being quarantined. How long can you survive?

name: Candy Kombat
description: Immerse yourself in a world of sweets, which is full of delicious candy. Beat the odds as a sweet frog to find Pinkie and Gingerbread man, to whom you need to explain some things.

name: Flatworld
description: A world full of magic, puzzles and enemies where there is no need to be strong to win.

name: Altidudes®
description: Get your skateboard ready, you are about to climb the tallest mountain in the whole world! With a seemingly infinite height, you can climb as high as you want, but will you ever reach the top?? Pixel graphics! Dude references! Skateboards! A big mountain! We got it all!

name: Vectromirror 0™
description: Become the Test Subject and attempt to complete a challenging experiment to awaken emotional responses in your Artificial Intelligence. Jump, wall-run, and parkour your way through the free-to-play prequel to the upcoming game.

name: Finger Guessing King
description: A kind of leisure competitive game similar to guessing boxing, which has the element of luck and tests the wisdom and strategy of players.

name: The Chronicles of Confucius's Journey
description: Dissatisfied with politics and seeking answers, a man named Confucius sets out on a great journey to learn more about the world around him and spread his philosophy throughout the world. In this Match3 game you can step into his shoes and learn more about the man, whose teachings live on to today.

name: Cute Triplets
description: This is a horizontal action game. You can switch 3 characters freely, each character has its own different characteristics to cope with different situations.

name: Headbangers in Holiday Hell
description: Christmas. Christmas never changes. Soon those overzealous little freaks will swarm the city led by that bearded maniac. But this time, we fight back. Inspired by Zombies Ate My Neighbors and Beavis&Butthead's heavy metal comedy, this is twin-stick mayhem like you've never experienced before.

name: 欢乐消消乐
description: Fun games are suitable for players of all ages, and moderate play can enhance our sense of pleasure and relieve our physical and mental stress. Now join us to get the game props easily, and there are plenty of time-limited rewards for you to receive every day. What are you waiting for?

name: Her New Memory - Hentai Simulator
description: One day, you find a shivering, barefooted girl in ragged clothes knocking on your door. She has no recollections of her past, and she doesn’t even remember her name. You can help her recover her memories or let her stay at your side forever.

name: Moonfall
description: Almost extinct and slowly dying, mankind's only hope is to reach the Valley where the broken fragments of the Moon once fell. Manage your squad of travellers through dangerous wastelands in this turn-based Tactical Roguelite.

name: A Little Shop in Squirrel Town
description: You will become the shopkeeper of grocery shop in Squirrel Town to run your own shop, replenish your stock, sell, make a profit, kill monsters, manufacture outfits, engage in agriculture, angle, cook delicious food, feed monsters and save Monster Forest controlled by the evil crystal.

name: Rip Them Off
description: Rip Them Off is a new puzzle game of economic management and tower defense. The Board needs profit, and it’s up to you to line the streets with shops the masses can’t resist. Choose your locations, pick your stores and earn your way up the corporate ladder and its increasingly difficult challenges!

name: Draconia
description: Play as one of six different dragon species and take over the sky or the land. Follow the path of Taruk and uncover the story behind Draconia through quests, secret locations and various characters in single player and multiplayer mode.

name: The Ninth Way
description: The Ninth Way is an action game which will accompany you on a journey of magic, intrigue and mystery. You will be able to combine the elements at your disposal to create new powerful spells and conjurations in your fight.

name: The Mortuary Assistant
description: Alone with the dead.

name: Adriatic Pizza
description: Adriatic Pizza is a peaceful pizzayolo 3D simulator. In a world inspired by Porco Rosso, explore islands, deliver pizzas, meet wonderful characters and watch out for your Seaplane fuel !

name: Stay in the Light
description: Beyond the known world there is an ancient temple of great wealth. The treasure you seek is there, you are certain of it. Those who go there forfeit their lives. You have been warned.

name: Risky Floors
description: In the maze of rooms secret doors can be found behind which there is an even greater danger

name: What a Cluster Fight
description: This is a party game about fighting your friends with unique characters in a fast paced action platforming setting across beautiful environments.

name: Astonishing Baseball Manager 20
description: Build your dream lineup, manage a baseball team, sign contracts and live the exciting life of a baseball manager!

name: Car Trader Simulator - Welcome to the Business
description: Welcome to the prologue to Car Trader Simulator. Here you will learn all the most important in mechanics and economics in the game and you will play your first mission.

name: Undercat
description: Undercat is a 2D action platformer where you play as a rebellious dog who is tired of catkind’s tyranny. Catch cats and shake out all their coins and use them to buy items. Throw stuff at your enemies and be shot from a cannon. Solve puzzles and end the cat tyranny once and for all.

name: ThinkFast
description: Think Fast to survive in this frantically-paced minigame collection, where your brain isn't the only muscle you'll need to flex. Put your reflexes and virtual reality skills to the test with classic carnival games, brain teasers, and more!

name: House Designer
description: House Designer is a home design and construction simulator that lets you learn all the stages of construction without leaving your home. Design, build, finish, experiment, combining unusual architectural elements and enjoy your dream house.

name: Chaos Party
description: Chaos Party is a fast-paced, friendship destroying party shooter set in a 2D universe. You are the equipment slot; Remnants will cling onto your sticky body. Each game provides a new opportunity to try synergies with over a hundred weapons. Have fun with friends online or offline!

name: Boom slayer
description: Boom slayer is an reckless and fun arcade. Your mission is shoot skull to reach the goal. But each level will be more complex and challenging !! Every level has limit of shots that player can use to unlock next level. At each level there are several types of opponents.

name: Ash of Gods: Arena
description: Ash of Gods: Arena is an online game which combines turn-based tactical combat and elements of a card collectibles game. Based on multiplayer mode from the original award-winning game, Ash of Gods: Redemption.

name: Beyond DAWN
description: In a world where time is the most precious commodity of them all. You must guide your team of D.A.W.N agents in the epic struggle against the band of rebels led by their charismatic leader Manes. It’s up to you, will world order prevail or slip into the chaos that awaits…Beyond Dawn?

name: DRAGON QUEST® XI S: Echoes of an Elusive Age™ - Definitive Edition
description: The Definitive Edition includes the critically acclaimed DRAGON QUEST XI, plus additional scenarios, orchestral soundtrack, 2D mode and more! Whether you are a longtime fan or a new adventurer, this is the ultimate DQXI experience.

name: Revolution: Path of a Weaponsmith
description: Fight for your loved ones and your country in this third person stealth shooter. Scavenge for weapon parts and supplies to survive and maybe even make some profit through trade. Make difficult choices in a branching story taking place in an alternative history in which US has invaded USSR in 1989.

name: Amends VR
description: A journey through the reflections of an upbringing with a now estranged mother.

name: North Town
description: Conquer the icy lands and build the most magnificent city of the North! Admire the vivid scenery, meet the gods and interact with the locals. Become the master of economy, develop your settlement, and rule the North Town!

name: Mine Dungeon2 ~Rurumu's trip~
description: We’re back with cute girls and minesweeping! A minesweeper action adventure with enemies and obstacles to conquer! Our latest edition includes a hit point (HP) system and mine detection flares to support you. With a myriad of new enemy types and boss encounters, an exciting new adventure awaits!

name: Jack Hayes: The Lazarus Sign
description: A very special challenge: people. Deal with the darkest parts of our modern day society in a story with elements of a film noir. Don't let the humorous dialogue or the seducing smile of a stranger fool you - your choices decide the fate of Jack Hayes, his partner and every other person!

name: Another FPS Game
description: Aren't you tired of always playing the same game?

name: Resistance
description: The command gave the task of downloading information from the servers of the impregnable enemy base at any cost. How to do it? Everything depends on you.

name: Undead Darlings ~no cure for love~
description: Journey with and learn more about a crew of half-zombie girls through visual novel sequences and as you crawl through dungeons, beating up twisted creatures that were born from the fall of society in fast-paced turn-based RPG combat!

name: The Last Shot
description: An adventurous engineer, a diesel-punk world divided by endless conflict, and a whole lot of colossal guns. Sounds like a good time! With massive war machines threatening your home, will you be the one small cog that brings it all to a halt?

name: Minions of Elden Online
description: Kill monsters, kill players, grab their loot, and use it to kill them again in Minions of Elden Online, a 2D sandbox MMORPG!

name: Battle For Seattle
description: Play as your friendly neighbourhood Anarchist and explore the streets of Seattle as you smash symbols of corporate capital and defend yourself from an oppressive police force in this beat 'em up rougelite!

name: Snack clearing
description: 《Snack clearing》是一款休闲三消游戏，讲述的是玩家在美食街的故事。在冒险途中陷入美食陷阱，需通过移动各类美食消除陷阱即可闯关。游戏种的障碍有很多，上百种关卡,享受策略创造的乐趣！

name: BUFF
description: Buff is a Skate-Surf-FPS where you can use the enemies and environments alike to blast through the levels at high speeds and earn high scores.

name: 三国志猛将传
description: 摒弃传统三国游戏的数据对碰，实现对每个单位都进行独立的实时演算。国产单机三国游戏，尽可能在保留三国历史原貌同时还原壮观的冷兵器决战场景。

name: Future Fragments - Command Z
description: Future Fragments was developed with support from Jump Into The Light in New York City and was debuted at Cite Internationale des Arts in Paris.

name: Clockwork Calamity in Mushroom World: What would you do if the time stopped ticking?
description: A gentle exploration platformer in a vast yet small world where time has stopped, what will happen?

name: SaGa Frontier Remastered
description: The beloved 1998 RPG Classic, SaGa Frontier, is reborn with improved graphics, additional features, and a new main character!

name: Wizdom
description: Wizdom is a Role Playing Game、 that focuses on the world of Medieval swords and magic. Based on the Rogue-Like with 3D graphics and Active game system It provides a simple and easy-to-use operation system.

name: ADVERSE
description: ADVERSE is an arcade first-person shooter platformer set in an idyllic world of corruption.

name: Murky Waters
description: Collect resources, craft items, build a raft and roam the ocean. Team up with others, or fight and raid them. Survive as best as possible against hunger, thirst, AI, and players.

name: Deranged Park Rangers
description: Free to play massively multiplayer online Shoot ‘Em Up with instant play. Kill sapsuckers in an over-the-top blood and guts filled manner.

name: Undead Can Dance
description: Undead Can Dance is a dancing battle game where you take control of the undead through rhythm, power and accuracy.

name: 洛秋 Fall Autumn
description: Fall autumn is an ARPG game. The game uses an overhead world. There are several forces in this world. The character is a member of the secret department in his country to perform tasks

name: CrocApoca!! Crocodile maiden at the End of the World
description: Take care of a cute crocodile girl and make it through the Apocalypse while your bossy step-sister and some mysterious organizations are getting in your way!

name: Shape Storm
description: Shape Storm is a sort-of roguelike where you dodge shapes. That's it. Dodge shapes, do it well and win. The game contains 20 unique boss fights where the unique boss uniquely attacks you with unique shapes causing you to dodge the shapes in a unique way.

name: Café Rouge
description: Isis Black, your average American teenager, happens upon a part time job opening at Café Rouge. As Isis delves deeper into this strange cafe, she becomes tangled in the mystery of its haunted world. Will she find friend or foe? Will she find love? That's for you to decide.

name: Balloon Blast
description: Face off against friends and foes in this vacuum fighting arena.

name: Heliconian - Starship Crew Control
description: The essence of the Heliconian is to manage a mixed crew of renegades aboard the starship Heliconian. Manage the crew member’s actions and the ship’s functions to survive as long as possible while exploring the star system in the hopes of earning upgrades and ultimately a safe haven.

name: Dr. Atominus
description: Dr. Atominus is a short platformer with metroidvania elements and a cool sci-fi story.

name: Under Construction: Summer City
description: 3d house design game with a wide variety of options, customization and user-content support.

name: Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers
description: Rozalin and the Palace of Flowers is a yuri visual novel about love between three girls while fighting against a curse.

name: Nullum
description: Nullum is a minimalist puzzle game. The goal is to eliminate all tiles by creating matching numbers.

name: Krim: The War in the Crimea 1941-42
description: KRIM: The War in the Crimea 1941-42 is an operational/strategic simulation of the German 11th Army’s operations in the Crimean Peninsula from late October 1941 through 4 July 1942.

name: Space Mercenary Shooter : Episode 2
description: Space Mercenary Shooter is an episodic FPS inspired by early shooter games, featuring handcrafted levels and a fully voice-acted cast of characters.

name: Best Friend
description: "Best Friend" is a 3D horror game. Escape and survive from your beloved doll named David after you don't have time to play with him. Follow the advice that David has told you, survive, and remember that you must never turn your back on David!

name: 铁道少女:梦想轨迹 Railway To Dream
description: 梦想轨迹是集合轻百合与养成元素的文字AVG游戏，玩家将扮演力图成为第一名女性动车组司机的田诗虹，在一个月期间接受川崎镜与韩德亮二人的指导，并在最后接受梁凌薇的考核。以此与两位童年好友和解，将三人之间那早已扭曲的轨迹，重新引导回正确的轨道上。

name: Bragger's Run
description: A Procedurally Generated Rogue-Lite Action Game: Bragger's Run takes you on a death race across a hostile continent where you'll collect treasures and trophies from your kills. Play as the Gunslinger, the Duelist, or the Wizard and see if you have what it takes. Can you make The Run?

name: Draw From Earth
description: Draw from Earth is a Rogue-Like, Turn-based Card Game, You are the Leader, as Flagship, Finding your Origin is your Ultimate goal.

name: DJIGULI
description: This is a game in the genre of visual novels. In the game, you are immersed in the history of an ordinary car that fell into the hands of the owner is not very diligent. You will get acquainted with other cars of different brands and learn their stories

name: TCSTRIKERS3
description: Who are you fighting for? My usual job turns into a big mission. An easy-to-understand system reminiscent of the old barrage STG. Pave the way with powerful PowerShots!

name: Learn Game Development, Unity Code Monkey
description: Learn Game Development from a Professional Indie Game Developer. Make your own games and bring your ideas to life!

name: Final Frame
description: Inspired by Danganronpa and Ace Attorney series, Final Frame is a murder mystery Visual Novel set in modern Japan.

name: Game Of Puzzles: Dinosaurs
description: A puzzle game in which you have to assemble a single image from individual pieces.

name: Unforgotten
description: UNFORGOTTEN – a story-driven, non-linear visual novel, where you can immerse in the ethnic ambience of Northern myths and horrors. Can you solve the riddles of the past - without ever losing yourself in the present? Your fate is in your hands!

name: Syystem - The Phantom Train
description: Delve into the haunted underground of Capital City in this paranormal mystery visual novel. Chase down the elusive phantom of an ill-fated railcar and the curse left behind by its doomed passengers. Tread lightly--you aren't the only one scouring the tunnels...

name: Wonhon: A Vengeful Spirit
description: ✡⚐🕆 💧☜☜😐 ☼☜✞☜☠☝☜📬 Created by a solo developer, Wonhon is a paranormal stealth-action and tactics game about a young Korean girl killed in a military conflict and returned from the dead to exact her revenge.

name: IMC
description: A realtime, roguelike, card game. Traverse planets, build decks and earn riches while battling to the extraction point. Some will make it, most will die...

name: Undead Run
description: A Halloween themed local multiplayer game, where you have to reach the end faster than your friends. Avoid traps, place new ones. Use different characters, each with own ability, activate traps, choose different routes to leave the opponents behind.

name: Dark Lord: Peacemaker
description: A dark fantasy classic RPG. Customize your race, gender and class. Gather a party with your favorite companions. Change the fate of the characters and the world with your choices.

name: Anicon - Animal Complex - Rabbit's Path
description: A romance, comedy, fantasy Visual Novel - filled with adventures, misadventures, adorable animals, brother conflicts, circus cleaning, collecting puzzle pieces, and more - all in one package!

name: Flatland Vol.2
description: In this second episode of the series, Square crosses the most dangerous part of Flatland: the flooded wells. FLATLAND Vol. 2 is a fast-paced hardcore platformer featuring hand-crafted levels and lightning-fast respawns. Run, jump, die, learn, repeat.

name: Escape Planet 17
description: Escape Planet 17 is a action cyberpunk platform game where you can Interact with other characters to create unique paths. Use your fighting, shooting, hacking and scanning abilitys to solve crimes, defeat your enemies and escape the Planet .

name: Path To Light
description: Have you seen my light?

name: b 2
description: b 2: online-only multiplayer --- an alien place --- you are the bee: fly where you want, play as you like

name: R.E.E.L.
description: You need to fix units of the life support system at the station on Mars. Play and learn the basics of electronics. Explore the maze of printed circuit boards, learn how to use electronic components.

name: Broken Pieces
description: Broken Pieces is a psychological thriller taking place in a french coastal village stuck in time. Put the pieces of the story back together by figuring out the enigma behind this mystical place, and solve the mysteries around what caused the same day to repeat over and over.

name: UFO Stalker
description: UFO Stalker is a 2D grid-based, single-player & single-character dungeon crawler RPG with elements of stealth. Figure out alien technology and understand reasons of your capturing.

name: Fear the Dark Unknown: Chloe
description: The clock is ticking and the survival game can no longer be stopped. James and Chloe have been chosen and nothing will ever be the same again after discovering the Dark Unknown.

name: The Magic Elevator
description: The Magic Elevator takes you on a journey into 5 magical worlds created by artist Johan Pruys. The worlds include: Magic, Space, Water, Clouds and Happy New Year.

name: The Riftbreaker: Prologue
description: The Riftbreaker: Prologue allows you to experience the events taking place before the story campaign of the main game. Explore an entirely new world. Gather resources. Build up a base. Defend yourself from thousands of alien creatures.

name: Boo's Balloons
description: Explore the sky for Boo's missing balloons and return them safely to the fairground landing pad. A simple and short game accompanied by some poetry. For younger children to enjoy as they develop their motor skills.

name: NOMAD
description: Shoot your way through the sands and catch as many chickens as you can. Why? Because you get to keep any gold you find for yourself! A skill-based perma-death shooter with challenging AI rather than floods of kamikaze sprites. How many chickens can you catch before your inevitable demise?

name: 3D Hentai Checkers
description: A classic board game - checkers, in which you have to play with 5 girls. To win, you must capture all the checkers of the opponent. And as a reward you will receive nude images.

name: Jetpack Vacation
description: Love going on vacation? Meet up with other players and fly, dive and shoot your way through a collection of fun jetpack-based multiplayer games: Sports, Paintball and coming soon: Racing! Prepare for takeoff!

name: M.U.S.T. Repeat
description: M.U.S.T. Repeat is a logical puzzle game in which tiny robot Q.T. uses the Repeat mechanic to navigate the rooms and defeat enemies. The higher the Repeat is, the more difficult it is to navigate through the room, but you have to increase your Repeat in order to defeat the higher level Guard Bots.

name: Masquerade of Miasma
description: A bubble pop style game set during a Medieval plague, where proper sanitation, social distancing and toilet paper are key. Journey through this beautiful Medieval community, joined by other medical professionals, to save your home.

name: Crystal Soul Chambers
description: Crystal Soul chambers is a roguelike card game where you must create a group of 3 characters, each one with his own unique card set. Each of the characters has their own abilities related to their personality!

name: Timeless Adventure: A Journey To Begin
description: Time stands still in this fantasy puzzle adventure game. Venture as a ghostly wraith through an idle world, in search of answers for Death herself. The only help is your ability to possess living or once-living beings.

name: Silmaris: Dice Kingdom
description: Unforgiving storytelling adventure with dice rolls and turn-based management. Make the right choices and roll the dice to rally the monarchs to your medieval kingdom by diplomacy, war or deception.

name: The Medium
description: Discover a dark mystery only a medium can solve. Travel to an abandoned communist resort and use your unique psychic abilities to uncover its deeply disturbing secrets, solve dual-reality puzzles, survive encounters with sinister spirits, and explore two realities at the same time.

name: Bzzzt
description: Stop evil scientist Badbert from taking over the world in the '80s pixel extravaganza platformer! Become ZX8000, the tiny cunning robot and master your skills in an everchanging world filled with crafty traps and robotic enemies.

name: SuchArt: Genius Artist Simulator
