description: Amanda meets Marian, who describes herself as a friend of her father's. And follow her to the mansion. A number of events that hit her while looking around the mansion. Can Amanda escape from the mansion?

name: Moving Out
description: Moving Out is a ridiculous physics-based moving simulator that brings new meaning to "couch co-op"! Are you ready for an exciting career in furniture? As a newly certified Furniture Arrangement & Relocation Technician, you’ll take on moving jobs all across the busy town of Packmore.

name: Echoes of the Past: The Citadels of Time Collector's Edition
description: Travel from the Dark Middle Ages to the present to save the inhabitants of the Orion kingdom in Echoes of the Past - The Citadels of Time!

name: Haunted Hotel: Eclipse Collector's Edition
description: Should anyone ever check in to a place called the Final Journey Hotel?

name: Redemption Cemetery: Children's Plight Collector's Edition
description: A warlock's curse has trapped you in an otherworldly cemetery! Explore Hidden Object scenes and save the warlock's victims!

name: Myths of the World: Black Rose Collector's Edition
description: Track down a vampire hiding on a Mississippi riverboat cruise.

name: Maestro: Dark Talent Collector's Edition
description: Diva's dark talent claims another victim – can you stop her before the curtain falls?

name: Fae Tactics
description: In Fae Tactics, follow a young magic user named Peony on her journey across a vibrant world full of mystery and danger. Summon allies, cast spells, and befriend a motley crew of characters as you dive into the growing conflicts between man and magical beings known as fae.

name: Dark Data
description: In a world driven by blackmail, time is not money...crime is. Do you have what it takes to uncover the truth while staring at the business end of a gun? Dark Data is a local multiplayer FPS based on the unreleased mid-nineties film of the same name.

name: Chieftain
description: Chieftain is a fantasy game of world conquest - containing elements of a procedurally generated 4X world, and real-time skirmishes including hundreds of soldiers on screen battling for your dominion and reign to be supreme!

name: King's League II
description: Lead your team to victory! Recruit, train and manage fighters of different classes before entering tactical battles of wit and glory. In this sequel to an award-winning strategy simulation RPG, can you climb the King’s League?

name: Strange and weird museum
description: The photographer visits the museum where the strange things happen. Take pictures of what is going on in strange and weird places.

name: SUBURI
description: NOTE : This App is a batting simulator NOT a usual video gameThis App is a VR batting simulator for kids who wants to improve their batting skills.The pitcher (right handed) will throwing balls into your 16 point pitch zone randomly so you can train your hand-eye coordination at home.

name: Quest for the Golden Duck
description: Run around the maze collecting coins while being chased by spooky monsters. Outsmart the enemies in 4-player co-op games, or play the versus mode as a monster to prevent the other team from stealing all the gold from the castle.

name: Mage VR -Mini Version-
description: Do you want to feel the power of mages? In this little game, you will be able to learn the postures that let you canalize the essence of magic itself. Fire balls, and 7 other spells, including Fire dragons will be there with you to help you kill your enemies.

name: Cryptofall: Investor simulator
description: Cryptofall is an investment simulator. Start as a trader during a cryptocurrency boom and explore all the possible ways to invest your wealth. Trade and even mine trending cryptocurrencies, growing your mining pool.

name: tia.sav
description: tia.sav is an experimental genre-melding game that tells a love story.

name: Buttle Tank
description: The good old genre of tank TDS is now in a new, improved quality. Modern pixel art, amazing sound design and gameplay.

name: Miracle Snack Shop
description: Try to find love while managing a Korean snack shop.

name: Threshold
description: There are multiple factions in the area that are looking for "critical items" in order to accomplish the mission. When one side finds it and brings it out, the other side will track it down. This is the only chance we have. Intercept it before they take it out.

name: Super president How to rule the country
description: Help the true patron of Mother Earth, Tsar Vladimir, to overcome his psychedelic trip and find the way to the desired Throne, so that order and prosperity could reign over the country once again.

name: Kadath
description: Experience a thrilling adventure in the icy caves of the Himalayas. Challenge your detective skills and uncover the mysterious fate of Elisa Schneider. Immerse yourself in a world of myth, occultism and horror.

name: Show me the way
description: I am a book of mazes. There are no entrances in halls of my pages, the history of world creation sleeps here. Do you remember that history? Then show me the way!

name: XLaunchpad
description: XLaunchpad gives you instant access to all your shortcuts.Arrange apps in XLaunchpad any way you like by dragging icons to different locations or by grouping apps in folders. Simply drag one icon over another to create a folder. you can name the folder whatever you like when you open the folder.

name: Truck Mechanic: Dangerous Paths
description: Truck Mechanic: Dangerous Paths is a truck driving simulator, in which you play as a professional driver and carry the most diverse loads across the South American frontiers where the greatest challenge is the wilderness and capricious aura of nature.

name: Jewel Puzzle Click
description: Jewel Puzzle Click is a game that you just need to find jewels of the same type that are close to each other and click on them to make them disappear and earn points. It is a very simple game with easy achievements to be completed.

name: Coffee VendoR
description: Tired of paying for VR mini games? Well now you can enjoy some mini games for FREE with Coffee VendoR.

name: Dark Sauce
description: Take gold from the dragon, and not become a barbecue. Colorful cubic platformer about pig and dragon

name: M.E.M.E.S.
description: You awaken in the eternal dimensions after living a life filled with meaningful suffering. Mr. ™ will show you around, and lead you to ACCOMPLISHEMENT. M.E.M.E.S. is a non-linear minimalistic RPG with an eerie vibe and surreal humor.

name: Hand to Hand Combat
description: Point your fingers, launch your attacks, and survive in Hand to Hand Combat! A Virtual Reality Action game made for the Valve Index Controllers. Slow Motion, Physics, Secret Agents!

name: Impulsow
description: Challenge your ability and your mind in this action puzzle with a unique gameplay where you use the impulse to move and overcome challenges ranging from thorns to missile launchers.

name: Aim Bot
description: The main focus of Aim Bot is to highly improve your aiming skills in a short amount of time. Compete in training scenarios or play levels designed to train your aim in different situations.

name: Tale of Fortune
description: Sexy anime girls are ready for pleasure. Make them hot and see what they can do when they are arouse and wild.

name: FREEDIVER: Triton Down
description: Plunge into VR on a capsizing research ship, the Triton, where survival means outmaneuvering the water's lethal surge. Freedive through a sinking ship, overcome underwater chaos, and unlock your path to the surface, all while protecting your most precious resource: the breath in your lungs.

name: RemiLore: Lost Girl in the Lands of Lore
description: RemiLore: Lost Girl in the Lands of Lore is a “rogue-lite” anime-style adventure set in a colorful fantasy world where players hack-and-slash their way through an army of mechanical monsters using a huge variety of unique melee weapons and devastating magic attacks!

name: DeMagnete VR
description: DeMagnete VR is a Puzzle Adventure game about magnetism, in virtual reality. Use your magnetic-powered gloves to attract or repel objects and solve puzzles. As you dive deeper in these mysterious caverns you'll discover more about yourself, the voice that guides you, and where you are.

name: Stary
description: Death is the inevitable and logical conclusion of life. All people, one way or another, understand this, but until the end they dare to accept only a few. Stary - the story of the traveler

name: Marble Odyssey
description: Marble Odyssey, a high octane adventure, as your marble rolls across 40 levels of devilish island courses, each requiring quick thinking, dexterity and outright speed. Marbly adventures await!

name: 干支セトラ　陰ノ卷｜干支etc.　陰之卷
description: 耐用年数を超えて綻びゆく都市風水を修復するため、次代の風水師候補に選ばれた主人公。 綻びから襲い来る妖異を討ち祓い、半年後の認定試験に挑むため与えられたのは、十二支――陰陽五行の化身である１２人の男達だった。 それは、400年に渡る首都繁栄の終焉。

name: The Magnet Trials
description: After successfully developing a working magnet gun prototype, Maxwell Industrial Research's space lab is attacked! Use the magnet gun to break through obstacles and escape back to earth with the help of your trusty AI companion, Armitage.

name: Zombieland: Double Tap - Road Trip
description: Zombieland: Double Tap- Road Trip is a ridiculously fun top-down twin-stick shooter featuring local co-op multiplayer for up to four players. Play as your favorite heroes from the original as well as new unlockable characters from the upcoming sequel.

name: 圣女战旗 Banner of the Maid
description: Banner of the Maid is a mix of turn-based strategy and JRPG. Set in an alternate French Revolution with fantasy elements, as the young officer Pauline Bonaparte you will have to lead your troops to battle and play a role in the political vortex of Paris.

name: 景行 | Encourage
description: The topic that youth can never escape is graduation. Graduation is parting, graduation is the ultimate destination of youth. Everyone's life node has been separated by graduation. The young people with high spirits and innocent girls have gone through the best years of youth. Our heroes and heroines are also facing graduation today.

name: 熊孩子WildKids
description: This is a very serious and serious game, so in addition to the time still. Magic elements are also there

name: Gunpowder on The Teeth: Arcade
description: Mega hardcore! In this game you will receive damage first, and only then you will locate the enemy. The implementation of military operations in the classic mechanics of platformer.

name: Mysteries of Neverville: The Runestone of Light
description: Play a thrilling hidden object adventure and solve the mystery of Neverville and find the stolen runestone of light.

name: 淫魔ネムのChuChu精液探検記
description: これは、ラスボスになったサキュバスのお話――。 主人公は、生まれたばかりの新米サキュバス。 『サキュバスが生きるのには精気……つまりHなことが必要なの』 町で、ダンジョンで、人間もモンスターも見境なくヤリたい放題! 果たして新米サキュバスは立派なサキュバスとして成長出来るのでしょうか。

name: Metro Simulator
description: Don't loose your unique chance to take a look at the subway system in a new way - now you can become a train driver!

name: Christmas Wonderland 2
description: Festive Seek and Find fun for all the family

name: Poker Master
description: Free chips!Including Texas Hold'em,Short 6+,SNG,MTT and more poker games.

name: Soccer Manager 2019
description: Lead your favourite team to victory on Soccer Manager 2019, an immersive football management simulator.

name: Escape Legacy VR
description: Explore, find clues, solve puzzles and make your way to the end! Can you Escape?

name: Havocado: Ragdoll Fighter
description: Havocado is ragdoll physics based fighting, with guns, crazy vehicles, weird creatures and more, where mistakes have real consequences. Will you beat the other fighters and become the next champion?

name: Fant Kids Animated Puzzle
description: Join Fant kids Eddie and Ellie to solve the puzzles that are animated

name: Rise Eterna
description: Follow the story of Lua and unveil the mysteries surrounding her origins in the tactical RPG, reminiscence of the 16-bit era Japanese strategy games. Recruit up to 14 characters with unique abilities and defeat your worst nightmare in epic fights.

name: NEOVERSE
description: Neoverse is a beautiful, fantastic game consisting of adventures with thrilling challenges. It is a strategic, action, rogue-lite, deck building game that will test the player’s skill. Start an adventure with unique heroes to save the world along various timelines.

name: Farming Village
description: Farming Village: THE STORY OF GREEN FARM TOWN is a new idea in which you'll feel like a real farmer. Use modern machinery to experience the existence of a farmer.

name: 肥肥大作战 fat battle
description: Fat combat is a changeable terrain, can jump between buildings, players play butcher, catch other players with hooks, the map contains a variety of traps, players need to skillfully avoid pits, rankings to win first!

name: Accel
description: To escape the cyber world of ACCEL you’ll have to go beyond your limits with your spaceship. In ACCEL we’re adding a new challenge, 360° maneuverability.

name: Five Day Great Escape 五日大逃亡
description: Human infections with evolutionary diseases have led to near-extinction. In order to reproduce, human cloning experiments have been carried out, but accidents have occurred. As an investigator, you need to save the survivors of the city and investigate the truth of the accident, build defensive fortifications or towers to resist the...

name: Let's Sing 2019
description: Solo, duet or with friends – let your talent shine. Let's Sing 2019 includes hits by world-famous artists such as Shawn Mendes, Rita Ora, Passenger and Dua Lipa. Sing along to these and other smash hits by ABBA, Bruno Mars and Queen – it'll be a blast!

name: Night City 2177
description: Night city is an experience, you can move around the city of the future and use several types of visions to admire its beauty. Visit the night club and feel like you are in the city of the future.

name: The Seduction of Shaqeera VR
description: Play the role of a personal assistant to a famous movie star named Shaqeera! Get a glimpse into what life as the assistant to one of the most famous and hot women is like! Will you be a well-behaved PA always nicely carrying out the tasks she gives you?

name: CoderBear
description: CoderBear is a puzzle platformer with educational programming aspects.

name: Steel Fight
description: Steel Fight is a fighting game with dynamic gameplay, unique characters and detailed art. Choose one of characters. And travel to the world where steel is the only weapon. Enjoy beautiful stages by facing each opponent.

name: Sky Racket
description: Sky Racket is a game that mixes two classic genres from the Arcade era: Shoot’em up and Brick Breakers. In a world where you are unable to attack, using your racket to strike enemy bullets back at them is your only option! Bounce bullets back at your foes and save the galaxy!

name: Oh Trap!
description: Oh Trap! is a couch co-op game for 2 or 4 players. Steal the other team’s treasures! Place traps strategically to either help yourself or stop your opponents.

name: Metal Revolution / 金属对决
description: Metal Revolution is a new generation of fighting game. The minimalistic controls, deep gameplay, and the cyberpunk robot theme are designed to bring a fresh battle experience. For the fighters who never flinch in the face of furious combat, welcome to Metal Revolution.

name: Pixel Fish
description: Pixel Fish is a fast-paced eater game starring a little orange fish named Sam. Sam doesn't know how or why he is in this hostile sea, but he has a strong suspicion that he doesn't belong. His only choice is to eat his way to the top of the food chain and learn the truth..

name: RelayCars
description: Welcome to RelayCars®: The New Way to Experience Cars™ Step inside our room-scale Showroom and view product accurate vehicle models as part of your car research and shopping experience! Select vehicles from the expanding model library and place the vehicles from one of three designated spaces on the showroom floor.

name: Space Struck Run
description: Space Struck Run is a small game where you take control of Dectron The Cyborg, where you have to do your best to survive in outer space while the difficulty keeps rising.

name: ThreatGEN: Red vs. Blue
description: ThreatGEN: Red vs. Blue is a cyber warfare turn-based strategy game that is also designed to actually teach you real-world cybersecurity concepts, methods, strategies, and skills.

name: The Dungeon Experience
description: Visit The Dungeon Experience! A thrilling world of high fantasy run by me, a level 1 mud-crab turned entrepreneur. Put your real world responsibilities on hold with a first-person guided adventure to achieve financial freedom and uncover the secrets of the mindhole.

name: Loco Launcher
description: You're an animal with an appetite for destruction. Use a cannon, vehicle, ride in a giant rock, or simply run through walls to destroy buildings as fast as possible. Have fun in these wacky arcade levels with added abilities that make no sense whatsoever!

name: Drive
description: Drive is a VR arcade racing game that puts you in the car letting you experience racing as if you were actually out on the track. Featuring traditional racing modes and arcade-like challenges there is plenty of racing to be had whether racing against the AI or your friends online.

name: Tsukumono / つくもの / 付者
description: Aim for a 999 chain! A brand new experience combining tower defence and matching tile puzzle games into a game you can easily play in 1-5 minute bursts! Let's try it for how many times you can chain.

name: 圈圈工坊 OO.Inc
description: OO.Inc is a indie 3-Match-puz game. You are a newbie employee. Complete tasks and unlock new levels. Put material chains on the board.make a line of 3 same color to score.dots can be stacked on circles.

name: CODE2040
description: CODE2040 is a teamwork-focused multiplayer online shooting/battle royale game with three people as a team. In the year of 2040, when energy is extremely scarce, you must adventure into the Outside to explore new energy sources. Accomplish the mission and return safely.

name: Scribble Plus
description: Scribble+ is the quick-draw, multiplayer party-game designed from the ground up to be playable by the whole family, anywhere in the world (especially with Twitch integration!). All you need is connection to a web-browser, and any phone, tablet, laptop or desktop can become a controller.

name: The Faceless Double
description: “This world is cursed...” The latest tale from LiEat creator △○□× (Miwashiba). Having lost his very form, our hero Double embarks on a journey to remove his curse. What exactly is “God”? What does it mean to be “cursed”? Why is Double able to become other people?

name: 梅塔特隆 Metatron
description: 《梅塔特隆 Metatron》是幻象信号工作室GhostCopy开发的首部独立游戏，在独特的视角和美术风格加成下，让游玩感受和其他竞品完全不同。玩家需要探索连通交错的游戏世界，与各种性格迥异的角色邂逅，逐步揭开隐藏的一切，最终达成不同的结局。

name: Hunger Apartment （蚀狱）
description: This is Hunger Apartment, a place feeding you, warming you, and satisfying all your fantasies.

name: Tempest of the Heavens and Earth
description: "Rogue Celestial, seek out your own path to the heavens." An Ecstatic-class Stylish 2D Action Game controlling Tenshi Hinanawi, as she runs all around the realms of Gensokyo! You are the path of righteousness itself! (A derivative game inspired by the Touhou Project universe.)

name: Anime Girl Slide Puzzle
description: A chill slide puzzle game featuring anime girls, with 50 different levels and 5 tiers of difficulty.

name: Lichtspeer: Double Speer Edition
description: LICHTSPEER is an unforgiving fast-paced lightspear-throwing simulator set in an ancient germanic future. Get ready to feel that beloved 80’s arcade rush in this brutal, stylish and psychedelic adventure. Co-op mode for 2 players included!

name: Codename Nemesis
description: Codename Nemesis is an indie, top down, action RPG set in a Noir themed world with cult action-movie styled cut-scenes and graphics straight out of the early 90's era.

name: Enchanted Path
description: Enchanted Path is a fun and unique puzzle game in which you must control a man who is traveling through a series of enchanted portals! Watch out as the tiles can fall away beneath your feet so you must move quickly and not make any wrong moves!

name: Data mining 4
description: Data Mining 4 - casual colorful minimalist puzzle in which you have to collect all the files that are not corrupted to exit the closed circle.

name: Boy Teen Dream
description: In the game you need to take bikini off the girls and run away. If a girl catches you up, she will take a bikini and the score will not count and you will stand. Your task is to collect more points.

name: Bullynoid
description: Bullynoid - This is a colorful breakout game in which you have to play for a bully! Beat the faces of passersby and onlookers! Take away their money! All of what sometimes you want to do in reality is now available in the game! Unlock new Freaky characters!

name: Transport Services
description: Transport services is a lightweight fast-paced simulation game about designing and managing transportation for a dynamic world.

name: Hentai Mosaique Puzzle
description: Relaxing puzzlesolving experience with elements of RPG. Beautiful girls. 30 unique rotating mosaic puzzles. 5 special abilities to unlock

name: Girls & sweets
description: Girls & sweets is a visual novel about the difficult relationship between two sisters - Aika and Yuno.

name: LazerGrrl
description: Fast paced PVP strategy. Bomberman meets RTS.

name: Jewel Match Solitaire Winterscapes
description: Grab a hot drink and cozy up to the fire. It’s cold outside and you’re snowed in with a game of Solitaire! Travel the icy land and rebuild 5 frosty locations across 200 levels, plus unlock 12 bonus game variants like Yukon and Emperor!

name: Ancient Enemy
description: Ancient Enemy is an RPG card battler set in a crumbling world where the forces of evil have already won. Blast distorted enemies with a satisfying range of spells and abilities. Journey into a scarred wilderness and draw power and hope from the landscape to defeat the deadliest foe of all!

name: Lost City of Vampires
description: Sent by the Council to hunt the "lost city" factions... You must destroy an entire bloodline and put an end to an unsanctioned blood war by remaining the last vampire standing in this single player shooter challenge. (Not Exactly, but Similar to a Battle Royale)

name: Intrepid
description: You wake up in your cryo-pod. Other crew members are dead. Something is wrong with the spaceship and if you don't use all your wits, you will not leave this place alive...

name: The Secret of Gillwood
description: The gods don´t hear the prayers of Gillwood, so it’s now up to you to find out why! The Secret of Gillwood is an single player game set in a dark and mysterious linear world. The player takes control over the most faithful Guardian of the gods.

name: Space Cruise
description: Space Cruise is a hybrid of both metroidvania style platforming and traditional bullet-hell gameplay, allowing the player to choose which play style resonates with them most for each run. With power-ups for both methods of gameplay, randomised levels on the branching paths, and leaving the final decision to the player, each run should...

name: Tank raid
description: Tank raid - a dizzying tank runner. Test yourself for stamina by participating in a battle with enemy tanks and aircraft. Random generation of opponents in the course of your progress, each new battle is unique and unpredictable.

name: Zarvot
description: Two things: a charming co-op adventure and a cutthroat competitive party game. Be a tiny, adorable cube with hopes, dreams, unrequited loves… and unlimited destructive power.

name: Circle Rally Party
description: Circle Rally Party is a challenging, family-friendly, 1 to 4 players local multiplayer party game with mini games about doing donuts with cars. Use your car's unique attack at the right time, and collect power-ups to improve your odds. Traffic rules do not apply!

name: A Lullaby of Colors VR
description: Blissful psychedelic relaxation experience for VR. Fly through breathtakingly beautiful worlds of endless sweet-tasting colors and gentle sounds. Great for relaxing, open-eyed meditation, or jaw-dropping drug-free tripping.

name: Super Blackout
description: Can you "black out" all of the lit-up tiles in this addictive puzzle game? Super Blackout is packed with 90 puzzles, an endless random puzzle generator, and even a puzzle editor! Playable with either controller, mouse, or keyboard.

name: Beyond Extinct
description: Beyond Extinct is a First Person Shooter where you take on the role of a survivor in an underground facility. You have to fight your way through waves of monsters to reach the surface. Unlimited fighting combinations in randomly generated levels with 20+ weapons, 50+ items and more!

name: Rebots
description: Rebots is a first-person simulation adventure game where you climaform planets in your galaxy to suit picky aliens. Fly between asteroids and planets with your crew of (mostly) intelligent robots, exploring ecosystems of wacky plants and animals.

name: Lossless Scaling
description: Play your favorite games without blur! No more quality loss when you run the game at a resolution less than the native display resolution.

name: Skinwalker Hunt
description: Skinwalker Hunt is a horror themed hunting game from the creator of Witch Hunt. Main focus of the game is on exploration, non-linear gameplay, and atmosphere.

name: THE DEVIL HAUNTS ME
description: Survive, explore and discover the secrets of the woods. But be careful, there's something else in these woods...

name: Calcul8²
description: Calcul8² is a quick fire number-crunching puzzle game, based on our old friend the calculator and aptly named Calculate Squared.Successor to the popular original, Calcul8. Playable via Mouse, Touch Screen or Keys.

name: FirstPlanet
description: First Planet is a 2.5D barrage shooting game that uses energy to develop planets and defeat enemies of the universe.prologue :You were chosen to be the commander of a planet. In a vast universe, you're the only one who can trust.As a commander, protect the planet and defeat all enemies that threaten the universe!

name: Cover Sky
description: Robots launched an attack on humans! You must stop them! "Cover Sky" is a fast-paced (small map) single-player shooting game that can switch between first and third person perspective at any time. It features fast start, end in fifteen minutes, customizable AI count(20 , 30, 40), dynamic environment, and multiple weapons.

name: Bobs Track Builder Pro
description: Bob's Track Builder Pro allows you to create tracks using simple mouse clicks to form the underlying track mesh ready to be imported into popular car racing games and raced on against your friends.

name: Gourmet Food Wizard
description: This is a real time card combat game with magic and gourmet food!Players capture magic objects, make food, use a super variety of magic [/], set foot on the adventure!The game level is randomly generated, the enemy is a new concept of no health, please enjoy the battle of releasing magic!

name: JOBU-KI
description: Endless runner full of color and weird creatures. Just some fun and funny little game ready to waste some of your time!

name: ISLAND 404
description: Welcome to the game "ISLAND 404". A fascinating adventure awaits you on the island. Imagine: After the crash of the plane you and the team were on a deserted island. In this survival simulator you have to explore the world of the game, to obtain the resources necessary for survival, and avoid dangers.

name: Cotropitorii
description: Cotropitorii is a third-person multi-player action shooter game that celebrates Romanian communism. Up to 32 players can join and pick between two factions and battle it out in death-match mode with over ten different weapons.

name: Sudoku3D
description: Sudoku puzzle - from easy to hardcore... Fully random generation with a choice of field size and difficulty.

name: iVRy Driver for SteamVR
description: Use your iPhone, Android, GearVR, Oculus Mobile or Sony PSVR headset as a Virtual Reality Headset for your PC. Lets you run SteamVR & Oculus Rift PC VR titles without a dedicated PC VR headset.

name: Meadow Fun!!
description: Meadow Fun!! is a game mainly for kids (from 3 to 10), where players have to gather, with their magic nets, stray animals, along 20 colorful and relaxing levels. All set in a dreamy environment, with a soft and charming original sound track. Gamepad, keyboard and mouse supported. Steam controller supported in game. Only for Windows

name: 快乐蓝熊HappyBlueBear
description: Happy Blue Bear is a platformer game with adventurous jumping. Developers “handmade” all levels, hope to make you feel relaxed and at ease while playing it.

name: Snake Path
description: Snake Path will drag you into a cycle of adventures in the spirit of classic arcade games. Collect fruits, avoid obstacles and enemies, grow to a huge size, compete with other players and learn all the secrets of the island!

name: Let's Create! Pottery VR
description: Let's Create! Pottery VR is the best way to relieve your everyday stress and find your inner peace. It's an impressive, therapeutic, and uplifting experience you can enjoy in the comfort of your home.

name: 妖怪俱乐部 Demon Club
description: Realizing the dream of being a demon king in childhood "Demon Club" is a game based on chinese mythology. It is envisioned on an overhead continent called "ShenZhou". The player is a demon with no power.

name: Pagan: Absent Gods
description: Pagan: Absent Gods is a singleplayer fast-paced hack-and-slash action RPG that will challenge your skill in brutal and satisfying combat against countless enemies and larger than life bosses. Master all heroes, each with their own unique playstyle and earn unique rewards.

name: The Lovebirds
description: Welcome to Saint Marionette's theater! Tonight's show is all about love and faith... Our life here m̷a̷y̷ ̷b̷e̷ ̷a̷ ̷s̷i̷m̷u̷l̷a̷t̷i̷o̷n̷, ̷f̷u̷l̷l̷ ̷o̷f̷ ̷s̷t̷a̷t̷i̷c̷ ̷p̷a̷i̷n̷, but our feelings are very real! 🕊️🖤

name: We are the Plague
description: We are the Plague is a tactical, turn-based game, set in a hand-drawn dark fantasy world. Join the mysterious Plague and seek your revenge. Customize your character, traverse the devastated land with a team or alone, and fight against the humanity.

name: Lighter
description: 《Lighter》是由YUKI制作组制作 ，二次元手帐发行的一款都市奇幻类AVG文字冒险游戏，其中作为女主和一只猫 ，受到了七天必死的诅咒，而能解救他们的在三个少女之中 ，围绕少女们的接触和过往的挖掘展开的有趣故事~ 希望能大家能玩得开心~目前是抢先体验版，还有很多问题正在修订中 ，后续会不断完善~

name: 東方苦粗芸物語 Touhou KSG Story
description: in Japanese language only yet. "Overview" This game is a fan game of Touhou fan movie. The setting etc differs from what is called Touhou series of Shanghai Alice. It is an omnibus by several genres such as action, shooting, puzzle, sports.

name: Project Downfall
description: An overdose of reality can have dire consequences… Descend down the rabbit hole and embrace your Downfall in a trippy, brutal and stylized adventure.

name: 祈風 Inorikaze
description: Inorikaze is a Touhou doujin game focus with the theme of pursuing the faith and bond. The main story is about Moriya family when they left Suwa and moved into Gensokyo, the Fantasy Village, and overcome the war between them and Tengus.

name: 社稷终于幻想 ~ A Finality with Sheji
description: 《A Finality with Sheji》 is a story based real-time strategy Touhou fan-game. It fealtures the danmaku battle just like the original Touhou series, pick your strategy for your shoujo team and win the battle.

name: Dragon Eye Online
description: Dragon Eye Online is a cross-platform, no P2W, fantasy MMORPG with a player-driven economy. Let's make something special together!

name: Switch & Ditch
description: Steal the spotlight in the biggest game show on earth! Get your one chance at fame and knock your competitors out of the camera view to make sure you are the last man standing and make your wish come true.

name: Car Wash Simulator
description: Achieve your american dream as a small businessman in the car industry. Build, upgrade and modernize your car wash to attract more clients. You also need to be wary of your growing competition and other, not entirely legal, factions, that would love to take part in your success.

name: Psycho Boys
description: Casual single or local co-op game (1-4 players). Throw bombs at enemies and try survive yourself or with your friend.

name: Greed: The Mad Scientist
description: In this thrilling hidden object adventure the laboratory of the world famous scientist Dr. Ralph Goodwin is blown up. Find out what's behind the assault and find a missing drug, that can heal all diseases.

name: Telekinetic
description: You come to your senses in a strange place, around the damaged bodies of people and a lot of blood, you have a head pierced and, instead of the left hand, its mechanical likeness, which is endowed with an interesting feature - telekinesis.

name: Moot District
description: Build and defend! Make Moot District yours!

name: Idle Wizard
description: RPG/Idle hybrid about becoming the most powerful wizard there is. Pick a class, get a pet, configure and improve your character in a myriad ways!

name: SpaBerry VR Experience
description: The world's first and only hot tub VR experience, by SpaBerry!

name: Inch by Inch
description: You play a shrinking scientist in a race against time: Can you find all necessary formulas and ingredients to produce the antidote and stop shrinking, before you are too small to operate the life-saving lab equipment?

name: Feathery Ears 羽耳
description: Below the planet's core, Misa wakes up on a pink beach to learn that Gembugs have pulled the stars out of the sky. Her friend Coral gives her a Fire Sword to defeat them. It's up to her to bring the stars back up where they belong.

name: Waves of the Atlantide
description: A finite world with infinite resources. Defeat your opponents before the world collapses under your empire in this epic Battle Royale 4X RTS! A tidal wave is putting an end to this continent, will you make it through?

name: Trawel
description: Trawel is a modern open world text adventure. What does that mean? It means that it's a romanticized text adventure with a world filled with locations for you to explore, partly handmade, partly procedurally generated.

name: Space Hockey
description: Futuristic 3D Sports Action!

name: 牧剑(Tale Of Swords)
description: 《牧剑》是一款3D即时战斗的仙侠题材ARPG游戏。三清山弟子李朔代表师门前往金丹门，却不料一场丹门盛会，突变炼狱血海。一众江湖名士，齐齐受困金丹门中，陷入一场猜忌与杀戮的陷阱。诡异恐怖的的布局之下，初入江湖的李朔，又将如何化险为夷？

name: 嗜血印 Bloody Spell
description: This is a martial arts action role-playing game. The core of the game is battle-oriented, and it combines many fighting elements. If you are a player who pursues blood and is brave enough to challenge the limits, it will definitely inspire your adrenaline and bring you the best combat experience.

name: Backbone: Prologue
description: Backbone: Prologue is the first act of a post-noir narrative adventure. Become raccoon private eye Howard Lotor and explore dystopian Vancouver inhabited by animals as you uncover a deeply personal story of change and transformation.

name: Nightmare (Incubo)
description: INCUBO is a side scrolling platform game with a semi-horror theme. We present many ghost from around the world in our game as enemy and bosses. You played as a child in his nightmare and discover the truth about his story.

name: Otiiz's adventure - Sushi Champ
description: Otiiz spends all his money and is driven out. His friend suggests that he joins the big eater competition held by the sushi restaurant. As long as he wins, he can get the bonus of the best. Let's help him get the victory

name: Santa Simulator
description: You ring the mysterious bell. Next minute, you're riding in Santa's sleigh, dropping presents in chimneys. Welcome to Santa Simulator where kids squeal with delight and adults become kids again. This game is gifted free when you buy Richie's Plank Experience

name: The Black Knight
description: Black knight is a short (10 minutes to complete) arcade line defence game. Tons of monsters are trying to escape from an ancient crypt and only you can stop them. The main hero can move between three lines and cast spells to destroy the enemies. You need to defeat 10 waves of monsters to win!

name: Make A Jigsaw Puzzle
description: In《Make A Jigsaw Puzzle》you can customize the length and width of the puzzle, the picture and the puzzle edge. Then you can play it on a platform that could move freely .

name: Epic Food Fight
description: Developed by Zugalu, EPIC FOOD FIGHT is a unique hide and sneak style sniper food fight game. Have you ever wanted to throw a burger at a kid, well in this virtual world we’ve got plenty of burgers and plenty of kids. HAVE AT IT. Dozens of unique enemies to test your skills.

name: Choice or Fate
description: Choice of Fate - игра которая бросает игрока в увлекательный и жестокий мир Эннерд. Спасти этот мир? Или уничтожить его? Или вы пойдете по иному пути?

name: ONE PUNCH MAN: A HERO NOBODY KNOWS
description: The first "One Punch Man" game finally makes its debut! Dive into a dynamic fighting game experience with beloved characters from the first Season of One Punch Man! Play as your favorite hero – or become one!

name: Rabbit Burn
description: Fabulous riches, flying fists, and sensual embraces abound in this dazzling arena where rabbit men and bunny girls sprint to and fro, dodging explosions, brawling, making love, or just rocking out. It's the crazy, depraved billiards game, Rabbit Burn!

name: RepairBot
description: RepairBot is a game that combines a platformer, physics, and puzzles.

name: Metal Fury 3000
description: Metal Fury 3000 will mix furious shootings, brutal fights, awesome pixel art, real physics, destructible environments, dismembering enemies, a lot of secrets to find, absurdly devastating weapons to use, an amazing Heavy Metal soundtrack (that will split your eardrums) and much more.

name: Voxel Sword
description: A comical versus game for everyone to enjoy! Voxel Sword is an easy to play action game, set in an adorable toy fantasy world, where you can wield various weapons to defeat monsters. This is our toy fantasy world, Voxel. Since ancient times, humans and monsters have worked together and coexisted in peace.

name: 炎之陨落 The Fallen of The Blaze Empire
description: The Fall of The Blaze Empire is an indie game based on science fiction and martial arts. Players will open a magical ancient books, in the story of a perspective of ordinary people, experienced the ups and downs of the great yan empire, as well as the hidden line in thirteen Chinese states.

name: Super Grower
description: Super Grower is a fun game of agility and reflexes. In this game, you must control a white square and grow the square to an immense size to eliminate all other objects on the level. By moving the square around the playing area and eat the smaller yellow tokens your square will grow big.

name: Summer Sports Games
description: Prove your athletic skills! Challenge your friends in twelve exciting disciplines and beat the AI in five thrilling tournaments! Depending on the discipline it is either played one after the other or simultaneously on a split screen. Who will finish on the podium?

name: Notes of Soul
description: The gleaning club is an immersive game experience hall, where you can participate in the script arranged according to the story by role playing. Or learn folk knowledge and taste strange culture, or realize the sad but warm past of the protagonist of the story.

name: Puzzle game for kids
description: Funny puzzles for kids.

name: Strategic Mind: The Pacific
description: Strategic Mind: The Pacific is a turn-based strategy set in the WW2 period depicting the war between the USA and the Empire of Japan waged in the Pacific Ocean with mindblowing historical accuracy and attention to detail. Two Sides. Two Commanders. Two Destinies.

name: IMAZE.EXE 2
description: IMAZE.EXE 2 - game where you need to found the way from maze.

name: Be the Ruler: Britannia
description: Be the Ruler: Britannia is a Choose-Your-Own-Adventure RPG set in early medieval England. You are the king. Found a dynasty, and play your descendants later. Wear the crown, gain allies, plot, defend lands. Play many times to discover the full possibilities!

name: Destroy The World
description: Destroy buildings, cars, trees! Use the destructive force of nuclear power plants to your advantage! Melt the ice caps! Kill all the baby seals! Raise the ocean levels! Burn down the rain forest & destroy every cultural site in your way! Cause great oil spills and disrupt threatened ecosystems!

name: HEXMAPMAKER
description: Hexmapmaker is an easy to use software for making nice looking hex maps.

name: GUNSMOKE
description: Western Arcade Shooter with lot of action killing bandits and collecting stolen money from the bank!

name: Barn Finders
description: Search for valuable items stashed in abandoned barns. Take part in storage auctions, bid high and buy yourself a chance to find exclusive items hidden in the past.

name: Highway of death
description: This race, which require from player good reaction. Maneuver the car in different directions, so as not to crash and overtake the car as well as to collect the stars

name: Trivia Throwdown
description: Knowledge is power! Vanquish 10 wise warriors in this 1P/2P climb-the-mountain trivia challenge with a fighting game style, designed for a wide range of knowledge levels. Includes 2500+ questions and several hours of gameplay.

name: Tentoria
description: Character action game with lightning fast action. Play as the badass femme fatale vampire queen, Lyss, and get ready to yell "This is not even my final form!". Travel through time, destroy dinosaurs, aliens, robots and undeads with bloody stylish combos! Ride your motorcycle, manage your strip club!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Trails of Cold Steel III
description: Experience an epic story developed across three titles, and crafted for new and old fans alike. Also includes an interactive introduction to catch up new players to the ongoing story so anyone can dive right in to the world of Trails of Cold Steel.

name: Air Combat XF
description: This is a 3D flight action arcade game(Version 2.00). Version 1.00 is also included, please try it.

name: Blinky - Rise to the Top
description: Speedrunning 3D Platforming game, learn to traverse short yet challenging levels, then try climbing up the Leaderboard!

name: You're Not Special
description: You're Not Special is a (mostly) non-combat, choices-matter, puzzle-based RPG. There are great forces set to doom the small kingdom in which you live and only the chosen one can stop them. The problem is, you're not the chosen one.

name: Wild Ranger: Gun X Dragon
description: 融合西部荒野与魔幻。在这个人类与魔物并存的架空世界，寻人之旅中的流浪枪手马克斯·贝恩与幼龙卓克，命运的旋涡正一步一步将他们卷入其中。

name: Numgeon
description: Numgeon is tiny, retro styled, highly-addictive and fast paced casual clicker RPG. Click your way through the darkest dungeons with your mighty heroes! Slay the monsters, collect gold and gain new upgrades as you progress.

name: Bookend
description: Harness your child-like imagination to interact with the pop-up book, “The Little Witch”. Explore the book's world and help the protagonist, the little witch, Abigail, as she's pursued by an angry mob trying to stop her mission that could either mean saving the world—or ending it.

name: RoboSnakes: Core Wars Legacy
description: An alien voice resonates within your head: IF.PROGRAM.ROBOSNAKE.SMART. KILL.ENEMY.AI.THEN.WIN.AGAINST.FRIENDS. SAVE.HUMANITY.

name: Divided Kingdoms
description: Divided Kingdoms is a multilayered medieval real time and turn based strategy with elements of role playing in the mix. You will have to unite your once mighty Kingdom and restore its former glory by overcoming challenges using strategy and skill.

name: Running Tadpoles
description: Don't hesitate to insert the gap when you see it. Every level requires all tadpoles to find their place. Be careful not to hit the tadpole in front of you, otherwise the game will fail. After each pass, the corresponding CG can be unlocked.

name: Yanpai Simulator
description: Can you get the girl you love?

name: Neon Noodles - Cyberpunk Kitchen Automation
description: You are in charge of a futuristic kitchen operating in a mysterious cyberpunk world. Automate your robot chefs to cook recipes in perfectly elegant loops to create well oiled machines that churn out dish after dish. It's a zach-like!

name: Sea of Craft
description: Sea of Craft is the new wave of realistic physics-based construction and adventure games. With hundreds of building materials and weapons at your disposal, there is no limitation to the unique and wonderful seafaring vessels that you can create.

name: Full Of Love
description: Classic puzzle play, you and your brother will love it.

name: Indiana Boy Steam Edition
description: Immerse yourself in a fantastic adventure with Indiana Boy. Help Indiana recover all the treasures and keys, but watch out for every move you make.

name: Mind Massaging Machine
description: Enjoy relaxing mind massages to freshen up and relax your mind.

name: Anime Vampire Slayer
description: You are trapped in a town full of evil anime vampires. Anime Cat girl on one hand. Anime knight on the other, and unlimited waves of Vampires. Use the knight in to attack and defend the princess. this is a first person "combat" simulator.

name: Darkness and Flame: The Dark Side f2p
description: There is no one in the world who could return from the Dark Side inviolate… “Darkness and Flame. The Dark Side” is an adventure game in the genre of Hidden Objects, with plenty of mini-games and puzzles, unforgettable characters and complicated quests.

name: Collapse: A Political Simulator
description: is a grand strategy game that takes place in 1992-2004. You take lead of your own Party in the face of the total devastation of one of the fictional post-Soviet states in Europe. Try to realize your (or someone else's) political dreams in the shaky arena of this dilapidated situation.

name: Olimdal
description: Welcome to library tower of Olimdal, where any wizards dream to get knowledge from. Due to general renovation of the tower, sometimes it can be hard to find your way around the rooms, especially in your condition!

name: SKYHILL: Black Mist
description: In this psychological survival horror your daughter was kidnapped and whole building is overrun by dark monsters and crazy cultist for whom you are a prey. Survive and save your family in a face of danger from the mysterious black mist that covered entire city and changes human into vile creatures.

name: Riddles of the Owls' Kingdom. Magic Wings
description: 200 fun levels that players of all ages will enjoy!

name: Solitaire. Dragon Light
description: Master the magic of cards to save the dragon king!

name: Slashvival
description: A virus has spread worldwide and you are the only member of your family who is immune... Fight through daily hordes of mutants to provide the necessary resources to save your family!

name: SINNERS
description: You wake up in a cold and dark cell. You look around. Everything seems abandoned and run-down. All of a sudden, the speaker on the wall activates with a loud and shrill noise. A voice comes through the speaker. It tells you to leave the room. Will you get your freedom back?

name: Deep Diving Simulator
description: Submerge yourself in one of the most immersive diving simulators to date. Gather your gear, choose your diving spot and discover what lies beneath the surface as you venture deep into the unknown.

name: War Online: Pacific
description: War Online Pacific is the first in a series of fast action WWII combat simulations.

name: The Dandelion Girl: Don't You Remember Me?
description: A short visual novel about a middle-aged man on his summer vacation, where he meets a strange girl who claims to be from the future. Adapted from a short story.

name: 87 Aftermath: A Rolling Ball Game
description: The Event of 2187 left no survivors. In an instant, Earth became a barren wasteland - a lifeless rock floating aimlessly through space. Until 4129. That's when Zenith landed. Set years later, 87 Aftermath is the story of a nameless orbling on a quest to escape from Earth and return home.

name: ToyShot VR
description: Casual shooting game that you can enjoy in VR lightly! Do not let live toys go out.

name: The Ghost of You
description: The Ghost of You is a text-based, yuri horror game in which a night at the symphony ends in a massacre. Libretto and her friends must work together to find out the truth; but between romantic conflicts, personal demons, and a song so haunting it warps the mind, will they survive the Symphony Hall?

name: Running Rogue
description: Running Rogue is a fast-paced first-person roguelike action. Parkour, cool magic gauntlets and tons of undead for you to smash their skulls with a powerful blow!

name: More and More
description: The protagonist of this story will be Freek, a human being who found himself in the city of More. In this city there are citizens, who say that Freek is the chosen one, he will have to discover the truth to fulfill the prophecy.

name: NAR - Not Another Royale
description: NOT ANOTHER ROYALE (NAR) is an action loaded multiplayer shooter with several different game modes.

name: Wild Ride
description: A fast-paced, great looking vehicle combat game where you are the one in control of the battlefield, sit behind the wheel of your ride and be quick and smart or someone else will take you out. Will you be the ultimate rider?

name: 随风而逝/Story About Times
description: Time is the only thing we can't resist. Some people and things will never be found once they are lost. In the dark, a man was walking alone. The moment when you turn back, don't forget the place where came from!

name: 时之回廊/Corridor of time
description: 这是一款roguelike玩法和动作系统相结合的地牢游戏，你可以携带两把神兵，在战斗中交替使用，形成错综变化的攻击方式。大量效果各异的道具，丰富你在冒险时的决策和穿戴上的搭配。游戏自备服务器，你将可以和好友共同联机冒险。一个新颖的竞技乱斗模式，与其他玩家在地牢中进行一场生死较量。

name: 脚本塔防 Massacre  Tower
description: With four towers as the center, enjoy the pleasure of mowing the grass" Unlimited free trade!"(real person market)"Really bet" on the feeling of a heartbeat"Arbitrary stack" skillNo fixed taskAttribute points with no restrictions

name: The Emulator
description: It's the night before Halloween and a new terror is about to be unleashed from the deep web.. The Emulator!

name: Million Arthur: Arcana Blood
description: For the first time on Steam, the incredible, over-the-top 2D fighter Million Arthur: Arcana Blood is ready to kick-off! Featuring many of the popular characters from the smash hit Million Arthur series as well as a variety of guest fighters!

name: NeoGeometry
description: Welcome back to the world of Neo! Your task is to deliver the NeoBriquette with the help of coups in the desired point. Beware Neo walls that can kill you. Just do not fall out of the field.

name: The Chronicles of King Arthur - Episode 1: Excalibur
description: Play this thrilling match-3 game with 74 challenging levels and help the young king Arthur conquer the throne and reign over Britannia.

name: Impossible Tower Defense 2D
description: Get ready for an epic journey to defend your land against hordes of orcs, wizards, goblins and ogres using a vast arsenal of towers and spells at your command! Fight on forests, mountains and wastelands, customizing your defensive strategy with different tower upgrades and specializations!

name: Conan Unconquered
description: From the Command & Conquer veterans at Petroglyph comes the first ever survival RTS set in the savage world of Conan the Barbarian. Play solo or team up in multiplayer in Conan Unconquered’s action-packed co-op Mode where you build a shared stronghold and fend off the hordes together.

name: The.Thend.End
description: A very simple visual novel about a simple man, in a simple world, with simple problems. That's all, thank you for your attention and have a good day.

name: NexVR Video Player
description: NexVR Video Player is a simple yet powerful stereoscopic video player for VR Headsets like the HTC Vive™.

name: Alveole
description: Alveole is a minimalistic puzzle where the player must understand how to run and why does he do it?

name: Dark Alley Elf
description: Play as Francesca the dark elf as she, on a bet, travels the city to find willing men to pay for her services! Fight off thugs and other strange creatures in this sexy action platformer!

name: Silenced
description: Travel through kingdoms destroyed by "monsters" and use wisdom to defeat tide-like enemies But can ordinary people really do it? Does the unsung adventure really make sense? In any case, this silent adventure of the road to death has quietly begun ...

name: GLAD VALAKAS TOWER DEFENCE
description: Help Valera protect the most valuable thing for him.

name: Ruthless Water
description: Now the game type is terror game, the developers are not going to make, the author give up production

name: The Scenic Treasures - Japanese Learning
description: The Scenic Treasures - Japanese Learning is an adventure game which offers an innovative way to learn the Japanese language through engaging treasure hunting gameplay.

name: Visual Novel Maker
description: 高一下半学期，和同学们一起乘大巴去春游的我，不幸卷入了一场离奇的车祸，住院治疗了整整两年才得以康复。 本以为大难不死必有后福，却没想到这只是一连串离奇事件的开端…… 同时配合简单易上手的自定义剧情编辑器，把你自己的的故事，在不同的平台，告诉给不同的人听。

name: Greylaw: Season 1
description: Hi, We are merging this game with Elleros: Wytchsun. Everyone who purchased or used a trial key for Greylaw will receive a free copy of Elleros: Wytchsun when it is released. This title will become unsupported, and merged with Wytchsun. Thank you to everyone who participated in the limited run trial.

name: Virtual Home Theater Video Player
description: Virtual Home Theater (VHT) is a video player, an audio player and a desktop mirroring software that simulate the audio channels from a media file as virtual sound objects or virtual speakers, delivering true 3D spatial audio in VR, replacing the old "head-locked" stereo audio technology.

name: Crystal Chameleon
description: Sci-Fi cyberpunk Visual Novel based in a future where telepathic powers are common-place and humans and dolphins work together.

name: Crop Dusta
description: Crop Dusta is a fast-paced Puzzle Action game. You control the crop duster by maneuvering it to spray crops and bugs while dodging buildings, trees, and animals. Please the farmers by spraying crops to pass to the next field. Spray those bugs before they eat the crops! Do you have what it takes to be an Ace Crop Dusta pilot?

name: Damnaze
description: You were taken into this damn maze, but you are not the first, and you are not the last.Here you do not have friends.You have only hope for salvation. To escape from this place you can use absolutely everything that you have found.

name: Tales From Galaxy 34
description: Explore the galaxy through a narrative adventure involving warring factions, mysterious ancient technology, military & civilian groups vying for control. Every experience is a chance to improve your ship, guide the future of the galaxy and find the truth about why you were selected for this mission.

name: Throne Quest Deluxe
description: Throne Quest is a language-less, seem-less open-world Action Role Playing Game (ARPG). Fast-paced ranged combat with over 90 types of monsters and over 150 unique weapons & armor to collect. Level-up and train your class-skills to become an epic champion with one quest- to claim the Throne.

name: Slay All Goblins
description: Casual hack and slash with bits of visual novel elements! Free to play 2D hack and slash game, with pixel art and animations. This is a mobile to PC port, with high res images & XBOX controller support (recommended).

name: PsyShift
description: PsyShift is a renewed take on a beloved classic. PsyShift will provide a fun experience for all and an enjoyable play-style that will keep you coming back for more. Use every mechanic to your advantage! Enjoy the varying music styles as you get lost in PsyShift, the renewed rendition of a classic.

name: Smasher
description: You are a wrongly imprisoned square, who must smash your way home.

name: Parallel World
description: Feel boring on Find Difference between still images? Would you feel awesome if I change those still images to 3D World?

name: Fight For Love
description: Fight for love is a 2D Platform Action game based on the story of the major of Simdar army, Ron, whose mission is to protect the Simdar city from external and internal conflicts.

name: Home Plate Baseball
description: Home Plate Baseball is a baseball simulator and mini-game collection​. 3 Inning Baseball, Catching, Umpiring, and Home Run Derby are all included. Hard mode increases pitch speed to over 100 MPH.

name: Deep Sea Endurance
description: How long can you survive in the deep Sea?

name: MarineVerse's Sailboat Racing Training
description: Work on and improve your sailboat racing performance in real life. The most advanced sailing simulator for competitive sailors.

name: Lightseekers
description: Epic battles await you in the multi-award winning Trading Card Game, now on Steam. Battle with digital cards and scan tabletop cards into your digital collection for Double the Value!

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Champions
description: Command powerful factions & legendary Champions in this Warhammer Trading Card Game. Deploy units and unleash deadly magical abilities, while completing quests to earn blessings from the gods.

name: Black Powder Red Earth®
description: The near present. Step into the event horizon of a failed state, as Private Military Contractor - Cold Harbor, hunting jihadist terrorists in war-torn sprawls as a lethal surrogate for the host nation.

name: Trigger Table
description: Trigger Table is a funny action based russian roulette game that utilizes action cards for surprising and unexpected scenarios during play.

name: Outrevenge
description: A Top-Down Cyberpunk Action-Adventure. Lead a Military Special Missions Unit in a battle against deadly lifeforms.

name: SHELL_BREAK
description: SHELL_BREAK is a Sci-fi RPG game with elements of maze explorations. Imprisoned in a research facility, you play a game where you have to find 3 'words' to confess your love for the berserk, and yet obsessive A.I. Will you obey your jailor, or somehow find another way out?

name: Christmas Wonderland
description: Help Santa and the elves to put the festive season back on track in this colorful and charming Christmas cracker of a hidden object game.

name: Inclement
description: In this farm-building strategy game set in the harsh environment of Northern Europe, you manage your land from clearing forests and selling grain at the neighbouring town to building barns and eventually oil rigs. Your right decisions will allow you to develop and eventually grow your wealth.

name: All Of ZHEM
description: Face against waves of 200 zombies with nowhere to run or hide.

name: 3 on 3 Super Robot Hockey
description: 3 on 3 Super Robot Hockey, how hockey should be played. No rules. Just smash, bash, and trash your opponent and score!

name: Breacher Story
description: An interactive narrative in social engineering.

name: Red Dead Pixel Man
description: Red Dead Pixel Man is a 2D-action game. Kill the boss at the bottom stage to get a super coin and win the game. Collect 4 coins to win perfectly.

name: Urban Trial Playground
description: This new instalment of the stunt bike racing series is moving the action from city streets, straight to the sunny and colorful beaches of California, mixing in even crazier tricks, flips and combos than ever before. It’s a game of speed, balance and style!

name: TowerHex
description: Set out on a magical virtual reality quest and explore the fantasy world of TowerHex. Open some portals, kill some dragons, become the hero and find the missing alchemist!

name: Viola: The Heroine's Melody
description: Viola: The Heroine's Melody is the musical Platformer/RPG! After failing at violin practice for the hundredth time, Viola becomes trapped inside her instrument's fantastical world. Join her adventure to find her way back home, aided by the diverse ensemble of friends she meets along the way.

name: One minute of death
description: O.M.O.D. is pretty difficult platform game.

name: Mad Hunting Simulator VR
description: Enjoy the pleasure and courage of VR hunting in an indescribably realistic and beautiful open world created to be reunited with nature while hunting. Go hunting and pre-entertain yourself in the detailed territory of the hunting house, full details of the objects around you!

name: Chain Reaction : Sexy Hentai Girls
description: Are you an Hentai or Ecchi fan ? Do you like japanese girls ? Are you also a mind games fan and nothing pleases you as much as mixing reflexion and pleasure ? If your answer is yes, CHAIN REACTION : SEXY HENTAI GIRLS is the perfect game for you.

name: Reach 50 : Sexy Hentai Girls
description: Are you an Hentai or Ecchi fan ? Do you like japanese girls ? Are you also a mind games fan and nothing pleases you as much as mixing reflexion and pleasure ? If your answer is yes, REACH 50 : SEXY HENTAI GIRLS is the perfect game for you.

name: Dots Pop : Sexy Hentai Girls
description: Each time you finish a level you will unlock a new image. For each girl you have 5 images (5 levels) : - Girl fully dressed - Girl half dressed - Girl wearing a bikini / underwear - Girl topless - Girl fully naked

name: Ski Drive: Biathlon
description: Incredible snowmobile rides in snow capped hills - what could be better? The biathlon snowmobile championship, of course! Here you have to take part in an exciting snowmobile race and test your accuracy by shooting a rifle.

name: Opencast Mining
description: Whatever you mine - coal or diamonds - it all starts with opencast digging. Will you be able to complete this difficult task?

name: ASTRONEST VR
description: Astronest VR is a VR online tactical shooting game. In combat with the Allied and Newcomers colonies, board the fighter and defeat the enemy.

name: Chocolat Rush
description: Revenge of the super chocolate monster! The war in bittersweet chocolate to the kitchen table. Super sweet casual VR game.

name: BLASK
description: BLASK is a unique puzzle game where you control the environment in order to hit all the goal markers with lasers.

name: ONINAKI
description: The all-new Action-RPG, ONINAKI tells the story of one Watcher on a journey to protect Life, after Death.

name: Donald VS Martians
description: Donald saves the universe!

name: Singularity 5
description: Play a pure WAVE SHOOTER arcade game in a globalized world led by moore, a global AI program. Your mission is to liberate Paris from the machines’ rebellion. The intense and immediate pleasure of playing with a rigorous and original art direction.

name: Dark Shiny
description: I created, this rpg for those looking for a great adventure and especially not easy, I tried to create a precise and intelligent fighting style, I hope you will be able to complete my game, somehow. (ENGLISH VERSION , is done, just go to the option in game, for change your language)

name: Call of Pixel : Close Quarters
description: PVP Free for All with PVE inspired by Call of Duty, Battlefield and Killing Floor in a visual close to Lego on Interactive Map with Day Night Cycle. Current contents: 3 Maps, 3 Game Modes, 3 Class, 34 Ranks, 3 Weapons, 5 Equipments, +15 Skins & Cosmetics.

name: CandyVenture
description: Berry and his friends count on you! Evil monsters invaded the candy world and stole all the candies. But you and our heroes are here to save their candy world! Use their powers to destroy the monsters in this cozy 2D adventure game!

name: Ayre
description: Experience Dragon flying freedom in Ayre. Enjoy a relaxing flight listening to the wind whistle past you, or test your skills with acrobatic sky races hidden throughout the land. Discover the history of an ancient civilization. Figure out what's going on with this Crystal Comet.

name: CHRONO
description: a two-player platform-fighter splattered with neon, kinetic movement, and just a sprinkle of bullet time.

2084 is a fast-paced First-Person Shooter with hacking mechanics. Battle your way through hordes of enemies, hack their minds to gain advantage on the battlefield, and immerse yourself in a riveting short story set in a grim cyberpunk landscape.

name: Moo Moo Move
description: Enter an adorable world where you and your chubby steed are tasked with herding cows to safety. Gallop through beautifully hand crafted environments and a host of hazards in this relaxing casual arcade game!

name: Seeker
description: Help Alfie find the the stars to get back home to his homeland. If you don't want to follow this short story you can explore this very beautiful island in search of my personal Easter eggs. these Easter eggs will be very hard to find but in the end it will be rewarding. Thank you for playing Seeker.

name: WarZone Flashpoint
description: WarZone Flashpoint is in an RTS in development by Dust Storm Entertainment. We're an indie team bringing you a classic RTS formula which we intend to update for a long time to come!

name: eBall
description: eBall is an old-school multiplayer arena shooter with high speed gameplay and a minimalistic look. An old school rocket and grenade in combination with rattling speed gameplay and predictive air shoot of a classic arena FPS with the power of modern gaming technology.

name: 王者战车
description: Kingchariots is a blockchain electronic competitive game, which takes chariots as the main operating body of the game and carries out 5-5 antagonistic competitive games. In the game, there are various types of chariots. From the type of tracked tank to the type of wheeled car, each chariot will carry different weapons and skills.

name: Hyperborean Charter
description: Traverse the Klondike in search of a mysterious research base; you have five days to deliver to the base a care package else a snowstorm will spell disaster for both you and the scientists.

name: A Grim Tale of Vices
description: A dark fantasy journey where you get into the shoes of a simple man, one whose life was taken and body left to rot in the wastelands... A dark goddess offers you a chance for vengeance, an evil armor and unholy magic at a very high price. Things will get violent!

name: BMX The Game
description: BMX The Game is a realistic bike game that captures the essence of this sport. Designed by BMX riders and lovers, it recreates the beauty, creativity, fun and variety of the BMX universe in an open-world game, set in the emblematic city of Barcelona.

name: Black Salt Coreuption
description: Black Salt Coreuption is a one-on-one 3D arena fighting game that allows complete freedom of movement around the arena rather than 3D fighters doing combat on a 2D plane. The Black Salt Coreuption 3D arena fighting game series also combines two action properties. (Black Salt Vs COREUPT)

name: The Aether: Life as a God
description: Create a mortal race to worship you and grow your strength. Guide them in their daily lives and help them grow. The power you collect will grow your mind and body. Dabble in the affairs of other gods or seek to destroy them and steal their power.

name: Dragon Racer
description: Prove that you and your dragon have what it takes to race with the pro's, and you will rule the land, sea and skies!

name: Crossroads: Lucky Edition
description: Crossroads is a hardcore roguelike RPG dungeon crawler stylized as a card game. Create your hero and go to the adventures to gain levels, loot new gear, learn different spells and finally complete your quest!

name: Shadow Legend VR
description: Shadow Legend is an exploration-RPG exclusively designed for VR where you play as the Grand Master of the Knights Templar in a story-driven medieval crusade. Freely explore densely filled worlds and use your sword, bow, and magic skills to save your kingdom from the destruction of Lord Adaroth.

name: Arcadia
description: In the not-too-distant-future, Roman is a newly-minted employee at a classy jazz club. He must contend with his past as a new hire (and former co-worker), Eris, makes him question if quitting his old job was the right thing to do.

name: Kalling Kingdom
description: A city building simulation & decision game.

name: DUSTNET
description: DUSTNET is the last remaining de_dust2 server. Connect to it through PC, VR, or AR and sift through the corrupted cyberspace.

name: Little Legend
description: Little Legend is a 2D Adventure Game taking place in a dreamlike Open World. Craft your own Magic Spells, summon ancient Guardians and discover the secret behind the rebuilding of the universe.

name: Street Outlaws: The List
description: Strap-in and put the pedal to the floor cause there’s only enough room for 10! Build, Customize, Race and Earn your way on to the “List", competition is ruthless and everyone is fighting for the respect that comes with the top spot. Your goal? Earn a spot on "The List".

name: PlanetSide Arena
description: PlanetSide Arena servers will be shutting down on January 10, 2020. Read our dev letter to learn more.

name: ライフワン- lifeOne
description: This is an ordinary retro RPG, but the only difference is that your HP is 1. Although you may be confused at the beginning, you can feel fumbling around the world and make friends and items and advance quests.

name: Disney's Hercules
description: Become a true hero in a battle of mythic proportions.

name: Maui Mallard in Cold Shadow
description: When he morphs into a Ninja, you'd better Duck.

name: 胸怀三国 OL / 삼국지를 품다 / Embrace the Three Kingdoms OL
description: 《胸怀三国》以三国故事来展开，作为一款纯正的MMORPG（多人在线角色扮演）游戏，本作所涵盖的元素相当丰富。除了角色扮演与战斗，游戏还融合了经营策略的设定，结合独特的剧情动画语音与超过1000篇的丰富剧情，让玩家体验不同玩法的乐趣。

name: DOKA 2 GUTS OUT NINJA
description: "This is a game where you kill zombies or you yourself are zombie, this is a game where you kill people in the most sophisticated ways" - this words echoes over the streets, covered with piles of rotting corpses.

name: Captain Contraband
description: In Captain Contraband, you play a ship captain trying to smuggle, trade, or pirate their way across the sea, and into legend. The sea is filled with all manner of pirates and vultures waiting to feast on their next meal - and that’s just the ones that are alive. The dead have become a menace of late.

name: HEATED
description: HEATED combines RTS elements with FPS elements in a spin on the FPS genre. Purchase mining rigs to get as much gold as possible, while hacking your opponents to hinder their mining. Then, there's the "action phase," where teams use gold to purchase equipment to take down their opponent.

name: Steady
description: A deceptively simple movement game that will challenge you through a set of 50 unique levels. Dodge moving obstacles, cannon balls, and spinning contraptions to see how far you can go.

name: PAGUI打鬼
description: PAGUI is based on a true story from Taiwan's history. One day, by chance, an orphan raised at a temple learned of his family background. From then, he decided to set out on a journey to uncover the secrets of his family and identity...

name: Moshpit
description: Head bang with your friends. Let the immersive experience awaken your senses and move your body. Turn your living room into Moshpit!

name: aMAZE Christmas
description: aMAZE Christmas is a straightforward and surprisingly - difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with christmas art and calm soundtrack.

name: Shadow Uprising
description: Shadow Uprising is a single player, post apocalyptic stealth game, designed exclusively for virtual reality systems. Utilize completely unrestricted mobility to bypass security and avoid detection, assassinate your targets, and help save the fate of humanity.

name: DRONE The Game
description: Experience fast-paced action-packed 3-dimensional combat with your own custom built remote controlled battle vehicles in spectacular SCI-FI arenas. Give it a chance: Try the Demo and see if you want to support this early access!

name: Auri's Tales
description: Join Auri in a 3D adventure to meet the King and the Queen of Solea: jump, explore, solve puzzles and help friendly characters to open the doors of the castle!

name: Shadows of Doubt
description: First-person detective stealth game set in a fully-simulated sci-fi noir city. There’s a serial killer on the loose, and it’s up to you to catch them by any means necessary: Sneak, tail, hide, hack and lock-pick. Just keep a low profile!

name: RAN: Lost Islands
description: In an era where warriors clashed face to face with cold steel, 100 outcasts converge on a cursed island in search of glory and gold. Only one will leave through violent close quarter combat with katanas, flintlocks, rapiers, and broadswords.

name: Lingua Fleur: Lily
description: 'Lingua Fleur: Lily' is focused on friendship, love, troubles, efforts, and confusions between girls. Made with illustrations, animations, and original music, this story tells of the protagonist Yuyi Wu's secret, one very different from an 'ordinary' girl. Told in a gentle and ordinary style.

name: Recompile
description: This atmospheric, Metroidvania hacking adventure lets you take control of a semi-sapient program struggling against deletion. In the sprawling 3D world of a Mainframe, Recompile features intense combat, tight 3D platforming, super-powered abilities and an environmental logic-based hacking mechanic.

name: AA Touch Gun!
description: Classic timekiller. Defend yourself from the attack of the aircraft. Destroy all the planes. You can get bonuses for the destruction of enemies. Watch out for small and fast plane

name: Raid on the Ruhr
description: For PC and VR. Time to blow up some Dams! Fly and shoot your way through the rivers of the Ruhr Valley while reliving this incredible feat of daring, brilliance and skill.

name: Nemezis: Mysterious Journey III
description: Nemezis: Mysterious Journey III is a puzzle adventure game with countless brain-teasers, in which two tourists find themselves engaged in a series of mysterious events. The puzzle designer is Roland Pantoła - creator of critically acclaimed adventure titles such as Reah and the Schizm series.

name: Try To Reach 10
description: Try To Reach 10 is a complex of fun mini-games in which you can spend a great time. Play with your friends and parents and find out who can get the tenth level!

name: Helidefence
description: You are a military helicopter pilot who must protect the border from enemy invaders. On your way there will be a lot of military equipment that you want to destroy. Defeat everyone to become a hero. Pick up armor to protect the helicopter.

name: Another Bad Day in the Future
description: Another bad day in the future is an open world VR espionage game. Players undertake jobs for one of four political parties in a flying city to get their parties laws passed in a dynamic legal system. Players traverse the city using arm swing based locomotion, grablines, and can climb all the buildings.

name: Gratuitous Zombie Cannon
description: A dual stage survival FPS/Defense/strategy zombie game; a DSSFPSSZG you could say...¯\_(ツ)_/¯ Stage 1 (Birds-eye-view strategy): Place defense mechanisms such as turrets, mines, etc around you. Stage 2 (FPS): Shoot incendiary rounds at the zombies from your powerful cannon!

name: Ultra Strangeness
description: You are a creative entity trapped in a mysterious box. Try to transform this strange world and defy the ominous titans to find your freedom.

name: Amanda's Sticker Book
description: Enjoy a fun match-3 puzzle game for kids and adults alike! Put your matching skills to the test as you swap stickers and use power-ups to clear each puzzle.

name: Luna and Cynthia
description: ルナとシンシアは成人向けのRPGです。 主人公は彼女たちとともに、逃亡の旅を続けます。 しかし、彼女たちは非常に魅力的です。旅の途中様々なエッチなイベントに巻き込まれるでしょう。 盗賊たちに追われ、時にはつかまり、村に逃げても村人あちからのセクハラからは逃げられません。 力づくでせめられることもあれば、口先でごまかされることも。 フィールドやダンジョンを巡って彼らは強くなっていきます。 レベルを上げて、装備を整え、もとの平穏な暮らしを取り戻しましょう！

name: 闯关杀II
description: 闯关杀这是一款结合了战旗和卡牌创新策略游戏，玩家需要在棋盘中走和合适地点来选择适当卡牌打出。游戏中玩家可以选择一位主公，然后招募自己的武将一起开始闯关之旅。战斗中的各种随机元素使得游戏策略性十足。

name: Fall In Love - My Billionaire Boss
description: Fall In Love: My Billionaire Boss. This is NOT your average love story game.

name: RUINS Survival
description: In the past of this world, civilization has reached a high level of social and technical development, but then the world experienced a global catastrophe, the fall of an asteroid and the subsequent extraterrestrial pandemic as a result of which civilization and most of the wealth it created were destroyed.

name: 同居指南 | Cohabitation Guide
description: What! My house is occupied!" Our male protagonist utters an incredible howl. He clearly lives happily in his big house. His parents can work outside all the year round, but they are occupied by three sisters in the best three bedrooms. Liao Feiluo, Xiang Yuyao and Zhu Nanjun! What are you three doing?

name: 3D Custom Lady Maker
description: A custom character creator with a tendency towards the titillating. Create and customize the 3D anime-style lady of your dreams!

name: Artillery Globe
description: Command missile strikes, strategically capture resources, conquer the globe. Outwit your opponent in one-on-one battles and lay claim to victory. Shoot cannons and missiles across the globe to hit enemy units on the opposite side of the planet.

name: BATTLLOON - バトルーン
description: BATTLLOON is a cute and casual PvP action game which pits you against your friends in a battle of bouncing balloons! Plays up to 4 players!

name: Greedy Crush
description: This is an exquisite casual game where players can experience the extraordinary immersion experience of the classic three-player game in the virtual world. You need to use a slingshot to stop it from eating golden apples. Combine the different energy balls to form a combo and get a higher score!

name: The Tourist Trap
description: The Tourist Trap is a Escape Room game focused on cultural aspects from around the world. Your goal is to be the first to escape the facility and now you are racing against the clock versus 4 other clones to escape this facility by completing all culture based puzzle rooms!

name: Mining Empire: Earth Resources
description: Overcome the challenges of running mining enterprises to extract minerals enough to build a manned lunar station.

name: ::CallBack
description: Compete in this frenetic arcade local party-game between friends by throwing projectiles at your opponents at full speed! Trajectories and rebounds must be mastered if you want to become the Champion of the Arena ! You need one controller per player to play.

name: Beat Me!
description: Beat Me! is a physics-based multiplayer game for up to 6 players. Play with comical fantasy characters in a wide variety of fun and surprising environments. Challenge your friends locally or beat others over the internet!

name: FIT IN
description: FIT IN is a challenging game that you can play simply and enjoy deeply. You will die a lot but that feeling when you pass a level can't be described but only experienced.

name: Kunoichi Botan
