description: 1001 Jigsaw World Tour: Australia. A puzzle game and tour guide!

name: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: London
description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: London Puzzles – feel the spirit of London in jigsaws

name: 1001 Jigsaw. Home Sweet Home
description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Home Sweet Home: brain teasers around the family hearth.

name: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Great America
description: 1001 Jigsaw. World Tour: Great America – see the heart of America in jigsaws.

name: The Unicorn Princess
description: Explore the world on horseback and help the inhabitants of your village. Befriend Unica the unicorn and try to save the Dream World by completing all your missions!

name: Rebel Cops
description: Lead a ragtag squad of cops in rebellion against their town's new criminal power and see how long you can hold out in this unforgiving turn-based spin-off game from This Is the Police. You'll be desperately short on supplies, and a single shot can cost a cop their life.

name: Crappy Tube
description: Crappy Tube is a classic FPS game in which you must to escape from a factory.

name: VR INTERACTIVE TRAILER: Runes
description: Experience this VR trailer in full immersion inside your headset and get a sneak peek of Runes, a single player, story-driven VR adventure game in which you are Leth, a renegade wizard fighting for survival in a virtual fantasy world.

name: Pipeline VR
description: Pipeline VR is a hectic virtual reality puzzle game, that pits you against a rising tide of torrential water. With the residents of Pipesville in desperate need for plumbers, can YOU solve their plumbing emergencies?

name: Mystery Case Files: The Countess Collector's Edition
description: What lies within the depths of the pitch-black mirror?

name: Dark Parables: The Match Girl's Lost Paradise Collector's Edition
description: A sizzling take on the classic tale of greed, yearning, and redemption.

name: Shadow Wolf Mysteries: Under the Crimson Moon Collector's Edition
description: Is Martha really a werewolf - or has she been wrongly accused?

name: Hidden Object: Home Makeover
description: Help Emma restore her grandparents' old house! Hidden Object, Match-3 and decoration all in one game.

name: Haunted Legends: The Dark Wishes Collector's Edition
description: Restore the threads of Fate, before they cause a disaster!

name: Forgiveness : Escape Room
description: "Forgiveness" is a series of 7 escape room adventures, Take the personality test and find out which sin you are guilty of - the room design, environment and the trials you’ll go through will change accordingly!

name: Anubis' Challenge
description: Anubis' Challenge is an action-based VR adventure game where you need to show your reaction and combat skills to withstand multiple waves of enemies.

name: B.O.T.S. and the Robofriends
description: B.O.T.S. and the Robofriends is a sci-fi top-down shooter rouge-lite with multiple games modes. Play alone or with friends in 4-player co-op choosing from 4 unique robot characters with different attributes and attacks. Defend your home, rescue the Robofriends, and find MOTER!

name: Möbius Front '83
description: Defend America from an alternate-universe America using state-of-the-art 1980s military hardware in this intricate and tactical turn-based strategy game.

name: 8bit Arena
description: Invite and battle your friends in this retro style local multiplayer action game. Choose your character, each with a unique skillset of 4 abilities, and compete in different arenas. Enhance your skill with full controller support and a direct competitive gameplay!

name: ChronoBreach
description: A deadly factory surrounds you. The manipulation of time is necessary to escape this underground facility. Use your wit, your laser blaster, and your time-warping abilities to face your demise head-on and triumph!

name: Daedalic Complex
description: Daedalic Complex is an adventure, RPG, dungeon-crawling game with elements of storytelling and harsh survival. In this game, a player is required to find an exit for each stage by means of meeting certain conditions while surviving unforgiving level-designs and combats with hideous monsters.

name: Bomber Arena
description: Bomber Arena is a 3d action adventure game where you go through several mazes in solo mode or co-op (only local) fighting enemies until you reach your goal. You can take powers to improve your character as well as mounts to help you defeat your opponents in this game.

name: Paranoia: Deliver Me
description: Based on the best seller Paranoia, the story about Lingluo's college life will bring you to a world unknown. She pursues her music dream without knowing her life is about to be turned upside down. Losing her best friend and her confidence, she plunges into the depth of despair. What will she do?

name: CHECKMATE : Battle Arenas
description: Checkmate! Turn Based Real Time PvP Game!Enter the hottest battlefield and compete other players all around the world.Show your divine move to beat the enemy!

name: Castle Rencounter
description: What? These insolent decided to defend themselves and gather an army? How? Is their army going on the offensive? Can not be! Well, in this case, act, my lord. Smash the enemies and destroy their stronghold!

name: Dig to the Stars
description: Collect minerals for the rocket repair and save the robot.

name: Nuclear Power Station Creator
description: Travel to Japan of the second half of the 20th century to get first-hand knowledge of how a nuclear power plants works.

name: Snowballed: Crazy Downhill
description: Welcome to the snow adventure Snowballed: Crazy Downhill! Control a small snowball, which merrily rolls down the slope, and don't let it face big obstacles!

name: Operation Snowman
description: Operation Snowman is a shooter with unforegttable Christmas atmosphere, and you can enjoy it any time of the year.

name: Kolumno
description: Don't let yourself be fooled by its minimalist looks, Kolumno is one of the most elegant and challenging games in recent time.

name: DRAMAQUEEN
description: DRAMAQUEEN lets players tell their own stories, and share them with their friends, for fun, for learning or for both.

name: Ball Out
description: Discover a crazy Motorcycle - Football game that combines reactivity and speed! In Ball Out, get on several vehicles and compete against your friends or other online players on various tracks with one goal in mind: score as many goals as possible! Gain experience and customize your equipment to show your opponents what you are worth.

name: Khaos Wind
description: How long will you survive?

name: Short Circuit VR
description: Short Circuit VR is an electronics lab simulator in Virtual Reality. You can build your own electronic circuits with the components provided, learn basic electronics by completing challenges and just have fun while experimenting and making awesome projects!

name: Julie's Sweets
description: Julie's Sweets is story driven time management game featuring 60 story and 18 pure challenge levels. Delicious donuts, cupcakes and pies - make them quick and time flys.

name: Burnouts: The Igne Mori
description: Burnouts: The indie adventure game driven by story, humor and weed. Maneuver yourself through the recent zombie apocalypse by utilizing a combination of Stealth, Quick Reaction Time Events and Puzzles. Any moment can descend into life or death in this tale.

name: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos
description: Step into the wacky heroic fantasy universe of the Dungeon of Naheulbeuk. Lead a team of unlikely and clumsy heroes in an epic and challenging tactical RPG. Live an adventure filled with humor, surprises and silly encounters.

name: Corrupt The Priest
description: You are one of the many servants of the strife god, and your task is to possess the mind of the local archpriest in order to sow wickedness and discordance in the town.

name: Klondike & Girls
description: Now new solitaire «Klondike» will please all fans of anime and sexy girls. The unfolding of cards turns into a fun entertainment thanks to hot beauties and pleasant relaxing music!

name: Terrible Beast from the East
description: The Terrible Beast From The East is an Online 2D Adventure RPG where you must fight invasions of monsters together with friends & strangers in order to save the last human city!

name: Car Transporter 2013
description: Highly polished cars are placed in front of the carshops waiting for buyers. To provide the dealers with the necessary cars you transport the vehicles under pressure to their final destination. Load trucks with the desired cars and avoid any scratches or damage during charging.

name: Woodcutter Simulator 2011
description: The smell of tree resin is in the air when Woodcutter Simulator 2011 is started. Here the player is the master of a modern wood processing plant and is allowed to take over pithy tasks – feel as if you were in Canada's forests yourself.

name: BattleRush: Ardennes Assault
description: Multiplayer action game in the entourage of the Second World War with total destruction of the environment. Complete freedom of action. Do anything and anywhere. Build defense, demolish enemy towns, control any vehicle which you will see on your way or create.

name: Puzzles for smart: Horses
description: Puzzles for smart: Horses - for fans of popular puzzles of different complexity. Collect puzzle with the image of these beautiful horses.

name: Gems of Magic: Lost Family
description: Peaceful and really magical Match 3 adventure for a whole family! This magic and beautiful game allow you to take a look at Enchanted Forest, were many magical creatures live peacefully. The bright game without violence, quite simple on start, but challenge after first levels! Suitable for kids and adults.

name: Psychoverse City
description: PSYCHOVERSE CITY, a dizzyingly fast-paced first-person platformer across the rooftops of an ever-evolving cityscape, accompanied by adrenaline-pumping beats!

name: Snares of Ruin Zero
description: A short prequel to Snares of Ruin, showing the infection outbreak and other harrowing events over the course of 2 weeks leading up to Hank's and Gwen's arrival in the city.

name: Trinity VR
description: Trinity is the pilot for the first live-action, immersive, interactive, virtual reality sci-fi experience… In a future where humans have long been extinct, the last surviving androids fight a final war for freedom against an all-powerful Singularity, their God…Who am I? What role do I play in the story?

name: Reynard
description: Reynard is a mixture of procedurally generated action RPG and a Tower Defense genre with roguelike elements. It has been influenced by classics such as The Legend of Zelda and an indie classic - The Binding of Isaac.

name: Hentai Plus Girl
description: Hentai Plus Girl - a logical game in which your task is to collect puzzles and open the pictures.

name: 3 Days in the Abyss
description: In the year 33 A.D on the day of the Crucifixion of Jesus Christ, there comes an event that saved Mankind from the fires of Hell.

name: Sierra Madre: The Wild West
description: Sierra Madre: The Wild West is a western, open world first person shooter survival game set in the 1870s. You play as a U.S. Marshall in the Wild West. Hunt outlaws, save the locals, and do whatever it takes to survive in your quest to rid the Wild West of injustice.

name: Campido
description: Campido is a unique card game which challenge your wits, strategy, memory and management skills. The game is set in a fantasy universe, in which humanoid mammals are replacing the regular and normal human characters you are always used to see.

name: Witoo VR photo viewer
description: Witoo VR is a virtual reality experience to visualize your 360° photos

name: Dr. Schplot's Nanobots
description: A challenging, story-driven puzzle adventure that takes place inside your intestines. Solve challenging puzzles with experimental mechanics, collect nanobots with unique abilities and discover the identity of the reclusive Dr. Schplot. The fate of humanity rests in your hands!

name: Hulì The Mage
description: Are you looking for a game both relaxing and adrenalinic? A weird plot with lots of NPCs and monsters to slay? Then, this is the game you are looking for. Beware! Do not get fooled by the nice and happy graphics, it is not as easy as you may think.

name: Warp Glider
description: Pilot a gravity-defying craft at blazing speeds. Pull off aerial acrobats using stackable weapons to survive the swarming Bandits. Retro arcade action and out of this world flight control! Now with Co-op!

name: Cope Island: Adrift
description: Visit a paradise of self improvement. Return a better version of yourself.

name: Pattern
description: Sometimes art isn't the product of a grand vision but rather the process. It's hard to know what you are trying to say until you've already said it.

name: Brave Hero Yuusha EX
description: Familiar tales can take unfamiliar turns! And it's up to you to reconstruct the story!

name: NekoMiko
description: The main character is an unfortunate man who can't do anything well. One fateful day, he meets 2 cat-eared shrine maidens by the name of Ayame and Kaede at an old shrine, and ends up living with them! Set in Akihabara, enjoy this adventure game of the slightly dirty-minded and eventful cohabitation life with 2 cat-eared shrine maidens.

name: Yearning
description: This 2D horror game is set in Edo period of Japan. The girl notices that her old sister has disappeared. The girl will look for her and clues of her. What will the girl find in end of the story?

name: Omno
description: A single-player journey of discovery through an ancient world of wonders, created by solo developer Jonas Manke.

name: Mean Routine
description: Manage a regular office worker, participate in discussions with colleagues and try to get a promotion!

name: mikapyon
description: miKaPyon is a rabbit girl in a colorful 3D platformer full of fast freerunning and jump challenges, wall-jumps and sliding over hills and loops.

name: The Lost Soul
description: The Lost Soul is an arcade difficulty-focused platformer , made in a minimalist style. 13 different levels, each of which contain it’s own unique soundtrack, checkpoint system, as well as many secrets.

name: Tales of the Aswang VR
description: Tales of the Aswang is a VR game that explores the myths and the epic creatures of Filipino oral tradition compiled from books written by Maximo Ramos and stories passed on through generations of storytelling and remembrance.

name: Cult of the Glitch King
description: A 2D horror adventure with predominant puzzle and minor stealth and survival elements centered on mysterious occult & sci-fi themes.

name: OkunoKA Madness
description: Test your reflexes and coordination with more than 100 levels to complete and 3 speedrun modes. Do You have what it takes?

name: Up in the Air
description: Up in the Air is a zany, open-world game made by students at SMU Guildhall. You play as a balloon dog exploring a demented carnival populated by crazy children using a variety of power-ups, like water balloons and ground pound, to fend the kids off and collect carnival tickets.

name: Death Space
description: You play as a scientist named Elmagamed at the 69th space station and you got to escape from a monstrous mutant.

name: Siam Twinstick
description: A badass, adrenaline pumping twinstick-shooter!

name: Flynguin Station
description: Flynguin Station is a casual projectile-endless runner game with RPG elements. Save the penguins by re-discovering the secrets of flight! Fly as far as possible, level up, upgrade your penguin and customize him to your liking.

name: The Way of Wrath RPG
description: Embrace the ferocious spirit of your ancestors and forge your path as a pre-historic tribal chieftain. Explore a rich open-world RPG brim full of exciting encounters and fun minigames. Make hard choices and develop relationships with your companions in a mature story where your choices matter.

name: The Dungeon Paradox
description: A genre-defining phase-based tactical RPG - lead a team of Operators into a world of monsters, puzzles and treasures while discovering the events that lead to their new fantastic adventure

name: Hentai Memorama
description: Memory game with a nice challenge and a happy ending

name: Dereliction
description: Real time tactical combat. Play the role of the commander. take back a derelict space ship from an alien infestation.

name: Too Hot!
description: Going to a beach and making love with a childhood friend girl whose body became so sexy.

name: Chaordic
description: Fight a horde of dark creatures that do not want you to get out of the underworld.

name: Halloween Puzzles
description: Halloween Puzzles. It‘s a clever and colorful learning experience. Puzzles are a challenging young minds, teaching and preparing them early in life some very important life skills. Halloween Puzzles will strike your imagination in assorted piece counts, shapes and levels of difficulty. Dozens of Halloween Puzzles to suit any puzzler.

name: Super Urban Wizard
description: The evil Sowron has stolen the one bling It’s up to Gundolf the Wizard to take the fight to Sowron, and bust a cap in the A** of Evil!

name: Angry Punisher
description: Sharpen your axes and put on your masks because today you are going to punish them all! After all you are a punisher! ANGRY PUNISHER!

name: Bomb N' Bats
description: Welcome to the world of Bomb N' Bats. Be the last Bat alive in this local multiplayer game where you can play up to 4 players.

name: ZET
description: Minimalistic hardcore platformer with unusual controls.

name: The Warrior
description: After an prison outbreak has gone wrong, surviving inmate Tom Feltrod comes face to face with an inmate who considers himself a "Warrior".

name: The Kite
description: The Kite is a small dramatic point-and-click adventure. The game highlights the problems of a struggling family.

name: Worlds Collide
description: Worlds Collide is a real-time strategy game.In the game of Worlds Collide, you will play as a king of your empire, to build a city, expand its territory, gather enough resources, set up more production lines, eventually form your army and conquer others.

name: Blood Card 2: Dark Mist
description: Dark Mist is a card game that combines elements of the roguelike deckbuilder genre with enemies that appear in waves. Defeat monsters and level up during battle to keep yourself going.

name: Iron Vulture
description: Iron Vulture is a real-time strategy line defender. You can command six soldiers in real-time combat, move them across lanes, and use their abilities to eliminate wave after wave of mutated creatures.

name: DYNASTY WARRIORS 7: Xtreme Legends Definitive Edition
description: The new modes and replay elements of "Xtreme Legends", even including downloadable content, have been packed into the thrilling one vs. one-thousand action game "DYNASTY WARRIORS 7", comprising a massive single title that is available now for a reasonable price!

name: Necro Story
description: A Comedy RPG where you play as a powerful and (kind of) evil Necromancer. Cast powerful spells, raise armies of skeletons, sign Dark Pacts and capture dead enemies' souls to take control of them.

name: Stormhill Mystery: Family Shadows
description: Stormhill Mystery: Family Shadows is a fantastic casual puzzle adventure game. This is an excellent family story with a paranormal twist! Your family’s past is more interesting than any story. And it's not over yet...

name: Defentures
description: Defentures - defense mid-core game. Lead your dwarves, help them to reach treasures. Choose their tiers, use magic and upgrade global skills.

name: It's Not A Moon
description: Manage a space station, flying through a procedually generated universe, fight, build and survive in the coldness of space.

name: The Fur in Me
description: The Fur in Me is a 2D platform match color game where you follow a young Fur in a quest to save his own world from the mad Fearflies. To do so, you’ll have to smash your enemies while matching your color with theirs .

name: A night with Natalie VR
description: Have some fun time with Natalie, the virtual lady of your dreams!

name: Glass Painting: Winter Art
description: Find the Christmas mood with an exciting arcade game Glass Painting: Winter Art! This winter puzzle is a real catch for all glass art amateurs. Create amazing snow landscapes with bright color palette and visual effects!

name: Assault On Metaltron
description: Get ready to defend your metallic planet from human and orc invaders in this intense, challenging and addictive action tower defense game! Play solo or in cooperation on one pc!

name: Soul Tech: Millennium
description: Inspired by the likes of MechWarrior, Armored Core, Pacific Rim, and more... With unique combat mechanics and engaging story-driven campaign, Soul Tech is not your average Mecha.

name: Spray Dynamite X Radioactive Insects
description: Play a shooter 2D, using a spray to explode waves of radiactive insects.

name: [it's possible] Classic
description: Squeeze past buzzsaws, dodge deadly spikes, and jump over burning acid in this challenging indie platformer made with love!

name: Angels of Ryina
description: Angels of Ryina is a Fantasy Adventure MOBA game featuring anime and manga graphics

name: Jump Jumpz
description: Reach as high as possible while collecting as many coins as you can. This game has the difficulty and style of Arcade games of the 80s.

name: Predicate
description: Predicate is a fast paced bullet-hell with a colorful palette and challenging bosses. Move fast and crush enemies as one character, carefully maneuver and shoot enemies as another.

name: King of Retail
description: Congratulations on owning your very own store! Design your store layout. Buy and sell goods. Hire and manage your staff, take care of your customers and plan the perfect marketing campaign. Make yours the most popular store in town - but watch out, running a store is not as easy as it sounds!

name: Deported 2: Build That Wall
description: Crankage Games brings you another hilarious tale full of satire and parody! Play as Ronald J. Grump, a secret agent hellbent on deporting illegal extraterrestrials from outer-space off of his home-planet! Brosie O'Shlongel is back for vengeance, and this time, this scumsucker means business!

name: Super Chains
description: Super Chains is a unique puzzle experience that will perplex, delight and unwind your mind.

name: Breathe Peace World
description: Enter a Virtual Reality storybook world and learn how to Breathe Peace. When you're ready to return home, you'll know exactly how to Breathe Peace in any situation, anytime, anywhere!

name: Alpha & Beta
description: Alpha & Beta is a 2d platform game for those who love old platform games but with a few touches on this old style, the most important features are the high degree of difficulty and the promise of a satisfying gaming experience with a long gameplay time

name: Recursive Pain
description: Recursive pain is a fast-paced third person multiplayer shooter that brings many original ideas and gameplay mechanics to the online-shooters genre.

name: Perfect Life VR
description: Perfect Life VR You can relax in this perfect house. Customize your car. Customize your friend. Fire the fireplace. Just put your HMD on your head and relax. Roam in the house. Enjoy stunning visuals and relaxing sound.

name: AstroGenesis
description: Dynamic game in the genre of Bullet hell. Destroy your enemies dodging the hail of bullets!

name: Fururu Project : Ruby
description: 《 Fururu Project : Ruby 》 is an adventure game (AVG). The game focuses on interactions with objects in scenes and exploring through the map. Players are able to trigger various events in game and affect how the story goes.

name: Colonization of the Moon
description: Defend your homeland because of all the forces and do not let the enemy break through Prove that you can survive all the trials and save the moon !

name: Artist Idle
description: Draw pictures, sell them and become a famous artist.

name: Hentai Puzzle Classic
description: Hentai Puzzle Classic - this is a new erotic puzzle-game in which you will need to solve different pictures.

name: Mine Royale - Battle Royale
description: Mine Royale - Battle Royale is the fun new blocky battle royale game. It's a fun single-player and online game! Alot of new updates are coming soon!

name: Bunny Mahjo
description: Classic Mahjong Solitaire is not single-player game anymore. You can play with friends in 3d-environment. Play together, win together, unlock more figures together.

name: The Portal Dimension - Bizarre Huntseeker
description: 「Run, Jump, Attack, Dash !」 "The portal Dimension" is a fast-paced 2D scrolling action game. The variety of mysterious dimensional armies has released several bizarre creatures to attack the innocence from various worlds.

name: A Bewitching Revolution
description: A Bewitching Revolution is a first-person adventure game about a communist witch living in a cyberpunk city. Use magic to help the city's residents organise collective forms of power and resistance!

name: Kick The Anime Simulator
description: Perform experiments on anime girl characters.  Angry at your boss?  Want to smash all around you?  Want more kicks?

name: Special Counter Force Attack
description: Get engaged in the Special Counter Force Attack plot to overthrow the oppressive rule of the drug cartel threatening the city. Make your way through different environments and brave the variety of tough game modes to get ever so closer towards bringing peace to the city.

name: Mò The Frog
description: Mo the frog is a classic 2D platform in which you will have to committ fully to ho through many levels that are present in the game. Dress the part of Mò the frog in the epic adventure to free Avalaar's kingdom from the oppression which the terrible Peter's the troll and his henchmen, the black captains, try to bring by conquering it.

name: Starfighter: Infinity
description: A space based MMORPG with a focus on ‘dogfighting’ style action and exploration. Features a huge array of ships, imaginative weapons and ship upgrades with more being added all the time. Explore the galaxy, fight other players, form your own organisations, mine asteroids to craft new items, loot rare weapons from alien races, and more...

name: Dungeons of Necromancers
description: Dungeons of Necromancers is a small pixel game. Your task is to go through as many dungeons as possible while upgrading your character.

name: Chronos: Before the Ashes
description: Chronos: Before the Ashes is an atmospheric RPG that chronicles a hero’s lifelong quest to save their homeland from a great evil.

name: Creatures Inc
description: Creatures Inc throws you into a world infested by Creatures. Battle to survive in a valley where you can capture and tame creatures.

name: Nights at the Clown Maze
description: Can you find out what secrets lie within the clown maze?

name: Invisible Fist
description: Create a billion-dollar startup, try to pay off your student loans or wait in the line for Food Stamps... And fight the Invisible Fist of the Free Market in this Late Capitalism Card Game!

name: The Wanderer: Frankenstein’s Creature
description: Experience the Myth of Frankenstein through the innocent eyes of his creature. Make decisions and change people's view that you will meet on your way. Now, the myth is in your hands, so how are you going to end it?

name: Red Matter
description: Red Matter is a story-driven VR puzzle adventure game set during a dystopian sci-fi Cold War. Take on the role of Agent Epsilon, an astronaut of the Atlantic Union dispatched to an abandoned Volgravian moon base on a frozen, faraway planet. Your mission: to investigate a shady top secret research project.

name: Pumped BMX Pro
description: Pumped BMX Pro is the next installment in the high adrenaline, fast-paced arcade BMX trickathon. Master 60 levels and over 200 challenges while pulling off as many radical stunts as possible on one of 15 bikes.

name: Leprechaun Shadow
description: Leprechaun Shadow is an absurdist comedy point & click adventure game following Sir Typhil of Creulor as he attempts to catch a rutabaga-stealing killer leprechaun in Yorkwen city.

name: The Yellow Quiz
description: The Yellow Quiz - a fun multiplayer game for parties that turns your smartphone into a wireless game controller.

name: SinVR
description: ENTER the Forbidden World of SinVR. Fulfill your sexual fantasies in your own private dungeon. With a growing library of characters and environments, SinVR is the destination for amusing adult entertainment, in VR or on your PC.

name: Pacify
description: There is reportedly an evil inside that house. Something about an old funeral parlor offering a last chance to talk to their dead loved ones. Plus something about lights, laughter, a girl, missing people, etc... You know the same stuff everyone claims. Take a team, and check the place out.

name: Raffle Blast
description: Raffle Blast is a tool that provides a way for anyone to host and present a visually appealing raffle or drawing to any sized group. No hat or coffee can needed :)

name: Curfew
description: Help a tired working robot to get home in the middle of a Curfew. Puzzles, hard jumps and obstacles, all while fighting killer robots . This is a homage to the 80s, retrowave style with some pounding synthwave music. Relive the good old days with this fps style gameplay

name: Bravado
description: Bravado is a game that will test your ability to endure waves of various enemies while fighting in a medieval arena. The advanced sword fighting mechanics creates a thrilling battle experience in the castle environment.

name: Speaking Simulator
description: The hilarious game about the complexity of conversation. Move your tongue and lips to make your words come out and try not to let your face explode.

name: Hell Breaker
description: VR Dungeon game with bHaptics Tactsuit

name: I'm the Koala
description: In this extremely challenging 2D platformer, you'll be faced with many obstacles and enemies that need to be avoided in order to pass 10 different stages. But be warned, you only get a set amount of lives. If you run out of lives, you start at the beginning.

name: Tale of Ninja: Fall of the Miyoshi
description: Play as a ninja through the Sengoku period of Japan. There are many possible ways to assassinate the target and find your own nindou.

name: 隆中策
description: 最具人文氣息的策略三國志遊戲，正統得天下三國遊戲，三國志2013（2014）的正版續作。

name: You have a drunk friend
description: What will you play if you have a very drunk friend? A warm hearted angel? Or an evilbad guy？You may find answer in this fun weird game. Try exploring in the room and figure out how to sober up your friend, may it's not only just one solution,though,never hurt friend,and never do evil!

name: Bedtime Blues
description: They say that child’s imagination is pure and innocent, but what if said imagination becomes a nightmare? Enter the pixelate world of a young, troubled mind, and survive the night!

name: ROGAN: The Thief in the Castle
description: ROGAN: The Thief in the Castle is a VR adventure game.Players experience the thrilling life of a thief who has sneaked into a medieval castle full of guards. You will require cunning to survive and make your way through the castle as you use everything a thief has at their disposal: pickpocketing, stealing, hiding, creating distractions,...

name: Zquirrels Jump
description: Why do Zquirrels Jump? Why do they risk their health and life? In the name and glory of the one and only true love. The love for peanuts! Join the Zquirrels, strap in and jump. You have only a few seconds before the nuts hit the ground. Make us proud, jump now!

name: Beat Blocks VR
description: Beat Blocks VR is a VR Arcade Puzzle game where your goal is to assemble blocks and make best combinations to be the best player in the world. Very innovative game, you will interact directly with shapes linked to the level soundtrack.

name: FPS Monitor – hardware in-game & desktop overlays
description: FPS Monitor tracks your PC's hardware state and displays this information as an overlay in-game or over desktop. Does not require configuration, it works immediately after installation.

name: qop 4
description: qop 4 is a minimalistic puzzle which goal is to get the cube to finish using 4 directions in space.

name: RAID OF REGIONS
description: RAID OF REGIONS is a multiteam tactical shooter set on a future post war era. Every match is a heart pounding 4v4v4v4 battle between agents with customizable loadout, fighting together with their unique gears and advance gadgets.

name: SnowNight
description: This is a small, warm story that happened in the winter. Two people who met by chance, because of each other's existence, and then felt more past that had not been deliberately remembered - After telling the story, I finally ushered in the day when the first snow fell.

name: Whimsical Quest
description: Whimsical Quest is a retro action roguelite adventure with enough nostalgia to entertain the old-schoolers. Fight through randomized maps, collect over 50 items, unlock different characters, collect pets to fight with you and prepare to destroy the typical evil one that won't be revealed until you meet him. Classic.

name: 我是渣男-Dishonest
description: 温柔可人的青梅竹马、倔强高配的女上司，了解一下？游走在花丛之间的都市屌丝渣男究竟是要闹哪样？请看他的表演。

name: Animal Force
description: There is no dizzy, no horror, no zombies,and no guns, Animal Force is a happy & funny game for all age game players.This game include single player mode and 3 local multiplayer modes.

name: Moreau
description: “Shipwrecked. A funny, old-fashioned word, but that’s what happened to me…” You are Eddie Pendrick, marooned on what you think should be a deserted island - until you encounter the natives. Their master wants you for his experiments, but one creature by the name of M’Ling dares to rescue you.

name: RocketGO
description: RocketGO offers entertaining ways to pilot the rocket for the universe exploration. Six planets with unique landscapes and extreme conditions will challenge your piloting skills. You can upgrade the rocket using alien artefacts you discovered in the hidden places. Get ready for the space adventure!

name: VRetired
description: VR Breakout with retro atmoshpere

name: My Exotic Farm
description: My Exotic Farm is a farm building simulation game...

name: Destiny's Sword
description: Destiny’s Sword is a Living-Narrative Graphic Adventure. Explore distant worlds, forge friendships and lead your team through an epic adventure.

name: Detective Sherlock Pug - Hidden Object. Relaxing games
description: An explosive combination of comic book, mystery and humor! In this Hidden Objects game you will become a superhero (comic-book detective's right-hand man) to solve an unusual fantastic case. Find and defeat the evil Skindiver!

name: Anstorm
description: Simple and gripping gameplay most commonly as a classical arcade shooter. The game consists of short levels which is perfect for short breaks to relax.

name: Trivia Clash: Adult Film Star Edition
description: Trivia Clash is a video based trivia game that allows players to compete against their favorite celebrities in a head-to-head trivia competition.

name: Relow
description: Relow is a very fast-paced first-person shooter where you compete using weird weapons and lethal side-arms in a procedural environment

name: Canasta 3D Premium
description: Realistic 3D Canasta simulation with singleplayer, multiplayer and tutorial. With configurable AI strength and many adjustable rule and game variants you can start exciting Canasta tournaments - or just play for fun!

name: IO Interloper
description: IO Interloper is a hacking heist game all about peering through security cameras, piloting drones, duping rubes, and saying I'M IN in a really gruff voice.

name: MagicJam
description: Pick up a controller and join Ricky on his adventure through the 90's Funk-O-tron game machine. There are 4 different themes to choose from, each have their own weird quirks that make a unique cartoon like experience.

name: Seek Love
description: Phoebus and Venus have met each other an old time ago. For a long time, in the heart of Phoebus, he has always loved Venus...

name: Slime Research
description: Slimy Puzzle Platforming

name: Tippy Tree
description: Christmas is just around the corner and it’s time to decorate! Tippy Tree is a virtual reality puzzle game that has you decorate the tippiest of trees. Celebrate the holiday season with trinkets aplenty, but watch out, without careful planning, all of your work may come crashing down!

name: Ocean's Treasures
description: Ocean's Treasures is a VR underwater treasure hunt that places the player on the bottom of the sea to explore shipwrecks and recover lost treasures. Within 12 different scenes, you will be surrounded by some spectacular environment and fishes.

name: Homestead
description: Raise livestock, make friends, and have fun farming!

name: Later Alligator
description: Pat the alligator, a (mostly) harmless and (probably) innocent reptile is at the center of a conspiracy that could bring down the biggest, scariest family in Alligator New York City: his own! Explore the city, meet the Family, and try to save Pat before the clock runs out.

name: Flower
description: Experience award-winning Flower, now available on PC. Flower lets you take control of the wind as you explore and navigate beautiful, lush environments.

name: TIGER GAME ROM KNIFE
description: Pin Anything You Want to Your Steam Library !

name: Desolate City: The Bloody Dawn Enhanced Edition
description: It seemed to be a normal day at Gray Bay. While law student Lisa was doing her part-time job in a pizzeria, an experimental project had made great progress in a research facility on the other side of the city, but later it was not proceeding as the researchers were expecting...

name: ROGO
description: ROGO is my cute rogue-lite where you gotta give everyone post and avoid cheeky animals trying to make you go to sleep · ◡ ·

name: Campfire Pro
description: Complete your character design, plot manipulation, and worldbuilding all in one place. Designed to be a revolutionary tool for writers to plan out their stories, Campfire Pro has exactly what novelists and screenwriters need to go from the seed of an idea to a detailed plan that’s ready to be executed.

name: Propaganda Llama
description: Puzzling and adorable political intrigue. Journey through over 50 llevels of challenging puzzles populated with plenty of llamas.

name: Neon Junctions
description: First Person Puzzle-Platformer imbued with atmosphere of synthwave and 80s.

name: Bombyman
description: Discover worlds, pass levels, blow up monsters, destroy walls in search of power-ups ! Become a Bombyman and keep "Bomb-run-boom-repeat" all day long !

name: Sagrada
description: A game of dice drafting and window crafting.

name: Raiders of the North Sea
description: It's Raiding Season! Plunder your way to Viking adventure in the digital adaptation of the award-winning worker-placement board game!

name: Reiner Knizia Yellow & Yangtze
description: Lead your dynasty to victory in the new digital adaptation of the acclaimed board game!

name: War Yards
description: Step into the shoes of a legendary gunslinger and experience a new kind of VR multiplayer combat. War Yards utilizes a set of unique gameplay systems to seamlessly bring bullet time mechanics to multiplayer matches.

name: Piggy Chase
description: Piggy Chase is a 3D runner where you form a conga-line of farm animal friends, dodge crazy tractors, runaway city buses and evil snowmen to weave through mazes without falling off the edge to lead Piggy on an adventure to escape the farm and find a new home.

name: Niplheim's Hunter - Branded Azel
description: Play as the hunter girl Azel and battle monsters with equipment made of their corpses while searching for the Black Demon Beast that branded her.

name: Survive Zombies
description: zombie arcade shooter is what this game is for the most part about. with a lot of action and many weapons. beat your way through sewer tunnels, alley streets, apartments, subways and factory area.

name: Evoke
description: A VR spell-casting experience! Greyhelm forest is on the verge of being completely corrupted by the undead, this looks like a job for an almighty and powerful wizard! Oh, he's booked out is he? Damn.. Well, perhaps you will be up for the challenge!

name: Super Darts VR
description: Super Darts VR is an easy and simple dart game simulator that you can enjoy with other players. You can experience the realistic dart throwing sensation in a virtual space. Face other players in the dart game with pleasant special effects.

name: Kara no Shojo
description: Play as a detective in the post-war reconstruction period of Japan. Uncover the mystery behind a series of bizarre murders in an interactive and complicated human drama. The trail of clues unfolds, one-by-one...

name: 沉睡的法则 Things as They Are
description: 轻松欢乐的细节向JRPG，《囧魂》、《对不起，我是个NPC》、《空陆》制作组“四块二茶会”最新作品。

name: Deported: Drain the Swamp
description: Crankage Games brings you another hilarious tale full of satire and parody! Play as Ronald J. Grump, a secret agent hellbent on deporting illegal extraterrestrials from outer-space off of his home-planet! Follow Agent Grump as he drains the swamp, deports aliens, and makes Earth great again!

name: Club Lighting
description: Welcome to the nightclub! A place for groovy music, best DJs and for sure pretty girls. Make those girls dance, and you will get your reward!

name: Plunder! All Hands Ahoy
description: Streamers are pitted against their viewers. Streamers sail to various locations in search of gold to plunder. As the viewers watch, the streamer raids the locations and the viewers choose to aid in the defense. With cannons, spells, and teamwork, the viewers can fend off the streamer's attack.

name: Storm Boy
description: Based on Colin Thiele's 1964 children’s book of the same name, Storm Boy takes place on the beaches of South Australia near the mouth of the Murray River, where the titular protagonist rescues orphaned pelican chicks, one of whom later becomes the child’s pet and faithful companion, Mr. Percival.

name: DriftKing 2D
description: DriftKing 2D is an endless random generated Drifting game!But the story starts with DriftKing 3D! Complete races & win the game![Public Beta]

name: Trinoline All Ages Version
description: One summer day, Shun Nanami meets a girl who is the spitting image of his dead sister. She turns out to be a high-tech android indistinguishable from a human being. So begins a touching tale in a world where androids and human beings coexist.

name: EduNumbers
description: EduNumbers is an educational software for children in the age of 3-6.

name: 江湖求生 Ganghood Survival
description: 《Ganghood Survival》 is a hardcore competitive action game based on Chinese Wushu theme. Dozens of players are in the same map, and play as a ‘Knight-errant’ with nothing at the beginning. They need to strengthen themselves by collecting resources and learning wushu books, beating others to win the game.

name: Space Gladiator
description: Retro top-down shooting game, you will control different kinds of the fighters in a unique way, soar in dangerous space, perform excellent skills, get loots, upgrade arms and achieve the highest score!

name: 能量冲击 Energy Shock
description: Energy Shock is a turn-based action game with roguelike elements. In-game attack and movement are combined. Whenever you want to attack, you have to move forward. Attack also means you will enter the enemy‘s range.

name: History Table: Lore & Quiz
description: Take a trip through time and learn more about the main events and people of world history with the History Table: Lore & Quiz!

name: VR Smash Park
description: It's time to let off some steam. VR Smash Park is a funny, intense and addictive Virtual Reality game created for VR beginners and pros.The game contains 5 unique shooting experience and several mini-games and more coming.

name: Ascending - Dojo
description: In this VR-RPG you can bend the elements and use other mystical abilities to face every challenge.

name: 骑士与魔法战争
description: In The Knight's Magic War, you will continue to explore the next layer, each layer of map generated randomly, the map will have a variety of monsters, props, magic, events, unknown. You need to train your heroes or troops to defeat them so that you can go further.

name: Walking Zombie 2
description: Zombie singleplayer shooter in modern polygon graphics with rich RPG elements.

name: Café International
description: The legendary game (Board Game of The Year 1989 Germany, over one million sold) is back, a fun and challenging strategic board game!

name: Akabeth Tactics
description: Akabeth Tactics is a turn-based tactical puzzle game where you play as the vampire Liel, trying to infiltrate into King Cassius' castle and usurpe the throne. Solve challenging positioning puzzles through fixed levels, in a gothic tone.

name: The Settlers® : Heritage of Kings - History Edition
description: With this modernized History Edition dive into the diversified mix of enthralling build-up matches and exciting real-time fights. Manifold landscapes await to be explored and populated. Includes the main game plus the two expansions.

name: The Settlers® : Rise of an Empire - History Edition
description: Build vibrant cities in a medieval world with this modernized version of The Settlers – Rise of an Empire. Each character leads their individual lives and can be observed by you at any time. Will you go down in history as a legendary king?

name: The Settlers® 7 : History Edition
description: Let yourself be enchanted by the new world of Settlers with this modernized History Edition – in the midst of green forests and lush meadows, it will bustle again. You alone hold the fate of your kingdom in your hands. Which strategy will you choose?

name: 🚀 Human Rocket Person
description: Human Rocket Person is an absurd & fun platformer where you jump & fly through different levels on your trusted pogo stick using ass-juice as fuel. It’s unbearably hard and by the end of this game, you will never play a platformer again.

name: I Can Gun
description: Everyone can shoot, but not everyone can gun. In this FPS you will have to operate your weapon in full detail while scavenging a procedurally generated level protected by machines that don't even know what mercy is. Find all documents to beat the game. Playable with Mouse+Keyboard and/or in VR (HTC Vive, Oculus Rift).

name: Shakes on a Plane
description: Shakes on a Plane is a chaotic co-op shaking game for one to four players. Flying on various planes with your flight crew, serve up a variety of tasty shakes, burgers, fries and many more dishes before the plane lands on the airport and your passengers rate your services.

name: Invasion Machine
description: Modern-warfare RTS/sandbox game inspired by the real conflicts in the Middle East. Fight a counter-insurgency war, protect the civilian population, casevac your wounded and decide how the world sees your struggle. And remember - no one gets left behind.

name: Dear Apothecary
description: Dear Apothecary is a short single player, casual, simulator-esque game. You will take on the role of the community Apothecary while you raise the funds necessary for medical school. You'll grow plants and combine items to fulfill client requests.

name: PomboTroll
description: PomboTroll is an extremely fun 2D game. Fly on the wings of a pigeon and earn points pooping and vomiting on other birds. Challenge other players for a gross battle and be the biggest troll pigeon of all!

name: Late'O'Clock
description: Late’O’Clock is an isometric stealth game in which you play as an office employee who is always late to work and must sneak to their desk. During the game players are able to bribe, distract, or deactivate enemies to avoid being detected. Every new day will bring many obstacles for the player to experience.

name: ANSIBLE
description: Taking a camping trip with girlfriend Emily, Joe thought this would be just another ordinary camping trip. But what he unearths there will change him and you forever. This 4th wall breaking Sci-Fi story will make you question yourself and the memories that might lurk beneath the shadows of your conscience.

name: Mr Husky
description: I'm not fat, I'm just a little...Husky. This time Mr. Husky fell in love. The love's so powerful that gravity will change. Help him send his love to Miss Husky by guiding him through the most creative levels.

name: Vampire Bloody Star X
description: This is bullet hell , bullet curtain and manic shooter 2D Game! Destroy enemies coming from all directions. It is a personal production game of high-vision visuals and music.

name: FUTURE GPX CYBER FORMULA SIN VIER
description: Master a 700 km/h cyber machine! Amazing graphics! Includes a VR mode! Make your best lap with the transformation system and the multi-step boost, just like in the "Future GPX Cyber Formula" anime! Become the next world champion!

name: 夜之归途 Night Homing
description: 【官方Q群：213634733】扮演小魔女寻找回家的路，在路途中结识到各个种族的萌萌哒的使魔，召唤使魔替小魔女迎击阻挠前进的敌人吧！

name: Mega Punchy Golf
description: Mega Punchy Golf is mini-golf where the balls are giant and you punch them. It's mini-golf for people with anger management issues.

name: Fant Kids Matching Game
description: This is a game for people to improve their matching skills, and memory. Game includes the Fant Kids Eddie and Ellie. Scenes are selected in the room of the Fants. Joyful music and bright graphics are included. 9 scenes: alphabets, numbers, forms and colours, beach, toys, space, christmas

name: At Home Alone
description: This is a recreational healing Mini-plot game explored at home. Players will play and wander around the house from the perspective of a little girl. What will she do when she is alone? What strange stories will happen in the process, and in the process of exploration, you may find some strange secrets....

name: Australian Road Trains
description: Get ready to get into your truck and transport gigantic freight trains across the streets of Australia. Whether machines, wood or bulk material - with sufficient power you’ll make it to your destination.

name: Heavyweight Transport Simulator 3
description: The kings of the roads are back and carrying their heavy loads to their destination. Plan the route in advance, considering road load, bridges, width and underpasses.

name: Hell is Others
description: Hell is Others invites you to leave the safety of your safe house and step into Century City, a dystopian society whose economy is literally fuelled by blood. Venture into the streets to loot, explore, hunt and survive. Horrors stalk the streets; and the most hideous enemies could be other players.

name: Control Freak
description: Control Freak is the wacky action game where you have to think fast to out smart your friends.

name: VR Rome
description: VR Rome reconstructs Rome city of 320 AD. You can walk in a continuous 2km * 2km play zone to visit the eternal city 1700 years ago. The reconstruction has archeology and architecture materials supports, and in the game you can view descriptions, photos and 1:500 models for each important buildings.

name: DCL - The Game
description: DCL - The Game is the official videogame of the Drone Champions League - the world’s leading series for Drone Racing Teams. Fly the original tracks from DCL and experience Drone Racing like a professional pilot. Join the flying revolution!

name: Write word
description: This is a simulator game for fast typing! Challenge yourself!

name: Project Flesh
description: Project Flesh is a 2D randomly generated dungeon crawler/ Rogue-like, set deep in the sewers under a nameless city, the goal is to survive and make it through all the floors, equipping yourself with the limbs of mutated creatures you kill.

name: Clad in Iron: Sakhalin 1904
description: Manage your fleet and army, hunt the enemy's fleet, hide your weak squadrons in protected ports until reinforcements arrive, blockade enemy trade routes, amphibious assaults, struggle for dominance over the seas.

name: Lost in Vivo
description: A horror game about claustrophobia. During a storm your service dog is forced down a broken sewer drain. You find the nearest sewer entrance and run in after it. Along the way you will meet others that are also stricken by abnormal or psychological fear.

name: Beasts Shall Rise
description: At first glance it may look like a Wave Shooter but make no mistake, BSR offers full freedom of movement in an Open World environment. Fight your way through swarms of undead zombies and werewolves in this action packed VR game.

name: Welcome To... Chichester 1/Redux : The Spy Of America And The Long Vacation
description: WTC 1/Redux is the origin story of how the protagonist (that is, you !) unknowningly ends up in England. When a long forgotten mission resurfaces, your nemesis takes drastic measures to deal with it - including taking you along with her.

name: Project Police
description: Top-down, realistic police-simulation game. With a bunch of civilians around town, there is enough for you to do. Wether you want to patrol with someone else, or by yourself is up to you, and with a wide variety of random events, it is never boring!

name: A Flappy Bird in Real Life
description: Do not like pixelated images? Enjoy playing this version of the well-known game of the bird.

name: Invaders from Dimension X
description: Invaders From Dimension X! is a solitaire game depicting battles between the crack 124th Galactic Marine Raider Battalion (nicknamed “The Old Reprobates”) of the Unified Space Alliance Defense Force and the invading “pods” of a mysterious alien race, commonly known as the Kay’otz.

name: Chromatic Aberration
description: An action Pixel-Art FPS, with fast combat, bullet-hell enemies and satisfying weapons! Enter a dark, violent struggle between resistance forces and the AI governor ruling the city! Face off against cyborgs, machines, mutants and worse!

name: Edge
description: Balance The Ball

name: NEONARCADE: adventure puzzle muse
description: NEON ARCADE: adventure puzzle quest - a game in which you have to go through many levels, overcoming various puzzles and obstacles. You will enjoy nice graphics, sound and unforgettable gameplay!

name: STARBOY
description: The hardest game in the world.

name: Snood
description: Forget Life, Play SNOOD!

name: Turn the mirror, please.
description: Turn the mirror, please. - А minimalist puzzle game.

name: Brainmelter Deluxe
description: Melt your brain with this twisted take on the platform genre!

name: Aim Theory - Trainer
description: "Aim Theory - Trainer" is the scientific way to improve your aiming skills for FPS games.

name: Endless Universe 2 PC Live Wallpaper
description: Procedural Generated worlds where you are not alone! Create your spaceship, explore and be ready for the battles! The most advanced PC live wallpaper for Windows 10 in the universe! Do you want to try?

name: A meadow Piece
description: This is a meadow simulator with slightly different flowers. Either just watch the flowers grow. Or defend yourself against strange aliens. Actively intervene in the development of the meadow. Play with your friends, either as a team or against each other.

name: MonGirlTile
description: Fight against cute monster girls in this territory control card game!

name: Chemical Chimpet
description: Interact with Reaction Stones that combine with one another to form molecules, break down adjacent stones, and chain reactions together to crush molecules without lifting a finger. The stones rotate and translate along the board, leaving it up to the player to take a simple or complicated approach.

name: Trash Rage
description: One survivor to clean up the mess! A VR post-apocalyptic eco adventure.

name: Pixel World: Unity-Chan!
description: This is the action game that you color all of panels. The production is simple, but you can enjoy exhilarating actions by run the player and dash the enemy and spin them.

name: PixNautiCraft
description: An amazing alien world is revealed in from of your eyes. Your task is to survive and find out the cause of your ship's tragic events. But BEWARE !!!  You are not the only survivor in the oceans depth.

name: Another Sight - Hodge's Journey
description: Take control of Hodge the cat in a brand new, stand-alone prequel story in Another Sight - Hodge's Journey. Tackle new platforming challenges using Hodge's nimble feline skills to solve puzzles and misteries as he travels between the world of dreams and the world of the real.

name: The Bluecoats: North & South
description: Reunite with Sergeant Cornelius M. Chesterfield and Corporal Blutch in this remastered game that combines turn-based strategy and real-time action. This new version will delight fans of the original game, initially released on the Amiga at the end of the 1980s!

name: Cute Puzzle MAX
description: Brain training in a little free time!The basic rule is simple, same as [Minesweeper].When the panel opens, sexy images are displayed.

name: Talk to Strangers
description: Talk to Strangers is a game of everyday survival. Survive door to door conversations ranging from bizarre to mundane (in this order) while trying to sell products to strangers. But beware: nothing is what it seems in this neighborhood.

name: Heroes of Fortunia
description: Heroes of Fortunia is an online multiplayer hack ‘n slash game, in which players strive to create their own dungeons, filled with monsters & traps, while at the same time attacking other players’ dungeons in an attempt to beat them.

name: Angel, Devil, Elf and Me!
description: Ayumu is a typical bachelor leading a normal life until women start appearing through portals in his living room fighting over who gets to become his bride and claim his... essence?!

name: Nya Nya Nya Girls (ʻʻʻ)_(=^･ω･^=)_(ʻʻʻ)
description: The game is a classic puzzle with three levels of difficulty.

name: PRiCERPG
description: PRiCERPG is a sidescroller RPG with a strong emphasis on politically incorrect humor and the concept of evolution of consciousness and emotions.

name: SCP: Blackout
description: A VR/Desktop game where you are a new D-Class personnel in secret SCP Research Site-50 when everything falls apart. Use what you can find as you explore the facility, access logs to learn about the SCP entities in containment, and run for your life from the SCP entities that have escaped.

name: The Eternal Castle [REMASTERED]
description: The Eternal Castle [REMASTERED] is a remake of the original "ETERNAL CASTLE" from 1987, with additional game mechanics, sophisticated sound design, polished 2-bit CGA animated graphics, and modernized game design.

name: A Sound Plan
description: A Sound Plan is a local competitive arena game about using sound to manipulate zombies into eating your friends. Inspired by gladiator games, matches are hilarious, hectic, and punishing. Be passive and hide, or be violent and throw rocks, the choice is yours.

name: Abyss Manager
description: Take over a small dungeon that no adventure is interested in as a new manager. You'll start with almost nothing and recruit minions, accumulate money, construct facilities, develop technology, explore the realm, have the dungeon's name up, defeat other dungeons and win the championship of the Dungeon League.

name: Intersolar Overdrive
description: Intersolar Overdrive was built on a gravity algorithm that lets you experience relative travel in deep space. Follow the story line or play in arcade mode for good old fashioned points.

name: SMOKED
description: Fast-paced Mafia topdown shooter shrouded in mystery and spattered with blood.

name: Cubic Factory
description: Design and build your own factory within this 3D voxel-based strategy game. Research to unlock new buildings and transport methods and move your factory to the next age. Create and design themed worlds with their own resources, products and end goals.

name: Dark Roll
description: Dark Roll is a FREE single player game, in which the player goes through a series of uniquely designed levels. Your agility will be tested along with your logic. Each level is planned to provide a different challenge. The further you'll get, the more you'll be surprised with what the game has to offer.

name: Madland
description: Find sanity within the Madland. A first-person shooter game, developed entirely by a one-man team, that let's You dive into the cold mystery of the Dark Abyss. For players who love HALF-LIFE , OUTLAST , and THE LONG DARK.

name: 执行人 Executor
description: 《Executor》It's a puzzle game.In this house, there are many secret plots hidden behind the doors.You will be unveiling all kinds of puzzles in this house by looking for the prompts and using them properly.

name: My 1/6 Lover
description: This is a visual novel about a lovestory with 6 routes, numerous CGs and 200,000 words. Small town, afternoon, leisure is in the air. A young man is trying to straighten himself up and finally say it to the girl of his dream. The girl shocked him with an unexpected answer. "I'm sorry, which of us do you like?"

name: The Haunted Island, a Frog Detective Game
description: You're a detective, and a frog, and it's time to solve a mystery.

name: Ponkle
description: Let a small star jump toward the top floor! A simple and comprehensible jump action game by random generating.

name: Webcam World View
description: Take an exciting journey around the world with hundreds of webcams showing views from all corners of our planet twenty-four hours a day, seven days a week.

name: Toy Road Constructor
description: Welcome to...the childhood of any kid, who's fond of toy cars! Remember the long-forgotten skills of road building with scrap materials. Blocks, rulers, cards, everything is good. What are we waiting for? Let's create a toy road!

name: Pirate Survival Fantasy Shooter
description: Pirate Survival Fantasy Shooter is a VR survival adventure that takes you inside a magical realm full of incredible bloodthirsty creatures. Your entire crew has been slaughtered by the cursed creatures living in these crazy islands and your ship is sinking.

name: Flip-Out!
description: Flip-Out! is a challenging pinball game with a twist, the flippers can move! This combination of pinball and the Breakout-style gameplay of horizontal movement and brick breaking brings you a brand new way to play pinball with new challenges and strategies.

name: Wallenda
description: Many years later, one early Magic Doll woke up quietly. With the awakening of the mysterious power, she travelled through the world full of nightmare. In order to find the airship and escape from the horrible world, she must go through various levels until the end of the journey.

name: WeLOVE
description: 不需要大的曲折，只需要微小的感动。由十段轻松的恋爱小品组成，百张可爱照片演出的真人恋爱文字冒险游戏。

name: The Silver Crusade: Aoorha Axeman
description: It is harder than it looks ! Use your axe to cut wood and enemies ! Can you find what you left the tribe for ?

name: S.A.I.A.'s Awakening: A Robothorium Visual Novel
description: Discover how it all began and explore Robothorium's universe through the eyes of Agent 22, a spy commissioned by Jaklov to stake Alan out. Will you carry out your mission or defy the established authority? Your choices will be crucial.

name: Granny
description: You have to escape Granny`s house...You have five days...

name: 机能女孩-Energy Girl
description: The functional girl is an RPG character adventure game, and the player will play the protagonist to experience various adventure stories.

name: The Darkest Woods 2
description: You woke up in old, empty psychiatric hospital ward. How did you get here? What's going on around? Where does these creepy voices come from?

name: Summer in Mara
description: Take care of your own island and sail with your boat in this cozy farming adventure! Relax and unwind exploring a tropical archipelago or harvesting your own crops while helping others. Discover the story of Summer in Mara, with farming, crafting and exploring mechanics.

name: IScream
description: IScream is an arcady driving game where you play as an ice cream truck driver who gets recruited by the Clowntown gang. Complete missions for the clown gang to defeat the other gangs, while the kids in the streets try to stop you by any means.

name: Paroniria 梦缚
description: 一个小女孩被卷入了一连串诡异的事件，信仰，争端，神秘空间----究竟她的命运会如何呢？ 本游戏为多结局模式，玩家需要收集信息和道具来触发不同的结局。 《梦缚》 是一款剧情向游戏，带有部分解谜和迷宫玩法，希望大家会喜欢！ 老梅如果有空会持续更新，如果大家发现一些问题请向梅老师提出，梅老师会尽量修复。 希望大家能不嫌弃我们刚刚起步的革诚星迹团队。

name: We Must Praise Our Glorious Leader The Flumf
description: We Must Praise Our Glorious Leader The Flumf is a 2D side-scrolling resource-gathering and building game. Collect items, build buildings, fend off enemies from your pile, and as always fulfil the eternal hunger of The Flumf.

name: Circle of Sumo
description: Use your belly to your advantage! Challenge your friends in this fun party game on sumo. Fight into the arena: charge, hit, dodge and defeat the opponents. Let's have some good old fun!

name: Super Blasting Boy
description: Super Blasting Boy is a logical platform platformer made in the best traditions of retro games of the late 80's and 90's.

name: Toltec and the mysteries of the Secret Island
description: “Toltec and the mysteries of the secret island” is an Atmospheric physics based action game ,with stunning hand-painting graphics , immersive sound score and simple yet amazing game-play.

name: Charm Tale 2: Mermaid Lagoon
description: Charm Tale 2: Mermaid Lagoon is a puzzle game with math3 and hidden object types of levels.

name: Romantic Journey
description: Romantic Journey is a Japanese-style visual novel game in which the protagonist, for a variety of reasons, takes a romantic holiday trip with the ladies of the boss's family. "Absolutely torture!" Just joined the company's protagonist, was arranged to accompany the chairman of the company's Qianjin lady and friends to travel...

name: Varenje: Collector`s Edition
description: Our hero was spending summer happily at the cottage until curiosity forced him to sample an unknown berry at the stream. Before he knew it, everything had become incredibly large, and he was reduced to the size of a bug!

name: Photo & Graphic Designer 16 Steam Edition
description: Reinvent reality. With Photo & Graphic Designer you have all the options you need to implement your creative vision. Graphic design, image editing and illustration — you'll find it all here, in one program.

name: Puzzles for smart: Birds
description: Puzzles for smart: Birds - for fans of popular puzzles of different complexity. Collect puzzle with the image of these beautiful birds.

name: Heaven & Hell 2
description: Match 3 game with gorgeous visuals and over 200 challenging levels in 3 different game modes (swap, puzzle, group mode). Win powerful bonuses and special boosters to help you win a level. Enjoy the humorous story line and help the hero, little Mephistino to play pranks!

name: Angry King
description: Are you a good archer? It's time to show it! Play a little, or a lot -- there's no skill ceiling, so you can always get better and better.

name: Tactics V: "Obsidian Brigade"
description: Tactics V: "Obsidian Brigade" is a retro-style tactical turn-based video game in homage to console tactical RPGs from the 1990s.

name: Ultimate Legends
description: The island of Legenia is being attacked. Can you defend it? This world needs new heroes. Will you be its Ultimate Legends? Let's find out...

name: Singularity: Tactics Arena
description: Tactics Arena is a narrative-driven RPG inspired by the SCP Foundation, Final Fantasy Tactics and D&D 5e.

name: Quicken® WillMaker® Plus 2019 and Living Trust
description: Quicken® WillMaker® Plus 2019 and Living Trust is the easiest way to create your estate plan, whether you're just getting started or you want to update your previous arrangements. This powerful software guides you through the process from beginning to end.

name: Tiger Tank 59 A-Gun
description: This is a tank war game, players need to control their tanks, through the enemy lines, break the enemy base, or defeat the enemy tanks

name: Solitaire: Learn the Flags!
description: A combination of using flashcards for learning with the classic card game Solitaire.

name: Time Virus
description: You as the member of project 'Time Virus' need to control the robot following the rhythm of music to finish your mission and get to know what happened in the game. This is an open-music game, you can import .mp3 file to play, you will have different experience when using music with different rhythm.

name: Fantom Feast
description: Help Fantom eat enemies and grow big and strong!

name: 天罡星宿海 The sea of TianGang XinSu
description: “The sea of TianGang XinSu” is an individually developed independent space game. The story takes place after the war between the earth and the robot world. The earth was reduced to the bargaining chip of the robots and was locked at a place of black holes. The core aim of this pre-launched version is to release the earth from the robots.

name: Red Blue
description: Red Blue is a quickness game. If you want to develop eyesight or APM(Action Per Minute), just challenge this game.

name: Vile
description: Vile is an action rogue-lite about fighting demonic creatures and other horrors throughout a vile world. Fight enemies and/or complete random objectives given to you in procedurally-generated dungeons to put a stop to the creatures forever! Collect souls, find new weapons, new artifacts, and battle EPIC bosses!

name: eCheese Zone
description: eCheese Zone! A punishment party game, a digital escape room, an activity to yell at your friends about! Join others as you collectively struggle to follow basic directions and collaboratively uncover the mysteries of eCheese Zone, nice!

name: Travis Strikes Again: No More Heroes Complete Edition
description: Travis Strikes Again, Beam Katana charged and ready! He's been sucked into the legendary Death Drive Mk II games console, where anyone who collects all the Death Balls has their wishes granted (...or do they?).

name: MarisaLand Legacy
description: Twilight Frontier's latest release is here! A Touhou Project inspired work: "MarisaLand Legacy" Eat mushrooms to increase your height in this easy to control 2D side scrolling action game! But it's not only her height which has changed, the number of players too! Marisa's adventure starts once more...!!

name: Config Wars
description: Strategic or with a hammer? Decide for yourself and configure your individual army to defeat your adversary in ultimate multiplayer battles

name: Dark Trail
description: Dark Trail - Minimalistic beautiful platformer game with hardcore gameplay

name: The Tower of Five Hearts
description: A cute and adorable yuri visual novel featuring kemonomimi (animal ears)! Play the role of a princess to find the girl meant for you!

name: Nowhere Patrol
description: Nowhere Patrol is a boss rush game with bullet hell and platforming elements. Inspired by classic action arcade games with it's steep difficulty curve and non-stop action.

name: Rampage Online
description: Get to the top of the best online shooter players!

name: NekoCharm
description: Hey, rookie! You have to go through a series of tests to prove that you are a worthy fighter! And then prove yourself in the service of the government!

name: Puzzle Out VR
description: Puzzle Out VR is an atmospheric tangram-style puzzle game in space where you need to put puzzle pieces in the right place before the moving alien wall reaches you!

name: Prixel
description: Prixel is an old-school pixel style 2D platformer.It's designed for speed runners, but ordinary people can play it too .

name: Abstract Hell
description: Abstract Hell is a realm of many hostile creatures made of simple lines, curves, and light, and they're bent on destroying you while you navigate the treacherous mazes collecting tokens to advance to the next level. Become overwhelmed in a variety of ways—sheer numbers, shifting environments, and various pranks.

name: 7-minute HOP
description: Interesting jumping game with cute graphics and infinite gameplay.

name: Sanatorium Purgatorium
description: Sanatorium Purgatorium provides you with an excellent opportunity to relax, forgetting about all your worries! Here you can make new friends, meet the love of your life and cleanse your sinful soul!

name: Backgammon, Chess & Checkers
description: Play either backgammon, chess or checkers against a virtual opponent, in a courtyard setting. Play on desktop or in VR.

name: CastleGuard
description: CastleGuard is a independent FPS game. The objective if you accept it is to pass cities and country sides full of enemies ready to kill you at any moments. If you die, you restart. Good luck soldier !

name: Christmas Crisis
description: Christmas. Its all about happiness, presents, joy and .. erm.. betrayal ? necromancy ? clones ? did I say Evil Santa ? Santa has been betrayed by his own elves and workers who, fed up by being overworked, have secretly created Santa's own clone, a Evil Santa to take over his winter domain.

name: Cargo Cult
description: Tear through the Trash Dunes on a stolen rocket, evading misshapen mutants, giant sentient maggots, and pistol poppin' pigeons. Build up your ship piece by piece with whatever you find in the dungeons below. Mutate your DNA to gain abilities and try to survive the frenzied onslaught. You won't.

name: Distress: A Choice-Driven Sci-Fi Adventure
description: A sci-fi visual novel where the lives of your crew are in your hands. Investigate a mysterious space station. Make your choices, live with the consequences.

name: Courage for a Kiss
description: Can a group of high school students write and perform an original stage play and win the national contest? Will they find love along the way? Find out in this Visual Novel!

name: Nanoswarm
description: Nanoswarm is a game about surviving an endless assault from an army of nanobots with the ability to form terrifying and unstoppable battlebots. You're not alone though. Tank command is back at base finding you new powerups all the time, helping you to overcome the odds and have a chance against your terrible foe.

name: The Gameshow
description: The Gameshow is an FPS game where you participate in a dangerous survival game. This is not your game. You, together with other players, have been kidnapped and brought to a forest. Now, surviving is your only objective.

name: Beyond Critical
description: Beyond Critical is a sci-fi versus game where players use unique abilities to battle for control over a super massive black hole.

name: Royal Wedding Quest!
description: Royal wedding Quest! is a fantasy otome/dating sim game where your character goes on a quest to find a husband and claim the throne of her country.

name: Coldfall
description: Coldfall is a short puzzle/exploration sidescroller game set during the Cold War. Attempt to escape from the town before the next nuclear strike hits.

name: Anno Domini Godfather
description: Become the godfather of the medieval world. You are a simple huntsman living in the legendary kingdom of Asteria, a land ruled by a tyrannical Queen and her daughter. With the help of a few trusted men and the tight grip of your sword you build up a powerful outlaw group based in the center of Asteria.

name: One Step From Eden
description: Build a powerful deck, cast spells on the fly, battle evolving enemies, find game-changing artifacts, make friends or make enemies, just make it to Eden.

name: GUNS 'n GUTS
description: GUNS 'n GUTS is a fast-paced, top-down shooter filled with action and gore. Blast your way through hundreds of hellish enemies in challenging skill-based combat. Can you survive?

name: DON'T GIVE UP: A Cynical Tale
description: A comedic RPG about the cynical and hilarious realities of social interaction, personal growth, and confronting your inner demons.

name: Girls' civilization
description: Open world RTS

name: Second World: Air War S
description: Second World: Air War S, This is a fighter jet shooting game: a battle that takes place on floating islands.

name: Galaxity Beta
description: Galaxity is a wonderful virtual world. In this game, you can create an avatar and customize it with a variety of costumes. You can also talk to people and become friends with them. Join Galaxity, and enjoy various mini-games and fun videos together!

name: Flower Design Ⅱ
description: An artistic floral arrangement simulation game, a vase of flowers can track your mood at the moment.

name: Rending Sky
description: “Rending Sky” is a 2D side-scrolling action game with lifelike pictures and exciting stories. It not only retains traditional arcade characteristics, but also creates a wonderful Boss combat system,optional characters, grand scenes, and dramatic stories, which will bring you novel experience in a familiar way.

name: Maytroid. I swear it's a nice game too
description: I swear it's a nice action metroidvania game.

name: One Night 2: The Beyond
description: A Lovecraftian survival horror adventure game inspired by the classics of the 90s.

name: Lufulus' Creatures
description: Develop your character in a colorful planet, Rethkor, and witness the mighty power of Lufulus.

name: Stunt Kite Party
description: Stunt Kite Party is a family-friendly single player and couch-coop multiplayer game with an exciting storyline and endless fun in numerous game modes.

name: Dafen Oil Painting Village: An Immersive Reality
description: Dafen Oil Painting Village: An Immersive Reality is a virtual reality experience about global creation, emerging technologies, and the future of media.

name: Ego Hearts
description: Ego Hearts is a small interactive reflection about death and what do we leave behind it. Take a paper plane and share your warmth to get the February away.

name: Dark Gnome
description: Retro gaming at its best! Join the cantankerous pixel art gnomes as they raid their neighbors in round-based combat. Chock-full of dark humor and loads of quirky characters, this RPG won‘t let you go. To battle! Play now!

name: YUNA: Sugar hearts and Love
description: Hello and welcome to YUNA World. Help Yuna collect candy hearts and accompany her through the day. Candy hearts are an important currency in the world of Yuna. Get to know her better privately, maybe you will like each other. You like collecting achievements? You've come to the right place.

name: Yuzi Lims: Hentai
description: Yuzi Lims: Hentai - is a game in which you need to identify 10 differences between two pictures and click on the difference.

name: Hello Neighbor: Hide and Seek
description: Hello Neighbor: Hide and Seek follows the tragic story of the Neighbor’s family in this dramatic prequel to Hello Neighbor. Experience playing a game of hide-and-seek with your brother as you both deal with the loss of a family member.

name: YAWS - Yet Another Wave Shooter
description: YAWS (Yet Another Waveshooter) is a waveshooter in three epochs (fantasy, present, and future). Defend yourself against never ending waves of enemies with increasing difficulty until you die. After death, you will be transported to the next level. Engage in an immersive experience with anit-motionsickness movement and gain the top score.
