description: "Charlie from the swamp" is a metroidvania game about little frog in a big world.

name: Titan78
description: This is survival game for one player and for cooperation in 4 players.

name: Imoto
description: Forge your own path throw the BLACK SWAN corporation branches to destroy their monstrous monsters creations and revenging your clan also your innocent little sister

name: Master of Miracles
description: Master of Miracles combines strategy, idle and collecting elements in the game. As a commander, you raise your army, combat with your own style in this fantasy world. You won't have pressure but only casual and fun.

name: Shifter
description: Shifter is a rogue-lite game with a gravity-shifting mechanic, made by a solo dev Niilo Hanni. It has 3 different areas with unique boss fights. Use different weapons such as swords, scythes, and shotguns to escape your dream, which has been hacked and turned into a twisted game by a hacker.

name: FOR HONOR™
description: Carve a path of destruction through an intense, believable battlefield in For Honor.

name: BloodLust Shadowhunter
description: Bloodlust is a dungeon crawling / action RPG experience that will allow players to explore the dark underworld of a forgotten society of Vampires and their disciplines, all while trying to battle for hierarchy among the clans in search of their sire.

name: Fallen ~Makina and the City of Ruins~
description: Fallen takes you on an adventure with Makina into the Ruins of Gardona. What fate awaits Makina and her friends as they travel around Gardona and descend further into the ruins? Find out in this RPG brought to you in native English!

name: PHOGS!
description: In PHOGS! you play as a duo of dogs on a captivating, puzzle-filled adventure. Linked by a stretchy belly, you’ll need to bark, bite and bounce your way through obstacles set across the themed worlds of Food, Sleep and Play, in co-op or single-player.

name: Shera and the Three Treasures
description: After the rise of a new Demon Lord, it falls on the chosen hero from an ancient bloodline to stop them. However, due to a curse cast upon him, he must pass the task to his sister, Shera. Now she must gather the Three Treasures, and defeat the Demon Lord.

name: Nudist Beach Survival Simulator
description: You appeared on this beach by accident, but it took you 5 seconds to realize one thing: DO NOT let go of your pants.

name: Blaite
description: A platform game so difficult and at the same time, so addictive that you will enjoy having to repeat a levels dozens of times until complete them.

name: Rule Your School
description: Rule Your School is a game in which you create and manage a school. Choose the correct decisions at the right time and become the best school in town! You are the headmaster, you decide what happens. Organize proms, hire teachers, force students to work in the gardens or be a generous Headmaster and let them play football.

name: Capcom Beat 'Em Up Bundle
description: Relive the glory days of cooperative arcade games with the Capcom Beat 'Em Up Bundle! This comprehensive collection includes seven classic titles, each with various multiplayer options and online capabilities!

name: VIDEO GAME
description: VIDEO GAME is a local-multiplayer action arcade game. Curve the ball past your opponents and dash to save a goal at the last second!

name: Song of Farca
description: Hack into crime scenes, look for evidence, analyze data, interrogate criminals, track suspects and deal with the consequences of your decisions. This is a dark and brutal detective story with a Black Mirror-esque atmosphere of digital dominance and the narrative structure of a US crime procedural.

name: 100 hidden birds
description: Hidden object game in the cartoon city style. Ultra hard! Really very difficult!

name: BUSTAFELLOWS
description: A new visual novel from the legendary eXtend! Mixing dangerous romance with murder mystery, BUSTAFELLOWS is a steamy noir mystery that will make you shiver but ask for more!

name: Asura Girls
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: natsuno-kanata - beyond the summer
description: ── In the summer of the world that has ended, the girl travels aimlessly. "natsuno-kanata - beyond the summer" is a text adventure game that depicts girls traveling in apocalypse. Through talking to the girls, we get to know them and approach the mysteries of the world ──

name: Metamorphos
description: Take on the role of the temple’s guardian, awakened to cleanse the temple from an evil force corrupting it. Fight and dodge your way through a series of corrupted denizens, wildlife, and guardians to confront Nafaset, the Defiler, and restore the blessed oases.

name: My name is human
description: My name is human - is the simplest visual novel where you will have to make destiny decisions playing as a robot.

name: Interrogation Files: Port Landsend
description: Search through the interrogation footage of suspects of a bizarre and horrific crime. Decide who committed the crime and see them get arrested and have their day in court. The latest interactive video experience.

name: 副作用之瞳-Tlicolity Eyes-
description: 啟用超人氣畫師以及豪華聲優陣容的「三角計劃」第一部──《副作用之瞳 (Tlicolity Eyes)》帶著豪華周邊套餐和超甜的戀愛推出中文版！同時也將首次橫跨Android、iOS、PC等多平臺。還有中文版獨佔周邊不容錯過！談一場甜蜜的戀愛吧！

name: Gladiator Manager
description: Gladiator Manager is a sports management and tactical battle simulation game.

name: ムッツリ騎士レイカのドスケベ淫乱覚醒RPG
description: ※All the characters in this game are over 18 years old. Reika visits the village of Seille as a bodyguard for a female merchant Fomia. Although Reika is inferior to Fomia, she is a reliable female knight. An easy-to-play, battle-free RPG!

name: Merto's Part
description: Merto's Part is a First Person Exploration game. Well..Who is Merto? He is anyone. He is just inside of some situations and he don't know anything. He need to help for choosing true moves. In this story, you will be in Merto's place and trying to find safe-zone for him.

name: Pow!
description: Great physical puzzles. Seconds matter!

name: Two Clusters Cold Haven
description: Nicholas is a mercenary who takes on a seemingly simple job which drags him through more troubles than he expects.

name: SKULL CHAINZ
description: Smash your way out of Hell in this unique physics-based combat game!

name: Nature And Life - Drunk On Nectar
description: Nature, Survival & Animal Lifecycles: Experience the incredible life of animals & their unique life stories; Drunk On Nectar aspires to become the most comprehensive Nature experience ever made.

name: Sanctuary Island
description: Dinosaur survival and role play

name: Storage Chase
description: Help the furry creature stay alive and overcome all obstacles in this challenging and dynamic 2D platformer - Storage Chase!

name: Tetris® Effect: Connected
description: Tetris® Effect: Connected adds an all-new robust multiplayer expansion to the huge variety of addictive and innovative single-player modes that Tetris Effect is known for, with all-new co-op and competitive online and local multiplayer modes!

name: Spellcaster University
description: Develop a prestigious university of mages. Build rooms, train your students, fight orcs, slay the bureaucrats, manage your budget... a director's life is not a quiet one.

name: SYNTHETIK: Arena
description: Face the varied challenges of the Machine God Zir in ARENA, a standalone expansion for Synthetik: Legion Rising! Leverage the next level in gun-play and experiment with powerful tech in varied action packed Arenas!

name: Dead Cells
description: Dead Cells is a rogue-lite, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer. You'll explore a sprawling, ever-changing castle... assuming you’re able to fight your way past its keepers in 2D souls-lite combat. No checkpoints. Kill, die, learn, repeat.

name: Mysteria ~Occult Shadows~
description: Explore the land of Sulnas as the "Shadow of Death", a cat girl who's dauntless and fierce. The land is poisoned by secret power and desperately needs salvation. Can you save it from its sure demise or will you doom its fate like everyone else would?

name: Paw Patrol: On A Roll!
description: PAW Patrol is on a roll! No job is too big, no pup is too small! Join the entire PAW Patrol team—including Everest and Tracker—for 16 exciting rescue missions around Adventure Bay! Help each pup use their unique abilities to help their friends and save the day!

name: Zombie Watch
description: Top-down open world single player / survival / RPG game with zombies and wildlife.

name: 四圣传说之黑暗森林
description: This is a plot-based game. The story of the game is original for the individual. There are only some simple mazes in the game, and there are no monsters in the maze. Characters can not be upgraded by conventional means, only some HP can be added through props. There are only a few BOSS battles throughout the game.

name: Serious Scramblers
description: No jumping. Only falling. Descend through a hazardous pit and defeat a massive monster lurking in the deep in this small but unabashedly tough platformer!

name: MADELA
description: MADELA is a short indie game which is inspired of one day living in Istanbul.

name: Suzerain
description: As President Rayne, lead the nation of Sordland in your first term of this text-based RPG. Navigate a political drama driven by conversations with your cabinet members. With looming war, rooted corruption, economic crisis and reform needed, the choices fall on your shoulders. How will you lead?

name: STAR WARS™: The Old Republic™
description: STAR WARS™: The Old Republic™ is a free-to-play MMORPG that puts you at the center of your own story-driven saga. Play as a Jedi, Sith, Bounty Hunter, or one of many other iconic STAR WARS roles in the galaxy far, far away over three thousand years before the classic films.

name: Angel Legion
description: Idle or play whenever and wherever you want. Customize the looking of your favorite Angels. Automatically accumulate resources all the time.

name: Prison Simulator Prologue
description: Wanna find out what a prison riot looks like? Check a free stand-alone prologue for Prison Simulator. A story that is not available in the full game! Be warned: Police baton might not be enough to bring order to the prison halls.

name: Disney•Pixar Cars 2: The Video Game
description: Inspired by the Disney•Pixar animated film, Cars 2: The Video Game lets players jump into the Cars 2 universe with some of their favorite Cars personalities in exotic locations around the globe.

name: Nelly Cootalot: The Fowl Fleet
description: Pirate heroine Nelly Cootalot takes on the villainous Baron Widebeard in this point and click adventure game. Meet a hilarious cast of characters including Tom Baker (Dr Who) and face perplexing challenges in your search for the Treasure of the Seventh Sea.

name: Wildfire
description: Master the elements in this stealth game where everything burns. Use your elemental powers to start fires, freeze water, and move earth as you outsmart superstitious enemies in this mischievous 2D stealth game.

name: Jalopy
description: Build, repair, refuel and drive a dilapidated old car on a grand journey through the territories of the former Eastern bloc. Explore Germany, CSFR, Hungary, Yugoslavia and Bulgaria

name: Planescape: Torment: Enhanced Edition
description: Uncover secrets of past lives in this story-rich, tactical roleplaying game set in Sigil, a dark fantasy city at the heart of the Dungeons & Dragons multiverse. Explore the planes, survive combat alongside a party of bizarre companions, and solve puzzles unlike any ever seen in the genre.

name: Torment: Tides of Numenera
description: Torment: Tides of Numenera is the thematic successor to Planescape: Torment, one of the most critically acclaimed role-playing games of all time. Immerse yourself in a single-player, isometric, story-driven RPG set in Monte Cook’s Numenera universe. What does one life matter? Find your answer.

name: 风起长安：驭骨人
description: This is a Chinese style otome game！

name: Kusari Kingdom
description: An innovative puzzle game which uses a chain reaction mechanic similar to falling Dominoes. Place your units so that the whole board is cleared when you trigger one of them.

name: Chat Generator
description: Chat Generator can export various chat and comment screen images.

name: trip=true
description: A short visual novel about two girls, who lost the memory about past few days.

name: Anton
description: Help a sentient robot escape an oppressive society through your abilities to hack and reprogram devices & automatons in the world

name: DRAMAtical Murder
description: Aoba's vibrant cyberpunk world is one of contrasts: high-tech virtual reality battles versus street gang turf wars, ultra-exclusive luxury resorts and tiny junk shops. The choices you make will shape the path of Aoba's journey into the dark secrets lurking beneath the glossy sheen of the city.

name: Lust Theory - Season 1
description: Lust Theory is a adult Visual Novel in witch you take control of an 20 year old guy whose life is turned up side down when he finds out that the same day is repeating. The game is packed with sex, humor, romance, drama and mystery.

name: College Bound - Episode 1
description: After two years of working your butt off in college, you and your girlfriend Summer finally managed to qualify for an international student exchange program in sweet, sweet Paris. Sounds nice, doesn’t it? Well, maybe if the principal didn’t suddenly exclude you from the program completely. Bitch.

name: Loopmancer
description: Loopmancer is a 3D platformer roguelite action game with realistic graphics that takes place in a cyberpunk universe. Players play as a detective who comes back to life after an unexpected death, and battle in this lifelike and futuristic city of the east.

name: Call of Senpai: Waifu Warfare
description: Take control of the beautiful Miki, and explore the area from the ocean coast, to the deep jungle. Advance through the storyline and fight through various challenges for the title of main waifu and 5 million dollars.

name: Space Survivors I: The Reckoning
description: Hello Space Survivors, this is little shooter game. Which is now most about shooting zombies but pvp will hopefully follow. Please also read the long description.

name: FootLOL: Epic Soccer League
description: The craziest soccer management game you have ever played! Use mines, aliens, cows, guns and other crazy cheats to decimate the opposing team and protect your players. Play against your friends or AI opponents!

name: August of August
description: An alien spaceship crashes on a frozen planet one day,opening the dramatic story.

name: Tunche
description: Tunche is a charming hand-drawn action game with roguelike elements. Team up with your friends or play solo. Choose from 5 unique characters and restore peace in the Amazon rainforest!

name: Hidden Objects - Cartoon Fantasy
description: Are you ready to test your eyes with Hidden Objects - Cartoon Fantasy, your seek and find skills will be challenged like never before. Develops your secret seeker skill to find objects. This is a puzzle game similar to Hidden Object games.

name: hexceed
description: A relaxing, hexagon based, puzzle game. An exciting new twist on a classic game without the element of guesswork! Use your critical thinking and our stimulating game mechanics to progress through hundreds of levels!

name: Wyrmsun
description: Wyrmsun is a real-time strategy game which features elements of mythology, history and fiction.

name: Predator: Hunting Grounds
description: Hunt or be hunted in this asymmetrical multiplayer shooter that pits man against Predator. As part of a Fireteam, complete missions before the Predator finds you. Or be the Predator and hunt your prey.

name: Bhavacakra Maco
description: Not wanting to contest a title with her elder brother who is 11 years senior, she chooses to leave her hometown behind.

name: Manor Lords
description: Upcoming medieval strategy game for PC that combines deep, organic and realistic city building with large scale, tactical battles.

name: Battles of the Ancient World
description: The ‘Battles of the Ancient World’ game system is a tactical simulation of some of the greatest and most important battles from 1457 B.C. to 378 A.D.. Each scenario features one of these great battles and players may play as either side. The game has been designed to ensure maximum playability and historical accuracy, in that order.

name: Civil War: Bull Run 1861
description: Bull Run recreates the first major battle of the American Civil War between the Union and Confederate armies. Take command of an Union army of Northeast Virginia or the Confederate army of Potomac and Shenandoah and engage in the largest battle fought on American soil to date.

name: Divinoids
description: Divinoids is a desperate struggle between a society much like our own, and highly advanced aliens piloting shapeshifting mechanical monstrosities... where you play as the aliens.

name: Paper Pirates
description: Grab a crew and jump aboard a haunted pirate ship for a social deduction party game, using your phones as controllers! Are you a human sailing home to shore or a ghost working against the crew? Throw your crewmates overboard, but fear not - nobody’s ever out of the game!

name: 时光编年史-阿斯特拉的萌芽
description: 收集武器改装、提升等级、培养搭档让自己变得更加强大，尝试搭配武器与搭档风格打出属于你自己的战斗方式。 利用三种对话性格选择肢体验任务的不同走向，感受自己的选择对世界的影响，以面对险恶的帮派与政治阴谋。

name: Ancient Abyss
description: Ancient Abyss is a 2D Zelda-like action game where you will explore mysterious and hidden events in a randomly generated maze. As you progress, you’ll gain more power and collect items to help you reach further into the maze.

name: Civil War: Gettysburg
description: The Battle of Gettysburg was fought from 1st to 3rd July 1863, in Pennsylvania. The battle resulted the largest number of casualties in any battle of the entire war, and was the turning point of the American Civil War. Over three days General George Meade’s Army of the Potomac defeated the Confederate army of General Robert E.

name: Doomtrooper CCG
description: Get ready for demonic aliens, cyber-mechanical vehicles, and interplanetary chainsaw warfare! Doomtrooper is a digital adaptation of the physical card game by the same name. Play Warrior cards to form your squad and earn victory points by eliminating the enemy's forces. Now in Early Access!

name: Steamburg
description: Steamburg is an award-winning puzzle adventure game with story exploration elements and unique gameplay. Professor Vincent Moore fights a robot invasion. He is unarmed so he must be really smart. After destroying robots he can explore locations to find and rescue his fiancée.

name: Public Defense Corp
description: Years after her hometown was destroyed by an evil group, Haruka joins the company, Public Defense Corp. Now, armed with a bipedal robot, Haruka can work towards getting her revenge for what happened to her home.

name: Hentai energy II
description: A logic puzzle with a nice reward at the end of each level!

name: Project Zero Deaths
description: Project Zero Deaths is a hectic physics-based F2P online multiplayer platform shooter. Jump into frantic battles in dynamic maps, solo or with friends, to fight in varied wild game modes! Choose between different characters with unique skills and customize them and their weapons to your own playstyle!

name: DominaTRIX - Hentai Storytelling Puzzle
description: Unscramble the tiles by swapping them around and Follow a dominatrix performance. Experience a BDSM furry story inspired by the classic Girl and Goblin. Can you resist Trix's session?

name: Esports Life Tycoon
description: Manage your own esports squad, expand your gaming house, and defeat legendary teams to become the best in the world!

name: Evil Tag
description: Four teenagers have to pass the rite of student initiation. To do this, they must read a spell from the ancient book in the basement of the abandoned house and spend a night there. They thought it would be fun...

name: Colorless Life
description: This game is dynamic story about man's struggle with himself. From your actions depends the outcome of this struggle.

name: Instant Farmer - Logic Puzzle
description: Water the soil of your ranch and watch your crop grow. A relaxing logic puzzle game.

name: Hero of Not Our Time
description: Hero of Not Our Time is a 2D top-down action game with elements of 90s classics. The player will have to move through neo-noir dungeons looking for a way out, simultaneously destroying various monsters using magic and weapon, cleaning up location after location.

name: Horror Bar VR
description: 🍹 Horror Bar is an incredibly engaging Zombie Bar simulator where you can take on the role of bartender and serve your scarily nice customers multiple crazy dishes and drinks. 🍹

name: 开心扑克Happy Poker
description: 《开心扑克》为兴趣而生，为竞技狂热！你会在这里找到志同道合的朋友，来一起畅玩最喜欢的游戏！

name: The Last Stand
description: The Last Stand is a 3D first person survival shooter game made in Unreal Engine. The player's objective is to acquire artifacts while defeating robots who have invaded earth to prevent the end of the world. The game features 5 unique levels created by the crew at nonPareil.

name: Logic Car
description: Logic Car is a coding-based puzzle game in which you program cars to achieve goals. Check the conditions given in each unique stage and take advantage of the various functions installed in the vehicle. Sometimes the laws of physics can be the solution. Now is the time to unleash your creativity.

name: Retrocycles
description: Race. Do not crash. Trap your enemies. Enter the maze. Dominate the zone. DO NOT CRASH.

name: Remains
description: Remains - survival in outer space orbiting the planet. Explore the area. Find a way to restore oxygen. Create tools for your needs. Beware of the dangers of outer space. Build your shelter in orbit and try not to die!

name: Explorer of Yggdrasil
description: After rescuing an armless mage during a chance encounter, the explorer Mei embarks on a journey to reach the top of Yggdrasil, and to uncover the mystery of her forgotten past.

name: Pray And Spray
description: Pray And Spray is an online first-person arena shooter. Grab a gun and defend yourself from the opposing team of extraterrestrials.

name: GetsuFumaDen: Undying Moon
description: Getsu Fuma Descends It has been 1000 years since the first leader of the Getsu clan defeated the demon lord Ryukotsuki, driving demons back into Hell and restoring order to the world. But when Ryukotsuki abruptly returns and all hell breaks loose, it falls unto a new hero to rise against the threat.

name: Warhammer 40,000: Space Wolf
description: A unique combination of turn-based strategy, RPG and collectible card game. Win tough battles using a vast arsenal of weapons, abilities and the cunning of the sky warriors! Success on the battlefield depends on choosing the right mix of cards and planning your decisions meticulously.

name: AYATANA
description: Welcome to the mysterious world of AYATANA! The first stop will be the discovery of Asian temples. You will play as Ava who is looking for her missing friend. Through many clues, help Ava to find Julia by solving puzzles and find the temple of AYATANA.

name: Rock 'n' Roll Will Never Die!
description: Glam rock's not dead, it just smells funny! Get your denim vest, bandana and makeup, and dive into a point-and-click adventure as a middle-aged teddy bear planning a comeback with his old glam rock band – in a world where glam rock has been dead and buried for decades.

name: PrincessCliffhouse(ver0.1)
description: princess simulation game. 프린세스 시뮬레이션 육성게임입니다. 플레이어는 4주씩 10달 총, 40턴 동안의 시간이 주어지며 그 안에 스탯을 올려 다양한 엔딩을 보는 것이 목표입니다. 수업, 아르바이트, 던전탐험, 한달에 한 번 있는 마을로의 외출, 메인 시나리오 및 서브 시나리오 옷 갈아입히기 등의 컨텐츠를 즐길 수 있습니다.

name: Combots
description: Combots is a free multiplayer robot war shooter set in fully procedurally generated maps.

name: Half-Fly3
description: The Wrong Fly in the right place fights for the glory to become The Hole Master.

name: Stay Safe: Labyrinth of the Mad
description: Many came before, many failed. Copies of previous players are still scattered throughout the dungeon! Thirty-five floors of unforgiving turn based combat with unique spells and weapons. Explore, craft, learn spells and much more on your journey to the top! Will you stay safe?

name: Hobo Cat Adventures
description: Join a homeless cat in this 3d platformer with souls-lite combat and dark humor. Explore the Squirrel Kingdom - a place full of secrets, collectibles and new weapons to find. Complete jobs for weird characters. Fight, dodge or parry challenging enemies and bosses with a lock-on combat system.

name: 幻灵岛(Fantasy Sprite Island)
description: Fantasy Sprite Island is a collection of spirit capture training, home construction, copy adventure and other business development type of game.

name: 一方灵田 Immortal Life
description: In Immortal Life, you play as a new cultivator apprentice of a waning clan, and you are recently appointed to manage a valley with abundant natural resources. Will you live in seclusion, or will you work hard to bring the clan back to its former glory?

name: Life In Planet
description: Build, arrive, and move into new regions and planets in the depths of space. Whether you will establish a colony and trade or train soldiers and fight, everything is in your hands.

name: Vivid Surf
description: Vivid Surf is a new take on the glitch made mechanic called 'surf'. Glide frictionlessly through the surreal environments in a single-player focused campaign. Get rewarded as you improve your skill with a comprehensive timer.

name: Cargo: TD on Rails
description: Arm and defend your train in this real-time strategy tower defense game. After you make a fast delivery upgrade your weapons and do more dangerous missions.

name: Ultimate Battle
description: A game full of action and lots and lots of fun. Play numerous maps against your friends. Many modes: 1v1, 1v2, all against all.

name: Socialism Simulator
description: The civil war is over. To the rapturous cheers of the crowd, you and four of your companions take control of the country. The young socialist state proudly raises its flags, its eyes fixed on a distant, bright future.

name: 浪迹三国
description: 游戏简介 -这是个古代回合制策略游戏 -透过各个生活技能来养活自己 -打败敌人，获得实战经验，增强自己的实力，行走江湖 -每个动作都将影响主属性跟生活技能经验的增加 -官位越高，在城市能做的事情越多，需要一定的官位才能开始接触军事 -在各大城市游走，跑商，采集资源 -官府可以开发各个等级，如民房，市集等等，用以打开更多的地方跟改建 -可以拜入门派学艺或或江湖结识名将交好学艺，各有不同的武艺特色 -攻占城市以获得每个月城市的进贡 -游戏最重要的是寿命值，影响可以在此世道可以行走多久的人生

name: Throne of Lies®: Medieval Politics
description: Play FREE! The 3D online multiplayer game of social deduction and mischief, inspired by medieval politics and the Werewolf/Mafia (1986) genre. Gather 'round the tabletop, uniting allies of the realm with strategy to distinguish friend from foe.

name: Majesty 2
description: In the world of Majesty, you are the ruler of the kingdom Ardania. At your service are your loyal and somewhat obnoxious subordinates, who have their own minds about how things should be done. In fact, Majesty is the only game where your heroes decide on their own what should be done and when, leaving you to try to control them through...

name: Gal-X-E
description: Gal-X-E aims to revive the old-school shoot em up genre, and adds modern elements to it! Fight your way through endless waves of randomly generated madness! Collect spaceships and show the enemy who's boss!

name: Modern Assault Tanks
description: Compete on war and prove your superiority in the tank games genre PVP!

name: The soldier in the mine
description: The soldier in the mine is an interesting 2D platformer. In this game, to move from one cave to another. But you will interfere with obstacles.

name: The Thing: Space X
description: At your disposal are a dozen of the best combat spacecraft equipped with death beams, machine guns and missiles. The sector is divided into several subsectors, which swarm with enemies. In the end, you will have an unbeatable boss - the "Thing".

name: Eternal Hour: Golden Hour
description: Play through a timeless adventure as Yasu or Rin Fujimoto and discover the origins of Eternal Hour! Eternal Hour: Golden Hour is a fun, emotional, and story-driven Visual Novel that takes place before the events of Eternal Hour.

name: Shantae: Half-Genie Hero Ultimate Edition
description: The ultimate edition of Shantae: Half-Genie Hero comes with all of the previously released DLC, Modes, and Costumes in one epic collection!  Includes an exclusive Blue Bathing Suit for use in Beach Mode!

name: Rainswept
description: Rainswept takes you on an emotional adventure in a small town shaken by a double shooting. Join Detective Stone and unravel entangled threads of love, relationships and unresolved trauma in this character driven murder mystery game.

name: NOBUNAGA'S AMBITION: Souzou (Traditional Chinese version)
description: The latest title in the historical simulation series "Nobunaga's Ambition." Become a daimyō of the Warring States era, and unite the land! With "the creation of a new age" as the key concept, this title features beautifully recreated castle towns, dynamic battlefield action and dramatic event scenes.

name: Grandpa
description: *Early access game* Grandpa is a survival horror game. You woke up in a house you never knew. Strange things happen in the house. You have to find a way to survive and get out of the house.

name: Potato Thriller
description: Known for deep frying his victims, Potato Man is the most notorious serial killer out there...

name: Avorion
description: A procedural co-op space sandbox where players can build their own space ships out of dynamically scalable blocks. Fight epic space battles, explore, mine, trade, wage wars and build your own empire to save your galaxy from being torn apart by an unknown enemy.

name: Bubsy Two-Fur
description: Bubsy returns in the first authorized digital release of his first two games! What could paws-ibly go wrong?

name: Veneficium: A witch's tale
description: Veneficium is a cute and magical 3D platformer in which you help Alice uncover the faith of her coven. Alice has to use her magic to interact with different objects within a vast and magical world to overcome puzzles and obstacles.

name: Armageddon Empires
description: Armageddon Empires is a computer turn based strategy game that takes the best elements of collectable card games, board games, and computer games and brings them all together to provide a unique interactive strategy war game experience.

name: Lona: Realm Of Colors
description: “Lona: Realm of Colors” is a point and click adventure in nature focusing on art and narration instead of fetch puzzles and dialogue. Each level is an abstraction of Lona’s story and it is up to you to bring peace and balance to her painting and find out what has happened to her.

name: Project Venus.RP
description: Project-Venus.RP is a casual card game of memory flip. The player will interact with the AI android girls via flipping the cards that are within the Venus system, and by doing so, direct them to learn the “knowledge”, and different choices will lead to different endings, for all three of you.

name: Ravager
description: Ravager is a role-playing game where you play a young dragon, determined to reclaim their birthright. To do so, you will need to build your power, ally with dark forces, evade justice, and whet your monstrous appetites.

name: Krush Kill ‘N Destroy 2: Krossfire
description: Krush Kill 'N Destroy 2: Krossfire is a fast and furious post-apocalyptic real-time strategy game where you have to be quick or be dead. Play as one of three unique factions in the struggle to seek out and conquer oil fields to fuel your army.

name: Algebra Ridge
description: Solve quick math questions and use handy upgrades to save the world with the power of math! In Algebra Ridge, you must stop Big Cheesy from stealing the Pencil of Knowledge in this unique story-driven adventure!

name: Total Dark
description: "Total Dark" is a classic arkanoid. You need to hit a ball with a platform, accurately directing it to the area covered by various plates.

name: Hentai Furry 2
description: This game is a classic memory game with several levels of difficulty and beautiful arts. Enjoy ;-)

name: Pocket Plants
description: Explore environments as a mushroom man, collecting, planting, and watering plants to level up and restore the area by clearing fog or restoring crystal light.

name: Math Hero - Minimalist Puzzle
description: MATH HERO is a relaxing puzzle game with simple mechanics.Use simple addition and subtraction operations to reach the endpoint.

name: Brave Alchemist Colette
description: Alchemist apprentice Colette sets out on a path to help others with her skills to become a respected alchemist like her mentor. A most peculiar adventure unfolds as Colette encounters people from all walks of life, and behind all of these lies a sinister figure who intends to take the whole world into its grasp...

name: Legion 51
description: Lead the storm of Area 51 in this new dynamic reverse tower defense game based on the old & long forgotten meme. Strengthen your Legion strategically and place it right on the battlefield to reach your destination as fast as possible while trying not to lose too many fans on your way.

name: Monobot
description: Coming online, Mono finds himself alone in a dark, dystopian world overrun with other hostile robots. Guide Mono through his solo journey, unravelling puzzles to uncover the buried secrets of this desolate world. Can you break the infinite cycle and find your true self?

name: Raptor Territory
description: Slip into the Role of a Deinonychus! The target for you and your pack is to capture as much of the map as possible, but be careful! Other players are your enemy. Work together to defeat them!

name: OverDrift Festival
description: Become the star on festival of car culture and sports. Drift, sprint and circuit racing. Huge game world, iconic tracks. Unique collection of cars. Wide range of tuning and styling options. Accurate physics: a sense of speed and lateral g-forces.

name: SEGFAULT
description: SEGFAULT is a hacker themed shooter game that focuses heavily on progression and skill. Order not so legal equipment from the Deep Web, fuse together components, and become the ultimate hacker. Compete online for high scores, or fight through a single player map alongside a bipolar AI assistant.

name: Dolmen
description: Dolmen is a terrifying new action RPG that combines futuristic Sci-Fi and Cosmic Horror elements. Will your timeline be erased or will you defeat your enemies to survive and fulfil your mission?

name: No Man's Island
description: No Man's Island is an uncompromising wilderness survival game. Enter a strange and unexplored world full of strange creatures, dangers, and surprises. Gather resources to craft items and structures that match your survival style. Play your way as you unravel the mysteries of this strange land.

name: el puppster
description: A retro platformer with difficult swarming enemies. You are a clay dog named El Puppster, and he is determined to exterminate all pests from his world. Play through more than 50 levels and defeat several Bosses. You earn points for destroying enemy creatures, and eventually earn extra lives.

name: Our Life: Beginnings & Always
description: A twenty-dollar bill, four summers, fifteen years, and a one of a kind life. Create an experience that’s all your own in this near-fully customizable visual novel where you grow from childhood to adulthood with the lonely boy next door.

name: The Island
description: The Island - "Island") - a computer game with an open world and a first-person view in the genre of survival.

name: 3DMark
description: 3DMark is for gamers, overclockers and system builders who want to get more out of their hardware. With its wide range of benchmark tests, 3DMark has everything you need to test your PC's performance.

name: Cypherpunk Essentials
description: 在这套交互视频课程《成为一名密码朋克》中，你会从玩乐里完成整个密码学的学习，从零开始，掌握密码学。​

name: 成为一名密码朋克 Playtest
Pizza Shop Manager
description: Pizza Shop Manager gives you an opportunity to open and manage a pizza restaurant of your dreams. It's all in your hands. Toss it, flip it, make it. Create your pizza empire!

name: Bunch of Games
description: BUNCH OF GAMES is what name says it is - It's a Bunch of Games.There are more than a dozen games to choose from, Racing, Shooter, Strategy, Casual and many more! Take part in action packed vehicle deathmatches or fly to the sunset, manage your farm or play a tavern game.

name: 卡牌缔造者-CardMaker
description: This is a Rogue + Hearthstone like card game, but also a card making tool, you can play in addition to the official cards, creative workshop players a variety of card DIY.

name: Everescape
description: Everescape is a simulator of an employee of the immigration department, the main task of which is to prevent the entry and spread of the virus. Whether you choose to follow all the recommendations or show mercy, the choice is yours.

name: SOKOBOT
description: SOKOBOT is an open-ended puzzle game with a sokoban twist. Place down cute robots, give them commands, and create elaborate assembly lines that combine shapes together into infinitely looping solutions!

name: ELDEN RING
description: THE NEW FANTASY ACTION RPG. Rise, Tarnished, and be guided by grace to brandish the power of the Elden Ring and become an Elden Lord in the Lands Between.

name: The Birth of an Artificial Intelligence
description: 《一个人工智能的诞生》（The Birth of an Artificial Intelligence）是一个有关机器学习的交互视频项目，它将从最简单的原理入手，通过清晰直观的可视化，让你彻底理解它的工作原理。你可以亲自动手操作，调整参数，改变视角，实时演示，甚至可以搭建一个人工智能。

name: The Married Manager's Scandalous Services - The Pleasures of the Night Shift
description: Low-priced practical erotic game! Try to make this headstrong, uppity, over-30 woman with a super-sexy body submit to you.

name: BattleBit Remastered
description: BattleBit Remastered is a low poly FPS shooter that aims massive multiplayer experience. It has ground vehicles, sea vehicles, air vehicles. 90% of the map is destructible. That gives unique gameplay for players to create different strategies to win.

name: 100% Orange Juice
description: 100% Orange Juice is a digital multiplayer board game populated by developer Orange Juice's all-star cast. Characters from Flying Red Barrel, QP Shooting, Suguri and Sora come together with all-new characters to duke it out... with dice.

name: Motor Town : Behind The Wheel Playtest
Stay Alive On The Tank: Explosive Shells In The Darkness
description: Video game about tank battles. Fight against opponents in multiplayer or in career mode. Earn points and upgrade your tank. Unlock new levels to complete together in cooperative mode.

name: Twilight Wars: Declassified
description: Twilight Wars is a dungeon crawler in a cyberpunk setting, where teams of secret agents fight for the interests of corporations. Revive a secret organization, recruit and equip a team of specialists - and neutralize those who stand in your way!

name: Into the Pit
description: A fast-paced retro-FPS roguelite! As a member of a family of lore-hunting mystics you are summoned to a cursed village, drawn by rumors of a demonic portal. Dark magics have overwhelmed the village, It's up to you to rescue the survivors, grow your powers, and journey forth INTO THE PIT.

name: Baba Is You
description: Baba Is You is a puzzle game where the rules you have to follow are present as blocks you can interact with. By manipulating them, you can change how the game works, repurpose things you find in the levels and cause surprising interactions!

name: Old Salt
description: A Naval Strategy With No Reinforcements On The Way. Command a Custom Fleet with faction abilities in Multiplayer matches or Faction Campaigns.

name: Grounded
description: The world is a vast, beautiful and dangerous place – especially when you have been shrunk to the size of an ant. Can you thrive alongside the hordes of giant insects, fighting to survive the perils of the backyard?

name: Spirits Abyss
description: Spirits Abyss is a roguelite platformer with destructible terrain. Cast into the Abysm you must explore its diverse depths battling phantasmic meanies and plundering its useful treasures to find a way home... but does something nestle beyond the realmic veil of death?

name: The Six Dragons
description: Welcome to The Six Dragons Discover 256km2 of Open-World full of surprises, escape 1 billion dungeons, craft and enchant items

name: Jeebo & Jerbo vs. Life
description: A story focused Metroidvania/Party Based JRPG told in chapters consisting of Goo Creatures, Office Workers, Dinosaur Lawyers, Demons, and much more!

name: Starship Simulator
description: Step aboard one of the most detailed Starships ever made in this genre-defining space simulation. Serve as part of the crew on mankind's first-ever deep space exploration vessel, where billions of distant uncharted worlds are waiting to inspire, awe, and challenge you. Do you have what it takes?

name: Ultimate Fishing Simulator 2
description: The most comprehensive fishing game of all time! Immerse yourself in the virtual world of fishing and test yourself in the fishing technique of your choice! Feeder, fly fishing, spinning or classic float fishing - the choice is yours!

name: Angels Cove
description: You are called to a secluded house on a remote island to conduct a paranormal investigation. However, you find the island and the house abandoned. Or are they?

name: Lost Grimoires 3: The Forgotten Well
description: Save the kingdom from curse!

name: Sonya: The Great Adventure
description: Dive into the fantastic world of adventure hidden object quest. Sonya: The Great Adventure is a colorful game with animated cut scenes that are professionally voiced over. This is a touching story of the eternal struggle between the light and the dark.

name: AER Memories of Old
description: Transform into a bird and fly to explore and experience a vibrant world of floating islands in the sky. Venture down into lost ancient ruins where each step leads you closer to the end of the world.

name: Kaet Must Die!
description: This is the hardest, most challenging, horror puzzle game you will ever play. 30+ hours of sanity-testing puzzles over the course of 10 horror filled levels. You are Kaetheran, an extremely powerful psionicist with a flair for cyberpunk style. You have awoken in a dank sewer without your mind powers.

name: Block Story™
description: There isn’t much better than a wide open game world in which you have essentially no limits and can alter the very landscape in which you play – that is, unless you add dragons, of course…

name: The Ritual on Weylyn Island
description: The Ritual on Weylyn Island is a First-Person Survival Horror Story set on a remote island in the Pacific Northwest. Inspired by classic horror movies, The Ritual on Weylyn Island is a weapons-free, story-driven action adventure game.

name: Subterra
description: An epic 10 hour adventure in the underworld of Subterra. Earth is but a memory and the mighty Devordor casts a shadow of evil over all that remains. Can you reclaim your home? Can you escape Subterra?

name: Twilight Wars
description: Twilight Wars is a dungeon crawler in a cyberpunk setting, where teams of secret agents fight for the interests of corporations. Revive a secret organization, recruit and equip a team of specialists - and neutralize those who stand in your way!

name: Hoa
description: Hoa is a beautiful puzzle-platforming game that features breathtaking hand-painted art, lovely music, and a peaceful, relaxing atmosphere.

name: REFICUL 666
description: As darkness descends upon the world. all contact is lost. Set in a small town in North America, will you survive the dark new world? Prepare for a challenging and unique enemy, powerful magical relics, and an unsettling atmosphere in this creepy Post-apocalyptic Indie survival horror game.

name: Mistral
description: Mistral is a 3D action roguelike game where you journey through a fantasy world. Collect relics to boost your powers, and use your weapons & spells to defeat the force of evil.

name: Trump Loves Waifus
description: Donald Trump was kidnapped by Waifus save him. Make America Great Again !

name: BRAVELY DEFAULT II
description: A new entry in the “Bravely" series! Four new Heroes of Light emerge in a new world and story!

name: Hell of Men : Blood Brothers
description: Hell of Men: Blood Brothers is a real-time strategy game, developed by one person, in which you will have to collect resources, build your base, train your army by choosing your soldiers wisely and fight.

name: Dark Elf's Adventure
description: 10 years after the end of the Dark Elf War, Tanya of the Dark Elf was an adopted daughter living with her human mother. This gave me the power of darkness... It's an RPG where you discover yourself through various choices such as prostitution and sexual harassment.

name: Mahou Arms
description: Mahou Arms is an anime-inspired character-action hack and slash that tells the story of a magical girl paramilitary group fighting back against an alien invasion.

name: capy hoky
description: Sokpop S04: capy hoky - capybara ice-hockey! Control a cast of wacky animals in this funny sports game. Play your real or AI friends in versus mode, or team up to compete in the Capy Cup and unlock new animals!

name: Ary and the Secret of Seasons
description: Take control of the seasons and use them to solve puzzles, defeat enemies, and discover the beautiful world of Valdi in this award-winning indie adventure.

name: VICCP
description: VICCP is a Very Important Central Control Panel. Brainstorming / Puzzle / Quest / Point Click. You are using mysterious remote panel that you can control. Find out how it works, make decisions, solve puzzles. The game has a lot of endings that you have to find yourself.

name: Golf Ace
description: Are you ready for an amazing golf experience with up to 12 different players? Complete on the 5 courses that has 18 poles. By completing courses faster than your friends, leave your friends behind on leaderboard and win! More courses, ball customizations and level editor will be added at earlyaccess

name: Monster Gals!!
description: Monster Gals!! comes with a special puzzle formula and 4 cute girls with animal ears and tails. But not only that, they have furry forms as well!

name: Perceptions of the Dead
description: Follow three stories set in a world where the dead linger, and things far worse wait beyond the veil.

name: IIN
description: IIN is a puzzle platformer where you are a soul that controls cubes, overcoming challenges to bring them to the portal which is their goal.

name: Hyzer Sky
description: Challenge three full length disc golf courses with 20 discs of different speed and stability. Play rounds of 18 holes or only the front or back 9 or just practice single holes. Unlock different seasons and more by gaining achievements and break your course records.

name: World Process
description: The world is roughly a futuristic game in which you play as a "human will" rather than God. The main description of the game is an uncertain fate, macro diversity of the future world.

name: My Goddess of Love
description: Well well, what a place! I would never have looked into an elven temple, but I simply have no choice. And what if I still find, how can I have fun?

name: Isle of Jura
description: Take a fishing trip to Jura, a remote and beautiful island. Explore, meet the locals, and catch delicious fish!

name: Sandwalkers
description: Sandwalkers is a roguelike turn-based exploration game. Build your team, traverse varied hostile environments, face countless dangers, and gain knowledge that will help you find and resurrect the Mother Tree Umama.

name: PiraCrash!
description: Unique PVP Shooter! Train, gain skill and sink your friends on this E-Sport Game! Awesome for a party, perfect for you and for your friends!

name: Classic Sport Driving
description: A retro racer for racing lines lovers! Get back to 1990, try to read the road ahead, brake as late as possible, avoid missing the apex, exit curves at the limit and reach the next checkpoint!

name: Ninja: Rise of a Hero
description: The path of the ninja is hard! Can you save your beloved and become a hero?

name: Full Ace Tennis Simulator
description: Full Ace Tennis Simulator is for those seeking unequaled tennis depth and fun.

name: Trigon: Space Story
description: Space roguelike adventure. Take a chance to become a spaceship captain and lead your own crew, make pivotal decisions, and inevitably win tactical battles. Uncover the mysteries of the galaxy, among which is the star of Trigon, the most sinister and enigmatic one.

name: Ephesus
description: Ephesus is an exploration and survival game adorned with a unique story. Write your own destiny through the West Aegean Coast of the glorious Roman Empire. While you're on the path, don't forget to stay alive!

name: 80's Night
description: Endless road, neon lights, palm trees. The game immerses you in the atmosphere of the 80's. Welcome to 80's Night! 80's Night is a car simulator game in which you drive along the endless road and avoid other cars.

name: Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin
description: Discover the true power of rice in Sakuna: Of Rice and Ruin! Take on hordes of demons in side-scrolling combat to reclaim the land as Sakuna, a spoiled harvest goddess banished to a dangerous island. Then, return to your mountain village and tend a field full of glorious rice.

name: {Undefined}
description: A sandbox survival game, set on life-sized voxel planets with realistic physics with the possibility to shape your own building blocks. From your custom made furniture, walls to vehicle parts. You shape the blocks which can then be used to build buildings, spacecraft and aircraft.

name: Scaredom
description: Fight as a Nightmare during their war against the Dreams in this intense, fast-paced action platformer. Become a Nightmare, explore bizarre, handcrafted worlds and uncover ancient secrets in a gorgeous pixel art style.

name: Raygun Chess
description: ​A VR-first, real-time, chess-family strategy board game for 2 to 4 players (AIs included). With very simple and elegant rules, move your pieces, shoot enemies, and the last Leader standing wins.

name: Elementite
description: Elementite is a third-person shooter RPG that fuses natural elements and futuristic firearms in a vast chaotic open world of challenges and secrets in a way never seen before.

name: Explosive Candy World
description: Forget about running and jumping. In Explosive Candy World you have to EXPLODE your way to the end of the level!

name: La Historia De
description: Have you ever wanted to play a tableboard rpg with your friends, but there was no way you could match? This game is for you. It is an environment who allows you to play online Rpg tabletop games. With your characters, maps, atmospheres, music, etc. The game loads all content from the game folder on your computer.

name: Tyrant's Blessing
description: Challenge the dread Tyrant’s undead army in this tactical turn-based fantasy game. Salvage weapons, equipment and supplies from your fallen enemies, build your team of heroes, and reclaim your homeland.

name: The Black Masses
description: The Black Masses is an open world first-person fantasy co-op RPG. The Black Masses features our next generation of crowd rendering technology rebuilt from Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator. Explore a 16 square kilometer island populated by hundreds of thousands of possessed inhabitants.

name: Geometric Sniper - Z
description: A 2D sniper game with zombies like you've never seen! Get ready to blow some heads and good hunting!

name: The Judgement of Q
description: Don't EVER press Q.

name: Quest of Wizard
description: Quest of Wizard is a classic Action Platformer set in a fantasy setting. Go through difficult levels full of dangerous traps and different enemies, fight with bosses, look for chests with gold, open secrets, learn and upgrade spells.

name: Lake
description: It's 1986 - Meredith Weiss takes a break from her career in the big city to deliver mail in her hometown. How will she experience two weeks in beautiful Providence Oaks, with its iconic lake and quirky community? And what will she do next? It's up to you.

name: Off The Chains Disc Golf
description: Off The Chains Disc Golf is a lighthearted disc golf simulation developed for VR from the ground up. Play alone or with friends and learn how to become a disc golf pro with realistic disc flight physics. Earn Chain Link points to unlock new discs and customize your own collection.

name: Creeper World 4
description: The unstoppable fluid enemy has returned and destroyed every world in its path! Defend against Creeper as it floods across the 3D terrain in this real time strategy game where the enemy is a fluid.

name: Claydo:Easy 3D Modelling & Printing
description: Claydo is a simple 3D modelling, design and 3d printing software for desktops.Create models from simple shapes and 3d print them easily with inbuilt STL edit and export.

name: Village Fest: Digging
description: Up to 4 player gold digging competition. Dig gold as much as you can and protect it from others... or be the one who is gonna steal, its up to you.

name: Your Show Has Been Cancelled
description: Your favorite show has been cancelled due to unbelievable circumstances. Take down foes who dare to get in your way in randomly-generated dungeon levels as you adventure to figure out what really happened and bring back your show!

name: Exodus Borealis
description: In this city builder and tower defense game, you will command a small band of ship wrecked colonists. Go from struggling to survive the elements to a thriving kingdom that will smash the demon hordes that dare attack your settlement.

name: Diesel Railcar Simulator
description: Drive vintage diesel trains, shifting gears manually and trying to reach a perfect score. Create new routes, trains and timetables. Share your creations and download new content from the Workshop.

name: Mystery Swords
description: Mystery Swords is a survival game with RPG elements. Your village was attacked by evil orcs. To protect the inhabitants, you, as the best soldier, are sent to explore the forest, but the enemies were much closer than it seemed. Can you stop a whole horde of hostile orcs?

name: Surgical Robot Simulator
description: A real surgical robot simulation game, observe human organs from the inside of the abdominal cavity, and use various instruments to grasp, cut and clip the organs freely to complete the real operation. Be careful not to bleed. Challenge to complete all levels from simple to difficult

name: Overhaul
description: Solve your way through this Sudoku inspired rogue-like dungeon crawler! Venture deep into an abandoned Power Plant, think fast to outwit unforgiving creatures and discover a hand-drawn 2D world filled with secrets.

name: Cossacks II: Napoleonic Wars
description: Cossacks II: Napoleonic Wars sends the player into the heroic XIX century where they assume the role of a commander to take part in the massive historical battles for the supremacy over Europe.

name: Queen's Quest 2: Stories of Forgotten Past
description: Conduct an investigation as shapeshifter!

name: Make It Rain: Love of Money
description: Make it Rain: The Love of The Money is a swiper game, where you have to invest your money in the best way to get richer then get more richer and then be very very rich. Be a business manager and success in your investments! Or otherwise, die in the process and start again to amass a lot of cash!

name: Abo Khashem
description: Start your adventure in the City of Torrid! Fight enemies in a whole new way, develop your entrepreneurial skills, explore dangerous dungeons, and discover hidden treasures! Experience the captivating journey of Abo Khashem.

name: Empires and Tribes
description: Empires and Tribes is a unique hybrid of a medieval city builder and a role-playing game. You will undertake the duties of a mayor in the 13th century and manage the expansion of your city, ensure the production of resources and raise a powerful army to protect yourself from rival principalities.

name: Racecraft
description: Start racing in many asynchronous events for free. Accumulate Season Points each month by competing in Championships, Tournaments and Special Events on always new circuits created by the Racing Authority, climbing to higher licenses. Check out the Premium DLC for even more!

name: Island Farmer - Jigsaw Puzzle
description: Arrange the farm islands and see your archipelago expand. Just swap the blocks of a 3D jigsaw puzzle.

name: God of Riffs
description: Are you ready to rock!? Boss Music Games and VYERSOFT Corp present God of Riffs: an epic, adrenaline pumping, heavy metal VR rhythm game that's like a hard rock album cover come to life!

name: Animals Memory: Cats
description: Animals Memory: Cats is a card game with pictures of different cats that will test your memory. The aim of the game is to find pairs of cards

name: How do you like it, Elon Musk?
description: Take part in a Russian space program. Design spacecrafts and send them off to explore the vast expanses of space. Experience the real scale of the Solar system and the size of its celestial bodies.

name: The Survivalists
description: A living world full of surprises, secrets and danger awaits in The Survivalists, an adventure-filled survival sandbox set in The Escapists universe. Explore, build, craft and even train monkeys with up to three friends in a desperate bid to survive. Have you got what it takes to be a Survivalist?

name: Resolutiion
description: Resolutiion is a zelda-like action-adventure, where an old killer and his AI explore a vast, mysterious world, full of mighty weapons, surreal abilities and gruesome bossfights.

name: After Hours
description: Groundbreaking research is encrypted on a computer from the 80's. Look through the computer and search the internet to crack the encryption in this fully Kickstarter backed augmented reality puzzle game.

name: Aliens Don't Exist
description: The road of adventure sometimes leads to a dead end. Help the courageous space explorer to survive all the attacks of fate and get out of the deadly labyrinth of an unexplored world!

name: Ecchi Spirit
description: Takeshi is a famous exorcist. He had heard about horrible forest spirits attacking people in a small village. Upon arrival, he found out that those spirits are only interested in young maidens... Ecchi Spirit is a point-and-click arcade game focused on erotic experience.

name: Haos
description: A chaotic fast-paced top down shooter in a procedural generated arena with a unique neon style!

name: Attack of the Giant Crab
description: Take control of the Giant Crab and cause the maximum amount of destruction while brushing off the military's puny attempts to stop you.

name: Ragtag Racing
description: Start your engines and join the mayhem in Ragtag Racing. Choose your whacky racer and try to complete all 15 tracks without running out of fuel.

name: INFLUXIS
description: A sci-fi underwater survival and exploration game

name: DEVOUR
description: DEVOUR is a co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. Stop a possessed cult leader before she drags you to hell with her. Run. Scream. Hide. Just don't get caught.

name: GolfTopia
description: DESIGN, BUILD and MANAGE your own futuristic golf course. Keep 200 persistent visitors fed, hydrated, and happy. Defend your creation from a growing infestation of weeds with robotic workers and defensive turrets. Evolve your course into a mega resort where nobody wants to go home, EVER!

name: INCANTAMENTUM
description: INCANTAMENTUM is a folk horror narrative-driven adventure. Explore the isolated moors of rural Victorian England as you uncover the mysteries of Hob's Barrow. The answers lie in the soil...

name: 深渊矿脉
description: This is an open world sandbox game. Currently, it's the first big release. The content of the game includes: domestication, genes, relics, excavation, building, construction and theft

name: Bodies of Water VR
description: Immerse yourself in this new and exciting, VR only, sports-based action arcade game. Learn how to Scuba Dive, Freedive and Snorkel over various action packed, exhilarating and challenging adventures!

name: At Dead Of Night
description: At Dead Of Night is part horror film, part horror game and part ghost hunt. It blends live-action and graphics to create a unique immersive horror experience like no other.

name: Turbo Sloths
description: Become the new star of the Wasteland League. Your task is to bring a multi ton clumsy car to frantically speeds with powerful turbine. Pimp your Turbojunk, set powerful boosters, stock up on active gas and go ahead - show what speed is.

name: Sword And Fairy 2
description: *** This game is only available in Chinese *** 《仙剑奇侠传二》故事发生在一代的8年之后，剧情紧接一代，围绕王小虎、苏媚、沈欺霜、李忆如展开，讲述四人交织出一段错综复杂的故事。一代的主角以及全新人物在二代中出现，交待了前后两代发生过以及即将发生的感情恩怨纠葛。本作首次出现了御灵、虎煞、阵术、养蛊、喂毒等多种战斗和养成系统。

name: Grey Instinct
description: In this cyberpunk 2D point-and-click adventure game, play as Grey, an amateur detective. Unravel the mystery by searching for clues, solving puzzles, talking to the mask-wearing residents of New Corium, and, if you have time, maybe go on a date!

name: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six® Vegas
description: Tom Clancy's Rainbow Six makes its next-generation hardware debut in the most dramatic installment of the renowned first-person shooter franchise to date. Rainbow operatives take to the chaotic streets of Las Vegas as an escalating terrorist siege in 'Sin City' threatens to take world terrorism to new, uncontrollable heights.

name: Pillars of Eternity
description: Prepare to be enchanted by a world where the choices you make and the paths you choose shape your destiny. Obsidian Entertainment, the developer of Fallout: New Vegas™ and South Park: The Stick of Truth™, together with Paradox Interactive is proud to present Pillars of Eternity.

name: From Dust
description: Immerse yourself in a world as exotically beautiful as it is dangerous in this modern God-Game where Nature is the Star!

name: Tommy Tronic
description: Tommy Tronic - an old-skool platformer that isn't trying to be anything else! Jumping, shooting, dodging and exploring is all that's required to help get Tommy to his destination and free his tiny puppy from the clutches of an insane genius school-kid and his brutal sidekick 'Biffa'.

name: Death and the Fly
description: Players will control two very different characters, Death and the Fly. Each character has special skills that must be used to navigate the many traps and puzzles contained in each level. With many interesting ways to die and numerous opponents to face, the player will be challenged and entertained for hours.

name: Roundabout
description: Drive a constantly spinning limousine around town! Roundabout is a '70s B-Movie game where you pick up passengers, find secret collectibles, take on dangerous missions, and fall in love in a far out open world puzzle adventure - all while driving a revolving limo!

name: Musclecar Online
description: Online top-down racing game with a new player-designed racetrack every day. Design your own tracks and race against the ghost recordings of thousands of players around the world. Includes daily and monthly championships, achievements, and leaderboards.

name: DARK SOULS™ III
description: Dark Souls continues to push the boundaries with the latest, ambitious chapter in the critically-acclaimed and genre-defining series. Prepare yourself and Embrace The Darkness!

name: Sakura Dungeon
description: You are Yomi, an ancient fox spirit. Your dungeon has been stolen from you while you have been sealed away in a deep sleep. Capture monster girls, collect loot, explore the dungeon's depths and reclaim what is yours in this first-person RPG dungeon crawler.

name: Warhammer: Vermintide 2
description: The critically acclaimed Vermintide 2 is a visually stunning and groundbreaking melee action game pushing the boundaries of the first person co-op genre. Join the fight now!

name: Fallen
description: Story of a Father who is in search of his son who has fallen in a cave. You play as Father and fight with monsters,ghosts and deadly animals to save your son. This game has also local multiplayer which can be played upto four players.

name: Angels with Scaly Wings / 鱗羽の天使
description: You, the player, are an ambassador for Earth sent through a mysterious portal into the world of dragons. Explore a town full of secrets and the people who keep them in this compelling sci-fi visual novel with slice of life and dating sim elements.

name: The Fan
description: The Fan is an interactive photo fiction with real locations and actors.The game is a first person thriller with a unique twist. Driven by a creepy and unsettling atmosphere, it will take you deep within the darkest places of Paris underground.

name: Desperados III
description: Desperados III is a story-driven, hardcore tactical stealth game, set in a ruthless Wild West scenario. Play smart if you want to succeed. A good plan can make the difference between survival and finding yourself at the business end of a pistol.

name: Stick Fight: The Game
description: Stick Fight is a physics-based couch/online fighting game where you battle it out as the iconic stick figures from the golden age of the internet.

name: Cyberia 2: Resurrection
description: Randomized gameplay - so it's never the same game twice.Action that moves... you can't just shoot your way out of this.Blackout-inducing G-force flying and driving, but don't just hang on or you won't make it.

name: Swarm Simulator: Evolution
description: What is this? A game for ants?!? Hatch a quintillion bugs. Conquer the UNIVERSE!

name: 铁道物语：陆王（Railway Saga:Land King）
description: Become a respected conductor, assemble and match your train lineup at will. In addition to transporting passengers from all walks of life, you can also set up your own factories at various city stations. Mining, planting and breeding all kinds of resources, using the craftsmen's crafts to produce a variety of famous things.

name: Beyond: Two Souls
description: A unique psychological action thriller delivered by A-list Hollywood performances by Elliot Page and Willem Dafoe, Beyond: Two Souls takes you on a thrilling journey across the globe as you play out the remarkable life of Jodie Holmes.

name: Hentai Girl Hime
description: Relax class puzzle game to keep you in a good mood

name: STORY OF SEASONS: Friends of Mineral Town
description: Experience the joys of life on the farm in this reimagining of a timeless STORY OF SEASONS classic!

name: 古剑奇谭三(Gujian3)
description: Gujian 3 is a mass 3D single-person RPG developed by Aurogon Info & Tech (Shanghai), a subsidiary of Wangyuan Shengtang. As the latest hit of the Gujian series, it boasts more free and smooth combat experience with its full real-time combat system. This generation expands the world of Gujian based on previous works.

name: Voidigo
description: Voidigo is a chaotic and colorful roguelite shooter with a focus on dynamic and unique boss fights. Equip the many weapons and powerups to fight back the void corruption throughout the worlds. Hunt or be hunted.

name: Super Bomberman R Online
description: Drop bombs and collect power-ups to blast your way through SUPER BOMBERMAN R ONLINE! You can compete against up to 64 players from around the world in this explosive survival battle.

name: Eternal Dreamers
description: Eternal Dreamers is a battle-focused RPG offering deep tactical combat action. With a wide selection of classes and equipment pieces, the game puts much emphasis on customizability and player choice.

name: Motor Town: Behind The Wheel
description: Enjoy realistic driving in the open world. Relaxing cargo deliveries or driving buses and taxes will give you enough money to buy new cars and parts. You can test your driving skills at the race track. It's all about pure driving pleasure!

name: Iron Conflict
description: Fight for glory in Iron Conflict, an online competitive real-time strategy game that features both modern and WW2 aircrafts and tanks. Make use of military tactics and choose from hundreds of different units to win on the ground and in the air!

name: Scars of Summer
description: A slice of life RPG. Due to family circumstances, Keita finds himself living with his childhood friend Ryoka for the summer. Explore a contemporary Japanese setting, and enjoy spending time with Ryoka.

name: My Singing Monsters
description: Breed them, feed them, listen to them sing! Create an island full of Singing Monsters, then watch your song evolve as you breed and upgrade them. Design and build unique decorations to make your world look just the way you want. You'll love exploring the wonderful fantasy land of the Monster World!

name: River City Girls
description: There's trouble once again in River City, and this time only the girls can save the day! Using a variety of attacks, weapons, and items, these hot-blooded heroines are ready to teach the city’s lowlifes a lesson - either solo or in 2-player co-op! It’s an old-school rumble for a new generation!

name: Ambrosia
description: The apprentice priestess, Flode, heads to the isolated island of Cerbes, in search of her captured friend. Luckily for her, she has the blessing of a deity to help protect her from the evil that she'll encounter.

name: The Rewinder
description: The Rewinder is an adventure puzzle game based on Chinese mythology. You play as Yun, the last known Rewinder, who can communicate with spirits and explore other people's memories to alter the past.

name: WorldBox - God Simulator
description: WorldBox is the ULTIMATE god simulator and sandbox game. Create your own world or destroy it using different powers. Watch civilizations grow, form kingdoms, colonize new lands and sail to far continents. Towns will rebel, empires will fall. It's your choice to help or watch them fight.

name: ВЗЛОМ ЖОПЫ
description: GOTY

name: STAR WARS™ Battlefront™ II
description: Be the hero in the ultimate STAR WARS™ battle fantasy with STAR WARS™ Battlefront™ II: Celebration Edition!

name: Breathedge
description: Survive in outer space! Together with your immortal chicken, discover the truth behind your sudden spaceship crash. Craft tools, pilot vehicles, and even control space stations to survive and explore the wreckage.

name: Subwar 2050
description: Includes the original Subwar 2050 and its expansion, The Plot Deepens.Pilot four types of submarine including deep-sea exploration vessels, reconnaissance subs, and highly maneuverable fighter submarines.

name: Evolva
description: Evolva combines the excitement of a fast paced shoot-em-up with the tactical challenge of commanding a squad. Fight against the alien parasites and save the planet. This is survival of the fittest!Appealing scenery with an other-worldly feelingAn unusual character development system based on mutationsUse your GenoHunters' unique...

name: VR Soccer '96
description: Feel the soccer once again.The first football game to utilize 3D graphics; also known as Actua SoccerCreate your own team and customize it to suit your preferencesPlay with up to 15 of your friends!

name: Bear With Me - Collector's Edition
description: The Bear With Me - Collector's Edition contains all three episodes, telling the whole story of Amber and Ted. It also includes the original soundtrack, a digital art book and full puzzle and script design documents.

name: Demolition Engineer
description: To destroy is easier than to create! You are a crane driver, who came to this town to destroy everything on your way! Crash the buildings as quick as you can, don't leave one stone upon another!

name: Rooten
description: There is only you and the Forest. In "Rooten" there are no compulsory tasks, time just goes by, and days pass by independently of you. You can explore the Forest, try to get out, or even do nothing at all. The forest has always been here, and always will be. You won't change it no matter what.

name: Scarlet Hollow
description: Scarlet Hollow is a horror-mystery game with sharp writing, dark humor, and hand-drawn art from award-winning graphic novelist Abby Howard.

name: Helixteus 3
description: A space-themed incremental game where you manage planets and resources in a quest to dominate the universe with buildings and megastructures.

name: 1f y0u're a gh0st ca11 me here! 幽铃热线
description: 1f y0u're a gh0st ca11 me here! is an adventure where the player must instantly judge the content of multiple conversations that are displayed on the screen at the same time, and continue to make the right choices in order to connect combos!

name: Sprocket
description: Carefully balance mobility, firepower and armour in a dedicated tank designer. Then uncarefully put them to the test in a series of combat scenarios progressing through the ages of the tank. Here, your limit is what you can fit inside your hull and turret while still being able to move forwards.

name: Stumble Guys
description: Race through obstacle courses against up to 32 players online. Run, jump and dash to the finish line until the best player takes the crown!

name: Shades of Sakura
description: Shades of Sakura is a casual physics-based puzzle game. Challenge yourself to get 10 animated scenes with Live2D. Go on a fascinating journey through ancient Japan and our Samurai girls. Connect the balls by drawing lines to win!

name: Samurai Journey
description: In this world, you have to play as a samurai, come into this world inadvertently, and the music box is taken away by the little devil. Get your music box back!

name: Dark Crypt
description: Dark Crypt is a turn-based puzzler with a horror theme. Sneak through an old crypt where an ancient evil slumbers. Its shadow is corrupting the tomb and the once buried bodies now haunt the halls. This evil must be sealed at all cost!

name: Funny puzzle
description: Funny puzzle game is an electronic form of classic puzzles, now you can collect puzzles on your computer! puzzles is not only a game of the mind, where you need logic, intelligence and ingenuity, but also a great way to calm your nerves.

name: ASTLIBRA ～生きた証～ Revision
description: ASTLIBRA Revision is a side scrolling 2D action RPG. It contains various reinforcement elements, exhilarating combat, rare equipment, battles with huge bosses, beautiful art, and long story. Estimated playtime: 40+ hours

name: Fluffert and Friends
description: Meet Fluffert the Owl who likes to hang out with his cute Animal friends in 3D World.

name: Honey Milf
description: Honey milf is a game for training mindfulness, memory and concentration.

name: Marbles on Stream
description: Marbles on Stream is a Marble Racing game for EVERYONE! You can simulate races yourself or stream it on Twitch.tv with your viewers! Many features in game to help interact with your viewers and engage with them in unique ways. 3 ways to play! Download and stream! Download the MoS app on your mobile device! Get on Twitch.

name: Zombie Panic! Source
description: Dive into the zombie apocalypse with Zombie Panic! Source: a cooperative, survival-horror first-person-shooter. A fast-paced standalone modification.

name: A.R.C Alien raid combat
description: A game based on the classic Tower Defense style, assemble your best combination to overcome obstacles, can you do it?

name: Hollow's Land
description: Hollow's Land is relaxing game where you kill skeletons of fire who are trying to put out your bonfire. Throwing snowballs under the northern lights.

name: UNCORPOREAL - "Fluffy!"
description: "Fluffy!", an experimental VR short, is pure camp horror with a script based loosely on the iconic 80's horror film "An American Werewolf in London". A surrealistic motel is imagined in the world of the original film, starring a peculiar bellmen who's obsessed with "pets'. Run length is 1 min 30 secs.

name: Curse of the Crescent Isle DX
description: A curse has befallen the Crescent Isle and it's up to you to save it. Luckily the curse has transformed your people into helpful monsters such as drills, blobs, icicles, and gravity flipping...things. With your monster subjects in hand you'll have to drill through rocks, maneuver through spiky terrain, freeze water to pass over the sea,...

name: Gauntlet of IRE
description: A 35 part obstacle course that is deceptively simple and infuriatingly obvious in the most difficult way.

name: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind
description: Peaky Blinders: Mastermind is a puzzle-adventure game, based on the multi-award-winning TV show. Become the Mastermind as you control key characters and pull off perfectly synchronized plans.

name: Grave Keeper
description: You are The Bounty Hunter and walked into The Forbidden Stronghold. It is taken by The Skeleton King. To collect all treasures you must kill him first.

name: My Little Blacksmith Shop
description: Mine, gather, combine and sell your wares to customers. Play at your pace.

name: Wheels of Aurelia
description: A narrative road trip game set in the roaring Italian 70s, it tells the story of Lella, a restless woman driving on the roads of the western coast of Italy, the famous “Via Aurelia”.

name: Fuel Renegades
description: Fuel Renegades is an epic arcade racing game REAL FREE (no DLC, no loot boxes, just fun), where your brain will produce tons of adrenaline because of the awesome races endings. Play up to four players in the same computer enjoying the polished mechanics that gives you a smooth game feel.

name: Savage Vessels
description: Rogue-like top-down-shooter with pixel-art, physics and hard survival.

name: Night shot
description: This is a very fun, fast and simple game, both adults and children can play it. Each of the players has his own cowboy for whom you need to collect ammunition in order for him to shoot at your opponent.

name: Unsolved Mystery Club: Ancient Astronauts (Collector´s Edition)
description: In the hidden object adventure "Unsolved Mystery Club: Ancient Astronauts", five explorers have disappeared while searching for evidence of ancient astronauts that came from other planets to earth thousands of years ago! Join the Unsolved Mystery Club in the hunt for the missing explorers.

name: Swords and Sandals 2 Redux
description: The world's favourite gladiator game has returned, bigger and more action packed than ever. Swords and Sandals 2: Emperor's Reign, remastered with all new graphics, music and powerful new skills and awesome Arena Champions Pharoah King, John the Butcher and Ultra Flavlus

name: American Patriots: Boston Tea Party
description: Take Boston or die for freedom!

name: Nasty Rogue
description: Mysterious Dungeon Exploration, Secret Items and Powerful Bosses, Fluid Movement Upgrades. Unique Enemies dropping Epic Loot. Level up your Stats, Enchant your weapons and Armor pieces.

name: История бомжа
description: The story of a homeless person is a wonderful story about one cheerful homeless person. This game will be able to immerse you in the world of homelessness. In this excellent game, you will need to collect bottles and turn them in to buy some vodka.

name: Forklift Load
